title: Qixel : Pixel Art Painter
author: Frosby Studios
description: Welcome to Qixel: a simple stylised pixel painting app. Draw pictures with 4 different 'qixel' types: Squares Circles Diamonds and Triangles. What can you make with 651 pixels? Qixel is all about creating minimalist images retro characters and typography with a limited number of pixels and color palette. Make art or just use it to chill out - it's the digital equivalent of popping bubblewrap! When you've made a real pixel masterpiece post it on the Facebook Qixel Gallery! (facebook.com/qixelgallery) Here's what you can do with Qixel: - Draw pictures with 4 different pixel types: Squares Circles Diamonds and Triangles. - The canvas background button flips between black or white. This has a very different effect on your qixels. - Use the darken and lighten buttons to add shade and depth to your art. - The triangle setting has an extra button: Rotation. Try rotating your triangles 90 degrees to make strange patterns and origami-style art. - Use Qixel to make quirky typography. - Write simple messages and greeting cards to send to friends. - Make cool patterns and abstract backgrounds for websites. - Quickly sketch out pixel characters for Minecraft. - Create retro game graphics and then export frames in stages to make animation. - experiment with color: great for artists and color therapy teachers. See some examples here: facebook.com/qixelgallery SAVING IMAGES: (currently 2 methods) A) The Photo button saves a compressed JPG screenshot to your device's camera roll. B) To save a high-resolution image to your device: hold down the HOME button and POWER BUTTON (or volume down button) AT THE SAME TIME. Note from the developer: If this app proves to be useful and popular I will update it. If you have ideas for functionality - please leave feedback on the Google Play Store and a high rating to help me to carry on with the project! Enjoy your qixels :)

title: Darbuka Doumbek
author: GameNICA
description: THIS GAME IS FUNNY! This game is perfect to passing good hours for celebrate the new year like an oriental people. Your android device will be like oriental countries. Darbuka or Doumbek is an oriental rhythm instrumant. This application is a darbuka-doumbek simulator. You will enjoy while playing this exotic instrument. THIS GAME IS EDUCATIVE! Your toddlers will love his application! This application will improve rhythm sense your babies and toddlers. This game may be too advanced for infants under 6 months old. Download Now and enjoy it... CAUTION! Playing the application too much amount of time or leaving the children alone with the mobile phone or tablet pc is not encouraged. Please feel free to notify us! Thank You...

title: Crossy MeMo
author: Mayimbe Network
description: Collect coins tap to change direction do not let the sharks eat you or its game over Crossy Memo is a fun addicting game for all ages come try it.

title: 서클.두
author: LiST Inc.
description: 아이들의 일상은 재미있게 엄마에겐 미소를 ;-) 서클.두는 가족간의 미션과 보상을 통해 아이들의 하루일과 학습 습관등의 관리를 도와줍니다. 또한 가족간의 대화를 보다 풍성하게 해줍니다. - 맞벌이 부모는 아이들이 하루를 어떻게 보내고 있는지 늘 궁금해합니다. - 부모들은 아이들의 생활습관 학업 일상과 관련하여 아이들의 나이에 맞는 단계별 성취를 격려하고 도와주고 싶어합니다. - 아이들과의 대화시간은 충분하지 않으며 그 주제 역시 한정되어 있습니다. 서클.두는 이러한 문제를 가지고 있는 가족들을 위한 서비스입니다. 미션의 생성 수행 완료 그리고 보상을 통해 아이들의 생활습관 학습 그리고 하루 일과를 관리할 수 있습니다. 가족 구성원이 언제나 함께 대화를 나누고 하루를 공유할 수 있습니다. 하루의 멋진 순간이나 특별한 이야기를 가족과 함께 나눌 수 있습니다. 지금 바로 이 순간의 느낌을 아이에게 전달해 보세요. :-) hello@circle.do 로 피드백을 보내주세요. 자세한 사항은 http://circle.do/ 에서 확인해보세요.

title: dondeEsta Family Locator
author: dondeEsta
description: dondeEsta Family Locator Because your family is the most important thing to you we help you to know where they are. dondeEsta Family Locator lets you locate your kids in real time and receive notifications when they arrive or leave school or home. Now you can also know where your car is. One app that connects everything that matters the most to you! dondeEsta Family Locator FEATURES: • Track your kids at any time and in real time by just a simple tap on the screen! • “At home” and “at school” real time indicator: with just a quick glance at the phone screen you will know whether your kids are at home or at school • Receive notifications when your kids arrive or leave school/home • Receive immediate alerts when your kids are not at school during school hours • Receive alerts if your kids didn’t get home when you agreed to • Receive alerts if your kids need help or if they are in danger • Get notifications when your kids need a ride back home • Option for "navigate to" your kid's location • Track and get healthy information in real time about your car • Track your phone when you lose it dondeEsta Family Locator brings peace of mind to families all over the world and helps them connect with their family members. dondeEsta Family Locator is a powerful and accurate family locator available that lets you protect your kids and have peace of mind. dondeEsta Family Locator FREE: • Locate your family at any time and in real time by just a simple tap on the screen! • dondeEsta Family Locator lets you see your family members’ location on a private map • dondeEsta Family Locator gives your kids tools to easily reach you when they need it the most: Panic feature which send you an instantly notification! • Your kids have tools for easily send you a free notification when they are OK or if they need a ride back home • Track your phone when you lose it dondeEsta Family Locator PREMIUM: • Receive different kind of notifications such as alerts if your kids are not at school during school hours! • dondeEsta Family Locator lets you set up curfews! • Receive notifications when your kids arrive or leave home/school • Set up your kids’ school schedule • dondeEsta Family Locator has an “At home” and “at school” real time indicator dondeEsta Family Locator - Kid Tracker is an incredible app for family safety. dondeEsta Family Locator– Kid Tracker brings peace of mind because lets you track your kids phone and connect with them at any time. It has the best GPS tracking technology and it is always free to use! Can we help you? Contact us at info@dondeesta.com and we will get back to you in 24h (English & Spanish support)

title: ChoreMonster
author: ChoreMonster Inc.
description: ChoreMonster makes chores fun by engaging and rewarding your kids! Kids earn points by completing chores to use towards rewards like an hour of video games or a camping trip. Parents get an easy-to-use tool that takes the tension out of household chores. Kids also earn tickets to the Monster Carnival for each chore completed where they can win and collect our monsters. With ChoreMonster your kids will beg to do their chores! Don't just take our word for it though. Here’s what ChoreMonster users are saying: ✭✭✭✭✭ “Set the kids up on ChoreMonster. So far it's a hit in the household with K wanting to complete a week's worth of chores by 8:00 am.” ✭✭✭✭✭ “Incredible things happening since I installed ChoreMonster app. My boys can't wait to help around the house!” ✭✭✭✭✭ “Day one of using ChoreMonster and the kids were pumped...woke up early to log on and asked for more chores when I tucked them in.” Plus we've been featured in trusted media outlets like Mashable The New York Times The Wall Street Journal CNBC TechCrunch and more. ChoreMonster is best for ages 4 through 12 but works with ages 3 through 15. See you soon!

title: Kidz Camera
author: 6th Element Creations
description: Simple clean and easy to use camera app for kids. Ad free and no in-app purchases. Kidz Camera is a camera app entirely separate from the phone’s main camera and gallery designed specifically for kids. This kid’s camera app has several features that kids will never know are there and parents can't live without. Stop spending time worrying about your child filling up your phone’s storage with an endless number of fuzzy pictures and pictures of feet. Kidz Camera app contains the following features: Separate Storage: All pictures taken within the camera app stay in the app thus not filling up your main camera gallery. Storage Limit: Set a limit to the number of photos and videos anywhere between 1-50 a child can take within the app. When photos are taken above the limit the oldest photo simply deletes out of the app gallery making room for the new photo. Parent Pin: The parent pin prevents unwanted changes to the settings and allows for the rare good photo to be saved to the device’s main gallery. The parent pin is created the first time the app is opened. After changes are made in the settings the user will be prompted to enter the parent pin before the changes are saved. If the parent pin is entered incorrectly three times the app will simply return to the app camera. Love a Photo: You can export any photos you want to keep from the kid’s camera app gallery to your main gallery by clicking the download icon and simply entering the parent pin. Parent Pin Reset: Don’t know or remember your parent pin? No worries just do a simple math problem. Video Time Limit: Set a maximum number of seconds a video can be up to 60 seconds per video thus allowing videos not to take up all of your storage. Draw on photos: Kids can paint/draw on any photo they want as long as the photo was taken in Kidz Camera app. Optional Delete Entire App Gallery: After a set amount of time (0 to 12 hours) the entire app gallery can automatically be deleted further freeing up your storage. This feature can be turned on or off easily in the settings of the kid’s camera.

title: Stop-Motion Movie Creator
author: Mattel
description: Direct Record and Edit Your Own Minecraft Stop-Motion Movies! The Minecraft Stop-Motion Movie Creator app makes it easy to produce your own stop-motion movies starring your favorite Minecraft Mini-Figures. In just a few simple steps you’ll be bringing Steve Creepers and other Minecraft characters to life! Once you’ve built your set and your cast is in place the Minecraft Stop-Motion Movie Creator will transform your iPhone iPad or iPod touch into an animation studio giving you the power to record whatever you can imagine one magical frame at a time. And the fun doesn’t stop there. The app includes editing tools visual filters original music tracks and sound effects from the game to help you craft the most epic movie ever! When you’re done save your movie to your library to watch later and start creating your next movie masterpiece right away! “Block-Buster” Features • Record edit and save stop-motion movies frame by frame • Customize your movie with original music tracks and sound effects from the world of Minecraft • Use filmmaking tools like onion skinning and on-screen movement guides to make the best movie you can • Enhance your movie with visual filters and add customized credits at the end • Create an original movie poster specifically for your movie • Check out the demo video recorded by the Mojang team and let it inspire your own stop-motion movie creation Compatible Devices: Android 4.2.2 (Jelly Bean) and above Device must have a rear-facing camera We reserve the right to terminate the Minecraft Stop-Motion Movie Creator app after June 1 2017. For further questions about the Minecraft Stop-Motion Movie Creator app please contact customer support at www.service.mattel.com

title: DooApp Kids Chores and Rewards
author: Jacob Kemsley
description: A tool for parents to reward children for achievements good behaviour and completing chores. Children earn points which they can redeem for fun activities. Recognise your kids efforts motivate and provide them with incentives. Key Features: * Quick and easy to setup * Points balance and transaction history * Award points for being good * Redeem points for fun activities * Simplified child interface * Child can tick off tasks and claim rewards parent sent notification to approve or decline * Online support provided * Free no in-app purchases no ads no hidden costs * Secure and private Benefits: * Provides incentives * Motivates your children * Makes children more active * Recognise good effort * Children learn to save * Encourages children to complete chores * Creates a dialogue between parents and children * Teaches children to be responsible * Boosts confidence * Helps unorganised kids become organised Setup: 1. Parent downloads the app and creates a free account 2. Parent adds children 3. Create awards - involve children in creating awards 4. Create rewards - involve children in creating rewards 5. If child login is enabled and the child has their own mobile device they can download and install the app

title: Name your babe
author: Thomas Tursics
description: The encyclopedia of names for parents-to-be to find a name for their baby It has never been so easy to find the perfect fitting given name for your babe! The app shows you a given name popular in your region. You don't like it? Simply shake your smartphone and you will get a new name. THERE IS NO EASIER WAY! All features at a glance: - New random given name by shaking your smartphone - Mark and remember favorite names - Selection from 5000+ names - Popular given names in your region from the last 10 years - For free and without advertisements The most popular given names for girls and boys in: - Austria (Engerwitzdorf Graz Linz Lower Austria City of Salzburg State of Salzburg Styria Tyrol Upper Austria Vienna Vorarlberg) - Germany (Berlin Bonn Bremen Chemnitz Cologne Essen Hamburg Moers Munich Münster Nuremberg Paderborn and Ulm) - Switzerland (Zurich) - More regions to come I'd love to enhance "Name your babe". Therefore your ideas and feedback are very welcome! And if you would like to have the app also translated into your language I appreciate your assistance! Here's what critics say about "Name your babe": "For those still undecided there is also the funny function to find a name for your young via a random generator. [...] Since there are many names in the data base there will be something for everyone." - Kronen Zeitung "Among others the mobile app 'Name your babe' stands a chance to get the special award of the community Engerwitzdorf." - Wiener Zeitung Awards for "Name your babe" up till now: - Winner of the CeBIT myApp Factory 2013 - Finalist at the apps4austria Award 2013 Do you like "Name your babe"? - Become a fan on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/nameyourbabe - Visit my website: http://tursics.de - Rate "Name your babe"

title: UEC Astroid
author: UEC Solutions
description: Mit dieser App können Geburtshoroskope gedeutet werden. Es wird ein mehrseitiger Test mit Deutungen generiert. Es sind verschiedene Prominente mit Ihren Daten voreingestellt. Die Horoskopdaten können auf Facebook geteilt werden.

title: LEGO® 3D Katalog
author: The LEGO Group
description: Erwecke deinen LEGO Katalog zum Leben! Mithilfe dieser App kannst du dir die neuen LEGO Produkte als tolle 3D-Animationen ansehen und sie von allen Seiten betrachten. Halte dein Smartphone oder Tablet über das Produkt im Katalog – genau dort wo du das gelbe App-Symbol siehst. Und los geht's! Neben den 3D-Animationen findest du auch unterhaltsame kleine Geschichten tolle Produktfunktionen und 360°-Ansichten des Modells. Und wenn du keinen gedruckten Katalog zur Hand hast kannst du mit der App im Online-Katalog stöbern. Bei Fragen und Problemen bitte den LEGO Kundenservice kontaktieren. Kontaktinformationen findest du unter http://service.lego.com/contactus Unsere Datenschutzbestimmungen sowie unsere Nutzungsbedingungen werden automatisch akzeptiert sobald die App heruntergeladen wird. Weitere Informationen unter http://aboutus.lego.com/legal-notice/Privacy-Policy und http://aboutus.lego.com/en-us/legal-notice/terms-of-use-for-apps LEGO und das LEGO Logo sind Marken der LEGO Gruppe. ©2015 The LEGO® Group.

title: まいにち！アンパンマン
author: Forecast Communications Inc.
description: ※Facebookへの投稿機能が利用いただけない場合がございます。 現在対応中ですので、今しばらくお待ちください。 ご迷惑をおかけ致しますが、どうぞよろしくお願い致します。 ::: ＊:::＊:::＊:::＊:::＊:::＊:::＊:::＊:::＊:::＊:::＊::: 【2015/3/19更新】 まいにち！アンパンマンがより可愛いデザインに変わって登場♪ ”おうち型のケーキ土台”や、かわいい”あめ細工”パーツが追加されたよ！ アンパンマンファンくらぶ機能追加！ アンパンマンのサイトやアプリなど、デジタルコンテンツ共通の会員登録サービスがスタート！ ・アプリを起動すると表示されるログイン画面の｢今すぐ登録｣ボタンからご登録いただけます。 ・アンパンマンファンくらぶに登録せずに、アプリを利用いただくこともできます。 もりだくさんの会員特典については、ここからチェック！ PC⇒ http://anpanman.jp/fanclub/ スマホ⇒ http://anpanman.jp/sp/fanclub/ スマートフォンでも、アンパンマンやなかまたちといつでも一緒！ お子さまの誕生日や運動会などの大切な日付まで何日か、あるいはすでに何日経ったかを教えてくれるアプリです。 オリジナルケーキを作ることや、ワンアクションで遊べる｢クラッカー｣など、お子さまと一緒に遊べるおたのしみ機能も満載です。 ------------------------------------------------------------ ■主な機能 ◎カウント 記録しておきたい日付のカウントダウン/カウントアップをなかまたちのアイコンで表示します。 ・グリッド表示/リスト表示の切り替え ・アイコンは7キャラ、35種類 ・誕生日設定の場合は、アイコンを写真画像設定可能 ・誕生日設定はアドレス帳からの読み込み機能あり ・カテゴリー10件（任意で追加可能） ・並び替え機能（カウント日数・期日・名前・更新日で昇降順の表示選択可能） ・誕生日当日スペシャルケーキでお祝い ◎おたのしみ -ケーキこうじょう オリジナルケーキを、かんたんなドラッグ操作で作ることができます。 ・オリジナルケーキを作成（ケーキパーツ240点以上！） ・メール送信機能 ・Twitter/Facebook画像投稿 ・端末保存 -ケーキギャラリー（アプリ内アルバム保存） -ろうそくけし -クラッカー ■ワンポイント ◎カウント ・「誕生日」のカテゴリ選択時は、誕生日を過ぎると再びカウントダウンになります。 ・「誕生日」のカテゴリ以外は、イベント当日を過ぎるとカウントアップに切り替わります。 ・生まれて何日経ったかをカウントしたいときはカテゴリーは「誕生日」以外を選択してください。 ◎おたのしみ ・ケーキにデコレーションできるアイテムは50個までです。 ・ケーキを作っている途中、アイテムを消したいときは、「ひとつまえ」ボタンを押すか、カテゴリエリアなど画面の外に移動してください。 ・ろうそく消しは、息を吹きかける以外に指をタップしても消すことができます。 ■販売価格 税込：411円 ■利用条件 このアプリケーション内で使用されているイラスト・画像の無断転載を固く禁じます。 著作権等の一切の権利は、有限責任事業組合アンパンマンデジタル及び、やなせたかし、株式会社フレーベル館、株式会社トムス・エンタテインメント、日本テレビ放送網株式会社に帰属します。 (C)やなせたかし／フレーベル館・ＴＭＳ・ＮＴＶ (C)APDLLP 提供：株式会社フォアキャスト・コミュニケーションズ ::: ＊:::＊:::＊:::＊:::＊:::＊:::＊:::＊:::＊:::＊:::＊::: ※Android用アプリケーションは、Android OS 2.3以降が必要です。 ※タブレット端末非対応

title: それいけ！アンパンマン
author: Forecast Communications Inc.
description: スマートフォンでも、アンパンマンやなかまたちといつでも一緒！ 「それいけ！アンパンマン」の世界を紹介！さらに２つのモードで遊べる「ぬりえ」、有料版「まいにち！アンパンマン-カウントしよう！あれから何日？あと何日？-」の体験版が遊べるアンパンマンの無料アプリです。 アンパンマンファンくらぶへの登録機能も新登場！！ ::: ＊:::＊:::＊:::＊:::＊:::＊:::＊:::＊:::＊:::＊:::＊::: アンパンマンファンくらぶ機能登場！ アンパンマンのサイトやアプリなど、デジタルコンテンツ共通の会員登録サービスがスタート！ ・アプリを起動すると表示されるログイン画面の｢今すぐ登録｣ボタンからご登録いただけます。 ・アンパンマンファンくらぶに登録せずに利用いただくこともできます。 もりだくさんの会員特典については、ここからチェック！ PC⇒ http://anpanman.jp/fanclub/ スマホ⇒ http://anpanman.jp/sp/fanclub/ ::: ＊:::＊:::＊:::＊:::＊:::＊:::＊:::＊:::＊:::＊:::＊::: ※Facebookへの投稿機能が利用いただけない場合がございます。 現在対応中ですので、今しばらくお待ちください。 ご迷惑をおかけ致しますが、どうぞよろしくお願い致します。 ■主な機能 ◎アンパンマンのせかい アンパンマンの世界の紹介をご覧いただけます。（※ネット接続が必要です。） -「やなせたかしせんせい」 -「えほんのしょうかい」 -「えいが」 -「テレビ」 -「アンパンマンのれきし」 -「なかまのしょうかい」 ◎ぬりえ 6種類の下絵でキャラクターたちに色をぬって遊べる機能です。 -フリーハンドで色を塗ることができる｢じゆうにぬりえ｣ -タッチすると塗りつぶされる｢きれいにぬりえ｣ ・メール送信機能 ・Twitter/Facebook画像投稿 ・端末保存 ・アルバム(アプリ内アルバム保存) ◎まいにち！アンパンマン mini 「まいにち！アンパンマン-カウントしよう！あれから何日？あと何日？-」のminiバージョンをお試しいただけます。 最大4つまでお誕生日を登録でき、「お誕生日まであと何日？」とキャラクターのアイコンでわかりやすく表示します。 ※有料版ではカウントダウン/カウントアップ機能どちらも設定可能です。 ◎おしらせ スマートフォンコンテンツの最新情報がわかる「おしらせ」ボタンです。 新着情報があると「new」のふきだしが表示されます。 ※「おしらせ」ページを表示するにはインターネット接続が必要です。 ※「おしらせ」をタップするとブラウザが起動します。アプリに戻る場合は端末のBACKキーをご利用ください。 ■ワンポイント ◎ぬりえ ・ぬりえをしている途中、失敗したときは「ひとつまえ」ボタンを押して、ひとつ前からぬりなおすか、｢けしゴム｣で消してください。 ・キャラクターの色がわからなくなったときは、｢おてほん｣ボタンを押して、参照できます。 ・｢きれいにぬりえ｣を選択した際は、パレットには本来のキャラクターに使用されるクレヨンのみ表示されます。 また、タップした箇所の近くにある同色の領域が、自動的に着色されます。 ◎まいにち！アンパンマン mini ・体験版では「まいにち！アンパンマン-カウントしよう！-あれから何日？あと何日？-のカウント機能のうち、お誕生日のカウントダウンのみお試しいただけます。 ■利用条件 このアプリケーション内で使用されているイラスト・画像の無断転載を固く禁じます。 著作権等の一切の権利は、有限責任事業組合アンパンマンデジタル及び、やなせたかし、株式会社フレーベル館、株式会社トムス・エンタテインメント、日本テレビ放送網株式会社に帰属します。 (C)やなせたかし／フレーベル館・ＴＭＳ・ＮＴＶ (C)APDLLP 提供：株式会社フォアキャスト・コミュニケーションズ ※Android用アプリケーションは、Android OS 2.3以降を推奨OSと致します。 ※タブレット端末非対応

title: Markers
author: Daniel Sandler
description: Markers is a simple multitouch pressure-sensitive drawing app. Some of its features include: Pressure sensitivity that works with most Android devices: As more of your finger or capacitive stylus touches the glass Markers will draw a thicker line. NOTE: It may take a minute or two of continuous drawing for Markers to adjust to your device’s touch panel so be patient! (If your device has an active stylus like the Galaxy Note or HTC Flyer the true stylus pressure will be used instead.) Multitouch painting: Two fingers make two lines three make three and so on up to the limits of your device (typically 5 simultaneous touches for phones and 10 for tablets). Kid-friendly interface: Every pen size and color is on-screen; multitouch drawing means accidental touches (such as kid hands on the edges of the display) won't prevent any little fingers from painting. Plays well with others: Share your drawings to other apps and share images into Markers to draw on top of them. [New in 1.2] Pan and zoom: By far the #1 most requested Markers feature! Tap the hand tool to switch into zoom mode; use one finger to scroll and two to zoom. [New in 1.2] Adjustable brushes: Longpress a brush and drag to adjust the minimum and maximum widths. [New in 1.2] Android 4.4 (KitKat) immersive mode: When you tap the Markers icon to hide the palettes the status and navigation bars hide too; you can use the entire screen to draw. Tap the icon to show everything again. Questions? Bugs? Ideas? Click “Email Developer” below. Got a great drawing to share with the world? Share it with +Markers on Google+: http://dsandler.org/markers/+ Markers is open source software; the code is available here: http://dsandler.org/markers Thanks for all your kind words and support! ♥ FAQ Why is my drawing all black when I save it to Gallery? — The drawing is actually on a transparent background so you're seeing Gallery's black background through it. When you load it back into Markers or send it to another app you'll see that the drawing is intact. If you'd prefer an opaque background longpress on a color swatch in the palette to set the paper color. What's up with the pressure sensitivity on my device? — See http://code.google.com/p/markers-for-android/wiki/DeviceSupport for known issues about individual devices.

title: LEGO® 3 D Catalogue
author: The LEGO Group
description: Bring your LEGO catalogue to life! You can use this app to view the new LEGO products as entertaining 3D animations and explore them from all sides. Hold your phone or tablet over the product in the catalogue where you see the yellow app icon. And off you go! Among the 3D animations you will find amusing little stories great product features and 360° views of the models. Even when you don’t have the printed catalogue to hand you can use the app to browse the online catalogue. For app support contact LEGO Consumer Service. For contact details refer to http://service.lego.com/contactus Our privacy policy and terms of use for apps are accepted if you download this app. Read more on http://aboutus.lego.com/legal-notice/Privacy-Policy and http://aboutus.lego.com/en-us/legal-notice/terms-of-use-for-apps LEGO and the LEGO logo are trademarks of the LEGO Group. ©2014 The LEGO Group.

title: Crazy Drum Pads
author: GameNICA
description: THIS GAME IS FUNNY! This drum pads is very funny that allow your baby to be a professionel DJ. Your little one will love this drum pads game. When they played for the first time your todddlers and babies may not be able to correctly touch the drum pads with his/her little hand. Play the "Crazy Drum Pads" game with your baby continuously for a few hours or days and you will be surprised at the mobile development of your baby's hands. "Crazy Drum Pads" game must be played in the presence of a mother or father and it is encouraged for you to guide your baby through the game for a few days at first. WHEN TO PLAY! When your baby is hungry or will not stop crying playing this game can hold your baby's attention. (The various sounds animated shapes stimulate your baby's curiosity.) This game is exceptionally handy for mothers and fathers who spend time with their babies but cannot figure out how to spend that time usefully. This game may be too advanced for infants under 6 months old. CAUTION! Playing the application too much amount of time or leaving the children alone with the mobile phone or tablet pc is not encouraged. Please feel free notify us! Thank You.

title: Video Editor
author: WeVideo Inc.
description: The best way to create edit and publish videos for free on Android. Get this powerful and easy-to-use storyboard-style video editor for exporting videos to YouTube Facebook Instagram and more. Enjoy an intuitive interface and animated interactions where you can see your images and video clips on a visual storyboard. Start a video on your mobile device and pick up where you left off on our full-featured desktop video editor. The WeVideo video editor has been featured in TechCrunch The Next Web Wired CNET ReelSEO and more! MAIN FEATURES + Use photos and videos from your gallery or capture from the app + Trim and arrange your clips + Narrate your story with voice over recording + Add effects to your movies or slideshows with a selection of themes + Overlay titles and captions + Use your own music + Publish in HD (720p) + Save videos to the gallery or share them to Facebook YouTube Twitter and more! Love the WeVideo video editor? Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/wevideo Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/wevideo

title: Pictagrid
author: IT Nilsson
description: Find the spelling of an object in a word maze.

title: Toddler Sing and Play 2 Pro
author: landoncope.com
description: Your kids will love singing along with these games: • Old MacDonald Had A Farm • Five Little Ducks • Five Little Speckled Frogs • Mary Had A Little Lamb Designed for ages 2 and up these games help your children learn popular songs while interacting in a fun and creative way. ***Old MacDonald Had A Farm*** Play with 18 animals including typical farm animals such as a cow horse pig and sheep and non-typical farm animals such as an alligator frog lion and snake. Choose an animal for each verse and interact with the farm! ***Five Little Ducks*** This counting song has five cute ducklings that love to play! As the song progresses the ducklings get fewer and fewer in number until there are none left and mama duck has to go find them. Watch and interact with the ducks as they fly around and play in the water. See if you can tap the butterfly! ***Five Little Speckled Frogs*** A counting song that features five unique frogs that love to eat bugs - and there is an endless supply of bugs! As the song progresses the frogs jump in the water until there are none left. Tap on the bugs to eat them move the frogs around touch the sailboats and more! ***Mary Had A Little Lamb*** A classic song that is often a first for children. This song features Mary her lamb four verses and a world that builds as the song progresses. Make it snow and make it green ring the school bell play with the school children pick apples and more!

title: Всяка Музяка - karaoke game
author: Nravo Kids
description: Всяка Музяка - Ukrainian music karaoke game for toddlers and young preschoolers (3-6 years). Well-known folk songs for children now sound in a new way in the performance of Andriy Kuz'menko and in modern arrangement of his team. Every song game is a separate little world full of charismatic heroes; interesting animations; hidden objects which have to be found and tasks which have to be fulfilled. MEET: ● "Лисичка-сестричка" - a song about a charming fox and her whole fox family about their fairy home about interesting activities and entertainments of all forest inhabitants. ● "Два веселі гусі" - a story about two geese who ran away from a granny and made their own boyish hiding place in the forest. Ice-cream cars firecrackers musical instruments and strange devices - all that is needed to make children happy! ● "Ходить гарбуз по городу" -- a story about outstandingly talented vegetables and their growth from small grains to a ready harvest under the supervision of a wise Pumpkin. FEATURES: ● Possibility not only to listen to the songs and study them but also to sing them in karaoke mode; ● Every mini-game has got its own “Achievements board” with tasks to be fulfilled. This is a great feature to train children’s attentiveness; ● In the story about Pumpkin there’s a possibility to get additional characters when growing required sets of vegetables. Children can get acquainted with how to grow plants train their logical thinking and counting skills; ● Intuitive and user-friendly interface designed for children from 3 years; ● “Parental control” feature - ability to limit the play time. Try “Всяка музяка” app enjoy singing playing and learning! ABOUT US. Nravo Kids is a cooperative project of Nravo company (international mobile game developer) and active Ukrainian parents who feel the lack of high-quality learning programs for early child development. LIKE US: https://www.facebook.com/nravokids.community VISIT US: http://nravokids.com WATCH US: https://www.youtube.com/user/NravoKids

title: Professional Piano For Kids
author: GameNICA
description: Very easy application to learn to play the piano on your tablet or phone! "Professional Piano For Kids" will teach you playing thr piano.Music notes section will teach you to read sheet music. You can find the sheet music of 5 easy songs. This piano game is included everything you need to become a great pianist. You will learn how to read sheet music. You will be a great pianist with this piano game. ★★★ Main features ★★★ ✔ Full 88 key keyboard ✔ 6 Different keyboard instruments ✔ Sustain

title: Drum For Toddlers
author: GameNICA
description: THIS GAME IS FUNNY! This drum is very funny that allow your baby to be a drummer. This game is very funny for the preschool children. They will love this game.Your little one will love this drum game. When they have played for the first time your todddlers and babies may not be able to correctly touch the drums with his/her little fingers. Play the Toddlers Drum game with your baby continuously for a few hours or days and you will be surprised at the mobile development of your baby's hands. This game will be first drum lesson of your toddler for preschool. Toddlers Drum game must be played in the presence of a mother or father and it is encouraged for you to guide your baby through the game for a few days at first. WHEN TO PLAY! When your baby is hungry or will not stop crying playing this game can hold your baby's attention. (The various sounds animated shapes stimulate your baby's curiosity.) This game is exceptionally handy for mothers and fathers who spend time with their babies but cannot figure out how to spend that time usefully. This game may be too advanced for infants under 6 months old. CAUTION! Playing the application too much amount of time or leaving the children alone with the mobile phone or tablet pc is not encouraged. Please feel free to notify us! Thank You...

title: NumSum
author: Pedro M.Renaut
description: NumSum is a game that enhances mental alertness basic logic and calculation speed while sharpening visual perception and mathematical planning. It is highly recommended for mathematical development of both children and adults. NumSum is also beneficial to seniors due to the fact that it activates areas of the brain rarely used after a certain age. Use the power of the Sum to move through different screens trying to outdo your friends in 5 different worlds (the Decimal Roman Numeral Cards Dice and Hexadecimal Worlds)... Enjoy this challenge which trains your mind. Suitable for anyone who can add ...Do you dare? Instructions: You have 100 seconds for each game. When the clock reaches zero the game ends. Each panel has a set of 25 tiles (5x5) which you must remove by selecting groups of 2 3 4 or 5 tiles that together add up to any of the target numbers (targets) which appears at the top to the left of the Score. The score for each set of tiles is as follows: 2 tiles = 50 points 3 = 100 points 4 = 150 points 5 = 200 points If the sum is not correct the tiles will not disappear and you should disable those you think necessary to achieve the desired result. Remember that time is running out! When less than 8 tiles remain on the screen the 'Pass' button lights up. When clicked the next level will appear and 25 seconds will be added to your clock. When you manage to remove all of a panel's tiles ('Perfect') you get 50 seconds added to your clock and the score multiplier (located under the 'Pass' button) goes up to the next level (x1-x2-x3-x4-x5-x10). This multiplies the points of each group of tiles so that a group of 2 tiles with the multiplier at x10 = 500 points. If there are 8 or more tiles remaining and you cannot add any more as a last resort you can use the 'Panic' button to move to the next level. Remember that you can press that botton only three times per game. NumSum has 5 Maps available with different degrees of difficulty:. The Decimal Number Map (1-9) with targets ranging from 5 to 25. The Dice Map (1-6) with targets ranging from 5 to 24. The Roman Numeral Map (1-10) with targets ranging from 5 to 40. The Card Map (1-13) [AK] with targets ranging from 5 to 50. The Hexadecimal Numbers Map (1-15) [1-F] with targets ranging from 5 to 60. In the store you can buy lives as well as open whichever Map you wish. Once you have purchased a map it will be available provided that you have lives to play it. Lives can be used on any map you have opened. Enjoy this simple but addictive challenge which also trains your brain. Do you know how to add?... Prove it with NumSum!

title: SketchBook Express
author: Autodesk Inc.
description: Autodesk SketchBook Express for Tablets is a professional-grade paint and drawing application designed for android devices with screen sizes of 4" and above. SketchBook Express offers a dedicated set of sketching tools and delivers them through a streamlined and intuitive user interface. Use it to digitally capture your ideas as napkin sketches or produce artwork on-the-go. With the same paint engine as the renowned SketchBook Pro software SketchBook Express delivers sophisticated brushes and pencils. Features: ✓ Full Screen work space with support for any device orientation (portrait orientation for smaller screen sizes) ✓ Multi-touch navigation with a 2500% zoom ✓ Up to 3 layers you can merge and toggle visibility • Opacity control on each layer ✓ Import layer from the Gallery on your device or Camera ✓ Save to the Gallery on your device ✓ 15 Preset Brushes including Flood fill tool • Synthetic pressure sensitivity (brush fade-off) • Smooth brush stroking ✓ Add text to current layer ✓ 4 Different draw styles ✓ Free Transform Tool for current layer ✓ Dynamic symmetric drawing ✓ Color Wheel ✓ Share your art directly from inside SketchBook to deviantART the largest online social network for artists and art enthusiasts ✓ Browse the Autodesk-SketchBook group on deviantART from the in-app Gallery

title: Toddler Sing and Play 2
author: landoncope.com
description: Your kids will love singing along with these games: • Old MacDonald Had A Farm • Five Little Ducks • Five Little Speckled Frogs • Mary Had A Little Lamb Designed for ages 2 and up these games help your children learn popular songs while interacting in a fun and creative way. ***Old MacDonald Had A Farm*** Play with 18 animals including typical farm animals such as a cow horse pig and sheep and non-typical farm animals such as an alligator frog lion and snake. Choose an animal for each verse and interact with the farm! ***Five Little Ducks*** This counting song has five cute ducklings that love to play! As the song progresses the ducklings get fewer and fewer in number until there are none left and mama duck has to go find them. Watch and interact with the ducks as they fly around and play in the water. See if you can tap the butterfly! ***Five Little Speckled Frogs*** A counting song that features five unique frogs that love to eat bugs - and there is an endless supply of bugs! As the song progresses the frogs jump in the water until there are none left. Tap on the bugs to eat them move the frogs around touch the sailboats and more! ***Mary Had A Little Lamb*** A classic song that is often a first for children. This song features Mary her lamb four verses and a world that builds as the song progresses. Make it snow and make it green ring the school bell play with the school children pick apples and more!

title: Toddler Sing and Play
author: landoncope.com
description: Your kids will love singing along with these games: • Twinkle Twinkle Little Star • Itsy Bitsy Spider • You Are My Sunshine • I'm A Little Teapot Designed for ages 2 and up these games help your children learn popular songs while interacting in a fun and creative way. ***Twinkle Twinkle Little Star*** Drag the stars into place and watch as the scene progresses until you have a full starry night with clouds mountains the moon twinkling stars and a few surprise animals. Plus your children may learn a new verse or two along the way (did you know the original song has five verses?). ***Itsy Bitsy Spider*** Spiders crawling everywhere! Make it rain make it shine get the spiders to go up the spout. Lots of silly spider actions and noises and a few farm animals waiting to be played with! ***You Are My Sunshine*** Hurry put all of your toys away before the sun goes down! This game features a kid's room with lots of objects to interact with from toys to bouncing balls to books. This game is perfect for children who love to organize! ***I'm A Little Teapot*** In this kitchen your toddler will have fun playing with different teapots and dozens of kitchen items. Turn on the stove explore the cupboards and watch as the happy teapots perform the song actions!

title: Gaby Estrella Karaokê
author: Globosat
description: No Karaokê da Gaby Estrella você vai poder: - Cantar as suas músicas favoritas de Gaby Estrella com a voz dos personagens ou sozinho - Escolher os cenários da fazenda para brincar - Gravar a sua performance E em breve ainda mais músicas para você!

title: Brick'um
author: SlowSeer
description: A fun breakout / brick breaker style game with a few different game-play modes. - Campaign Mode: Play through a few campaigns with different brick shapes and layouts. - Free Play: Play in a level where blocks re-spawn and the ball gets faster and faster the longer you survive. - Kid Mode: An easier version of Campaign Mode. The ball is a little slower and the player cant lose. The game is free has no adds no purchases and requires no permissions check it out! Requires a widescreen (16:9 or 16:10) horizontal resolution.

title: 3 en raya gratis
author: Onlinegratis
description: Jugar al clásico juego de 3 en raya también llamado juego del gato  totito triqui triqui traka tres en gallo michi debe alinear 3 figuras Iguales todas las figuras para poder ganar Tienes varios Niveles para que te superes desde fácil medio o Muy difícil que nunca ganaras solo puedes elegir también llevar la puntación y las veces que has ganado como podemos ver en las Imagines de la aplicación gratis para Android En Idioma Español .. Nivel 0 - Fácil como jugar contra una Mosca. Nivel 1 - Versión original. Nivel 2 - Usted podría ganar ... pero sólo si la fuerza esta contigo. Nivel 3 - Para superdotados Muy difícil que a súper computadora te deje ganar.

title: Kids Fun Animal Piano Free
author: App Family
description: App Family is proud to introduce "Animal Piano" bringing you laughter and fun with 3 hilarious pianos beautiful HD graphics and high-quality sounds. You play by pressing directly on the cheerfully animated characters. As you play random effects change the piano keys for variation and fun! In this free version 3 pianos are available. Play with all 9 in the PRO version! Parental guidance information: - No third-party advertisements. - Suggested age group is children aged 2 - 4 depending on previous touchscreen game experience. - The game encourages basic manipulation skills (touch) musical skills (scale of notes) and imaginative play For more fun check out our other fun kids games! Technical information: - Installs to SD card if available. - Anonymous usage statistics are collected via Google Analytics hence the requirement for Internet access. We do this only to improve the game experience of future versions. The only statistic collected is the number of times each piano is played. Music: Kevin MacLeod

title: Ninja Math
author: Thinking Garden
description: Ninja Math is fundamentally a math game with a physics-based puzzle twist. Enjoy 36 levels of this exciting game while practicing math skills in all the basic arithmetic operators: addition subtraction multiplication and division. Not only do you have to safely get the Ninja to an answer gong it has to be the one with the correct answer to the math problem! That makes for double the fun while exercising both your math and physics puzzle skills. Ninja Math also includes the option to customize (turn on or off) each of the math types independently and to set a global difficulty level (easy medium hard) to accommodate a wide range of grade levels and math skills from kindergarten through 5th grade. Such flexibility also allows for drilling students on weak skills or reinforcing current skills while they enjoy a challenging physics puzzle game with great graphics and sound effects. Key features: • Three difficulty levels - easy medium and hard ranging from single digit problems up to triple digit problems • Ability to customize experience by independently turning math types on/off • Ability to reset all level progress for multiple children to play their own level progress • 36 challenging levels in all • Fun sound effects • Several different physics-based puzzle mechanics including catapults trampolines and rockets!

title: Juice and Jelly's Fruit Heroes
author: Dart Frog Games
description: Do You like those games where you match Candy to Crush the competition? Do you hate having to grab a Soda and wait for extra lives to arrive? Try Your luck at the Berry Farm. Our Matching Puzzle Game does not jerk you around waiting for lives or waiting for days for the next level to be open to play. Pause your game so you can get a soda when you want to. So come play and have a blast crushing our candy gummy Berries and Fruit! It's a Gem of a Game and Diamond in the rough. Fun Kids game for when you are bored. ★★★★★ "Amazing game. So much fun. Great game to play in your free time."

title: Eyes-free Minesweeper (BFG)
author: e-UCM
description: This application will entice any family fans of this classic strategy game where you have to find and flag all the bombs hidden on the board. The novelty in this case is that the game can be played also by blind users as it has been set up with different accessibility features. For more information please visit http://en.blind-faith-games.e-ucm.es This application is part of the Blind Faith Games research project which aims to develop mobile games that can be enjoyed regardless of your sight level. As a research project we are collecting anonymous data that help us to improve accessibility of present and future games. Please fill in the evaluation form included in the app and leave some feedback! We would really appreciate it!

title: Saky paky
author: Česká televize
description: České večerníčky znají v mnoha zemích světa. Kam všude se ještě podívají? To je na tobě. Pomož jim sbalit věci do zavazadel tak aby se to tam vešlo všechno. Stihneš to?

title: MELILEMO Lettres (FR-Full)
author: Fabrice Eveillard
description: COLLER COUPER RECOLLER les lettres pour essayer de TROUVER le bon mot !! ***** MELILEMO LETTRES est un jeu éducatif pour toute la famille dont le but est de retrouver les mots mélangés et découpés en lettres ( un mode "Normal" avec les mots découpés lettres par lettre un mode "2 lettres" avec les mots découpés par groupe de 2 lettres ). Si vous ne connaissez tous les mots ... pas de problème : Vous pourrez trouver et enrichir votre vocabulaire puisqu'un indice vous est proposé toutes les 10 secondes si vous êtes bloqués. ***** Cette version complète vous propose de découvrir ce nouveau jeu au Gameplay original en mode " classique " ( Trouver 30 mots le plus rapidement possible) ou en mode " chrono " ( Trouver le plus de mots en 2 minutes ) et vous donne la possibilité de choisir des champs lexicaux précis parmi 11 thèmes & 1100 mots ou de jouer en aléatoire ( mélange de tous les thèmes mots disponibles ). ***** Amateurs et amatrices d'anagrammes de scrabble de mots mêlés et de mots croisés : Préparez-vous !!! version "Pro" bientôt disponible ...

title: Jump Steeve minecraft style
author: MilaPa
description: Meet a Steve Minecraft who dreams of soaring through the skies! This is absolutely FREE to DOWNLOAD! Use accelerometer control-bounce from platform to platform dodge the mean flies and grab everything you can to get the highest score. Your mission is simple: Jump and get as high as you can! Control the Steve and jump on clouds to geht higher and higher. MULTIPLAYER minecraft mode ZOMBIE minecraft mode HEROBRINE mode Dinocraft mode and more wonderful things will be added soon! Give us 5 starts to improve the game for you and please leave comment. Which upgrade do you want . We appreciate the support. Thanks... Jump Steeve it is not associated or connected with Mojang AB and it's game Minecraft - Pocket Edition

title: Wordhedron Pro
author: Enscene Games
description: Wordhedron Pro is the no-ad version of Wordhedron and includes a bonus level the Pentagonal Hexecontahedron! Combine your vocabulary and perceptual skills to find words on 3D polyhedron shapes. Slide your finger in any direction to rotate the shape. Tap to select adjacent letters on the shape to form words. Make as many words as you can within the time limit. Letters are randomly generated making every game unique and challenging! Features • A 3D word game using complex polyhedron shapes. • Beat the clock make as many words as you can within the time limit. • Letters are randomly generated so every game is unique! • Unlock shapes by completing achievements. • Best Records: Track your performance and compare with friends.

title: Наряди Ёлку  Фиксики Фиксиклуб
author: Thematic Media GmbH
description: Новогодняя игра от Фиксиклуба - «Ёлка». Все мы ждем с нетерпением Нового года и все хлопоты связанные с этим праздником нам в радость. А дети особенно ждут этого праздника в предвкушении новогоднего волшебства! Фиксики тоже празднуют Новый год и готовятся к этому празднику. Все мы любим наряжать ёлку и особенно находить под ней подарки. В этой игре необходимо фиксикам помочь нарядить Ёлку. Ловкость и внимательность помогут тебе нарядить ФиксиЁлку не разбив особо много игрушек или вообще не разбив ни одной. Тебя будет отвлекать Жучка но мы уверены что ты справишься с заданием и фиксики не останутся без новогодней ёлки. Мобильная версия популярной игры портала Фиксиклуб - www.fixiclub.ru Игровой портал «Фиксиклуб» - это обучающая и безопасная среда для ваших детей. На портале www.fixiclub.ru вы всегда сможете найти то что полезно и интересно вашему ребенку. Все игры разработаны для развития важнейших навыков и умений которые пригодятся не только в школе но и в жизни! Фиксиклуб позаботился о том чтобы ваши дети не заскучали за процессом обучения и разработали десятки игр по разным дисциплинам. Но и конечно не нужно забывать об отдыхе для этого у фиксиков припасено несколько отличных развлекательных игр. Не все же время учиться можно и на фиксиборде полетать или пузыри полопать! В Фиксиклубе играя под руководством фиксиков дети знакомятся с буквами и цифрами тренируют память внимание логику сообразительность; развивают мелкую моторику и координацию движений. Каждый месяц в Фиксиклубе появляются новые игры: дети играют фиксики учат родители отдыхают!

title: Reveal! Kids Edition
author: Koko Digital
description: Reveal Kids Edition is a scratch and guess picture quiz with a huge variety of topics to be enjoyed by all the family! It's super fun to play just choose a quiz topic to play reveal the images and guess the answers! - Pay once play forever with no adverts and no in-app purchases. - Great quiz topics for all the family! - Stuck on a level? Get free helpful hints! - Enjoy cool and funny cut-scenes along the way! - Fun to play with friends and family but safe enough to leave little ones to play by themselves. Quiz packs include educational and other non-school topics such as: - A is for... - B is for... - C is for... - Pets - Pencil Case - Shapes - Sweets - Toy Box - Packed Lunch - Musical Instruments - Beach Holiday - Sport Doodles - Wild Animals - Emoji Quiz - Farm Adventure - Animal Doodles - Fruit & Veg - Around the World - Guess the Job - Art Box - Guess the Sport - Song Lyrics - World Flags - Camping Trip Plus many more! Earn up to 3 stars for each quiz pack completed and you can play each quiz multiple times to improve your score! We hope you enjoy playing Reveal! Happy Scratching! --- support@revealapp.net www.revealapp.net

title: Слова из слов 2
author: Vitamin Labs.
description: СЛОВА ИЗ СЛОВ 2 • Из букв заданного слова составь как можно больше новых слов • Пройди все уровни • Добавляй новые слова • Узнавай значение незнакомых слов • Накопи как можно больше очков • Стань умнее Игра “Слова из слов 2” это более сложный вариант игры “Слова из слова”. Смысл игры: Из букв заданного слова необходимо составить как можно больше новых слов. Словарь игры “Слова из слов 2” составляет 11700 слов . Игра “Слова из слов 2” состоит из 12 уровней. На каждом следующем уровне необходимо составить все больше слов. Каждое предложенное игроком слово подтверждается значком ввода. За каждое правильное слово начисляются баллы и увеличивается счетчик отгаданных слов. Если вы не смогли составить все слова данного уровня то по кнопке “Пропустить” – вам будут предлагаться новые слова для решения текущего уровня. При нажатии на любое слово списка дается его толкование. Можно добавлять новые слова - нажми "Добавить в базу". В следующем обновлении приложения слова будут проверены и добавлены. Возможности и особенности игры: 1. Подключен толковый словарь. Нажатие на слово позволяет узнать или уточнить значение слова. 2. В первом уровне вы должны составить из одного слова 5 новых. А вот уже в 11-ом уровне придется попотеть. Вам будет предложено слово из которого нужно составить минимум 110. А максимум - 233. Ну что? Принимаете такой вызов? Разрешения - android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS: для поддержки пуш уведомлений на старых устройствах - android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED: для пуш уведомлений - android.permission.VIBRATE: для вибрации при пуш уведомлениях - android.permission.WAKE_LOCK: для пуш уведомлений во время выключенного экрана.

title: MELILEMO Letters (US-Lite)
author: Fabrice Eveillard
description: ***** MELILEMO LETTERS is an educational game for all the family whose aim is to find the words and blended cut into letters (a "Normal" mode with words cut out letters by mail a mode "two letters" with words cut out by group 2 letters). You don't know all the words ? no problem: You can find and build your vocabulary since help is offered every 10 seconds if you are stranded. ***** This full version offers you to discover this new game to the original gameplay in "classic" mode (Find 30 words as quickly as possible) or "chrono" mode (Find as many words in 1 minutes) and gives you the ability choose specific lexical fields among 11 themes & 1800 words or play in shuffle (mix of all words themes available). ***** ONLY 2 THEMES & 350 WORDS IN LITE VERSION ***** you like anagram ? word search and crossword ? Prepare yourself !!! "Pro" version available soon ...

title: Words with Shakespeare
author: Dizzy Heights
description: Love words and theater? Play Words with Shakespeare! Welcome onto beautiful stages where you will fill in missing words in excerpts from William Shakespeare's plays. Play the game today and by and by you will find yourself immersed in the English playwright's wonderful world of words. HOW TO PLAY: You will get excerpts from Shakespeare's plays with some words missing. Fill in the missing words by tapping letters in the right order. FEATURES: * Simple-to-Play and Fun! * No time limit * Great Brain-exercise * Learn (or get reminded of) 560 exciting excerpts from Shakespeare. * Trivia of the plays * More than 1000 words are available to figure out in different grammatical forms. *** Presently you can choose to play with words from 14 plays these are: - The Tragedy of Hamlet Prince of Denmark - The Tragedy of Macbeth - Romeo and Juliet - King Lear - The Merchant of Venice - The Comedy of Errors - Love's Labour's Lost - The Taming of the Shrew - King John - The Two Gentlemen of Verona - King Henry VI Part I - King Henry VI Part II - King Henry VI Part III - Richard III Let us know if you have any questions or suggestions for Words with Shakespeare. Reach us at: https://twitter.com/DizzyHeights_

title: Full Game for Cats Paw Me.
author: CLOUDCOM S.L.
description: Real-time Multiplayer Game for Cats and Humans. Sale! 50% off now! Paw Me is a fun a truly unique game for cats with constantly updating and developing gameplay. Animated backgrounds natural sounds and intensive dynamic gameplay specially designed with real cats game participating in development. So far we have gathered over 15 cat toys that you've never saw such catnip before! It's not just a mouse or a fish but a whole bunch of game objects to play with along with animated and changing backgrounds we guarantee that your cat won't leave it until the game for cats is over! No more sitting alone at home bored or crashing your stuff in the house - now your cat games friend can compete with other cats game in real time instead! Watch your cat play virtual laser mouse cat fishing and bird or other toys or play with him easily from your phone. Some of our friends really got into the game for cats so we decided to add human versus human mode! The following modes are supported: • Single Player • Cat vs Cat • Cat vs Human • Human vs Cat • Human vs Human This game for kittens won't leave your cat bored because we have gathered the natural sounds to entertain your friend even more! Enjoy the constant online cats game with own scores and compete with your friends. Share your cats game results on your Facebook or Twitter and share your cat game 'Paws' with your friends. Give your little friend the best app to toy with and customize the game settings by actually seeing your cats likes and personal preferences. Paw Me is the only real time multiplayer game for cats available today that can make your cat happier than ever! Try free version here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.pawme.gamelite Watch Cats around the world playing Paw Me on Instagram: https://instagram.com/gameforcats Post with hashtag #pawme and get your cat featured to 10k+ instagram followers!

title: Sleep Furiously
author: Playmation Studios
description: Unleash your imagination by finding complete sentences in a grid of jumbled words. Sleep Furiously is a unique puzzle game that takes the concept of a word game to a new level. "Sleep Furiously combines the absurdity of fridge magnet sentences with SpellTower." - Pocket Gamer Mobile game of the week - Offworld (Boing Boing) July 6th "Sleep Furiously is a very cool surreal game...love it!" - Jane McGonigal "Word lovers will get a thrill out of creating complex sentences with the limitations of available words." - Common Sense Media. "Sleep Furiously is quite the smile-inducing experience for fans of word games." - Gamezebo "All in all the game is a cheerfully built puppy dream (which is also a decently scoring phrase)" - Big Think "I hope it paves the way for a new sentence-making genre of games" - All Things Linguistic Sentences must be grammatical but can be nonsensical and the resulting possibilities are endlessly fun. Get ready to let your imagination run wild. Don't be fooled the game is very challenging. How good are your language skills? Is your brain up for this word filled adventure? GAME MODES TIMED: Can you beat the clock? Find as many grammatical sentences as you can in 90 seconds. MOVES: An un-timed moves based mode; take your time finding the ultimate sentences for the highest score and the most whimsical fun. ENDLESS: Relax and explore. What is the most absurd sentence you can you find? We love feedback! Email: info@playmationstudios.com Twitter: https://twitter.com/playmationgames

title: Mike The Knight: Great Gallop
author: Hit Entertainment
description: Join Mike the Knight and his faithful steed Galahad on valiant missions in the legendary world of Glendragon. In his journeys Mike helps townspeople in need collects treasure and completes his mission. Mike shows them what it means to “Be a knight and do it right!” Experience the thrilling adventure of the show with simple gameplay that young children can enjoy. Features - 4 Missions with various locations and challenges - Training - learn how to gallop and collect treasures - Mr.Cuddles Muddle: Evie's spell has gone wrong and made lots of Mr. Cuddles'. Help Mike the Knight collect all of the Mr. Cuddles'. - Jam Tart Trouble: The Viking's have taken Mrs. Piecrusts tarts. Help Mike collect all of the jam tarts and return them to Mrs. Piecrust - Trollee's Treasure Trove - Help Mike find and collect all the gems in the Maze Caves - Practice great galloping and complete missions with basic taps that help Mike and Galahad gallop and leap past obstacles during their missions - Collect as many things along the way to complete your mission!

title: CatchWords
author: Dizzy Heights
description: Catch letters to create Words! Every letter gives you 20 points. Choose between 2 - 9 letter words. You get score for a word once every new word gives you more score. Try to get as many words as possible and compete with others on Google Play. CONNECT: https://twitter.com/dizzyheights_

title: Letterfall
author: Nexus Games AU
description: Take the traditional wordsearch add over 250000 words to find give it any combination of eight directions to search and you have Letterfall. With three unique game-modes cascading letters and an in-game dictionary Letterfall will test your knowledge of the English language. Features: • Three unique game modes. • Official Scrabble Dictionary • Six unique Powerups • Online Play • Font and color customisation Games: Letterfall gives you three different modes to play. Race against the clock in a two or five minute game try to keep the timer from reaching zero in Blitz mode or take as much time as you want to set up and unlock words from the dictionary in infinite mode. Extensive Dictionary: Letterfall uses the official Scrabble Dictionary giving you over 250000 words to find. Each word found will be unlocked in the in-game dictionary. Can't think of any words? Not sure about a word? The dictionary feature will list all available words! Want to know the definition? Simply enter a valid word and hit the Search button. Online Play: Earn your place and climb the ranks of the many online leaderboards each with daily weekly and all-time records. Set a high score in one of the game modes compare your collection of unlocked words earn achievements by completing goals or seek out the hidden words. Power-ups: Have the perfect word lined up but a letter is just out of reach? Can't find any words? Need to get rid of some letters from the board? Letter Fall gives you six unique power-ups to tailor your gaming experience. Customization: Don't like the color scheme? Think the letters look a little dreary? Visit the 'Themes' section of the menu to customize your game! With over one-hundred different themes and fonts to choose from give the game an appearance to your liking.

title: Adventure time run
author: MilaPa
description: Adventure time run Collect coins treasurecandy avoid cars train helicopter. - Amazing 3D Graphics. - 15 Unique Levels. - Easy On-screen Controls. If you like this game don't forget to give it five stars. Play on any Android smartphone or tablet. * For players that Facebook Connect there are leaderboards for you and your friends to compare your scores -This game will be installed on the SD Card hence uses only small amount of internal storage..

title: Halloween 3D Run
author: MilaPa
description: Halloween 3D Runner City Run Get ready for the scary endless runner Halloween Run 3D! Run avoid and jump over obstacles in this fast paced running game. Collect pumpkin coins and power ups on your way. Halloween Run 3D is a fast paced endless running game set in multiple creepy locations. The stunning 3D graphics bring the halloween feeling straight into your device. Avoid and jump over obstacles by swiping your finger on the screen. Swipe left and right to move left and right and swipe up to jump over obstacles. The smooth and responsive controls make every swipe count while you try to avoid grave stones jump over cars and avoid runaway bus. Features: - Stunning 3D graphics - Halloween themed endless runner - Creepy locations - Smooth and responsive controls - Creepy obstacles - Special power ups - Fun and fast paced game play

title: Monkey Mai
author: Minolau
description: Monkey Mai is a fun retro game based on them LCD handholds of days past. Background story: Sven Scooper lost his tool belt. Now he must juggle to not drop his tools. Monkey Mai is a dyslectic donkey who thinks he is an ape. Sven Scooper is a hard worker. He tries but he just isn't capable. Help him! --- 50 points or every 100 points you get your lives back. Have fun!

title: Eyes-free Golf (BFG)
author: e-UCM
description: This simple golf-like game is about getting the ball in the hole. As simple as that. Try its different game modes and screens you won't be disappointed! The novelty in this case is that the game is eyes-free meaning that also people with a visual disability can play as well. For more information please visit: http://en.blind-faith-games.e-ucm.es This application is part of the Blind Faith Games research project which aims to develop mobile games that can be enjoyed regardless of your sight level. As a research project we are collecting anonymous data that help us to improve accessibility of present and future games. Please fill in the evaluation form included in the app and leave some feedback! We would really appreciate it!

title: Paper Sumo
author: Fantamstick Ltd.
description: Paper Sumo game for the family! With 10 unique characters of all sizes to choose from this fun and simple game is built for small children to adults. Very much like the actual paper sumo your taps bounce the stage to move the characters.

title: Lamphead
author: Oriplay Games
description: The protagonist of this game is a strange man with a lamp instead his head who needs to breach out of the darkened and dangerous odd place at whatever cost. Are you ready to prove that your reaction is outstanding shunting between sharp barriers collecting bonuses remembering that in the end of every dark path the light of victory awaits? We are ready to offer you a oneoff runner game where tiresome jumps are replaced with moving of the protagonist between two equitable planes. Try it! What if you like it? Gameplay – tap to flip up and down to avoid obstacles. Dash as fast as you can! Reviews Joao V. good. Original Медведев Great idea for a game. Cool design. Miguel It is very entertaining recently I'm beginning the game Iv on wonderful disappeared 3 additional world which seems to me a perfectly diversified game. Yes and the possibility to change skins and the possibility of man-also good. This case would be to return and develop. Very addictive game combining minimalism pridel′nyj management-in the style of "zalipnoc" ® Floppy birds-and stylish graphics. Runner himself à la MI-MI-MI Ptah wasps and saws-best from the darklands. Although on devices with 1 GB may slow down but I've noticed that a couple of times running game defeated lagi)) in General me lampogolov conquered though I'm not a fan of choosing pallet wrap and flopnaâ bird Agios zadolbala with the first five games. So I think fonarebaškovitogo one of the best and nicest murderers time and brain klinerom on WP this year. Thanks to the developers! * Get battery to light your way * Collect coins to save him! * Adorable sound effects * Challenge and help your friends! * Added more New Location * Added more cute cartoon characters * and more Coming Soon Multiplayer!!! CONNECT WITH THE LAMPHEAD * Like us: http://on.fb.me/1CQc5tK * Follow us: https://twitter.com/_oriplay_ * Visit us: http://oriplay.com/lamphead

title: Zarodnik BFG (Eyes-free game)
author: e-UCM
description: Become the most dreadful predator in the ocean with this original game! And enjoy its 3D audio system which helps blind users to play and provides a unique gaming experience. The story Once upon a time there was a little monster from an unknown place. It used to be called Zarodnik and it was involved in a trip under the depths of the ocean. While it was travelling it found a lot of varieties of creatures and learnt many survival aspects. One day our hero reach one of the biggest ocean of the world Izlude. Izlude was the best ocean that a marine creature can imagine with enough food to live forever but when Zarodnik arrived Izlude was been slaughtered by a new race of monsters: the Strouf. The Obeaune which were the race that used to live in Izlude during the last centuries became slaves of the Strouf or been killed. Now the Strouf have taken the control of Izlude the place where our hero has just arrived. Zarodnik is now involved in this adventure where it will try to save as many Obeaunes as it can by saving it in its belly... But our main character has a limited stomach. What will you do to help it? The game objetive is to save as many preys as you can avoiding the predators that you could listen near you. The more preys save the better score you get. If you save a prey you have to go to one of the edges of the screen to move to the next level and continue the game. This application is part of the Blind Faith Games research project which aims to develop mobile games that can be enjoyed regardless of your sight level. As a research project we are collecting anonymous data that help us to improve accessibility of present and future games. Please fill in the evaluation form included in the app and leave some feedback! We would really appreciate it!

title: Family Hearts
author: ZingMagic Limited
description: Hearts is a classic card game full of skill and strategy. Unless you attempt to ‘Shoot the Moon’ simply avoid collecting the Hearts. There can be few things in life which are more frustrating than being beaten by luck! To have your card playing ability and experience fall victim to a lucky deal can cause players much irritation. Hearts however is a game which regularly brings victory for skilled players over their less skillful opponents through its depth of strategy. Hearts supports all the usual features you would expect from a ZingMagic game including numerous game play variations reviewing the game take-back and replay of moves display of the previous move and hints. Game features: * Multiple levels of play. Each computer player can have any strength from beginner to expert. * Best of breed artificial intelligence engine better than most PC Hearts engines. * Multiple display and card playing options to suit your individual preference. * Support for three different Passing cards game variations. * Support for Queen of Spades breaking Hearts game variation. * Support for Ten or Jack of Diamonds as a bonus card game variation. * Full undo and redo of moves. * Hints. * Hearts is just one of our large collection of best of breed classic board card and puzzle games available for a wide range of platforms.

title: Quiz Art
author: GENERATION 5
description: Un quiz très calé pour les super-doués du monde des arts et pour tous ceux qui désirent se cultiver ! Mettez à l'épreuve vos connaissances et essayez de coller vos amis ! Ou bien tout simplement découvrez et apprenez quantité de choses sur l'histoire de l'art tout en vous amusant. - Trois thèmes principaux : peinture sculpture architecture. - Toutes les questions sont agrémentées d'illustrations photographiques. - Un indice est accessible pour chacune des questions posées. - Un commentaire vient éclairer votre réponse. De temps en temps une question plus facile vous permettra de "reprendre votre souffle" par exemple : "Quel pont est cité dans une chanson traditionnelle ? (pont d'Avignon pont du Gard pont Mirabeau ?) Trop facile non ? Bref un petit jeu sans prétention qui vous fera passer un excellent moment seul(e) ou à plusieurs !

title: WDW Trivia Free
author: Red Dragon Web Development
description: The included 500 questions cover all four WDW parks as well as the various resorts restaurants and attractions that compose Walt Disney World. There is no time limit for questions which makes the app fun for the entire family. This can be a great way to pass the time or help with some quality family bonding. Compare your score to the daily leaderboard of other WDW fans! Walt Disney World WDW and all associated information (such as the names of individual parks attractions resorts restaurants characters etc) that may appear in questions or answers within this app are the sole property of the Walt Disney Company. This app is fan-created and is not associated with the Walt Disney Company in any way. This app is for entertainment purposes only.

title: Family Spades
author: ZingMagic Limited
description: Spades is a modern classic in the world of card games. It is thought to have been developed during the late 1930's in America. The successful Spades player is a fine strategist a master of deductive reasoning and a champion of mind games. ZingMagic allows you to develop and test these skills by bringing Spades to your mobile device. The powerful engine with 6 different playing strengths ensures a fascinating and challenging game every time. Spades supports all the usual features you would expect from a ZingMagic game including numerous game play variations reviewing the game takeback and replay of moves and hints. Game features: * Multiple levels of play. Each computer player can have any strength from beginner to expert. * Best of breed artificial intelligence engine better than most PC Spades engines. * Multiple display and card playing options to suit your individual preference. * Set the winning and losing scores from a range of values. * Support for Blind 6 7 or 8 bidding. * Support for Boston bidding. * Support for Big and Little Moe bidding. * Support for Big and Little Bemo bidding. * Support for Blind Nil and Nil bidding. * Support for numerous 10 for 200 bidding game play options. * Full undo and redo of moves. * Hints. * Spades is just one of our large collection of best of breed classic board card and puzzle games available for a wide range of platforms.

title: Suspended - The Strongest Link
author: Grey Olltwit Educational Software
description: TV game show like quiz where the host is suspended on a platform by nine chains. Get questions correct to break the chains. Nine questions correct in a row will see the platform and host disappear with you scoring maximum points. In this game instead of saying goodbye to the weakest player or link in the chain after each round you get to say goodbye to the host if you are the strongest link and score maximum points!

title: Guess The Picture - For Kids
author: Straightforward Apps
description: A simple Guess The Picture app for younger kids. Can be used to help children learn to spell the words for everyday items that they use and know of. Give it a try... Hope you enjoy it. Please rate and review.

title: Garfield's Diner Hawaii
author: Web Prancer
description: Aloha! Garfield & friends are back to serve up even more food and fun in this sizzling hot summer edition in Garfield's Diner Hawaii. Manage a new restaurant on the beaches of Honolulu as you race against time to serve customers with their favorite dishes. This eatery is about to get a whole lot more interesting! The company that brought you the time management hit Garfield’s Diner now brings you even more addictive gameplay set in one of the world’s most beautiful spots: Honolulu Hawaii! And yes this time management game is full of your favourite characters! Irma has returned from her vacation and thanks to Garfield and the gang (and against all the odds) her diner is in tip-top shape. Ecstatic Irma decides to reward Garfield and Jon Arbuckle and all the others with a little vacation in Hawaii. But what started out as a simple holiday soon becomes another diner adventure! Irma’s cousin needs help to save her Honolulu diner from going bankrupt and she turns to Jon for assistance. Of course Jon will need all the help he can get managing this eatery including the invaluable assistance of everyone’s favorite fat cat Garfield! So Garfield and Jon are back in the kitchen. With dishes a-clinking and pans a-clanking it’s up to them to cook serve and feed their hungry Hawaiian customers. If you want their next Aloha to you to be hello and not goodbye (forever!) make sure your time management is top notch! So join Garfield Jon Odie Liz Doc Boy Nermal and Arlene in serving up gourmet food in Irma’s eatery. Food in Honolulu will never be the same again! GAMEPLAY Help Garfield and friends by directing them through different stations in the diner. Each member of your staff must be managed quickly and efficiently to make sure meals are prepared and customers are served before their patience runs out. Do well and you’ll have more satisfied customers plus more cash in the register! Utilize your best time management skills and make Irma’s eatery the talk of the town! FEATURES · A challenging game set in Honolulu Hawaii! Aloha! · Frantic exciting arcade-style time management gameplay that's easy to pick up but hard to put down · Hire popular characters from the Garfield comic strip · Upgrade equipment to provide better faster service in Irma’s popular eatery! · VIPs will visit the eatery at random to provide an extra challenge for greater rewards · Collect special character cards featuring Garfield and his friends If you need any support or have comments/concerns feel free to email us at: gamesupport@webprancer.com Available in English French German Italian Japanese Korean Portuguese Spanish Simplified Chinese and Traditional Chinese languages. Simply change your language from the game’s title screen! ** Please note that while the app is free please be aware that it contains paid content for real money that can be purchased upon users' wish to enhance their gaming experience. You may control in-app purchases made within this app using password protection which can be enabled from the setting page of the Google Play Store app. **

title: One Choice
author: Alexander Melde
description: You get a question and you only have one choice you can make: True or False. It is your decision. But be warned: If your answer is wrong you will fail. ----------- One Choice is the perfect app to train your brain in small breaks while having a whole lot of fun! Challenge your friends and compare your high-scores. There are 5 difficulties and 4 game-modes to explore. We promise you will never get tired. Every question challenges you: - Is the Calculation correct? - Is the stated amounts of corners of an polygon correct? - Does the Color of the Circle matches the Word on it? But don't worry you will soon have got the knack of it and reach new levels. Finish Training and start in Easy mode. Continue in Normal and Hard and finally and only for the pros: enter the Extreme Mode! Not only the questions will get more difficult the time will run out faster as well. Good Luck! PS: The start will be really easy with the new One Choice Tutorial!

title: NRK Super
author: NRK
description: Se NRK Super når og hvor du vil! Her finner du alle barnas favorittprogrammer fra NRK Super de kan se TV-programmer direkte eller om igjen. Appen er designet for barnefingre med store trykkflater og gjenkjennelige bilder det er lett å finne innhold selv og videoer spilles av umiddelbart i stor skjerm. Appen er personlig for barna og den kan ha flere profiler dersom flere barn bruker samme mobil eller nettbrett. Innhold som er best egnet for de eldste barna kan enkelt skjules på profiler for små barn. Vi anbefaler at du bruker NRK Super-appen med trådløst nettverk. Dennne appen trenger følgende tilganger: - Dine bilder - for at man skal kunne velge et bilde som sitt profilbilde - Kamera - for at man skal kunne knipse et bilde til sitt profilbilde - Wi-Fi - for å kunne vite om man er på trådløst nettverk og laste videostrømmer deretter - Skjerm alltid på - for å hindre at skjermlås skrus på under bruk eller videotitting

title: Whoowasit?
author: Ravensburger Digital GmbH
description: ★★★★★ The “Children’s game of the year 2008” from Ravensburger now available on your Android device ★★★★★ Boardgamegeek.com 4/5 – “This is a great app if you have children I would certainly recommend picking it up. […] The production value is so amazing it may just be worth checking out anyway.” “Whoowasit?” is the digital adaptation of the “Children’s game of the Year 2008” by the successful author Reiner Knizia. Now the fun tactical adventure full of mystery and magic is finally available on Android! The king’s castle is in danger! The evil wizard has been seen near the kingdom. Only the king’s magical ring can protect the castle but it has disappeared. Can you find the thief? The children of the castle are the last hope. The animals have seen the thief: they want to help to catch him in order to get back the ring and only the children can talk to them and understand them. A sharp eye and deduction skills are needed to solve this puzzle as only together can the children track down the thief! Careful thinking strong team play and working closely together are necessary for the small detectives to reach their goal. But watch out for the ghost! Can the kingdom be saved on time from the evil magician? Features: ► Digital adaptation of the “Children’s game of the Year 2008”. ► By the successful author Reiner Knizia. ► Interactive tutorial to easily start playing. ► Teamwork tactics and powerful deduction skills are necessary to find the thief on time! ► Search the castle speak with the animals open secret doors and find the magical ring. ► Play with up to 4 players at the same time on the same Device. Work together to save the kingdom! ► Chest mode: use your Device with the original “Whoowhasit” board game! ► No need to assemble: simply start the application to enter the magic world! And best of all: no need to put away the game once you have finished playing. Award winner: - GIGA-Maus 2012 (the best game/family category) - Disney FamilyFun Toy of the Year 2011 - Creative Child Magazine Game of the Year 2011 - The National Parenting Center Seal of Approval 2011 - Children's Game of the Year 2008

title: Talisman
author: Nomad Games
description: A great game with a ton of content. - 4/5 BoardGameGeek. "Talisman: Digital Edition is one of the best board game ports available for iPad and Android period." – Dave Neumann Pocket Tactics **Included in Pocketgamer.co.uk's Top 10 Board Games on Android** Talisman: Digital Edition the classic fantasy adventure board game for 1-6 players. This officially licensed version of the Games Workshop game uses the 4th Revised Edition rules. In Talisman you embark on a perilous quest for the ultimate treasure the Crown of Command. Choose from 14 characters such as the Warrior Assassin Thief or Wizard and race your opponents through a perilous realm. Each character is unique in their strengths weaknesses and special powers. To win the game you must journey to the heart of the land to find the Crown of Command and then use its ancient magic to cast a mighty spell to subdue all your rivals.
