title: Toddlers Xylophone
author: Alyaka
description: This Xylophone is very funny that allow your baby to be a Xylophoner. Your little one will love this Xylophone game. When first played your todddlers and babies may not be able to correctly touch the bells with his/her little hand. Play the Toddlers Xylophone game with your baby continuously for a few hours or days and you will be surprised at the mobile development of your baby's hands. Toddlers Xylophone game must be played in the presence of a mother or father and it is encouraged for you to guide your baby through the game for a few days at first. When to play! When your baby is hungry or will not stop crying playing this game can hold your baby's attention. (The various sounds animated shapes stimulate your baby's curiosity.) This game is exceptionally handy for mothers and fathers who spend time with their babies but cannot figure out how to spend that time usefully. This game may be too advanced for infants under 6 months old. Caution Playing the application too much amount of time or leaving the children alone with the mobile phone or tablet pc is not encouraged.

title: The Jungle Book
author: Fox & Sheep
description: Take a great imaginative journey with your child by accompanying Mowgli Baloo Bagheera and Shere Khan on their adventures in the Indian jungle! “The Jungle Book” by Rudyard Kipling is a classic story among children of all ages. Mowgli is a little boy raised in the jungle by a bunch of wolves after escaping the fire destroying his home-village. His two best friends Baloo the bear and Bagheera the panther protect him from the dangers in the wilderness and try to teach him the rules of the jungle. We have interpreted this classic story in a modern way by designing it in the form of an interactive ebook application. HIGHLIGHTS: - Interactive storybook with great animations stimulating the imagination - Professional narration and music create delightful ambiance - 12 pages with lovingly designed graphics and animations that bring characters to life - Cute recognizable characters from your favorite story book - Simple and intuitive interface - Languages: English and German. QUALITY FAMILY TIME Reading stories together is a simple way to accomplish communication and to enjoy spending quality time with your children. “The Jungle Book” is a classic story with deep moral values to be talked upon: comprehend them with your child in a fun and interactive way! LOVINGLY DESIGNED GRAPHICS AND ANIMATIONS A great story deserves as great graphics and animations! We’ve put a lot of heart and effort in designing outstanding visuals and catchy animations to bring characters to life. Your enjoyment for them is our greatest appreciation! WONDERFUL SOUND EFFECTS AND PROFESSIONAL NARRATION Wonderful sound effects and professional narration help create a familiar and engaging story telling atmosphere. INTERACTIVE ADVENTURES WITH HEART The interactive story and lovingly designed graphics will make you become a part of the exotic universe of the jungle by learning the moral of the order of nature. Dive into the adventure and give your child a taste for reading and reflection with this great intuitive story book. If you experience any trouble with the App or have any questions or comments please don't hesitate to contact us any time: contact@foxandsheep.com . We´d love to help you out.Please also mention your device version and your Android version.

title: Planet Clash - Matching Dots
author: Transylgamia SRL
description: Planet Clash is a really enjoyable game with cool graphics and great sound effects. The three different game modes add more challenges to try and with Game Center support you can check out the leaderboards and 74 awesome achievements for even more excitement. - AppAdvice The galaxy is in chaos and someone just needs to put order into it! Prepare your spaceship discover far away planets and let’s do crazy matches! PLANET CLASH - MATCHING DOTS it's a minimalist match 3 game interspersed with endless gameplay and challenging missions in every step. Get it now and immerse yourself into a unique galactic world fun-packed with enthralling and simple dots connections trippy graphics and awesome power-ups. HOW TO PLAY: - Connect at least two planet dots of the same color by simply swiping your finger on the screen; - Match as many dots as possible and discover all the special shapes; - Get competitive and challenge your friends on the Game Center; - TIP: for the greatest results play and think quickly! GAME MODES: This new dots matching game came out with three different game modes to replenish this galactic adventure. Choose your favorite one and start popping planets! TIME ATTACK : Get the highest score within 60 seconds! MOVE ATTACK : Score highest in a limited amount of moves. You will get 20 moves to show off your matching skills. RUSH : Create connections as quickly as you can to gain extra time. SPECIAL MOVES: These special moves shapes and loops will help you quickly increase your score. Show us you are a genius and find the cleverest ways to connect the planets and blow up the entire galaxy! SQUARE: Match four dots in a square and explode all the dots of the same color; FULL LINE: This will help you destroy the two adjacent lines; SPIRAL: Destroy all the planets! COMETS: Gives you three levels of bonus; CHAMELEON: Mimics the first color it touches. GAME FEATURES : - Fun adorable and thoughtful gameplay; - Simply connect the planets with the same color in several shapes; - Beautiful minimalistic flat design; - Various challenges to keep you on your toe; - Improve your time and get more points by using different power-ups; - Perfect time killer for both children and adults; - Challenge your friends on Game Center! Have fun keep connecting and become a UNPOPPABLE Master of Matching Dots! ------------------------------- CONNECT THE DOTS and then CONNECT WITH US by simply rating and review our game as we are always looking to improve it! LIKE US ON FACEBOOK : http://www.facebook.com/Transylgamia FOLLOW US ON TWITTER: https://twitter.com/transylgamia FOLLOW US ON PINTEREST: http://www.pinterest.com/transylgamia/ FOLLOW US ON GOOGLE+: https://plus.google.com/+Transylgamia-Games

title: Park Ranger: Hidden Objects
author: Filematch Ltd T/A Microvalue
description: Spend a glorious summer working as a Park Ranger searching for hidden objects in a stunning National Park. Visit areas of outstanding natural beauty including gorgeous forests idyllic lakes cool woodland trails and awesome mountain vistas. Search for carefully hidden objects in beautifully scenic levels and solve challenging mini puzzle games set in the great American outdoors. Clean up the park in this unique HOG game and do your bit for the environment by collecting all the bonus trash items to recycle. Earn extra bonuses for finding all the lost and found items which careless tourists have left strewn around the park. Can you find all the bonus objects without using any hints? A fantastic hidden object game for all generations of the family. Features include: •Play trial levels for free to see just how great the game is •Beautifully themed hidden object scenes •Stacks of challenging puzzle games •Multiple game modes with progressive difficulty - great for all ages from kids to grandparents •Wonderful sound track •Play as one of two characters •Optimized for your mobile device •A true gem of the HOG game genre •The first hit HOG game in a great successful series If you enjoy hidden object games that relax and sooth away the stresses of the day then this is the HOG game for you and all ages of your family. No eye strain here just gorgeous pictures of national park locations interspersed with challenging puzzle games to train your brain. Enjoy time with your friends and family young and old exploring Pine Creek Hills National Park and don't forget you get to play this gorgeous HOG game for free to see if you enjoy before you pay for it which we know you will! Please note this is not a free game but it does include free levels for you to try before you buy

title: Vacation Vexation
author: Nostatic Software
description: Ah the family seaside vacation. Sun sand and... annoyances galore. Explore solve puzzles and play arcade mini-games in this sequel to "Quiet Please!". • Classic adventure game fun on your hand-held device. • Explore a lighthearted and humorous environment. • Use your wits and a bit of mischief to solve puzzles. • Play mini-games in the Funhaus arcade.

title: Fireworks Piano
author: GameNICA
description: THIS GAME IS FUNNY! This game is perfect to make a celebration for the new years marriage anniversary independence day on4th of July and all carnivals. Your android device will be like Rio in Brasil...Just you need to touch with your finger to the fireworks. You now have the opportunity to bang the fireworks right on your phone. Time is piano and sparkler time. Come on let's play the piano and bang the sparkler. THIS GAME IS EDUCATIVE! This game is suitable for preschool children. It is possible to support of your toddlers physical social and emotional development at your home. Piano is one of the best musical instruments. This game will be first piano lesson of your toddler for preschool. PLAY AND LEARN TOGETHER WITH YOUR TODDLER! This piano is very funny and it will improve your toddlers musical talents and their physical social and emotional development. Your little one will love this piano game. When they touch the fireworks there will be a lot of fireworks in the sky. This game is perfect to celebrate the new year marriage anniversary 4th of July and all carnivals. Your android device will be like Rio in Brasil... When they have played for the first time your todddlers and babies may not be able to correctly touch the piano fireworks touches with his/her little fingers. Play the "Fireworks Piano" game with your baby continuously for a few hours or days and you will be surprised at the mobile development and musical intelligence of your toddlers. "Fireworks Piano" game must be played in the presence of a mother or father and it is encouraged for you to guide your baby through the game for a few days at first. WHEN TO PLAY! When your baby is hungry or will not stop crying playing this game can hold your baby's attention. (The various sounds animated shapes stimulate your baby's curiosity.) "Fireworks Piano" game is exceptionally handy for mothers and fathers who spend time with their toddlers but cannot figure out how to spend that time usefully. This game may be too advanced for infants under 6 months old. CAUTION! Playing the application too much amount of time or leaving the children alone with the mobile phone or tablet pc is not encouraged. Please feel free to notify us! Now is the party time. Happy New Years and Fun! Thank You...

title: Banana Smash
author: Segelson Production
description: A fun Chicobanana-game with simple rules; just JUMP or PUNCH to avoid the obstacles you have 3 lives for each track. You can earn an extra life if you catch the golden boxing glove. To win the whole game you must have the awesome skill to run the last track with only one life! Can you do it? Chicobanana whish you luck! :-D

title: Baby musical instruments
author: AppQuiz
description: Educational app. Learn the musical instruments. Which musical instrument does your baby prefer? Scenes of different musical instruments with exciting performances by the cute animals cultivate and train your baby's mind to recognize the different sounds and learn to play the most popular musical instruments: xylophone piano and drums. Does your baby like musical rhythms? A special interactive model of rhythms is designed to suit your baby's needs. This app is fun and easy to learn and can foster your baby's musical talent. All your child needs to do is simply click on the screen and the musical instruments will play following his/her "clicks". We care about EDUCATION we care about FUN. There are dozens of background songs to listen to while playing. Interactive interesting and entertaining children games. - focus on inspiration not just learning. - focus on capacity-building rather than a single cognition. - focus on entertaining rather than spoon-feeding teaching. Developed specifically for preschoolers combines the main concepts of early childhood education for 3-6 year-old babies and covers the Cognition Pavilion Brain Training Art Center and other relevant categories the applications for age(3-6) are aimed at the development of the comprehensive cognitive abilities of the baby’s musical artistic and the analytical thinking capabilities of the left and right brain.. Play the piano xylophone and drums in different animated scenes. Friendly animals and company dance to the sound of music. Ideal for introducing children to the world of music.

title: Booya ! Match the monsters !
author: Games_Labs
description: Bejeweled just got a little bit of scary! Start an exciting adventure in the haunted mansion of Booya ! Reach the door by chaining (at least) 3 similar monsters. Chaining diagonally is doable and even advised to manage to collect all bubbles ghosts monsters bats and witches needed to clear the path. Unfortunately the time is against you ! Turns are limited so try to reach the door in a minimum number of moves before the light turns off and the dark spirits get you. Watch out the traps ! Collect the plank by dropping it to the bottom ! Fun for all ages! Main fun features of this Match 3 games : ★★★★★ Connect the similar nearby ghosts in this awesome match 3 game. ★★★★★ Navigate through this haunted house collecting cute little monsters in your path. We love your feedbacks We develop games for players so we pay a lot of attention to it. Feel free to rate this puzzle game and share your feedbacks and ideas to improve it !

title: Furry land - Trial
author: The-any-Key
description: Furry land is a fun and addictive game for everyone. Match 3 cute furries to bring the unique board to life. Defeat the furry boss and rescue furry land to become the hero. Get free special moves by matching 4 or more. Collect different colors to win. Release the trapped furries. Collect enough points to get 3 strars. New quests everyday to earn the super duper moves. 177147 level combinations. Trial version: Game data is not saved! NO pay to win. NO Ads. All features included NO in-app purchases. Reviews: AppHappy 94/100 http://www.apphappy.net/furryland/

title: Spongebob Frozen Face Off HD
author: Nickelodeon
description: Dive in to SpongeBob's first-ever interactive children's book app! Plankton's got quite the story to tell about SpongeBob and his friends on a Great Sleigh Race adventure. Look for hidden Jelly Beans to collect along the way so you can see alternate endings! •Collect Hidden Jelly Beans! •Narrated by Plankton! •Throw Snowballs! •Tap Drag and Tilt for Swell Animations and SFX! •Tilt to Look Around! •Alternate Endings! •Based on an Exciting New Episode!
