title: Beware Of Cats
author: Crave Creative
description: Guide the mouse through the maze collecting the cheese and avoiding the cats. Tapping a direction arrow will move the mouse in that direction until it comes to a wall or until you tap another arrow which will move it in that direction the next time it can. Once you have collected all of the cheese you can progress to the next round. You can deploy fish and catnip to help defend against the cats. When a cat runs into a deployed fish he will stop for a short time to eat it. If a cat runs into a bowl of catnip he will eat it and become harmless for a short time which is indicated by it becoming transparent. In the maze there are five mouse holes which can transport you to another mouse hole. Two always take you to the same place and the other to a random mouse hole. As you progress through the rounds the cats get smarter. Sometimes an extra fish or catnip appears in the maze which you can collect to use. You have three extra lives to use during the game but once they are gone you have to start from the beginning again. + Avoid The Tabby Cats + Collect The Cheese + Fish Food Makes Cats Stop To Eat + Catnip Makes Cats Harmless

title: Baby lullabies
author: AppQuiz
description: 16 lullabies for your Baby. Just play baby lullabies for your baby and you will see how he/she will fall into a deep peaceful sleep. You no longer need to sing to your baby. The app stimulates the brain of the baby while sleeping. Relax while playing with soap bubbles. The app has accumulated all the best classic lullaby songs of all time for your baby. We are sure that your baby can be calmed into sleep like an angel. Simply choose the music and put your child to sleep in no time with the beautiful song. Classical Tunes for Babies from the Womb to the World : Mozart Beethoven Bach Debussy Mendelssohn Dvorak Brahms Schumann  etc. Relaxing Lullabies and Children Songs with Nature Sounds Smart Baby sleep music

title: Cute Baby Fireworks
author: MOD Games
description: It is time to lightening fireworks! Babies and toddlers will love this eye catching Fireworks game. Simplicity is the key to a successful app for babies. "Baby Fireworks" brings the beauty of of the fireworks to the Android. Fireworks will pop like a bubble. When first played your toddlers and babies may not be able to correctly touch the fireworks with his/her little hand. Play the Baby Fireworks game with your baby continuously for a few hours or days and you will be surprised at the mobile development of your baby's hands. Baby Fireworks game must be played in the presence of a mother or father and it is encouraged for you to guide your baby through the game for a few days at first. When to play! When your little talent is hungry or will not stop crying playing this game can hold your baby's attention. (The various sounds animated shapes stimulate your baby's curiosity.) This game is exceptionally handy for mothers and fathers who spend time with their babies but cannot figure out how to spend that time usefully. Designed for improving timing and focusing abilities. This game may be too advanced for infants under 6 months old. Caution: Playing the application too much amount of time or leaving the children alone with the mobile phone or tablet pc is not encouraged.

title: OctOut
author: trashmob.ch
description: The ball is round and a game takes 180 seconds. If you liked Space Invaders or Breakout definetly give this app a try. We at trashmob love the old classic arcade games and think they are great for casual and core gamer alike. Play it on the bus play it in a break 180 seconds goes by fast. If you never heard or have played Space Invader or Break Out that's also no problem. Just try this and you will understand why people liked the classic arcade games. Set a new highscore earn all Achievements share your scores on facebook or twitter and show everyone that no one can play with balls like you! - Play two arcade classics combined in one game - Pixel meets Vector ArtstyleJust with a lot of Balls. - Gamepad support. - Over 70 Waves and 10 Power Ups - Master teleportation to avoid enemy attacks - Achievements and Endless Mode - Share your Highscores and Achievements with your friends and compete against them. - No ads and no micro transactions - Free content upgrades. Mixing the game principle of the classic arcade games Break Out and Space Invaders up this game is easy to pick up but hard to master. Are you good enough? Play with balls and have fun!

title: Baby Phone Games for Babies
author: Penguin Apps
description: A wonderful musical baby phone game for babies! This is one of the best games for babies and it will keep your baby and toddlers occupied for hours on end with classic nursery rhymes and adorable images. Your baby will love this baby toy. Baby Phone Games for Babies and Toddler plays Nursery Rhymes Lullabies Songs and lots of Sound Effects that your baby will love. Tablet Support! All content is FREE! Baby Phone is a fantastic and fun baby toy for a six month old to one year old to 2 year old baby. Also ideal for Toddlers who will still appreciate and sing along to the music and nursery rhymes. Babyphone really is one of the best "games for babies" and games for toddlers. Your baby will be occupied playing these games for babies for hours on end. It will keep your baby and toddler entertained for hours with the catchy nursery rhymes and fun graphics. Your baby will love playing these games for babies for hours on end. ** FEATURES ** ★ Baby toy phone that plays piano sounds when baby touches one of the number keys and makes 'fake' calls ★ Lots of pre-bundled Nursery Rhymes that play when baby makes a 'fake' call ★ Tons of musical games for your baby and toddler to enjoy for hours on end ★ Add your own music and images to play during a call. Your baby will be able to listen to any music that you have added to the babyphone! The possibilities of music that the babyphone can play is limited only by your music collection! ★ record your own singing so babyphone can play to baby ★ Lots of sound effects for baby to play during a call ★ 10" Tablet supported! ★ 8" Tablet supported! ★ 7" Tablet supported! ★ Lock your phone so that baby can't accidentally exit Babyphone! Your baby or toddler or child will love bobbing to the nursery rhymes and making sound effects! Give it a try! You won't regret it!!! Licenses ------------- 1. "Yankee Doodle Dandy" by Quantum Music Works 2. "London Bridge" by Quantum Music Works 3. "Oh Where Oh Where has my little dog gone" by Quantum Music Works 4. "Row Row Row your boat" by Quantum Music Works

title: Wyatt Food Warrior
author: Balvamar
description: Wyatt the Food Warrior is the first game released in the Wyatt's Adventures series. Wyatt's Adventure games are fun educational and easy to play platformer games designed for 6-8 year olds. With bright colourful graphics large simple touch screen controls and fun characters your child will enjoy hours of easy and fun game play. There are no in-app purchases no third party advertising and no links to social media to ensure your child's game play is safe and fun.​ Quests Wyatt Food Warriors mission is to complete all 24 of the fun and challenging quests by running jumping and collecting all kinds of different types of food. Once he has found the secret key and made his way to the door he will complete each quest and move on to the next one. His adventure starts at home and takes him through the woods into the medieval village through the forest down an underground mine and ends at the castle. Match Games There are four mini memory match games included in this game. This is a great fun way for children to practice their memory matching skills whilst recognising the themed food items used in the platform game. Starting with a 16 match memory game and progressing to a 36 memory match game providing hours of fun game play. Features 5 Medieval Themed Worlds 20 Fun & Challenging Quests 4 Mini Memory Match Games Large Simple touch screen controls Educational Bright Fun Graphics G Rated No Violence No in-app purchases No third pary advertising Parental Controls - No internet access

title: Paper Plane
author: EB Software Development
description: El juego consiste en volar un avión de papel esquivando nubes peligrosas sumando puntos a medida que vas avanzando

title: Club Penguin SoundStudio
author: Disney
description: It’s all in your hands to mix amazing one-of-a-kind tracks. From Club Penguin Disney’s #1 virtual world SoundStudio lets you experiment with cool beats mix crazy sound effects and show your sound savvy as you create unique songs to play for friends. What are you waiting for? You got this—make music! For Everyone EXPERIMENT with 6 genres—each with 25 music loops MIX drum beats bass riffs guitar melodies & more USE 15 unique samples & DJ sounds LISTEN to CP Radio in the app For Members Only UNLIMITED ACCESS to 6 music genres CREATE unique tracks with 25 music loops MIX drum beats bass riffs guitar melodies & more SAVE up to 24 unique tracks with all available sounds SHARE tracks with friends & CP Radio UNLOCK all membership features in the Club Penguin app OR With in-App Purchases UNLOCK up to 6 different music genres CREATE unique tracks with 25 music loops RECORD & SAVE unique tracks Share tracks with friends and CP Radio SoundStudio app is free to play. However there are optional in app purchases and Club Penguin recurring membership subscriptions available for purchase in the Club Penguin app that cost real money. A membership means unlimited access and endless play of the SoundStudio app and the Club Penguin app. If you choose to make a purchase your Google Play Store account will be charged. Before you download this experience please consider that this app contains in-app purchases that cost real money push notifications to let you know when we have exciting updates like new content as well as advertising for the Walt Disney Family of Companies. Children should always ask their parent or guardian to download and play. WiFi or data connection is needed for some features. Network or Carrier data fees may apply if WiFi is not connected. SAFETY Disney Club Penguin has had an unwavering commitment to online safety. This includes secure log-in and protection of your child’s private information filtered chat report player capabilities and live moderators. Terms of Use http://disneytermsofuse.com/english Privacy Policy https://disneyprivacycenter.com/privacy-policy-translations/english © Disney. Club Penguin™ The service provider for this app is Disney Canada Inc. located at 500-1628 Dickson Avenue Kelowna British Columbia Canada VIY 9X1. Company Registration#1879215 VAT# EU826012025 Support@clubpenguin.com

title: Voice changer with effects
author: Baviux
description: Change your voice and have fun listening to your modified voice! Record your voice apply effects and share them with your friends. You can send your changed voices directly from Whatsapp! INCLUDES FOLLOWING EFFECTS: • Normal • Helium • Robot • Big robot • Squirrel • Dizzy • Backwards • Monster • Nervous • Giant • Telephone • Cave • Cathedral • Dark side • Alien • Grand Canyon • Fan • Devil • Child • Sheep • Overlord • Small alien • Megaphone • Death • Everything is spinning • Hexafluoride • Small creature • Optimus Robot • Android • Villain • Battery low • Shrinking • Cyborg • Duck • Extraterrestrial • Deep voice • Zombie FEATURES: ✓ Share (whatsapp e-mail dropbox etc...) ✓ Save to internal memory / SD card ✓ Create image with sound. You can share it on Facebook ✓ Import pre-recorded sound ✓ Create voice from text ✓ Set as ringtone ✓ Set as notification sound NOTE: External storage access permission is only used for save your recordings and read your images allowing you to create videos. If you need more information please contact to: sviudes@baviux.com . Privacy policy: http://baviux.com/voicechanger-privacy . This app is designed for children and families.

title: Jenny's Beauty Salon and SPA
author: TutoTOONS Kids Games
description: This Beauty Salon gives you not 1 but 4 different Spas! Choose Hair Spa Face Spa Nail Spa or Make-up Spa to give Jenny a day Spa makeover! Luxurious Spa products and professional tools will help you get Jenny a fresh new look! Hair Spa Start with washing Jenny’s hair with smoothing shampoo. Apply super rich hair mask to make her hair lush and luminous. Blow-dry and finish with high class hairspray to get Jenny the desired classy looks! Face Spa Jenny has some skin problems but there’s nothing a good facial couldn't fix. Wash Jenny’s face with detoxifying face wash apply cucumber mask pluck eyebrows and pop the zits to make Jenny’s face look radiant! Nail Spa When Jenny’s hair is silky and smooth and her skin glows with confidence time to do the nails in a fashionista way! Apply a set of fashion nails combine red soft pink and glitter pink nail polish add a nail sticker and Jenny is ready to rock with her perfect nails! Make-up Spa Complete Jenny’s makeover with professional make-up! Apply foundation fuchsia eye shadows and volumizing mascara for dramatic looks. Finish with rose pink lipstick and Jenny is ready to go party! WHAT’S INSIDE 4 different SPA treatments 3 luxury hair products 4 chic make-up products 3 posh nail polish colors 1 nail sticker 2 gentle face cleansers Blue color contact lenses Fashion nails Professional beauty salon & SPA toolkit

title: BB BlastStar
author: Cyber Software LLC
description: Try you luck at the classic carnival shooting gallery for you Android device. Shoot out all of the yellow objects on each level to advance. It's simple and fun. You can upload your scores to our online portal and see rankings against others. Enjoy - this is our take on the classic star BB gun shooter game.

title: CookieGirl Game
author: billmastin
description: Help cookie girl deliver cookies to the houses! But be careful there are dogs and cars to avoid. Don’t let them turn you into dogfood! At least the dogs love cookies and anywhere you throw a cookie the roaming dog will follow. Dodge dogs cars and solve each level to deliver the cookies to win! Cookie girl has a mission; she needs to get the cookies delivered to houses and find the cookie van to exit the level. If she is successful she earns her way to camp! She must find the courage to navigate cars and dogs to get the job done. All she has is a bag full of cookies and a mission to get the people what they want cookies! The game play is arcade like and she has to hop skip and run through 50 unique and tricky levels. To get to the upper levels she has to deliver enough cookies to open them up. Have fun and let the cookies fly!

title: Ultimate Bumper Ball
author: OMECHA
description: Ultimate Version: Get the 3 basic balls in this premium upgrade + No Splash Screen No Ads! Just pure gaming. Tilt your phone to sink the ball into the yellow hole be careful evil bumpers will block your path! Find yourself in a ditch? Tap the screen to shrink and slip through gaps! The new game set to revolutionize android gaming by incorporating retro elements strategy reflexes and timing. What level will you reach? Can you topple your friends on the leader board? Get bumping and become the Bumper Ball Champion! Upgrade to the full version to remove ads and remove splash screens. Let your friends know you're serious about bumping! ----------------------------- NOTE: This game uses the accelerometer in your phone for gameplay. If you think you are experiencing strange movement behaviour of the ball try to restart your phone or recalibrate the accelerometer. ----------------------------- We at Omecha aim to develop technologies which improves the quality of daily life for our users by supplementing their lifestyles and creating new experiences. Our company vision 'New ways to move people' is very much alive in Bumper Ball as you will be using your visual and hand reflexes to ascend to the next level. We envisioned a game where the user wasn't sitting motionless staring at a screen making subtle tap or swipe movements but rather something more engaging and challenging by activating other senses and movements. The motivation for this app was to create something addictive competitive and beautifully chaotic through using retro elements in a refreshing modern adaptation. We hope you will enjoy our first app as much as we enjoyed making it. Any suggestions or comments are always welcome!

title: Kids Balloon Pop Game Free
author: App Family
description: A classic balloon popping game for kids with colorful graphics cute animals and various backgrounds! You can even adjust the speed and size of the balloons your baby or child's skill level. AD-FREE: no ads are shown while playing! There are three different game modes: • Normal. Balloon popping just for fun. Great for toddlers as a baby game • A - Z. Pop balloons containing letters of the alphabet and hear the name of the letter spoken out loud. • 1 - 20. Pop balloons containing numbers and hear the name of the number spoken out loud. Both game modes A - Z and 1 - 20 are suitable for young kids as an educational game. For babies or kids with visual impairments such as CVI you can disable background images and increase the size of the balloons in order to make them easier to pop The free version contains 4 regular balloons 3 animals and 2 different backgrounds. The full game (unlocked via an in-app purchase) is even more fun with 7 regular balloons 3 special balloons 10 animals and 3 different backgrounds! Looking for an iPad version? Search for "appfamily" on the App Store! Love it? Hate it? Please review the game and let us know. For more fun check out our other games for kids! This app: - Does not contain third-party ads - Does contain a link to our Facebook page - Does use anonymous data collection tools - Does contain one in-app purchase for the full version

title: Picnic Packer FREE
author: Silent Lime
description: Picnic Packer FREE is an exciting new game from Silent Lime: * Food pops up on up to 10 different plates similar to moles in a generic mole wacking game but that's where the similarities end. * Each of the 10 levels has a different goal and you can get green silver or gold points. * See your high score for each level and try to beat your previous score. * Not sure what you can tap on? go to options (...) and tap on the book icon to see the glossary * Picnic Packer FREE is the $0 version of Picnic Packer. The full version of Picnic Packer includes: *** 10 extra levels *** Bonus Levels YOU customize *** Access Picnic Packer and other Silent Lime products on Google Play At:https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=Silent+Lime #CanYouPackIt

title: Voice Changer
author: e3games
description: Record your voice and apply any effect you want with voice modulator! Save your modified voice and set as ringtone notification or alarm sound. Voice Changer with effects is an entertaining app with great graphics. Have fun with your kids with voice changer! Apply helium chorus drunk robot backwards and many other funny effects to your voice like morphvox! Share your modified voice with friends(e-mail dropbox whatsapp...) using voice modulator. Effects: - Normal - Drunk - Cave - Monster - Squirrel - Helium - Hexafluoride - Smurf - Robot - Chorus - Death - Fast - Backwards - Kid - Alien - Bathroom - Bee - Old radio - Underwater - Fan - Telephone - Space Station - Low Battery fmod is used as sound engine. www.fmod.org

title: JumpinSauceRS
author: S T LLOYD
description: Are you our Hero? Help save Earth from the Evil Queen DarkSock in this exhilarating Space shooter! JumpinSauceRS is a space shooter game aims to allow blind and visually impaired individuals to play a mainstream game with their sighted friends. We have two versions available to download this one is the paid version. If you like what we’re doing and wish to support us then please purchase this version your contribution goes into helping us develop the games accessibility and the evolution of a game world/universe called "The Mists of Audazzle". If you pay for the game your unique Mists of Audazzle character will receive a medal of honour showing you have supported our mission. Please help us improve the game by sharing your feedback we need you! Let’s make a difference together. • SUITABLE FOR AGES Suitable for all ages • PRODUCT LANGUAGE English • LOVE THE APP? If you or your child likes the game please leave a review or purchase the paid version to help us keep developing more games in the future. • AUDAZZLE CARE PLEDGE We are committed to bringing all our customers the highest quality apps and aftercare service and are always looking for ways to improve our games so please get in touch if you have any suggestions or feedback. In the unlikely event that you experience a problem please email our support team who are waiting to help you. Email us on support@audazzle.co.uk you will usually receive a reply within 24 hours. • CHILD FRIENDLY APP This game does not contain in app purchases of any kind. Your child will be given the option to enter an email to receive their profile details username and password will be completely random safeguarding your child’s identity. Their profile will be used to save their high scores in the Audazzle hall of fame nothing else. We do collect anonymous usage information to help us improve our services and applications. _______ Follow Audazzle on Twitter: @audazzle Like Audazzle on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/audazzle Find out more about Audazzle: http://www.audazzle.com _______ CONTROLS Basic controls are use device "tilt" to go forward backward left and right. Please wait to listen to instructions tips and game narrative between levels. Triple tap to progress to the next level or tap the on screen buttons. KNOWN ISSUES We have a number of known issues as far as accessibility is concerned in the simple space shooter. For users with no sight please try with and without headset or ear buds (and please make sure you have left ear / right ear set up correctly) Known Issues 1. There is no specific support for native voice over / screen reader for either iOS or Android. Instead users of all devices need to be connected to the internet to have TTS. However we request you toggle voice over if the game seems to have stopped. Right at the start iOS users are asked by their phone to allow location information. This may also help after level 1 completion where you are asked to enter your email. 2. Upon completing each level (to the sound of cheers and applause) pause and wait instructions if no instructions come triple tap to continue. 3. Upon completing level 1 you should receive an important message about "Incarnation" this is effectively your birth into the a future fantasy game world that will link all our forthcoming games and or iterations of this game. Make a note of your username should you need to contact us for support. There is an issue accessing the email registration form if you have no sight we found our daughter needed help at this point and we are looking for suggestions to overcome this. 4. The game over screen has three buttons and they are not accessible unfortunately this means non sighted users will get stuck in a loop of continuing at the level they reached until they complete the game. A solution is underway but we want to release the game at this early stage for as much feedback as possible.

title: Port-Ole Maze Game
author: Cohen Creative Labs
description: The premise of this game is for players to accurately navigate a variety of mazes utilizing the motion sensors of their Android devices. It Features multiplayer gameplay supported by a Bluetooth connection an automatic scoring system leader-boards and a precise timer for competitive split second time differences.

title: Baby Phone Game for Kids Free
author: App Family
description: A classic baby phone game for kids with colorful graphics and cute animals! One of the best free apps for babies or toddlers who love to play with their parents' mobile phones. No advertisements are shown while playing! :) Does your child want to play with your cellphone all the time? Then you use this app to turn your phone or tablet into a colorful baby phone with cute graphics high-quality music and lots of great animal sounds. This game features both a classic keypad with numbers and an animal keypad with hilarious animal sounds. When your child dials a number an animal chosen at random will answer the phone. Your child can touch the animal to hear the sounds and watch it move around. Your kid can also change the design of the mobile phone to pick their favorite 'skin'! Keeps children visually stimulated and engaged. Want to call a particular animal to hear their partcicular sounds? Just press a single number and use the speed-dial! Fun features in the game: - 2 keypads - 6 colorful phone designs - 2 high-quality nursery rhymes as background music - 12 cute animated animals to dial and interact with - Lots of great sound effects - Learn the numbers 0-9 Does your kid love it? Or do they hate it? Please write a short comment about our babyphone game and let us know! For more fun have a look at our other fun kids games for babies and children aged 1 2 3 and 4 years old. This app: - Does not contain third-party ads - Does contain a link to our Facebook page - Does contain promotion for our other apps - Does use anonymous data collection tools

title: A Multiplayer Game Of Cubes
author: FunDriven.com
description: A Multiplayer Game Of Cubes (AMGOC) is an exiting fast paced board game for up to four player per device. The unique gameplay can be described as Othello on steroids with unpredictable chain reactions. The goal is simple: Conquer the playground! The player who occupies the whole playground wins. Sounds easy? It is! Or maybe not?!? Just see for yourself: AMGOC offers many hours of multiplayer fun! We hope you enjoy playing and share our game with your friends. Features: - Never seen before multiplayer fun for the whole family on one device. - An artificial intelligence enables you to enjoy two player games even without a playmate. - The interactive tutorial shows you how to play and win against your friends. - The hard to predict effects of the chain reaction keeps you exited until the very last turn. - 100% free! Without ads and without in app purchasements! AMGOC has been rated one of the best two player games 2015. Just see for yourself: Download "A Multiplayer Game of Cubes" now to enjoy countless hours of fun with your friends and family.

title: Vroom! Cars & Trucks for Kids
author: Yomio s.r.o.
description: Colorful app for 1 to 3 year old kids that love cars and trucks. Discover various animal drivers in each car help a garbage truck pick up all the trash or lift a heavy box with a crane. Explore police car garbage truck mixer truck fire engine ambulance crane digger and dump truck. Children can tap what they see in the app and switch on the headlights put out a fire or find out who is inside the ambulance. The app help kids improve their eye-hand coordination and it teaches them about cars and their parts. User interface is tailored for toddlers and preschoolers so that they can use the app on their own. Three cars are offered for free others are available as an in-app purchase. There are no ads in the app. If you have any suggestions for improvement have general feedback or just want to chat drop us a line at app@yomioapps.com .

title: Revello
author: Harth
description: Revello - also known as Reversi / Othello. The strategic board game for all ages with multiple playing levels and nice Animation.

title: Moon Explorer: Panda Astronaut
author: BabyBus
description: Traveling to the moon may be a far fetched concept for our children at the present age and time. There is however a more suitable approach to give them a tiny taste of space travel by having them take on the role of an astronaut. They can experience the fun and joy of the moon landing! Come and check out our newest roleplaying game on moon exploration! Fun features: - Take on different roles and tasks - Play interactive games to solve challenging problems - Walk on the moon and plant a flag like our hero Neil Armstrong! We are counting down the final hour before our rocket is scheduled for launch. We are sending you to the moon. What a fun and exciting day it is for all of us! Are you ready our young commander for the challenges ahead? Let the adventures begin! What children know comes from life and game. Roleplaying activities incorporate these two aspects into one fun experience to become a key part of learning and understanding the world they see. Take on the role! Learning is simple and fun! -- -- -- Design concepts: We focus on inspirational learning We focus on skill-building We focus on bringing fun contents to our young audience Take the baby bus for an unique learning experience! The series introduction: BabyBus is the first trusted brand in early childhood educational software. The mobile applications are designed and developed specifically for preschoolers and they are divided into two groups by age the Starter Group for toddlers between the ages of 1 and 3 and the Prodigy Group for children between the ages of 3 and 6. The educational series in the Prodigy Group combines the main concepts of early childhood education to meet the needs of mastering different learning categories. The applications are aimed at the comprehensive and the analytic development in preschoolers. Tips: In the search bar enter "BabyBus" to find all of our products. Feel free to tell us your thoughts on our games and services using the contact methods listed below: Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BabyBusENGLISH E-mail: en@babybus.com Website: http://www.babybus.com

title: Soap Buble Pop
author: Alyaka
description: Kids will love this bubble pop game. The colors are very bright and show up wonderfully. Young players will love playing Soap Bubble Pop game. Feel free to pop bubbles and fun. Soap Buble Pop Game is a kind of balloon pop game. Game is developed for kids and babies. Once the game started there would be a lot of different sized and colored bubbles in the screen. Your baby is going to love the bubbles in the screen and your baby will pop flying bubbles. When first played your todddlers and babies may not be able to correctly touch the moving bubbles with his/her little hand. Play the Soap Bubble Pop game with your baby continuously for a few hours or days and you will be surprised at the mobile development of your baby's hands. Play the Soap Bubble Pop game must be played in the presence of a mother or father and it is encouraged for you to guide your baby through the game for a few days at first. When to play! When your baby is hungry or will not stop crying playing this game can hold your baby's attention. (The various sounds animated bubbles stimulate your baby's curiosity.) This game is exceptionally handy for mothers and fathers who spend time with their babies but cannot figure out how to spend that time usefully. This game may be too advanced for infants under 6 months old. Caution Playing the application too much amount of time or leaving the children alone with the mobile phone or tablet pc is not encouraged.

title: Unbeatable Tic Tac Toe
author: Ifta Noor Mahmood
description: This is a classical tic tac toe game. It is a small product of gigantic AI (artificial intelligence). The computer always plays the best move. So the best one can do with it is to draw the game None can win with AI. Challenge your friends to play this classical game and win. They never can win the game. It will be a bet you can always win.

title: Preschool Kids Where am I?
author: Fantamstick Ltd.
description: Kids love to match!!! A simple but educational game with 140 different faces to match up. Designed for preschool children the simple interface effectively enables small children to notice the difference with the faces and choose the right one. Designed from a parents perspective there are no buttons or links to confuse the child. There are also no scores or levels which makes it easy for children to put the game done when the parent says time up. The colors design and sound effects have been selected from the viewpoint of keeping children amused. "Kinderpan" series specifically targets preschool children to learn and enjoy while taken into consideration the parents perspectives. They are all designed to be simple to maneuver yet highly creative aiming to bring joy for children and parents world wide. * Free download * Contains no advertisements so children will not be able to leave the confines of the application.

title: Little Buddies Animal Hospital
author: TutoTOONS Kids Games
description: Oh no! Seven poor little animals got sick and now are waiting in the hospital. Play animal doctor and take care of them: fix teeth test eyes clean infected ears fight germs and bacteria cure fever and tummy ache. Nurse and look after the Little Buddies: Horse Bunny Piggy Cow Sheep Owl and Hedgehog. Your new pocket friends will thank you with their big smiles! Game features: - Fill the medical chart for your little patients - Take care of Horse‘s teeth and put on dental braces - Clean little Bunny‘s infected ear - Learn to use ultrasound machine and treat Piggy‘s tummy ache - Nurse little Cow to cure her runny nose sore throat and fever - Decorate Cow‘s hospital room with balloons and flowers to help her get well - Pull out cactus spines from tiny Hedgehog‘s paw - Make a fruit smoothie with vitamins to help the Sheep get her energy back - Play dress up and cheer up the Sheep when she‘s healthy again - Test Owl‘s eyes and pick her perfect glasses or colorful contact lenses Play with Little Buddies every day and get rewards: spin to win extra coins and collect daily bonus! WHAT‘S INSIDE 7 little animals that need your help Creative activities like dress up and decoration 32 decorations for Cow‘s hospital room 52 Sheep clothes and fun outfits 48 Owl‘s glasses and contact lenses Real doctor and dentist tools Beautiful graphics and cute characters Easy gameplay even for small kids Discover more fun with TutoTOONS! Play our games: http://tutotoons.com/apps Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/TutoTOONS Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/tutotoons Get our newsletter: http://ow.ly/HlYbn

title: First Kids Puzzles: Toys
author: AR Entertainment
description: Kids from 2 to 6 will have fun solving their first puzzles. With 12 different puzzles nice sound effects beautiful graphics this game will entertain your children while improving their motor skills. Don't forget to shake your device to replay a puzzle or to reset puzzles already done. This game is part of your "Learning is fun" educational game collection. Visit our website for more educative games: http://ar-entertainment.net/learning/ or http://ar-entertainment.net/android

title: Sliding Puzzle
author: Harth
description: The traditional Sliding Puzzle (also suitable for tablets) can be played with the following options: Choice of 3 matrices - 3x3 4x4 5x5 12 game variations to each matrix 16 motives provided 20 possible own photos To the game the current number of moves and the minimum number of moves required to solve a variant of the game will be displayed. For each variant of the game a demo solution is offered! You can copy and use up to 20 own pictures into/from directory ".../MyPuzzlePictures". Your own images will be automatically cropped quadratic and centered.

title: HyperUranium
author: Marco Brenco
description: A game for real nerds where you have to try and lay out uranium atoms and keep a chain reaction stable as long as possible. Atoms emit two neutrons when hit by one. Atoms don't explode the first time they are hit but they do if they get bombarded by several neutrons in rapid sequence. Therefore to get high scores you need to place enough atoms to keep the reaction alive but not so close to make atoms explode. (Created with Pygame for Android)

title: Animal Train for Toddlers
author: Yomio s.r.o.
description: Animal Train for Toddlers is an animated game to help your kids (1-3 year olds) learn about animal sounds and have fun along the way. The game is fully interactive and designed to make sure your kids don’t get lost in the app. Download the app to follow the dog driver and his group of animal travellers on their journey. Let your kids tap on the different things they see - a cat a horse a wicked goose a hungry goat a sleeping cow. Or try touching the sun in the sky clouds or other parts of the surroundings and see what happens. All the animals are animated and make sounds and the weather changes as your child gets involved with the changing environment. The app comes with the steam locomotive and one coach included and the rest of the coaches are available as an in-app purchase. If your baby or toddler loves animals or train then this app is just for them. For more information about the app visit http://www.animaltrainapp.com . If you have any suggestions for improvement have general feedback or just want to chat drop us a line at app@yomioapps.com .

title: Quebra-Cabeça do Bita
author: Mr. Plot
description: O Quebra-Cabeça do Bita é aplicativo divertido e educativo para crianças de todas as idades. Monte os personagens do Circo Mágico do Bita em diferentes níveis de dificuldade começando pelo mais fácil até o mai difícil. Para encaixar as peças basta arrastá-las com o próprio dedo. O Quebra-Cabeça do Bita oferece oito diferentes níveis com os personagens: Bita Oto Agnes Rodolfo Luke Lili Nina e Mia e Quebra-Queixo. O quebra-cabeça do Bita é um app divertido simples e educativo que estimula a coordenação motora do seu filho e ajuda a aprender e se divertir ao mesmo tempo! A Mr Plot produz aplicações divertidas e educativas para crianças de todas as idades. Visite www.mrplot.com.br para mais informações

title: Animal Sounds
author: Gurfing Entertainment
description: - Set animal sounds as ringtones as alarm melody & notification sounds; - Listen to a huge amount of sounds of different animals; - Play the game and guess animals by their voices; - 3 levels of difficulty in guessing; - 4 animals groups; - Each animal has image; - Kids mode; - Quick Search by name of the animal; - Constantly updated database of sounds; - Control animal sounds from your Android Wear; - Play animal sounds from your watch without starting application on phone. (can be used for pranks). List of animal sounds: Pig Cow Basset Hound Cat Cattle Chicken Doberman Duck Goose Goat Horse Longhorn Rooster Sheep Hog Frogmouth Bat Bee Canary Cardinal Crow Eagle Falcon Finch Hawk Lapwing Macaw Parrot Mexican Red Parrot Mockingbird Mosquito Nightingale Owl Peacock Penguin Pigeon Red Lories Seagull South American Parrot Vulture Woodpecker Whippoorwill Aligator Baboon Bear Camel Capuchin Monkey Chimpanzee Cougar Coyote Elephant Giant Anteater Gibbon Gorilla Hippo Lamb Leopard Lion Lioness Raccoon Rhinoceros Tiger Wolf Elk Lemur Panda Snake Toad Zebra Beluga Whale Chipmunk Cricket Dolphin Frog Sealion Rabbit Donkey.

title: Hangman for Kids
author: AR Entertainment
description: Hangman for kids is a classic Hangman game with about 500 selected words for kids. With 5 word categories (Western Human body and clothes Animals Fruits and Vegetables and Misc.) your kids will have fun to guess words letter by letter. And with the selection we did on words there is no way that your kid will discover a word he should not see. A statistic screen is also available to check your progression in the game. This game is part of your collection of educational games "Learning is fun". Visit our website for more info: http://ar-entertainment.net/android

title: Pirate Pinball
author: Grey Olltwit Educational Software
description: Fast action pinball game where you need to flip the ball at the right moment to maximise your scoring at various points around the board.

title: Tony the Truck and his Friends
author: Yomio s.r.o.
description: If your kid loves cars trucks and vehicles in general this is the app to download. Tony the Truck is very busy at the construction site. Everybody needs his help - digger Dan bulldozer Karl Hugo and Amos the cranes roller Ben mixer truck Ron and of course the forklift brothers Max and Rex. Where should Tony go first? The app has been designed for kids between 1 to 4 years so your kids can use the app on their own and won’t get lost anywhere in the navigation. There are no ads in the app and all the links are under parental control. Two screens are available for free others can be bought as an in-app purchase. For more information about the app visit http://www.tonythetruck.com . If you have any suggestions for improvement have general feedback or just want to chat drop us a line at app@yomioapps.com .

title: Princesses fairies mermaids
author: MauroME Games
description: Welcome to the world of princesses fairies and mermaids! Design the princess of your dreams in a creative and fun way. To create your princess you need to get candy playing fun mini-games: puzzles Mermaid Fish-catcher Fairy in the Forest Fairies with a Racket Princess' Snot Mermaids and Frog Fairies and the Boomerang Frogs and Fish and the amusing Tree with Eggs. Design the face of your princess! The more candy you get the more options to design your princess you have: start by choosing the shape of her face the different types of eyes nose eyebrows changing the type of hair or hairstyle put features to the princess’s face like chubby cheeks hearts etc. and add-ons like sunglasses of different shapes and colors necklaces ties and even change the background color for a special touch. You can change your princess’s face as many times as you want or you feel like so try to have the maximum number of possible candies playing mini-games. Choose a message to your best friends! Once you have retouched and designed your princess the way you like you can choose a text with a special message add it to your princess and send it to your best friends. Your message does not take candy away so you can select one whenever you want to and send it to different types of friends. You'll be able to congratulate your friends on their birthdays or tell them how much you love them with posts. Take a picture of the princess and send it to your friends! Once you've created the princess of your dreams you can send it to whoever you want with the "take a picture" button. You can click on it to share the picture of your princess with whoever you like. Be creative and have fun with your friends by customizing your princess's face. You can create many designs and faces to make your princess look funnier and more modern and you can also send them to different friends or relatives. Mini-Game 1 and 2 - 4x4 and 5x5 Puzzles Complete the puzzle to get candy princesses. Move images from the lower to the upper panel and complete the image panel. Each completed puzzle gives you lots of candy. Minigame 3 - Mermaid Fish-catcher. Move the mermaid from one part to another of your screen so you can catch the maximum number of fish.Oh and wait until the time runs out. Minigame 4 - Fairy in the Forest Get keep the fairy without tripping over the trees until the end of time. You get candies with every tree that you avoid. If you can keep the fairy until the time runs out you get 500 candies. Minigame 5 – Fairies with Rackets Do not let the ball fall down to the bottom of the screen.If you can keep the ball until the time is up then you will get 400 candies. Minigame 6 – Princess’ Snot. The Princess has a cold and a runny nose. Every color tissue cleans its respective color of mucus.You must wait until the time runs out. Minigame 7 - Mermaids and the Frog In this minigame you must touch the mermaids so that they can rise and touch the frog. Every time a mermaid touches the frog this will go higher and higher until it leaves the pond. Minigame 8 - Fairies and Boomerangs. You have six boomerangs at the bottom of the screen which you will have to touch so that they soar. But beware because at the top you have three wonderful fairies that are flying happily and they must not be touched by the boomerangs. Minigame 9 - Frogs and Fish. Will you be able to pass the 6 frogs from one place of the pond to the other? To do so you must touch every frog to make it advance. Minigame 10 - Trees with Eggs Touch each one of the eggs to make them fall off the tree but beware because each egg that falls it must be collected by the pan.

title: Sweet Baby Girl Farm Adventure
author: TutoTOONS Kids Games
description: Play farmer and run your own ranch! Breathe in fresh countryside air and start living the farm life: harvest crops plow soil drive a farm tractor grow juicy tomatoes cut sheep wool groom horses feed chickens protect grains from mice attack dress up like a real farm kid and more! Excellent game for all girls who love playing farm and taking care of animals! 10 fun farm adventures for kids: HARVEST CROPS Rush into the field of ripe crops with little Devon and play crop harvester! Move the scythe a traditional tool to cut the crops and harvest the grains for food! PLANT TOMATOES Follow Yukiko to the greenhouse because it's time to grow tomatoes! Carefully plant the seedlings in soil make sure they get plenty of water and sunlight and watch how they grow into beautiful tomato plants. When your tomatoes look glossy red they are perfectly ripe. Tap to pick them! PLOW RACE Get ready to drive a real farm tractor with a plow and prepare the soil for planting new crops. Move the tractor up and down to plow the field but keep your eyes open and don't hit stones stumps and moles! SHEEP SHEARING Three sheep have grown so much wool that needs to be cut off right now! Play sheep shearer: take the shearing machine and move it until there's no wool on all 3 sheep! HORSE CARE Sweet Alice is waiting for you near horse paddock. This can only mean one thing - time for horse grooming! Carefully wash rinse and dry the horse then gently brush its coat to make it smooth and add extra shine! FEED THE CHICKENS Chicken coop in this farm is very modern – feed for chickens is delivered on a conveyor belt! Spot and tap chicken feed and have fun feeding six hungry chickens! FIND THE MOUSE Oh no! A few mice got into the windmill and now are planning to eat the grain! Tap the straw hats and catch all mice before it's too late! FARM DRESS UP When all jobs on the farm are done time to have some dress up fun! Choose from more than 70 farm fashion items in 8 different categories to create your own farmer style! ANIMAL BARN Collect farm animal stickers as you play and add them to your own animal barn sticker book! WATERMILL OF FORTUNE Play Farm Adventure every day and spin the Watermill of Fortune to get your daily prize – up to 500 extra coins! WHAT'S INSIDE 3 crop fields to harvest 3 tomato gardening activities 3 levels of field plowing race 3 woolly sheep to shear 4 horse grooming activities 6 chickens to feed 3 levels of chicken feeding 3 levels of mouse catching 71 farmer clothes and accessories Sticker book of 8 barn animals Daily prize of up to 500 coins Groovy farm music and realistic animal sounds Bright graphics and funny animations DISCOVER MORE KIDS FUN WITH TUTOTOONS! Follow us: https://twitter.com/TutoTOONS Like us: https://www.facebook.com/tutotoons Visit us: http://tutotoons.com/ Play our games: http://tutotoons.com/apps/

title: Horseshoe
author: YAGD
description: Horseshoe is a simple strategy board game exclusively for android! ------------------------------- Move your pieces across the board and try to trap your opponent! ------------------------------- Play with a friend or against the computer! ------------------------------- ★★★FEATURES★★★ ● Completely free with no advertisements. ● Simple and easy to understand gameplay. ● Two player mode - Play with a friend on the same device. ● No in-app purchases. All content included. ● Three levels of difficulty to test your skill. ● Cartoony graphics and sound effects.

title: Elmo Calls by Sesame Street
author: Sesame Workshop
description: Pick up the phone Elmo’s calling! FEATURES: • Make or receive audio and video calls from Elmo • Get voicemail from Elmo • Schedule calls for bath time potty time and more CURRICULUM: Elmo Calls encourages kids to play and imagine practice listening and sing! It can also foster self-confidence by celebrating important moments in a child’s life. • ABCs: Saying your ABCs is fun! It’s even more fun with Elmo! • Special Visits: Elmo wants to talk about your special plans for today. (FREE) • Holidays: Holidays are fun to celebrate and Elmo wants to celebrate with you! (FREE) • You Can Do It!: No matter what you're learning whether its your ABCs or using the potty Elmo wants to cheer you on. • Sing with Elmo!: Elmo sings for you! You can sing along or just listen. • Happy Habits:Healthy habits are more fun when you do them with Elmo. • Laugh with Elmo: Elmo just wants to say hi! • Playdate with Elmo: Play and pretend with Elmo! This app has been tested on the following devices: • HTC Droid Incredible 4G LTE • LG Optimus G • HTC One X • Samsung Galaxy S III • Samsung Galaxy Note II • Motorola Atrix HD • Motorola RAZR HD • Galaxy Note 10 • ASUS Nexus 7 ABOUT US • Sesame Workshop’s mission is to use the educational power of media to help children everywhere grow smarter stronger and kinder. Delivered through a variety of platforms including television programs digital experiences books and community engagement its research-based programs are tailored to the needs of the communities and countries they serve. Learn more at www.sesameworkshop.org. • IDEO is a human-centered design and innovation firm ranked independently among the ten most innovative companies in the world. Learn how our team of child-development experts veteran toy designers and interaction designers approach the creation of award-winning kid apps at www.ideotoylab.com. • PRIVACY POLICY can be found here: http://www.sesameworkshop.org/privacypolicy • Your input is very important to us. If you have any questions comments or need help please contact us at: sesameworkshopapps@sesame.org .

title: Animal Restaurant - Kids Game
author: UAB Edukacines sistemos
description: Have you ever been to an animal restaurant? If not here‘s your chance to visit one and assist the chef in the kitchen. I hope you know what a pig or a frog likes to eat because you‘ll have to carefully choose the ingredients and then prepare a meal for each animal. So better start cookin‘!

title: Ape på jungeleventyr
author: Hyper Games
description: La barna dine ta del i en lærerik og morsom opplevelse sammen med Ape i «Ape på Jungeleventyr». Her kan barna hjelpe Ape å mate de forskjellige dyrene med frukt de liker og finne de riktige hjelpemidlene for å få jungeldyrene til å sove eller våkne. De kan også bli med Ape på snorkeltur for å mate fisker og andre morsomme sjøskapninger samt samle inn frukt på havets bunn. Om det er natt eller dag kan barnet selv velge oppgavene og belønningene varierer deretter. I «Ape på Jungeleventyr» trenes barnas motoriske og sosiale evner. Oppgavene oppfordrer til utforsking trener barnets hukommelse og nysgjerrighet. Med frodige illustrasjoner og et levende lydbilde er det også en veldig underholdende app. Ape på Jungeleventyr passer for barn fra 2 år og oppover og er vel så gøy for de eldre barna også. Dette spillet er laget for Safari Yoghurt som markedsføres av Fjordland AS. Appen viser ingen produktreklame til barna som spiller og det er ingen kjøp eller eksterne lenker i spillet.

title: Tiffel-Toffel film-app
author: Ruta Ett DVD AB
description: Barnens egen lilla minibio! En perfekt barnfilms-app för 2-6 åringar. Appen innehåller både filmer och spel. Tiffel-Toffel och hans vänner har med sitt lugnare tempo kommit att bli en stor favorit bland de lite yngre barnen. Innehåller: Över en timme bra barnfilm! Appen innehåller både filmer och spel. En film en trailer och 1 spel är gratis. Om Tiffel-Toffel och hans vänner: Tiffel-Toffel och hans vänner är en 3D-animerad tv-serie om vänskap. Serien har med sitt lugnare tempo kommit att bli en stor favorit bland de lite yngre barnen. I Tiffel-Toffel och hans vänner möter vi den pedantiske uppfinnarsnigeln Tiffel-Toffel och vännerna Syrsa och Skalbagge. Tiffel-Toffel bor i en vildvuxen vinbärsbuske som står i en övergiven del av en trädgård. Syrsa och Skalbagge bor på en sten inte långt därifrån. Varje dag träffas vännerna för att hitta på någonting tillsammans det kan vara allt från en kuslig spökberättarkväll till en bärplockardag eller en upptäktsfärd i trädgården. Varje gång uppstår ett problem av något slag som Tiffel-Toffel måste lösa genom att gå in i sin uppfinnarverkstad och tillverka en ny uppfinning. Välkommen till livet runt en vinbärsbuske! Vi hoppas att du och ditt barn uppskattar våra filmer och att ni får mycket glädje av Tiffel-Toffel och hans vänner. Vi tar gärna emot dina synpunkter kommentarer och förslag. Maila oss på info@rutaett.com

title: Bolibompa
author: Sveriges Television AB
description: Bolibompa är Barnkanalens program för de allra minsta. Vi möter Bolibompadraken som bor i ett högt hus tillsammans med sina hyresgäster. Nina som gillar att pyssla Yankho som samlar på allt möjligt Ayla som håller koll på nyheterna och så Filmisarna som kivas och tittar på tecknad film. I appen kan du se på Bolibompa och enkelt hoppa fram och tillbaka till olika delar av programmet i en trygg och barnanpassad spelare - varje dag finns något nytt att titta på. Du kan också skoja med Draken och kittla den på magen. Appen är noga testad för att vara rolig och enkel att använda för barn i förskoleåldern. För bästa videokvalitet rekommenderar vi anslutning via trådlöst nätverk (Wi-Fi). Bolibompa-appen innehåller inte köp inuti appen (inga in-app purchases). Din mobiloperatör tar dock betalt som vanligt för nedladdad mängd data när du surfar via mobilnätet. Kontakta din mobiloperatör om du vill veta mer om det.

title: Baby Rattle Toy - Child Lock
author: kiddoware
description: Baby Rattle Toy (With Child Lock) – an interactive rattle toy for your infant or toddler ★Child lock ensures your kid accidentally does not make calls or get out of the app while enjoying it. ★ Six different rattle styles. Each with different sound effects. ★Animated objects in rattle will entertain your kids while improving their hand eye co-ordination as they try to tap on moving animals fishes and other objects. ★Airplane mode feature to avoid exposure to cell phone radiations to your loved ones. ★Please read the permission explanation at the end of description section. With Baby Rattle Toy you can calm or amuse your baby with your phone. You baby will love this toy. With this free app you will always have a toy to calm your baby. The app rattles on shaking your phone or tapping the screen. Features: - Each object in rattle animates with sound effect when tapped. - Setting to enable Child/Toddler lock - Setting to force Airplane mode. - Infant friendly – Rattle animates automatically for 20 seconds and can be triggered again by a simple tap or shake. Permission Explanations: * Internet Access - Used in App Settings screen to display Ad; for Google Analytics library; very minimal data consumption. * Global System Settings - For airplane mode Home Lock * Network State - For setting airplane mode; displaying ads

title: RIO 2 Sky Soccer!
author: Cupcake Digital Inc.
description: ** Soccer fever is here with the new RIO 2 story! ** 2 deluxe soccer games featuring the red vs. blue macaws It’s game on at the Pit of Doom as your feathered friend Blu and the blue macaws play an action-packed game of sky soccer against the pesky red macaws to gain control of the bird sanctuary they call home. Experience Blu’s amazing flying bicycle soccer kick during the thrilling match but does he help his team score the winning goal? RIO 2 Sky Soccer! is brought to you by award-winning children’s developer Cupcake Digital in partnership with Twentieth Century Fox and Blue Sky Studios. Features: - Relive the magic of the RIO 2 film in a brand new storybook app filled with favorite characters festive music and bright colorful imagery - Fun soccer-themed activities for all the soccer fans in your life - Star Soccer: Experience the blue macaws vs. red macaws in a flying soccer game. Unlock 20 levels of fun and receive bonus points! - Soccer Smash: Play by yourself or with a friend pick your player from the blue and red macaw teams then get ready to kick the ball into the goal to win To play with more of your RIO friends check out RIO Read & Play and RIO 2 (Official App for the Movie) in the Google Play Store. Cupcakedigital.com provides free downloadable activities based on the story to further the educational value at home. Parents’ and Teachers’ Guides are also available with helpful tips for getting children ready for school and for utilizing apps to reinforce learning in and out of the classroom. We care about your kids and their safety. This app contains gated areas to ensure that only adults can access anything that would take you outside of the app. To view our full app privacy policy please visit www.cupcakedigital.com/appsprivacy

title: Mad Libs
author: Penguin Random House LLC
description: Fill in the blanks and be the funniest person in the room! FEATURES • 21 free Mad Libs stories with new content added all the time • Swipe gestures make creating stories faster and easier • Interactive hints provide inspiration and speed your play along • Save your stories and share with friends • Earn badges every time you play • Replay stories as many times as you want • Play solo or with friends and family • Bright engaging color palette and custom typography • Custom illustrations for every book • Explore optional in-app purchases for loads more stories • Kid-friendly interface • No 3rd party advertising AWESOME LOOK Bright fun and engaging—it’s a super cool Mad Libs experience. MAD LIBS MUSIC?! Play along to an original soundtrack and audio effects. CREATE LAUGH AND LEARN This game makes you seriously smart—you’ll learn how to make great fun word choices!

title: ivi для детей
author: ivi.ru
description: Добро пожаловать в полностью обновленное приложение ivi для детей! Здесь вы найдете все самые популярные мультфильмы и мультсериалы а также подборки видео специально подготовленные редакцией ivi.ru для наших маленьких зрителей. А чтобы любимые мультфильмы были всегда под рукой вы можете отметить их и получить быстрый доступ к ним. Все мультфильмы приложения по-прежнему доступны абсолютно бесплатно. Кроме того вы можете оформить подписку ivi для детей и получить доступ к расширенным возможностям приложения: • ваш ребенок будет смотреть абсолютно все мультфильмы без рекламы • загружайте мультфильмы на устройство и берите с собой в дорогу. Они будут доступны для просмотра без доступа к Интернет. • неограниченный доступ к списку любимых видео. Стоимость подписки 199 рублей в месяц. Автопродление и списание денег за новый период происходит в течении 24 часов непосредственно перед моментом истечения подписки. Автопродление может быть отключено в настройках кошелька Google на вашем устройстве. Приложение работает как через Wi-Fi так и через 3G соединение. Обратите внимание! К загрузке разрешены только мультики которые отмечены специальным значком загрузки.

title: Yle Lasten Areena
author: Yleisradio Oy
description: Sovelluksesta löytyy sekä tv:stä tuttuja että vain Lasten Areenassa julkaistuja lastenohjelmia jaoteltuna iän ja kielen mukaan. Pikku Kakkonen tarjoaa ohjelmia perheen pienemmille ja Galaxi on koululaisten oma tv. BUU-klubben tarjoaa ruotsinkielistä lastenohjelmaa pienemmille ja Hajbo kouluikäisille. Sovellukseen julkaistaan uutta sisältöä päivittäin. Sovellusta voi käyttää suomen- tai ruotsinkielisenä. Sovellus toimii puhelimella ja tabletilla ja vaatii vähintään Android 4.0 käyttöjärjestelmän. Osa ohjelmista on tekijänoikeussyistä rajattu vain Suomessa katseltavaksi. Huom! Mikäli median toistossa on ongelmia voit kokeilla vaihtaa mediasoitinta ja pudottaa videon maksimilaatua sovelluksen asetuksista. Voit antaa palautetta suoraan sovelluksen kautta tai lähettää palautteesi Lasten Areena-sovelluksesta ja sisällöstä sähköpostilla osoitteeseen areena.info@yle.fi --- Applikationen innehåller både barnprogram ur tv-utbudet och program som enbart publiceras i Barnens Arena. Programmen är grupperade enligt ålder och språk. På svenska innehåller BUU-klubben programmen för de yngre barnen medan Hajbo bjuder på program för barn i skolåldern. På finska finns programmen för familjens yngsta samlade under rubriken Pikku Kakkonen medan Galaxi riktar sig till skolbarn. Det publiceras nytt innehåll i appen varje dag. Det går att använda applikationen både på svenska och finska. Appen fungerar på mobiltelefoner och pekplattor och kräver minst Android 4.0 som operativsystem. En del av programmen går av upphovsrättsliga skäl bara att titta på i Finland. Om du upplever problem vid uppspelningen av program i applikationen kan det löna sig att testa att via Inställningar > Experimentella inställningar begränsa den högsta tillåtna uppspelningskvaliteten. Här kan du också pröva på att byta mediespelare. Du kan ge feedback direkt via applikationen eller genom att skicka dina synpunkter på Barnens Arena -applikationen och innehåll till adressen areena.info@yle.fi

title: Cool magazine
author: Whisper Arts
description: Cool magazine: the application wholesome entertainment! is an educational application for children from 7 to 13 years. Released jointly with the publishing house "Open systems" based on the popular children's magazine "school journal". Together with deft red trot of Pantacles and curious blue ceterorum the alien Guebrou a lot of fun to run the quests and tests to solve crossword puzzles and brain teasers listen songs watch videos solve fun puzzles conduct experiments create crafts. And the kids love horror stories jokes and comics! Permanent sections: "Quest" — an interesting story with several scenarios. "Zadachnik" — a fun logic puzzles. "With their hands" — step-by-step instructions for creating a variety of interesting things. "Master of words" — the history of the life and work of famous writers. "The cool web" — a review of the exciting children's sites. "Playlist" — children's songs from different artists and composers. And also: "Jokes" "Horror" "Puzzle" "Puzzle" "news" "Test" and "Comics". The app "Cool magazine: the app useful entertainment!" is not just a set of entertainment and a platform for comprehensive development of the child. "Cool magazine" ( http://классный-журнал.дети — modern interactive magazine for children of younger and average school age (the target audience of 7 to 13 years boys and girls) published since 1999 and is one of the most popular children's weeklies Russia (edition 55 thousand copies per week). Each issue of "class-book" contains the latest information for kids: cartoons computer games and children's movies-new releases to scientific discoveries sports and technology. In the magazine's a balance between cognitive and developmental information. "Cool magazine" — magazine of wholesome entertainment!" Publishing house "Open systems" (www.osp.ru) is a leading Russian publishing house that produces a wide range of journals for professionals and active users in the it sector digital devices telecommunications medicine and printing magazines for children. Want to receive the latest news about the app? Subscribe to the news group http://vk.com/whisperarts

title: Mighty Raju Football Puzzle
author: Green Gold Animation
description: **This Free Game works both on phones and tablets** In this game you have to help Mighty Raju score goals in football. It is a Football Puzzle and tests your logical intelligence. Every time you play you are exposed to a new and different puzzle and the game is quite fun to play. From the creators of Chhota Bheem comes yet another app with “Mighty Raju” as "Mighty Raju Football Puzzle"

title: Kinderfilme Hörspiele Lieder
author: Kixi Entertainment GmbH
description: Mit der Kixi-App (Kinder-Mediathek) können Kinder Kinderfilme Kinderserien Hörspiele Hörbücher Kinderlieder Kindermusik und viele andere Video und Audio Programme für Kids legal und sicher schauen & hören. Mit der Offline-Funktion können alle Programme auch ohne Internet (offline) angeschaut bzw. angehört werden bspw. im Auto oder im Zug! BEACHTE: UM KIXI NUTZEN ZU KÖNNEN IST DER ABSCHLUSS EINES ABOS FÜR 699€ pro Monat ERFORDERLICH. Das Abo wird komfortabel über Ihren Google Play Account bezahlt und verlängert sich automatisch wenn es nicht 24 Stunden vor Ende eines Monats gekündigt wurde. Eine Kündigung zum Ende eines Monats ist jederzeit über den Google Play Store sehr einfach möglich. In diesem Fall werden natürlich sämtliche Downloads von ihrem Gerät gelöscht. Du benötigst W-LAN oder LTE: Man benötigt Breitband für die Nutzung von Kixi! Nur in DE+AT+CH: Die meisten Movies Serien und Musik Angebote können nur in Deutschland Österreich & der Schweiz genutzt werden im Ausland nicht! (außer in der Offline-Speicherung) Das bietet Dir die Kinder-Mediathek von Kixi: - 51 Kinderserien: Neben Zeichentrickserien wie Benjamin Blümchen Bibi Blocksberg oder der kleine König haben wir auch die neuen Animationsserien aus dem TV-Programm wie Zeo Wendy Summ Summ Super! oder Das Dschungelbuch. - 200 Spielfilme: Bekannte Kinofilme wie Der Krieg der Knöpfe Arthur und die Minimoys aber auch echt Kinderfilm Klassiker wie Lassie oder Filme aus den DEFA Kinder Studios warten auf dich. Ob Zeichentrickfilm oder Realfilm alle Filme nicht über fsk 6! - 78 Hörbücher: Hier kannst du zwischen Märchen Lehrbücher oder Abenteuer von Prinzessin Lillifee als Audiobücher wählen. Außerdem gibt es viele Gute-Nacht-Geschichten als Audiobook. - 190 Hörspiele: Neben echten Klassikern wie Jan Tenner oder Xanti warten auf dich die brandneuen bekannte Hörspielserien von Mia and Me Feuerwehrmann Sam Der kleine Prinz Die wilden Kerle und viele weitere. - 130 Liederalben: Ob Kindergartenlieder Mitmachlieder Lernlieder Einschlafmusik (Einschlaflieder) Entspannungsmusik mit Meditation Filmmusik oder moderne Popmusik wie z.B. die Songs von den Lollipops. Hier ist für jeden etwas dabei. - Offline Funktion für unterwegs - Ständig neues / erweitertes Programm - Nur FSK 0 und FSK 6! Alle Inhalte redaktionell getestet. Schaue doch auch mal auf unsere Facebook-Seite: https://www.facebook.com/kinderkino.de . Oder auf unseren Youtube Kanal: http://www.youtube.com/user/Kinderkino . Dort gibt es viele weitere Kindervideos kostenlos! Bei Problemen mit der App bitte eine Email senden an: info@kixi.de . Weitere Informationen zu Kixi und Kinder Videos auf http://www.kixi.de . Hinweis: Kixi Kinderkino ist keine Mediathek eines TV-Senders und auch kein webTV (IPTV Internet-TV) Sender wo das Fernsehprogramm einsehbar ist oder Fernsehsender geschaut werden können.

title: Sago Mini Space Explorer
author: Sago Sago
description: Blast into space with Harvey the dog. Invite Harvey out to play among the stars and planets. Jet through space and discover dozens of delightful surprises. Make new alien friends zip around in a flying saucer meet the lovable hug-bot and enjoy an interstellar picnic. This open-ended play experience is perfect for toddlers and preschoolers. Made with care Sago Mini Space Explorer puts kids in control. Part of the award-winning suite of Sago Mini apps the app is sure to bring smiles to your little one. Features • Use your finger to move Harvey through space • Guide Harvey to the yellow markers to uncover fun animations • Fly dance and laugh with Harvey and his friends • More than 30 fun animations to discover • Make up stories to go with the actions • Recommended for toddlers • No in-app purchases or third-party advertising so you and your child are free to discover without interruptions! Our team of designers and developers create apps that children love and parents trust. We build on kids' natural sense of wonder creativity and curiosity to make apps that are safe positive and fun. Sago Mini are the ideal first apps for your little one.

title: Fresh Pick
author: PBS KIDS
description: ARE YOU THE NEXT LUNCH LABBER? Professor Fizzy star of the PBS KIDS web series "Fizzy's Lunch Lab" is holding a competition to see who has what it takes to be the next Lunch Labber! Think it's going to be easy cheesy? Well think again! If you can navigate your way through the grocery store come up with right amount of change in the check-out line and successfully serve food to a room full of hungry customers you may just have what it takes to become the next member of the Lunch Lab! Optimized for a tablet experience challenge specifics are: • For kids ages 6-8 and Lunch Lab fans of all ages • From the 3-time Emmy Nominated PBS KIDS Web Series Fizzy’s Lunch Lab • Combines video narratives with interactive challenges • Covers math topics such as deductive reasoning mapping sorting and classifying • Has self-leveling games that make the challenge specific to each user • Funded by a Ready to Learn Grant from the US Department of Education THE LUNCH LAB For more on Fizzy and the rest of the Lunch Labbers visit pbskids.org/lunchlab DISCLAIMER The contents of this mobile game were developed under a cooperative agreement #PRU295A100025 from the U.S. Department of Education. However those contents do not necessarily represent the policy of the Department of Education and you should not assume endorsement by the Federal Government.

title: Kids Safe Video Player Sami
author: SamiApps.com
description: From Sami Apps team we present the perfect solution for kids and parents to watch Internet videos in the safest way. Integrated Parental Control protects kids from unexpected surprises. You will know that at all times your kid will be watching safe content appropriate to his/her age. In turn Kids Safe Video Player allows the smallest at home to have fun freely. From “Sami Apps” we have created this app in which children can surf channels and watch kid’s videos. We add the best content and you as parents can approve and add more videos so at all times you may have knowledge of what your children are watching. What will you find in “Kids Safe Video Player”? - The best videos channels and playlists previously selected by us for the kids to have fun. - Different sections that classify these videos by theme: your child can learn play dance and laugh which will include educational fun and music videos. - A Favorite/Bookmarked video section so that the kids can collect their favorites. They can have access to them as often as they want! - Add videos: only the parents (and us) can add new “YouTube Kids” videos so you can always control the content that the children are watching. - Preview and timer: you can play a nice and elegant video previews and limit the time that the kids spend watching. - Tips: we'll also be adding new “Youtube Kids” video suggestions to see. You can enjoy “Youtube Kids” videos in a totally safe way for your little ones! Our work is guaranteed by quality seals and our expertise in developing educational apps for children in which the parents can also find educational Pedagogical Information with explanations suggestions and tips for working with your children at home. Sami Apps won first prize for Best Children’s App in the 11th Annual El Chupete the First International Festival of Child Communication. Sami Apps was considered by Appszoom as one of the best family and games apps of 2014. And we are also available in some specialized Tablets for children. _________________________________ Disclaimer: we are using YouTube technology to watch the videos. We are not part of them and we can’t control the advertising shown in these videos.

title: Electric Company Party Game
author: PBS KIDS
description: HEY YOU GUYYYYYS! Marcus and Jessica are stuck on Prankster Planet and they need your help! Complete physical challenges silly brainstorms and math questions in this exciting multiplayer game. From wacky challenges to counting races this game will have your team laughing and learning as you add draw discuss think act problem solve and dance your way back to Earth. The app is based on the PBS KIDS series The Electric Company. KEY FEATURES •Collaborative play •Digital board game •Hours of unrepeated fast-paced games physical challenges and group activities •Play as your favorite Electric Company member EDUCATIONAL GOALS These goals are part of 1st and 2nd grade math and literacy curricula and include: •Geometry •Addition and subtraction •Data analysis and graphing •Telling Time •Coin value and recognition •And more! About The Electric Company The Electric Company is a PBS KIDS multi-Emmy award-winning TV show an online destination and community outreach experience offering 5-9 year old children a playful portal into the world of literacy and math. In the animated/gaming Prankster Planet kids get to play as a member of The Electric Company to defeat the pranksters in a series of math challenges. Produced by Sesame Workshop Prankster Planet content airs on PBS KIDS and the adventure continues online at pbskids.org/electriccompany.

title: LEGO® TV
author: The LEGO Group
description: Watch your favourite LEGO® movies directly on your device. This app allows you to watch LEGO movies in both online and offline mode. You can download your favourite LEGO movies to your device and watch them whenever you like. Important Messaging for Parents: • The app may include product videos like TV commercials and product reviews. • The app includes links to the LEGO.com website a safe site for kids to have fun. This app features two main areas: - LEGO Movies streamed from the official LEGO YouTube Channel - LEGO Movies for download to your device LEGO Movies streamed from the LEGO YouTube Channel • You have to be online to use this feature. Movies are streamed from the LEGO YouTube channel to your device. LEGO Movies for download to your device • This feature allows you to download selected LEGO movies to your device. Please notice that this feature stores the movies on the device and uses memory. The app also features a playlist functionality • Here the user can name and create playlists with a mix of selected LEGO Movies. Get into the world of LEGO with this app – LEGO Movies on the go! For app support contact LEGO Consumer Service. For contact details refer to http://service.lego.com/contactus Our privacy policy and terms of use for apps are accepted if you download this app. Read more on http://aboutus.lego.com/legal-notice/Privacy-Policy and http://aboutus.lego.com/en-us/legal-notice/terms-of-use-for-apps LEGO and the LEGO logo are trademarks of the LEGO Group. ©2014 The LEGO Group.

title: はたらくくるまゴーゴー 2歳から遊べる幼児・子供知育アプリ
author: WAO CORPORATION
description: ●おかげさまで累計300万※ダウンロード突破● 働く車に乗ってドライブしよう！ いろいろなミッション（お仕事）が君を待っているよ！ 【対象年齢】2歳〜 ※コラボアプリを含む2015年7月時点のワオっち！シリーズ累計数 ■■ミッションをクリアしよう■■ タクシーでお客さんを運んだり、消防車で現場に急行したり、働く車のお仕事をドライブしながら楽しく体験できます。 ■■簡単操作で楽しく運転■■ 2歳の子ども達でも簡単に遊べる操作性に配慮しました。 楽しくドライブ気分が味わえます。 ■■車カードを集めよう■■ ミッションをクリアすると、お給料コインがもらえます。 コインを使って、車カードを集めましょう。 車カードは続々追加予定！ ＜配信中の働く車＞ 一つの働く車で、5つのミッションを遊べます。 ●タクシー（無料） お客さんを目的地まで連れて行ってあげよう！ ●ごみ収集車（有料） 街をきれいにしよう！ ●パトカー（有料） 困っている人達を助けよう！ ●路線バス（有料） たくさんのお客さんを運んであげよう！ ●消防車（有料） 緊急指令！現場に急行せよ！ 働く車は続々追加予定です！ ●●こんな力が育ちます●● このアプリは、色々な「はたらくくるま」を自分で運転してみる体験を通して、普段街中で目にする多くの車が、どんな働きをする車なのかを考えるきっかけとなり、お子さまの、外の世界に対する豊かな好奇心を養います。 小さなお子さまが抱く、目の前にあるものに対する強い興味や関心は、自分の知らない新しいことを知りたいという欲求の表れであり、お子さまのあらゆる発達の原動力となるものです。 また、このアプリで仕事を疑似体験することによって、仕事を通して他人から感謝してもらうことができること、仕事を通して対価を得ることができることを学び、働くことの意義や目的の理解を助けます。 『はたらくくるまゴーゴー』は、全国の子供達のいるご家庭で、お使いいただいている知育アプリ『ワオっち！（わおっち！）シリーズ』です。 幼児期に必要な5つの力、「知力」「感性」「表現」「自律」「就学基礎」に沿って複数のアプリを『ワオっち！シリーズ』として「学び・感動カンパニー、㈱ワオ・コーポレーション」が制作しております。 幼児学習ゲームとして「触って、話して、傾けて、親子で楽しく遊んでいるうちに、知らずに学んでる!?」そんな親子で楽しめる子供向けアプリシリーズです。 ご家族一緒に楽しみながら行った幼児期の学習は、子供達のこれからの知的好奇心を豊かに大きく拡げていきます。 お子さまと一緒にスマホ・タブレットを手にし、「こうするのかな?」「よくできたね!」と声をかけながら『ワオっち！シリーズ』のコンテンツで楽しく学んでいただければ幸いです。

title: MakeUp Salon - Fancy Vacation
author: San Games
description: Hey Girls! Summer is going to end its time to take a relaxing vacation. If you are in awe of the glitz and glam of the fashion world its your chance to become the superstar makeup fashion designer. Its time to give a boost to your beauty! Makeup Salon – Fancy Vacation is here to help you girls. Its time for your dream to come true! Take out some time for your self and get a relaxing vacation in paradise like environment. Get spa treatments such as steaming facial cleansing and get fruity massaging at lovely spa with paradise environment. If you have sunken eyes and eye bags you can place fresh fruit slices on eyes to get rid of dark circles. icy mask can help retighten your dull face and bring back your youthful glowing beauty back. San Games bring you this game for you to Be as creative as you want create unique makeup designs for the fashionable beauty. Do spa and facial makeup and get sensational eye makeup at the best makeup salon. Get those glam fashion model looks by applying a wide range of cool colorful eyes Makeup Fashionable Eyewear such as colorful contact lenses and summer designer glasses it's time to take a vacation and have some summer fun time at seaside spa and makeup salon. Apply liners mascaras shimmers all the makeup what you can think of! glamorize your looks with rogue and blushes with tattoos Apply dozens of juicy and fruity lipsticks shades to get lush lips. Place shiny flower accessories on the face for celebrity super star look and modify them to get perfect fashion looks. Choose from Various makeup items tattoos haircuts delicate jewelry accessories styling glasses and dazzling cosmetics in this fashionable girls game. Its all your choice you want to create a bold and beautiful look? Or do you prefer to be on a softer side with cute glam doll look Choice is all yours. Here you can be the one as you wish. You come to this Makeup Salon for every occasion whether you want to Makeup your clients for special costume partyseaside fun Princess Ball High School Prom Party halloween makeup party makeup Wedding Beach or Pool Party.You girls can look chic and elegant for any occasion you like and become the Princess makeup star. You can Enjoy this girls game with you friends and have fun. Features: - A Perfect makeup game for girls having Relaxing Paradise Spa and Realistic Makeup Spa Salon Environment - 5 beautiful girls are your clients(sofia Mia zoe lily Isabella) - Use FANCY creams and cosmetics to get rid of those pimples acne and freckles! - Use special tools like pimple poppers tweezers & steamer massager and many more! - Choose from tons of lipstick colors eye shadows blushes mascaras and more! - Use sparkle spray to make face SHINE! - Spa treatment such as Remove Acne Pimples & freckles and dark circles to get glowing skin - You can apply Multiple Eyeshades Hairstyles eyeliner blushes cool lip-gloss and many other girl things. - Hundreds of items are offered for free - A set of makeover steps in real MakeUp Salon is represented - Show your creativity to the world - HD graphics and smooth Gameplay that girls will certainly love Get ready Show your beauty to the world at Makeup Salon! About San Game: San Games is committed to create creative mobile games Children's stories and innovative learning experiences for kids as well as Teens. Like San Games on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/SanGameStudios?ref=hl

title: Kyorochan ADV in Candy Town
author: KidsStar Inc.
