Hvis du bruker samme Google-konto betaler du selvfølgelig ikke på nytt for allerede kjøpt innhold. På samme måte kan du laste ned appen på flere Android enheter og du kan slette og gjeninstallere Elias-appen. Det koster ikke noe ekstra så lenge du bruker samme Google-konto. Hjelp oss med å lage en enda bedre Elias-app. Skriv til os på appservice@egmont.dk eller på www.facebook.com/ApperForBarn

title: Toddlers Funny Puzzle
author: Alyaka
description: Kids love Toddlers Funny Puzzle! This tactile game also appeals to young kids and children with special needs. Its puzzles are full of interactivity animations and sounds for many repeat plays. It helps kids develop spatial recognition matching tactile and fine-motor skills. As for you parents this game is designed to be playable by you and your child together so you can participate and bond with your child. Besides being entertained your kid will build memory and cognitive skills while playing.

title: The Little Crane That Could
author: Game Studio Abraham Stolk
description: Cranes are fun! In Little Crane you can operate a wide ranges of cranes. You can even fly a sky crane if you want. Over 14M users can't be wrong: the challenges are entertaining. The incredibly realistic simulation gives you full control over your crane. Repair bridges load cargo trains reconstruct ancient temples move houses: it is all possible in 'The Little Crane That Could'. Play the first six action packed levels for free and with a single one time purchase you can unlock all 27 levels in the game. NEW: WORLD EDITOR. You can now design your own levels using the Little Crane World Editor (sold separately.) See: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.steenriver.worldeditor NEW: PLAY ON DESKTOP You can play more Little Crane on the desktop. Head over to steam and get Little Crane for Windows/Mac/Linux. http://store.steampowered.com/app/361430 - Top notch physics. - 6 free levels. - free roaming sandbox level. - 21 premium levels. - Support for tablet devices. - Gorgeous high resolution visuals. - High frame rates on all modern devices. - Drive mobile cranes dump trucks skid loaders and fork lifts. - Fly a Sky Crane. IMPORTANT NOTICE: My apologies to the people making the in app purchase and do not see all the levels unlocked. If this happens to you and 'Restore Premium' button is not helping please use this work around: - open device settings - open apps tab Little Crane - uninstall - open google play store and download again. - launch game it will say 'restoring purchases'. GAMEPAD: Starting with V1.12 you can now play Little Crane with your PS3 gamepad. This feature is ONLY AVAILABLE for devices that support USB HOST. More information on the game is available in the FAQ. http://stolk.org/tlctc/androidfaq.html

title: School of Dragons
author: Knowledge Adventure Inc.
description: Join Hiccup Toothless Astrid and the rest of the Vikings in School of Dragons a massive 3D world where you play in the DreamWorks Animation “How To Train Your Dragon” universe with all your favorite dragons and Viking friends. Raise train and compete with your dragon — the more you accomplish with your dragon the faster you will rise through the ranks at the School of Dragons and become the Ultimate Dragon Trainer. Venture with your dragon on quests to the depths of the ocean corners of Berk mysteries within hidden caves and more that will test your Viking’s knowledge and skill. True Vikings fear nothing and dragons open up a whole new world of never before seen adventures. Experience all the fun and adventure of “How To Train Your Dragon” in a 3D world when you enroll in School of Dragons! Are you ready to own the skies as the Ultimate Dragon Trainer? FEATURES • Embark on challenging quests with familiar friends like Hiccup Toothless and others from the “How To Train Your Dragon” franchise • Build up your stables and train over 30 dragons! With Toothless a Stormcutter Flightmare and more you will surely become the ULTIMATE DRAGON TRAINER! • The vast world of Berk beckons you with head-to-head games such as Viking Racing Fireball shooting and so much more • Farming and fishing are the basic essentials for any Viking. Manage and style your very own Farm with animals crops special contraptions and décor - Don’t forget to fish the depths of the seas that surround the School. Each area holds new and different species • Create your very own unique avatar. Pick your own dragon and customize its appearance from a multitude of options • Enrolling in the School will allow you to play with millions of other students all over the world! Socialize with your friends or meet new ones in this fantastic ever expanding universe • With over 7 different lands to explore your Viking will find something new every day • Use your tablet to race your dragon against dragon trainers worldwide to win rewards and glory • Gameplay revolves around science – Life Earth and Physical sciences and simple machinery. Learning is rooted in the Next Generation Science Standards one of the first games to employ this • Play on your mobile device Facebook or computer — SEAMLESSLY. This cross-platform gameplay experience is one of the first of its kind! ** For optimal performance please close all apps prior to opening School of Dragons. ** ** If you are having issues please refer to http://www.schoolofdragons.com/how-to-train-your-dragon/mobile-optimization or email: support@schoolofdragons.com for help! ** ** 2gb of space is needed for the game on your device. ** What people are saying about School of Dragons: * "This amazing world of creativity is loaded with timeless exploration and exciting quests that you will find more than entertaining." - Dragon Games Online * "...it has both brains and heart wrapped in a non-violent package that will appeal to lots of different people.“ - 4/5 stars Gamezebo Available in English Spanish Portuguese Simplified Chinese German Russian French Korean! Email us at AppComments@jumpstart.com with your suggestions and comments. We love to hear your ideas and feedback! Privacy Policy: http://www.schoolofdragons.com/Help/privacypolicy Registration information is optional (children under 13 require parent registration). You will be able to be notified of game updates and new features along with integration to our online educational world for kids. PLEASE NOTE: School of Dragons uses in-game currency to unlock game content customization options and consumables. You can earn them through gameplay or purchase additional in-game coins via your iTunes account. You may lock out the ability to purchase the upgrade by disabling this through your device’s settings.

title: Bamse Bjørn
author: Egmont Kids Media Digital
description: Denne appen inneholder alt barna ønsker seg! Her kan de kose seg i Bamse Bjørn-kinoen leke i Pannekake-bakeriet finne ting på myldretegninger male i maleboken legge puslespill spille Memo-spill og Tre-på-rad samt lytte til lydbøker med Bamse Bjørn og alle vennene hans.

title: Big Hero 6: Baymax Blast
author: Disney Publishing Worldwide
description: Experience the thrilling story of Big Hero 6 as you soar through the streets of San Fransokyo! Collect story pages and clips from the feature film unlock character bios and exclusive background information and snatch back trails of stolen microbots! Upgrade your tech and explore with new characters then hang out in the lab with your favorite heroes and their huggable healthcare companion. FEATURES: • Collect story pages and film clips and discover exclusive story content about each of the characters! • Skirt deadly obstacles and smash through barriers as you streak through San Fransokyo in this action-packed endless runner adventure! • Retrieve microbots and collect energy to unlock and upgrade cool power-ups like a phase shifter that lets you survive crashes and the scorchingly-fast super ion thrusters! • Add Hiro and Go Go to your flight or save up to earn silver and gold super suits for Baymax! • Complete challenging missions to unlock all sorts of rewards including clips from the feature film a fully illustrated Big Hero 6 story and exclusive art character files and super-tech blueprints! Before you download this experience please consider that this app contains in-app purchases that cost real money links to online stores to purchase real products as well as advertising for The Walt Disney Family of Companies and some third parties. If you're experiencing difficulties with audio please check the audio settings within your device to see if your device is muted. Don't hesitate to contact customer care at 877-662-3769 or memberservices@disneydigitalbooks.com .

title: Snowy&Chinooks Birthday Invite
author: Loud Crow Interactive Inc.
description: Discover a magical world of handcrafted puppetry brought to life in Windy & friends. This unique and wonderful story experience combines stop-motion animation with touch interactivity that will captivate children and the young-at-heart. It's Tulip’s birthday! Join her friends Snowy and Chinook on their hunt for the perfect present in the icy Winter woods. A stick a rock a toothbrush? No the best gift is the one we make ourselves. Three cheers for Tulip hip hip hooray! Learning Outcome: Snowy and Chinook's Birthday Invite demonstrates the value of thoughtful decision-making and resourcefulness. Children learn that the biggest isn't always the best. App Features * Groundbreaking mix of handcrafted stop-motion animation with innovative interaction and cinematics * Touch tilt and drag the screen to explore the world of Windy & friends * Original music narration and sound effects * Three reading modes included for your enjoyment: Read to Me Read Myself and Autoplay * Language support in English and French; toggle languages on-the-fly * Visual Word Map promotes word association in both languages * Matching Game is a fun way to improve memory skills * “Parents only" area safely separates adult controls from child-friendly content Visit www.windyandfriends.com for DIY craft activities original music and even more Windy & Friends! Visit us: www.loudcrow.com Follow us: twitter.com/loudcrowinc Like us: facebook.com/loudcrow

title: Little Builders
author: Fox & Sheep
description: Little Builders - construction site fun for 2-6 year old children! On our construction site your child can drive a digger mix cement roof a building operate a crane drive a street sweeper or paint a house. There’s so much to do here. Our Little Builders dig plaster fill paint and mix... And they need your children´s help. At the same time they can watch funny things happen because on every building site there’s always something going wrong. Water suddenly bursts from a pipe a builder falls into a hole or the wind blows the bricks away because the cement wasn’t dry yet. Little Builders is the first 3D app for children aged 2-6 years that want to explore the world of being a real little builder. Depending on the child’s age all animations and functions can run automatically or be controlled through a tap. 7 interactive scenarios contain over 100 interactive animations and surprises: 1. Steer the digger fill the truck and repair the water pipe. 2. Paint the house in different colours and unload the removals truck. 3. Operate the crane and build a new roof for the house. 4. Mix cement and build a real wall. 5. Operate a big cement mixer and concrete a large area. 6. Drive the street sweeper and clean the dirty road. 7. Unload the crane truck and make sure it leaves on time. Amazing graphics great animations a user-friendly interface no text and no in-app purchases. Download now and start building! If you experience any trouble with the App or have any questions or comments please don't hesitate to contact us any time: contact@foxandsheep.com . We´d love to help you out. Please also visit our website www.foxandsheep.com for more information and support.

title: Ella Bella Bingo Bicycle Thief
author: Ravn Studio
description: Popular Ella Bella Bingo from the acclaimed children’s TV series is ready for a new adventure. Ella Bella’s best friend Henry gets a brand new bicycle for his birthday but as soon as it gets dark the bike mystically disappears. Ella Bella wants to help her friend. She starts a detective agency to find the missing bicycle. Join Ella Bella and her friends as they try to solve the mystery! Ella Bella BICYCLE THIEF is not your regular book app but a magical story experience. Play your way through the interactive story. Enjoy fun classic activity games. Designed for children from 3 years old and up. The app is made to entertain and keep children occupied for a long time. Ella Bella BICYCLE THIEF includes: • The story book with 37 colorful pages full of interactivity • Original music • Games such as memory games color activities and fun jigsaw puzzles with a twist. No third party advertising or in app purchases.

title: Charlie Brown's All Stars!
author: Loud Crow Interactive Inc.
description: It’s the bottom of the ninth and the team is down two-zero... It’s Charlie Brown’s chance to be a hero. Will the Peanuts gang win the biggest baseball game of the summer? Charlie Brown’s All Stars! magically springs to life in this charming interactive storybook designed for your Android tablet and smartphone. Peanuts fans will delight in sharing this classic story of team spirit and friendship with a whole new generation of underdogs! Touch tilt and swipe your way through tons of summer fun with your favourite Peanuts characters! Take to the mound with Charlie Brown swing a bat with Linus and make a very special uniform with Lucy and the rest of the team. And don’t forget to hang ten with Surfing Snoopy and practice your skateboarding tricks with the gang! Narrated by Stephen Shea the voice of Linus van Pelt this classic summertime story of team spirit and friendship comes alive with beautifully re-mastered illustrations voices and music from the original 1966 animated TV special. App Features: ● Touch and drag objects to make them “spring” to life or tilt to watch them slide and move ● Pitch bat and catch high fly balls with the Peanuts gang ● Measure cut and sew a special uniform for Charlie Brown ● Hang ten with Surfing Snoopy and skateboard with your favorite characters ● Help Linus get his inflatable pool set up for a pool party with the gang ● Jump to any page in the book with the handy table of contents bookmark ● Educational features such as word highlighting to help improve reading ● Hear individual words spoken with the tap of a finger ● Charming narration by Stephen Shea the voice behind Linus van Pelt ● Beautifully re-mastered artwork from the original 1966 television special ● Original dialogue music and sound effects from the original television special ● Optimized for the tablets phones and HD Devices.

title: 당근 한 개
author: PUBLSTUDIO
description: ★★★움직이는 동화책 ‘당근 한 개’!★★★ ‘옆집아이’‘해피주니어 동화’로 유명한 퍼블스튜디오의 또다른 이야기! ★아기자기한 캐릭터들이 돋보이는 감성적인 일러스트 ★남녀노소 감동을 주는 따뜻한 이야기 ★아이가 읽고 듣고 만지며 볼 수 있는 다양한 인터렉션과 애니메이션 효과 ★따로 감상하고 싶을 만큼 듣기 좋은 음악과 다양한 효과음들 ★캐릭터들의 개성이 살아있는 전문성우의 음성 지원 ★동화속 동물친구들이 등장하는 틀린그림찾기 미니게임 두가지 지원 유아아동초등학생에게 적합한 교육용 컨텐츠입니다. 또한 아기자기하고 귀여운 일러스트와 따뜻한 이야기를 좋아하는 분들을 위한 동화책입니다. ---- 개발자 연락처 : #c6 smart contents center G.square 18F 1039 Hogye-dong Dong an-gu Anyang-city Gyeong gi-do 431-080 Korea

title: Windy's Valentine Delight
author: Loud Crow Interactive Inc.
description: Discover a magical world of handcrafted puppetry brought to life in Windy & friends. This unique and wonderful story experience combines stop-motion animation with touch interactivity that will captivate children and the young-at-heart. On a cheery Spring morning in the orchard who will be Windy’s valentine? Windy visits each of her friends and learns who their valentine will be. At home with her blossoming pear tree it becomes clear who (or what) Windy will call her valentine. Learning Outcome: Windy’s Valentine Delight highlights curiosity and encourages children to recognize and value individuality in themselves and their friends. App Features * Groundbreaking mix of handcrafted stop-motion animation with innovative interaction and cinematics * Touch tilt and drag the screen to explore the world of Windy & friends * Original music narration and sound effects * Three reading modes included for your enjoyment: Read to Me Read Myself and Autoplay * Language support in English and French; toggle languages on-the-fly * Visual Word Map promotes word association in both languages * Matching Game is a fun way to improve memory skills * “Parents only" area safely separates adult controls from child-friendly content Visit www.windyandfriends.com for DIY craft activities original music and even more Windy & Friends! Visit us: www.loudcrow.com Follow us: twitter.com/loudcrowinc Like us: facebook.com/loudcrow

title: Hungry Baby
author: Gametion
description: YAY there is no one at home!! Mama’s baby wants its milk bottle; oh… dear Hungry Baby!! Help him to get near Milk bottle! Allow the baby to crawl fast so that it can reach near the bottle and drink milk happily... Husshh!!! It’s so relieved when baby get its milk!!! Also make the baby overcome all the coming obstacles and divert its way... the path through which baby moves are all distributed in square blocks so help baby to crawl through the square blocks and achieve scores!! Play Hungry Baby games and have fun along it…. Controls of the game: Swipe with your finger to crawl the baby to the milk bottle.

title: Mike the Knight Six Game Pack
author: Hit Entertainment
description: Huzzah! It’s time to be a knight and do it right with the NEW Mike the Knight™: Knight in Training Game Pack. Mike the Knight wants to be a brave and noble knight just like his father the King. With the new Knight in Training Game Pack help Mike with the skills he needs to become the best knight in Glendragon! Featuring a collection of SIX interactive games and puzzles that feature Mike his dragons Squirt and Sparkie his sister Evie and all of their friends in Glendragon kids will love helping Mike on all of his knightly missions. The easy and hard modes welcome all children to play. Games include: Jam Tart Fling – With up to 50 levels of play help Mike protect Glendragon from the Vikings’ mischief! Fruit Shoot – Practice your archery skills and see how many fruits you can shoot! Paint the Castle - Learn shapes and colors while painting the walls of Glendragon Castle! Jigsaw Jumble - Discover favorite friends after completing and unlocking puzzles! Seek & Find - Search the scroll for the hidden items! Match Mission - Memorize and match your favorite characters Aspiring knights-in-training are guaranteed to enjoy hours of fun while testing their reflexes dexterity and puzzle solving skills. Playable on Android tablets and phones and featuring the characters music and beautiful CG graphics from the TV show - Mike the Knight: Knight in Training Game Pack is a must have App that is sure to entertain and inspire fans and newcomers alike! About Mike the Knight™: Mike the Knight brings the excitement and enchantment of medieval times into the life of the modern pre-schooler. Kids are transported to a world filled with marvelous missions castles dragons Vikings and trolls. With the triumphant rallying cry “Be a Knight do it Right” the young hero is joined in his adventures by a host of characters including his trusty steed Galahad two friendly dragons Squirt and Sparkie and his sister Evie a trainee wizard. Mike is an energetic cheeky yet bountiful young Knight-in-training driven by his passion to help others and along the way be the best knight he can be. Visit HIT Entertainment at www.hitentertainment.com Follow Mike the Knight on Twitter: @miketheknightus Like Mike the Knight on Facebook at www.facebook.com/miketheknightofficial Visit Funny Garbage at www.funnygarbage.com Follow Funny Garbage on Twitter: @funnygarbage Like Funny Garbage on Facebook at www.facebook.com/FunnyGarbage

title: Ellie Rides
author: Talking Talk
description: Ellie is five and a half and she has tried to ride a bicycle but she did not manage. Sammy has just moved in next door he is five and he can ride very well. Dad learns a new fun technique to easily teach children to ride. He tries it out on Ellie and... Every page has interactive animation features. There is a read to me audio option and each word is touchable to help young readers. The book is recommended from age 4 through 7.

title: Kids Christmas Snow Globe
author: Kidoteca
description: A funny Christmas toy for your kids! As with a real snow globe they can tilt shake and put upside down the device to move the snow flakes. FEATURES ✰ tilt and shake to spread the snow ✰ chase the flakes by touching the screen ✰ three traditional Christmas Songs included: Jingle Bells Merry Christmas Silent Night PRIVACY ✰ no ads ✰ no in-app purchases ✰ no outbound links Kids Christmas Snow Globe (mobile app) is certified by the kidSAFE® Seal Program. To learn more click on the seal or go to http://www.kidsafeseal.com . We developed this app as a Christmas gift for your children this is why it is totally free. If you like it please rate it and have a look at our other apps! In this simple toy you will find a beautiful and funny scene of a village on Christmas night. Santa Claus is trying to enter into the chimney of a house while the dwarfs are trying to help him without much success. ABOUT KIDOTECA We are a new studio making “Apps for Curious Kids”! Kidoteca's philosophy is to promote education through kid-friendly gaming and discovery. Visit our website at http://www.kidoteca.com - if you have any comments or suggestions please send us an email at feedback@kidoteca.com .

title: Sunny's Dark Night
author: Loud Crow Interactive Inc.
description: Discover a magical world of handcrafted puppetry brought to life in Windy & friends. This unique and wonderful story experience combines stop-motion animation with touch interactivity that will captivate children and the young-at-heart. In this stormy appisode we join Windy and Sunny as they explore creative ways to have fun when the power goes out. Use a flashlight to explore objects in the dark. Play the mystery snack phone game. Watch shooting stars in sky. With plenty of hidden surprises there is much to see and do! Learning Outcome: In Sunny’s Dark Night children draw on their imagination to make their own fun. Discover the concept of opposites as Windy and Sunny compare light to dark crunchy to smooth. Bonus games promote word association in English and French as well as memory skills. App Features * Groundbreaking mix of handcrafted stop-motion animation with innovative interaction and cinematics * Touch tilt and drag the screen to explore the world of Windy & friends * Original music narration and sound effects * Three reading modes included for your enjoyment: Read to Me Read Myself and Autoplay * Language support in English and French; toggle languages on-the-fly * Visual Word Map promotes word association in both languages * Matching Game is a fun way to improve memory skills * “Parents only" area safely separates adult controls from child-friendly content Visit www.windyandfriends.com for DIY craft activities original music and even more Windy & Friends! Visit us: www.loudcrow.com Follow us: twitter.com/loudcrowinc Like us: facebook.com/loudcrow

title: Windy's Lost Kite
author: Loud Crow Interactive Inc.
description: Discover a magical world of handcrafted puppetry brought to life in Windy and friends. This unique and wonderful story experience combines stop-motion animation with touch interactivity that will captivate children and the young-at-heart. In this appisode we help Windy on her journey to solve the mystery of her missing red kite. Adventure through wintry woods filled with sugary snow and roller skate through orchards filled with colourful paper leaves. Meet some of Windy’s friends and see if they can help. Where is Windy’s kite? Let’s explore together! Learning Outcome: Windy’s Lost Kite demonstrates that cooperation and a positive outlook are essential to solving problems together. App Features * Groundbreaking mix of handcrafted stop-motion animation with innovative interaction and cinematics * Touch tilt and drag the screen to explore the world of Windy & friends * Original music narration and sound effects * Three reading modes included for your enjoyment: Read to Me Read Myself and Autoplay * Language support in English and French; toggle languages on-the-fly * Musical Soundboard allows reader to play instruments with Windy and her friends * Visual Word Map promotes word association in both languages * “Parents only" area safely separates adult controls from child-friendly content To learn more about Windy and Friends visit www.windyandfriends.com Visit us: www.loudcrow.com Follow us: twitter.com/loudcrowinc Like us: facebook.com/loudcrow

title: Test Application : 01
author: Test Account - KFA
description: Test Application : 01

title: UNIQLO CAMERAでPON !
author: UNIQLO CO. LTD.
description: ユニクロ店舗でのショッピングがよりいっそう楽しくなる！こどもも楽しめる新感覚スマートフォンカメラアプリ「ユニクロカメラでポン！」操作はかんたん。ユニクロ店舗でスマートフォンをのぞくといろいろな3Dキャラクターが飛び出てきます。 ＜ユニクロカメラでポン！のあそび方＞ ◆ユニクロのお店（キッズ取り扱い店舗）にあるマークにかざす (1)青いマーク 画面上に３Dキャラクターが登場し、そのキャラクターと一緒に写真撮影をすることができます。 (2)赤いマーク 隠れているキャラクターを探して集めることができます。 ◆ユニクロのお店（キッズ取り扱い店舗）でもらえる「ぬりえ」にかざす ・画面上にぬった色のキャラクターが登場し、タッチしてあそぶことができます。 ※イベントごとに飛び出るキャラクターがかわります。 ◆おためし機能 ・身近にあるユニクロのロゴをさがしてアプリをかざしてみよう 詳しい情報は「カメラでポン！」公式サイトをチェック！ http://www.uniqlo.com/jp/uniqlocamera/

title: Crayola Color Alive
author: DAQRI
description: Bring your coloring to life with Crayola® Color Alive™! This app works with Crayola Color Alive Action Coloring Pages. FREE Action Coloring Pages can be found inside the app. Save and print them to start playing right away! For more pages purchase Color Alive Action Coloring Books through the app or in stores. Use any Crayola Crayons or markers to bring your coloring to life and apply special effects to your creations. Pairing an innovative 4D app with exclusive Crayola Color Alive Action Coloring Books Color Alive gives parents and kids the ability to interact with their real world creations like never before. Characters fly out of your coloring pages coming to life and interacting with you through augmented reality. Each new character and creation is reflected in a 4D Experience™ viewed through the app staying true to the creativity at play by appearing exactly as it has been colored. It’s a great creative developmental activity and an amazing experience to try and share! A fun and exciting cast awaits within these coloring book themes: 1. Mythical Creatures – Breathe life into fantastical dragons intricate gargoyles mystic wizards and brave knights. 2. Barbie – Bring Barbie’s world into yours with fashion and cute pets to fun activities like roller skating dancing and rocking out on her guitar! 3. Enchanted Forest – Discover a magical world inhabited by cheerful pixies lovely princesses flying fairies and graceful unicorns. 4. Skylanders – Join Wash Buckler Prism Break Food Fight Stealth Elf Gearshift and more in their battle to protect the Core of Light from Kaos. Features: - Color fun coloring pages in the real world any way your creativity inspires you then see them come to life in 4D exactly as you’ve colored them! - Add amazing animated effects to your coloring including Fire-Breath™ Ice-Blast™ Pixie-Dust™ and Show-Stopper™. - Save your characters and bring them out to play in 4D anytime anywhere in the real world without the coloring page! - Take save and share pictures of your creations in the real world. Family and friends can even be part of the photos too. Switch to “selfie” mode to take a picture of yourself with your favorite characters. - Keep the fun going: purchase and print new coloring pages from directly inside the app. How To Get Started: - Download the Color Alive app and print out the free page for each set of characters from “my saved stuff”. - Color in a page then view it with your mobile device through the app and watch as the character springs to life in 4D. - Move your device around to see the 4D Experience™ from all sides. Tap the screen to start its animation. - Save your character and you’ll be able to bring them back later into the world. - Purchase more pages from inside the app or use with Crayola Color Alive Action Coloring Books. Visit Crayola.com to find out more. - Check your device's compatibility How to Bring Your Character to Life instructions and watch a demo video at www.Crayola.com/AppCheck. - FAQ at www.Crayola.com/FAQ/Another-Topic/Do-You-Provide-Helpful-Tips-For-Using-Crayola-Color-Alive/. Please Note: - An Internet connection is required to use all of the features of this app. - This app only works with Crayola Color Alive Action Coloring Pages. - Additional printable Crayola Color Alive Action Pages are available via In-app purchases. For any questions requiring additional assistance please contact Crayola Consumer Affairs at 1-800-CRAYOLA or email Support@Crayola.com. For more information go to www.Crayola.com/ColorAlive. Powered by DAQRI 4D Technology the industry leader in augmented reality.

title: Adventure Time Appisode
author: Cartoon Network
description: This isn’t just any Adventure Time episode--it’s an interactive appisode! Your kids can play along with their favorite Adventure Time characters in the episode “Furniture and Meat.” Finn and Jake have too much money honey! Join in on the fun as they spend all of their gold in the Wildberry Kingdom. Features: - Full-length appisode based on the Adventure Time episode “Furniture and Meat” - More than 20 interactive experiences with Finn and Jake - Intuitive tap tilt swipe and shake controls - Original VO from Finn Jake and BMO - Track your child’s progress and success What time is it? Adventure Time Appisode time! ***** If you're having any problems with this app feel free to contact us at advanced.platforms@turner.com . Tell us about the issues you're running into as well as what device and OS version you're using. ***** IMPORTANT CONSIDERATIONS: This app may contain ads that feature other products services shows or offers from Cartoon Network and our partners. PRIVACY INFORMATION: Your privacy is important to us at Cartoon Network a division of Turner Broadcasting System Inc. Our privacy practices are guided by data privacy laws in the United States. For users residing in the EU or other countries outside the U.S. please note that this app may use persistent identifiers for game management purposes. title: JellyTelly
author: Creative Trust Media LLC
description: JellyTelly is a subscription video on demand app designed for the faith oriented family. Co-developed with VeggieTales creator Phil Vischer JellyTelly is a fun and entertaining app that contains videos and movies that help teach kids about God the Bible and faith. Current entertainment options for kids are endless but very few are informed with a Christian worldview. It's difficult to find programming that acknowledges God and tells great stories about Him and His people -- our goal at JellyTelly is to provide a safe place for children to experience fun and engaging entertainment while doing just that! JellyTelly can be accessed online at jellytelly.com via the iOS app and on Roku -- allowing subscribers to watch hours-and-hours of entertaining shows and videos anytime anywhere! Your account will allow you to move from device to device without skipping a beat saving where you are in a video or series! Popular shows include: VeggieTales 321 Penguins Buck Denver Asks... What's In the Bible? Gigi God's Little Princess Paws & Tales Adventures in Booga Booga Land Friends and Heroes Theo Junior's Giants Elevation e-Kidz Hillsong Kids Read & Share Bible Davey and Goliath SIlly Songs with Larry Hoop Dogz Yancy and Friends the Jesus Storybook Bible and MANY more!

title: DreamWorks COLOR
author: DreamWorks Animation
description: DreamWorks COLOR is about encouraging kids of all ages to re-imagine DreamWorks Animation characters and worlds. Print out coloring pages color capture the drawings and see them jump off the page. Then build unique worlds and see your creativity come to life! IMPORTANT ★ This app needs printed DreamWorks COLOR enabled coloring pages ★ Camera is required on your device to capture your drawings

title: Feed Garfield
author: Web Prancer
description: ★Another one of Garfield ‘s awesome adventures is now in a puzzle game! Use your gameplay tactics to feed your favorite hungry fat cat! Feed Garfield is a puzzle game that involves physics and careful planning skills. Help Odie shoot the food into Garfield's bowl using different tools that will be provided as you play. Use different tools to put food in Garfield’s bowl Odie has to use his hunting skills to sniff out the food. Once he finds the food source he must shoot the food straight to Garfield’s bowl. It’s a tough challenge for the dopey dog but he knows he has to feed the kitty! Odie needs to make sure the food will go straight into Garfield's bowl. But wait there's more! Help Odie drop the food and get all the lasagna along the way. There are 3 pieces of lasagna strategically placed in every stage. Hidden objects bonus levels and wallpapers galore! Work your way through the game and collect hidden objects along the way to get special-edition Garfield wallpapers and unlock bonus levels! ★Garfield & Odie’s great food heist has begun! Jon went on a weekend getaway to Hawaii with Liz. But before leaving for the trip he made sure he secured all the food in the house to prevent Garfield from pigging out. But while Jon’s away the cat must play. Garfield needs to find a way to get his paws on some sweet sustenance! Proving that hunger is the mother of invention Garfield has devised a cunning plan and enlisted Odie’s help. Odie must track down all the food and bring it straight to Garfield’s bowl. What a lazy cat! If Odie doesn’t cooperate Garfield has threatened to lock the dog in a room with Nermal the world’s cutest — but most annoying — kitten. Thus a food filching partnership is born! Hints If you get stuck in the game use Hints to get clues on how to solve that particular stage. But you must remember use your Hints wisely. You will only be given a few. You can always get more hints inside the shop. ★FEATURES [1] Awesome Garfield graphics and BGM [2] Simple yet challenging gameplay [3] Unlimited number of tries per stage [4] 45 fun and mind-boggling stages to enjoy [5] Helpful and handy tools to unlock and avail [6] List of achievements and collections to accomplish for bonuses and freebies Don’t make a hungry cat wait. Feed Garfield now!

title: Action Sticker-KidsJobs
author: Y Factory Inc.
description: ★Action Sticker Series 2! – Exploring the world of various careers with stickers! ★ ★Learning amazing vocabularies naturally by visualizing hearing and by touching! ★ ★What’s so special about ‘Kids Job – Action sticker book?’ Beyond the one-dimensional ‘sticking stickers this application is a new conceptual playing and learning application where you can experience various occupations naturally. It was planned to make you enjoy and learn various characteristics of careers in the world and job-related vocabularies. In addition to that various interactions are added to help develop children’s vision hearing and sense of touching. ★Features★ 1. Children’s concentration improved fast as hops- children can entertain themselves with this fun and exciting stickers! 2. When you are complete with the sticker then the hidden definition appears! Learning through visualizing reading and by hearing the vocabularies 3. Where is the school and where is the police station? MAP mode to find 4. Find the hidden ACTION in each stage! Exciting little episodes!! ★10 stages of the Kids Job – Action sticker book★ 1. Let’s learn together with teachers and friends! The School 2. How about transforming into a new style? A Beauty Salon 3. Chef! Make me delicious food! A Restaurant 4. Let’s get treated from the doctor tiger energy is surging! The hospital 5. You must call 911 when there’s a fire! Fire station 6. Police officer catches the bad guys! Police Department 7. Shall we get on the airplane? The airport 8. Where cars zip. The road 9. Which train is faster? Train Station 10. Let’s go see the bear rabbit and monkey! The Zoo

title: Baby Entertainment Activities
author: Gameiva
description: Ohhh...!!! Kids were gone to park and the storm has destroyed the park and they need your help to make the park as before as it was. Help them in this kids Baby Entertainment Kids Activities by Gameiva. You need to complete all task as given in the games such repairing the carousel bumper car and much more. Hurry up as your friends are waiting for your help. Features: Different rides inside the park! New rides to fix Each ride is packed with tons of real-life fixing activities! Use professional tools to repair rides Easy to use and user friendly About Gameiva GameIva brings you the latest creations of most loved categories of games and apps which are all hugely loved by kids. We are entirely devoted to build user friendly games related to fun and learning for better educational familiarities and enjoyment for kids. Stay with us for the latest updates of GameIva on Google play and get more of educational games. title: Atrapa la Bandera Oficial
author: cuatroochenta.com
description: Viaja al espacio con la aplicación oficial de "Atrapa La Bandera". Descarga la App y descubre más contenido gratis de la película y otros contenidos exclusivos que solo encontrarás en esta App como pasatiempos experimentos puzzles y juegos de pinta y colorea. Dentro de la App puedes comprar los juegos que más te gusten: App ATRAPATIEMPOS (199€) - Cómo se juega ALB - Las 7 diferencias - 1 escenario Laberinto - 1 Encuentra a Igor (Como - 1 Puzzle (nuevo) App ATRAPATIEMPOS 2 (299€) - 3 juegos Pinta y Colorea - 3 juegos Laberintos - 3 juegos Encuentra a Igor - 3 juegos Puzzles - 5 juegos Adivinanzas - 3 juegos de Las 7 diferencias App APRENDE CON ALB (399€) - Fases de lanzamiento del cohete espacial - La Misión Apolo - La Luna - El Sistema Solar App BRICONAUTAS (399€) - 6 vídeos nuevos Si quieres conocer más sobre las aventuras de Mike Igor Amy y Marty descubrir el espacio de la mano de los protagonistas y estar a la última de todas las novedades de tu película favorita no lo dudes: descárgate "Atrapa La Bandera La Película" y sumérgete en esta emocionante aventura hacia la luna.De los creadores de "Las aventuras de Tadeo Jones" con las voces de Michelle Jenner y Dani Rovira. Política de privacidad: http://www.480interactive.com/terminos-y-condiciones/politica-de-privacidad/

title: Pikkuli - Band
author: Aittokoski Experience Ltd.
description: Children’s Animation series: Pikkuli is now available as fun games! Play together with Woody and Chicks! Mrs. Hazel Grouse’s little chicks and their choir needs guidance with their singing! Take the role of an orchestra conductor and make them tweet! Tapping or holding makes chicks to chirp and each chick has their own assigned note to sing. You can play and learn 6 fun songs including “Row row row your boat” and “He’s a jolly good fellow”. And if you like you can also record and play your own songs! A rusty old car broken parts to a clueless pair of eyes it might seem like just pieces of scattered junk. But where others see garbage Woody sees art. Oh wow ba-bum-du-dum hey it’s a drum! Drum away with Woody 3 drum sequences to learn or if you so wish you can record and play your own sequences! Pikkuli Band game family for all the music lovers! Instruments and joy of music is at the core of these games. In every Pikkuli game you can earn fun stickers to add to your sticker book! See if you can gather them all!

title: Jewel Race
author: The-any-Key
description: In the jungle everyone can hear your monster truck. Collect gems in an inaccessible jungle. Load them on the truck and drive towards the goal. Your efforts can save the inhabitants of the country. NO pay to win. NO Ads. All features included NO accidental "in-app purchases". How to play: Press the gas or brake to run forward or reverse. Rotate your phone or pad to get the car reared. DOWNLOAD FREE VERSION: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.theanykey.jewelrace Thanks and attribution: Some of the music "Bumba Crossing" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) "Volatile Reaction" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

title: RB Open OffRoad LW Ver.
author: Rational Box Division
description: Open Off Road 4x4 Game Low Requeriments Full Version 6 Vehicles 6 Tracks Everything Unlocked

title: Crayola DigiTools Paint
author: Crayola LLC
description: The Crayola DigitTools Paint app lets you digitally paint in a variety of styles on your Android tablet! Create virtual watercolor or acrylic works with the Digital Paintbrush. Or use the Digital Airbrush for cool spray art designs. You can also mix your own colors roll on patterns and stamp on additional images and icons! When you purchase the Crayola DigiTools Paint Pack you can unlock the Digital Paint Roller Digital Airbrush Digital Stamper and more tools to bring your creations to life! The full DigiTools Paint app also includes: • 25 Backgrounds: Awesome art starter scenes • 25 Stamps: Stamp painted images to decorate your creations • 25 Virtual Stencils: Instant spray on designs • 10 Patterns: Quickly create with painted patterns More about Crayola DigiTools... Crayola DigiTools are the perfect creative component to the Android tablet and the next generation of digital art! These sleek stylish instruments produce colorful designs in a variety of wild and whimsical ways. Each DigiTools pack includes a free app with pages of virtual line art stamp designs and other dazzling digital art effects. And because Crayola DigiTools are digital kids can express without the mess!

title: Tellagami
author: Tellagami Labs
description: Animate your life! Download today! Tellagami is a mobile app that lets you create and share a quick animated Gami video. A Gami can be an exciting tweet or status update. It can be a fun way to tell a story. It can be a thank you message or a vacation postcard. It can be a birthday greeting party invite or cool way to share photos. The possibilities are endless! Create a Gami video in 3 easy steps: 1 - Customize a character and choose your background. 2 - Record your voice or type a message for your character to say. 3 - Share your Gami on your favorite network or directly with a friend. FEATURES ● Mix and match your character & background ● Record your voice or type a message ● Resize character and place it in the scene ● Personalize with a photo background ● Doodle on the backgound ● Share via standard Android sharing ● View Gami as a web URL on all devices WAYS PEOPLE ARE USING A GAMI ● Greetings & Invites - Tell a story liven up a blog introduce someone ● Education - Teach a lesson create a book report share a vacation ● Business & Marketing - Pitch an idea sell a product showcase a company EDUCATORS: Download the Tellagami Edu app! Tellagami Edu is a paid version of the Tellagami app loaded with features that allows classrooms to use the app without in-app purchases. Learn more at https://tellagami.com/edu ATTENTION: The Tellagami app is experiencing issues on some devices with Android Lollipop. Please test the free Tellagami app if your device is on Android Lollipop before making any in-app purchases. Thanks for your patience as we investigate this issue.

title: Toddlers Xylophone(Remove Ads)
author: Alyaka
description: Description This Xylophone is very funny that allow your baby to be a Xylophoner. Your little one will love this Xylophone game. When first played your todddlers and babies may not be able to correctly touch the bells with his/her little hand. Play the Toddlers Xylophone game with your baby continuously for a few hours or days and you will be surprised at the mobile development of your baby's hands. Toddlers Xylophone game must be played in the presence of a mother or father and it is encouraged for you to guide your baby through the game for a few days at first. When to play! When your baby is hungry or will not stop crying playing this game can hold your baby's attention. (The various sounds animated shapes stimulate your baby's curiosity.) This game is exceptionally handy for mothers and fathers who spend time with their babies but cannot figure out how to spend that time usefully. This game may be too advanced for infants under 6 months old. Caution Playing the application too much amount of time or leaving the children alone with the mobile phone or tablet pc is not encouraged.

title: Sweet Talking Princess Gold
author: Kaufcom Games Apps Widgets
description: Talk dance and sing with the beautiful princess! She answers with her charming voice and responds to what you say and your touch. Become a pop queen with this new and modern princess. Additionally with 3 funny games included. ★ ★ ★ Features: ★ ★ ★ ✔ High quality 3D graphics ✔ Voice interaction ✔ Many different animations such as dance feeding the horse care for babies and much more. ✔ She sings different songs she sings to you while she is accompanied by different melodies. ✔ She dances and sings on stage with different sounds. Record your own hit and let her perform it. Press one of the three buttons to change the way of her interpretation. ✔ Cool Game: check how sporty the princess is. Help her catching various objects like cats hearts blue stars cloverleaves etc. Beware of the false red objects! ✔ Help the pretty princess in the childcare: She is very fond of children and takes care of three sweet and tiny babies that are crying easily. ✔ She loves animals / pets and feeds her horse: find out what kind of food her horse prefers. What will be its favorite meal: carrots banana fish or maybe sunflowers orange salad etc? ✔ Fun for all Like every girl in this world independent if she comes from a small village or a big city she likes music. You will see this young super contemporary princess visiting a color full disco / club and dance like a star on different song styles like pop electronic rock etc. She will show you how lovely she becomes when she gets in touch with children or when she meets her white horse. This fantasy app offers endless entertainment with fun and laughter for all the fairies and princess lovers! This app is a Premium version of Sweet Little Talking Princess which means without ads.

title: Baby Daycare Activities
author: Gameiva
description: You can play and learn about taking care of a baby at your own day care center with this game Baby Day Care Activities by Gameiva. Play with the baby in the play room where there are lots of toys that babies love to play. Do clean all the rooms before taking the baby there to make it a healthy environment for the baby to play. Feed the baby and play different games with him so that he feels happy all the time. Finally put the baby to sleep for another amazing day for him. Features: 1) Clean the dirty room with the broom to make it safe for the baby to play. 2) Feed the baby when he is hungry with the delicious baby food items. 3) Heal the small bruises and injuries of the baby to make him stop crying. 4) Play different games with different toys and also play some outdoor games for some extra fun. 5) Share this baby games with your friends and become an expert in taking care of a child. About Gameiva GameIva brings you the latest creations of most loved categories of games and apps which are all hugely loved by kids. We are entirely devoted to build user friendly games related to fun and learning for better educational familiarities and enjoyment for kids. Stay with us for the latest updates of GameIva on Google play and get more of educational games. Contact us anytime for any questions and suggestions at wecare@gameiva.com .

title: Kids Match & Learn Game: Color
author: CL2 Apps
description: 2.3 Version Kids Match & Learn Game is a fun way for kids to learn the names of different items. The Matching portion of the game presents the name of an object (in both text and audio form) and asks the child to choose the correct matching image out of four possible choices. The Memory portion is a simple challenge of turning over cards to find pairs of the same objects. We use colorful artwork encouraging narration and fun music to keep children engaged with the learning games. Kids Match & Learn Game was designed and developed for our own children. They love it so now we have made it available for you to share with your children. Features: Matching Game 6 Themes • Fruit (Apple Orange Strawberry Bananas Grapes Pineapple Cherries Watermelon) • Bugs (Ladybug Spider Caterpillar Fly Beetle Butterfly Grasshopper Bee) • Colors (Red Orange Yellow Green Blue Purple White Brown) • Shapes (Circle Triangle Square Star Moon Diamond Heart Rectangle) • Numbers (1 through 10) • Counting (1 through 10) Memory Game 4 Themes • Fruit • Bugs • Colors • Shapes We hope you enjoy this app and find it as enjoyable as our kids do. Please let us know if you encounter any issues or if you have any general comments. We look forward to hearing from you. clii.apps@gmail.com

title: The Boynton Collection
author: Loud Crow Interactive Inc.
description: Introducing The Boynton Collection - 4 by Boynton!! Now you can find Sandra Boynton's first four amazingly interactive apps in one convenient place at an amazing price! The Boynton Collection contains: - The Going to Bed Book - Written with a mesmerizing rhyme and rhythm and illustrated by the author with those lively and personable Boynton characters it's the perfect end-of-the-day book for young children. - Moo Baa La La La! - Written with zesty rhyme and wry humor and illustrated by the author with those droll Boynton characters it's the perfect anytime book for young children - Blue Hat Green Hat -Three earnest animals and one misguided turkey learn colors and clothes. Though admittedly the turkey never quite gets the hang of it. - Barnyard Dance! - Irrepressible farm animals join in a rollicking square dance

title: Shaun the Sheep Top Knot Salon
author: Aardman Digital
description: An official Shaun The Sheep Movie app from Aardman Animations and Lionsgate! Give yourself a Shaun The Sheep hairdo in this unique baaaber shop experience – it’s the ONLY hair style to be seen in this season! Shear Your Style Take a pic of you or a friend and the Top Knot Salon app will transform your locks into a Shaun the Sheep style fleecy mop for you to cut color and style! Personalize Your Top Knot Select from a range of hilarious avatars and choose from a selection of grooming shearing dipping and dyeing tools to create a truly ewe-nique new hair style. Share Your Snaps With The Flock! When you’re done snipping show off your new look on your favorite social networks! Or save your pic to your own personal collection. FREE Fun The app is free to use and has no in-app purchases. The app allows players to connect to social networks such as Facebook and Twitter to share pictures however this connection is not compulsory to fully experience the app. Get Ready for Shaun The Sheep Movie! When Shaun decides to take the day off and have some fun he gets a little more action than he bargained for. A mix up with the Farmer a caravan and a very steep hill lead them all to the Big City and it's up to Shaun and the flock to return everyone safely to the green grass of home. Shaun The Sheep Movie - In Theaters August 7 2015. http://www.shaunthesheepmovie.com https://www.facebook.com/ShaunTheSheepUS https://twitter.com/ShaunTheSheep https://www.pinterest.com/ShaunTheShe.. . #ShaunTheSheep Lionsgate Studiocanal and Aardman Animations present in association with Anthon Capital Entertainment an Aardman production.

title: ToonYou TVSeries My Dream Jobs
author: ToonYou
description: The App to Customize your Pre-School TV series. Upload a photo of Daddy Mommy and your loved ones and enjoy an award-winning Pre-school TV Series. (3 awards in 4 months) Your family will appear in the job of the day: Astronaut Trapeze Artist fireman Postman President Computer Scientist… Your kid can understand every job on earth through acclaimed little adventures.A Customized TV series that you can have Any Time Any Where on AnyDevice. Our customization engine will generate more than 100 expressions with only one picture of your loved ones.The family will star in 70 episodes of this Commissioned TV Series: My Dream Jobs.You will act in an educational series but this time for real … not with a still face in a music clip ;) My Dream Jobs tells the story of a StopMotion and Papertoys Series discovering the fun parts of the most famous jobs in the world from Pilot to Entrepreneur or even Juggler or President! Every morning a young kid wakes up and tells us the dream he/she just had. The dream reveals the special day of a man or a woman struggling in his/her job. Every job you can think of from regular to very surprising ones. This Professional is dealing with some serious adventure; which leads the audience to understand what the main or funny parts of his/her job are. We always f ind out that this hero looks like… the daddy or the mommy of our main character! THE EDUCATIONAL DATA 80% of kids want to spend more time with their parents.90% of kids consider their parents as their N°1 Hero. (Nickelodeon research/Nielsen USA-2012) CHILDPSYCHATRIST REVIEW: « From the very f irst days of their life children are born with the ability of detecting the unique combination of peculiar visual stimuli: eyes nose & mouth that constitute a face. The automatic detection & interest for faces is fundamental for acquiring the milestones of communication & social interaction development. And of course their parents' faces and emotions will soon be one of the most important clue for kids to understand the world around them. The emotional faces of their parents that they will see in the app will raise children's interest immediately and will lead them in a secure exploration of new adventures as it does in real life. » Dr Melina Huc THE GUESTS Depending on the language selected ToonYou brings famous professionals to star in special episodes. For the job of “Novelist” a real Novel Writer for the DJ a real king of the deck for the Fashion Designer a real star... Surprises to come every month. PRIVACY & PERMISSION Our App is reviewed by the independent website privo.com to be COPPA compliant. (FTC rules to protect kids data) PRICING THE APP IS FREE. You can customize an episode for free and share it if you want. You have access to several episodes of the Series uncustomized “As seen on TV” for free.If you want to get access to more episodes of the series (customized or not) you can buy packs or subscribe to a stop-when-you-want offer. We are launching the App with 3 packages.

title: Crayola Virtual Fashion Show
author: Crayola LLC
description: Design fashions on paper and watch them come to life and walk the runway on your device! The Crayola My Virtual Fashion show lets you create fabulous fashions and bring them to life. Draw dazzling designs on the fashion templates and take a picture to bring your fashions to life! Watch your designs rock the runway in a virtual fashion show! Save your favorite creations accessorize your models and make your fashion shows in New York Paris and Milan. With the Crayola My Virtual Fashion Show kit you have everything you need to start creating right away with 10 different fashion templates. Download the app to design your first fashion with the free template. Please note: a printer is required to print out fashion templates.

title: My house - fun for kids
author: Puzzle King AB
description: My house is fun stickers game for kids the house have 9 different rooms that can be furnished in unlimited ways * 200 different items to play with * 9 different rooms * 14 different human characters * Hours of fun Have fun!!

title: Thomas & Friends: King Railway
author: Hit Entertainment
description: Calling all little engineers! Thomas & Friends: King of the Railway Game Pack features SIX exciting new games starring characters and locations from the latest Thomas & Friends DVD adventure! Help Thomas explore the Island of Sodor with all your favorite friends including James Percy Cranky Millie Stephen the Earl and more! Each game showcases scenes from the Thomas & Friends: King of the Railway story and features its characters and locations in thrilling interactive adventures. Easy and Hard modes ensure that kids of every level enjoy the fun. • Help Thomas catch the falling crates in Cranky’s Dock Drop! • Drive Thomas James & Percy as they haul a heavy load in Working Together! • Repair the castle with Thomas & Millie in Castle Builder! • Repair and paint an antique steam engine in Stephen Spruce up! • Watch out! Thomas needs your help to avoid obstacles in Trouble on the Tracks! • Find Stephen and discover the secret treasure in Mission at the Castle Mines! Thomas fans of all ages are guaranteed to enjoy hours of fun playing while they test their reflexes dexterity and explore the Island of Sodor and its secrets! Playable on Android tablets and phones and featuring the characters music and beautiful CG graphics from the new movie - Thomas & Friends King of the Railway. This game pack is a must have app for all Thomas fans! About Thomas & Friends: Thomas the Tank Engine was created by a father for his son over 65 years ago and today is enjoyed by families in more than 185 territories and in 30 languages. The #1 blue engine and his friends invite children to enter a world of imagination through the tracks of a train and the words of a story. Children embark on adventures with their engine friends while experiencing timeless life lessons of discovery friendship and cooperation. Thomas & Friends makes tracks to great destinations on top broadcasters around the world. Visit HIT Entertainment at www.hitentertainment.com Follow Thomas & Friends on Twitter: @TrueBlueEngine Like Thomas & Friends on Facebook at www.facebook.com/Thomasandfriends Visit Funny Garbage at www.funnygarbage.com Follow Funny Garbage on Twitter: @funnygarbage Like Funny Garbage on Facebook at www.facebook.com/FunnyGarbage

title: Police Kids Toy Car Game
author: Galante
description: Let your kid become a police officer and drive a real police car. Jump into the car and try all the professional equipment to solve exciting police cases. Select various toy cars and start a joyful patrol ride right now! Many cases need to be solved. Pull over to help a cat in need buy a donut and fuel your car to solve other problems. Why your kid will love it: interactive police equipment: handcuffs police siren radio and many more great ride in various toy cars routine patrol cases endless road trips interesting mini games to play Police Kids Toy Car is the second game in our series of Kids Toy Car Games designed for all car lovers. Download it to enable your kid to develop role playing skills. If you’d like to give your opinion about Police Kids Toy Car game feel free to contact us! https://www.facebook.com/GalanteGames Privacy Policy: http://galantegames.com/privacy-policy/

title: Poznávám barvy (zdarma)
author: kve
description: Mluví česky. Aplikace pro malé děti (už od dvou let) které se chtějí naučit barvy zábavnou formou. Objeví se tabulka s 4 poli každé jinou barvou. Poví se barva na kterou se má ťuknout. Po každém uhodnutí se objeví legrační obličej přes celou obrazovku na barvě kterou malý hráč uhádl. Pokud se dítě netrefí poví se na kterou barvu to vlastně ťukl a kterou má hledat. Barva se zakýve (jako nene) a označí jako rozbitá. Častěji se hledají barvy které se nepovedlo uhodnout. Barvy jsou pokaždé náhodně proházeny. Jedná se verzi zdarma pro plnou verzi (12 barev) můžete přejít přímo z této hry. author: Crave Creative

Avoid or shoot the cars and bombs. How far can you drive? + Shoot other cars and bombs + Gas containers refill your gas tank + Wrench power-up repairs damage + Hitting cars and road cones give you damage + Tilt and touch controls + Fun For All Ages

author: DinoMage Games
description: Are you missing some parts of your favorite board game? Need to flip a coin draw a sketch or deal out tokens? We’ve got you covered. Time your games with one of 4 different timer styles even while using other tools. Give the realistic spinner a whirl. Pick and choose which tools you need then customize and configure them to fit your game. App Includes: Timer - Digital hourglass analog and chess timers each can run in the background when other tools are in use Dice - Traditional pip dice and numbered dice from 4 to 20 sides custom text and colors hold tray roll history Spinner - Realistic feel with colored or numbered wedges freespin mode for pointing at a player Buzzer - Up to 4 buzzers sound and glow indicate who rings in first Doodle Pad - Quick sketching and erasing supports multitouch (kids love it!) Scoreboard - Auto sums enter player names no limit on number of players undo and redo Tokens - 4 colors of your choice divided table stackable supports multitouch Board Game Apprentice has a simple interface for casual users yet is loaded with features die-hard gamers will appreciate. It’s kid-friendly and contains no ads no in-app purchases and requires no internet access.

title: Baby's First App (Kid's Mode)
author: dberm22
description: ★★★★★5-day Trial Version (Ad-free no limitations)★★★★★ ★★★Filled with catchy music and lots of bright flashing colours I am sure it will keep any young ones interested. I find the interaction surprisingly lots of fun for me that is. I just know younger ones are bound to love it even more.- AnndroidOfVirtue.com★★★ Link to article including a video demo visit: http://www.androidofvirtue.com/babys-first-app/ Join the Beta Program: https://groups.google.com/d/msg/android-betatesters/1SWl_v40v5I/5q3RPuLQPzQJ Written for babies by babies! Okay maybe it wasn't written by babies but it was exclusively designed with your babies and toddlers in mind and has been extensively beta-tested by a top-notch team of babies (aka my two beautiful nieces Ava and Hailey). Open this app hand your phone to your baby and sit back while you enjoy countless hours of uninterrupted "you time". I have spent over 100 hours developing this app with unique features to grab your baby's attention and keep them entertained and captivated for hours. These features include: ○ Multi-finger scrolling ○ Omni-directional scrolling ○ Infinite scrolling ○ Cute icons and music This game will also help your toddler develop their young minds. Learn animal names and sounds letters and words numbers and simple math problems. Oh let's not forget to mention that this app has a locking feature which makes it extremely difficult for a child to exit the app unless they know what they are doing (press your phone's back button or the exit tile 10 times in a row). No more unexpected charges on your cell-phone bill changes to your settings or opening that folder you thought you hid so well. While running Baby's First App intercepts the home button to make sure that your 2 year old is not perusing your data. Keep them in the game where they are safe and captivated. Join the Beta Program which is even more secure than ever! https://groups.google.com/d/msg/android-betatesters/1SWl_v40v5I/5q3RPuLQPzQJ This app expires within 5 days of running. To unlock the app once it has expired purchase the Pro Key.(https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dberm22.BabysFirstApp.ProKey) Keep this version installed - the key simply authenticates that you have purchased the app and you can continue to use the trial version as normal. Don't worry this extra app does not use any battery memory and negligible hard-drive space. No extra icons will show up in your launcher. ___________________________ This app was written for my 2 nieces (ages 2 and 3) after I was unable to find a suitable app for them. This app was specifically geared towards toddlers. Something easy to pick up and play nothing frustrated and extremely simple. It requires zero supervision keeps your child inside the app and last but not least educational. If you like it please purchase the Pro key and send it to your friends! http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dberm22.BabysFirstApp.ProKey ________________________ Legal Stuff: This app comes without warranty and I do not take any responsibility if something happens to your phone or child as a result of installing this app. All icons are shuffled randomly when you launch the app so if any words which appear are offensive in nature that was purely accidental. If enough monkeys type on enough keyboards.. etc. By installing this app you agree not to sue me for anything. I wrote this app to entertain your child not to be a target of lawsuits. Thanks! Now enjoy the app!

title: Toddlers Drum (Remove Ads)
author: Alyaka
description: This drum is very funny that allow your baby to be a drummer. Your little one will love this drum game. Toddlers Drum game must be played in the presence of a mother or father and it is encouraged for you to guide your baby through the game for a few days at first. When to play! When your baby is hungry or will not stop crying playing this game can hold your baby's attention. (The various sounds animated shapes stimulate your baby's curiosity.) title: Ultimate Bridge Solitaire
author: Academy of Biochemistry
description: No in-app purchases no ads and no monthly fees! Just countless hours of fun! Have you ever wanted to learn how to play Bridge one of the greatest and most popular card games of all time? Would you like to refine your skills at Bridge with the convenience and flexibility of not having to engage other people? Ultimate Bridge Solitaire offers single player Contract Rubber Bridge using Standard American bidding conventions and skilled AI opponents and partner. It provides an excellent tool for the novice player to learn the basics of the game or for the more experienced player to develop the finer points of play. Features: -Multiple aesthetically-pleasing card and table choices -Standard American bidding with optional use of Blackwood & Stayman conventions -Intelligent AIs that have some notion as to how to play the game beyond simply following suit -AI auto-bidding and bid recommendations for beginner players -Deal replay to test different contracts or approach to play for a given scenario -Open-handed play for enhanced learning of Bridge by students of the game -Manual card dealing to set up layouts from instructional books and articles

Draw fire and bright colors effects on color canvas or on top of any of your pictures and save to doodle fire art gallery or share on facebook instagram whatsapp email send to other apps :) If you like doodle toy you'll love doodle fire! Try Mirror mode and all kinds of color shapes hearts and firework like neon like effects glowing brilliantly. ★ Drawing on top of your pictures in your photo gallery is easy just click the first button on the second menu to load your image from gallery then draw and make a painting or work of art or just make something funny for some laughs and likes on instagram! You can even playback your drawing for the shapes. If you'd like a more traditional drawing style to create other type of styles you can try our other apps also such as doodle toy. ★ Have fun drawing and sharing your creations! Post them on facebook instragram or simply email them. ★★★★ App features enough options and configurations to keep any adult busy and easy enough for kids of all ages to have fun drawing and doodle'ing with! Children love the sound effects but you can turn the audio off in the settings on the second row of buttons. You can configure the particle life time and also the size and even direction of the fire and other particle effects. Even choose the distance between the drawn shapes. The app renders in real time and uses native opengl for high performance. You can save a snapshot of the screen at any time simply click on the floppy button to save a screenshot. Then when you click on the f facebook sharing button you can view your saved snapshots and choose to share them by facebook or email or any other app you have installed like instagram or whatsapp or doodle text or doodle wish! ★★★★ Have fun with all the intricate symmetry drawing modes. Simply trying out the various symmetrical drawing modes is a sure way to boost creativity and spark the talent within. Not just great for improving children's concentration and drawing skills but helpful for even grandparents to exercise their mind while having fun watching their grandchildren learn and use their mind! Teaching kids has never been easier they love playing with doodle fire to create all kinds of colorful drawings they are very proud of :) And with the easy press of a button snapshot they can easily save all their work and share! ★★★★ Although there is a colorpicker the color picker is not used as much as the random alternating color drawing modes or the rainbow colors drawing mode which are toggled from the second button. The third button brings down a second row of buttons for undo redo playback and a pencil for drawing something showing the numbers of the drawing style and then playing it all at one time. We love to hear your feedback! More features are in the works based on our users' feedback :) Can't wait to see your creations as we get ready to host a doodle drawing contest where you can use any of our doodle draw paint apps to sketch new designs or modify existing photos. Happy Doodle 'ing! * Doodle Fire!™

title: Magic Kinder
author: Magic Production Group S.A.
description: Invented for kids approved by mums! For children and parents to enjoy together! FREE/AD-FREE/SAFE You will not find all of this content in one APP for FREE anywhere else! FEATURES • Play & Learn: Strategic educational games and quizzes to improve children's skills and development. • Watch Videos: Videos and special episodes updated frequently with themes that include: karaoke protecting the Planet surprises’ secret life arts & crafts nature and more! • Read stories: Storytelling designed to unify the family with a fun feature that allows you to record the story with your own voice personalising and creating a familiar environment for your child. • Draw & Paint: Creative tool to colour and a fun and innovative way to learn to draw. • Family Diary: A place for parents and children to share emotions and stay in touch with the people you all love. All this can be controlled by you! Parents can easily manage content by controlling what is shown frequency of usage and receive an overview of your child’s behaviour. SURPRISERY! Here is a selection of content you will find: VIDEOS The Protectors of the Planet – Four animal/robots are on a mission to teach children all over the world how to protect the Planet. Many songs and original choreography to learn English whilst singing and dancing. Take a peek and watch what happens to the Kinder surprises when they are alone at home. GAMES Save the Bubbles/A splash of colours – Multiplayer strategic games to play together with your child My Puppy – Take care of an animal of your choice and make sure it is fed washed dressed and much more! STORIES A world of colours for Zac: A story about a Polar bear who learns the importance of family and friends and that the grass is not always greener on the other side! Why do we need to sleep? Simple question and a very fun and interactive way of finding out the answer. This and another three questions are answered: Why do we see colours? – Why do oysters make pearls? - Why are some animals vegetarian? .....and more IMPORTANT: Content can vary according to the country. Maximize the emotion of playing and bonding together with a world full of surprises Welcome to Magic Kinder…your partner in raising happy children! Thanks for your reviews. We will take them in consideration in order to improve our service. If you are experiencing any problems contact us directly to the following address contact@magic-kinder.com

title: Yukon Gold Solitaire
author: Brass Key Software
description: Solitaire–sometimes called "patience"–has always been one of the most popular card games for phones and tablets. There are quite a few solitaire games out there but some lack features and options while others are difficult to actually play on a mobile device. Yukon Gold Solitaire is something better: professional beautiful and easy to play. You won't find a cartoonish look unnecessary permissions or annoying ads here. No ads • No special permissions • No in-app purchases Games included: Alaska • Baker's Game • Canfield: Draw 3 • Canfield: Draw 1 • Double Alaska • Double Klondike: Draw 1 • Double Klondike: Draw 3 • Double Russian • Double Yukon • Forty Thieves • FreeCell • Golf • Klondike: Draw 1 • Klondike: Draw 3 • Klondike: Vegas Draw 1 • Klondike: Vegas Draw 3 • Putt Putt • Relaxed Forty Thieves • Relaxed FreeCell • Relaxed Streets • Russian • Scorpion • Scorpion II • Spider • Spider: Spades • Spider: Spades & Hearts • Streets • Tri-Peaks • Wasp • Yukon If you have a question or run into a problem please email us at support@brasskeysoftware.com . title: ABC Word Hunt
author: Warm and Sunny Apps
description: ABC Word Hunt combines fun play and learning. 12 different puzzles help kids ages 2-6 learn their ABCs. "The ABC Word Hunt app is a great app for preschoolers! With ABC Word Hunt kids can improve their spelling skills as well as their puzzle skills."- The iPhone Mom 5-star review Touch to see animations and hear sound effects including the name and sound of every letter in the alphabet. If a letter is a correct match for the word puzzle the letter lights up. Find all the letters to see an animation that encourages comprehension. - 12 different word puzzles help preschoolers learn their ABCs. - Learn the name of every letter - Spend time exploring both upper and lower-case letters - Hear the sounds letters make (phonics) - Animations include a ladybug a bee a bird a leaf a kite an ant the sun rain a cloud the moon a school of fish a crab a shark a bat and a wolf. - Diverse settings include the sky on a sunny day the ocean and a night-time scene - Soothing background nature sounds - Recognizing letters their sounds and understanding they make words is a big step towards learning how to read ABOUT WARM AND SUNNY APPS Warm and Sunny Apps creates apps that children love and parents trust. Warm and Sunny Apps was founded in 2014 by a mom with a passion for kids education design and play Warm and Sunny Apps takes children’s privacy seriously. ABC Word Hunt does not include any third-party advertising or collect any personal information. For more details please see our Privacy Policy http://www.warmandsunnyapps.com/privacy-policy-1.html

title: 6 takes!
author: Application Systems Heidelberg
description: 6 takes! - Wolfgang Kramer's ingeniously simple card game with "bullheads" - now as an app. The aim of the game is to avoid getting cards. Each card you have to pick up costs you points for each bullhead on it. The player with the fewest bullheads at the end of the game is the winner. It sounds easier than it is players will need some great tactics and perhaps a little luck. 6 takes! is regarded as a modern classic among card games and has been sold all over the world. It has won the German "Games Prize" and has also been nominated "Game of the year". Features: - 6 takes! Singleplayer mode against up to four computer opponents. - Three levels of difficulty - Multiplayer mode for up to four players around the same device - Interactive tutorial - Quick game or first to 66 minus points

title: Word Owl's Word Search - K
author: Avrin Ross
description: Word Owl's Word Search - Kindergarten is a neat big and colorful word search with sight words for kids that's designed for tablets. This Kindergarten Edition of Word Owl's Word Search features over 100 sight words for children in or around Kindergarten. These words have been gathered from numerous sight word lists provided by real Kindergarten classes in different schools. Help your kid learn and retain several words while having fun! This word search will help your kid learn how to spell and decipher words. Your child's reading quality should also increase as they start comprehending sight words easier. √ Over 100 different sight words √ 10 words to find per puzzle √ Customizable letter and background colors √ Sharp colorful retina resolution graphics Simply slide your finger across the letters to form a word that's displayed on the left side of the screen. The words are in the word search vertically horizontally and diagonally. All of the words are displayed in a forward facing manner. Have fun! (Sight words are commonly used words that children are encouraged to memorize as a whole by sight so that they can automatically recognize these words when they see them without having to use any distracting strategies. Sight words account for a large percentage of the words used in literature for children. One advantage for children being able to recognize sight words automatically is that the child will be able to identify the majority of words in a book before they even attempt to read it. When the child is able to do that they'll be able to concentrate on the meaning and comprehension as they read without having to stop to figure out the actual word.) Increase the knowledge of your child with this excellent sight words wordsearch. Available for the Samsung Galaxy Asus Nexus HTC One Galaxy Tab and thousands of other Android devices!

description: All the words have been shuffled and it's up to you to recreate the sayings!! Word Shuffle quotes a popular saying in each new level and we have lots of levels for you to play! Word Shuffle only quotes the most popular proverbs in the English language. It's fun and educational at the same. Learn more proverbs and their meanings in a fun way! Copyright © MadRabbit Studio

title: JUMBLE Pro Anagram Word Puzzle
author: PANAGOLA
description: This is an ad-free version of android's most popular classic Jumble word game with over 8000+ clean good quality words. It features more screen space bigger buttons and needs no device permissions. Rearrange the letters to form a proper English word. This is different from the Word Search and Word Find games in that you have to use all the letters. Features over 8000+ clean good quality words! Learn new English words their meanings and pronunciations with the dictionary link provided. You may speak or spell the word instead of typing. It also supports entering words via your favorite keyboard including swype type. . Please note that this game is NOT the same as the popular newspaper jumble where you need to decipher a phrase after un-jumbling multiple words. Here the words are presented one by one to allow continuous solitary game play. . If you are a student or teacher try the Word Power mode with tougher words that feature in English tests such as GRE TOEFL and SAT. A review feature is available for you to revisit the words you played recently and lookup the meanings. . Promises hours of fun even while learning... Try out the pro version of android's most popular word jumble today! Permissions: None! Does not require any device permissions.
