The educational series in the Prodigy Group combines the main concepts of early childhood education to meet the needs of mastering different learning categories. The applications are aimed at the comprehensive and the analytic development in preschoolers. Tips: In the search bar enter "BabyBus" to find all of our products. Contact us: E-mail: en@babybus.com Website: http://www.babybus.com Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BabyBusENGLISH

title: Doc McStuffins
author: Disney Publishing Worldwide
description: Based on the hit Disney Junior show Doc McStuffins join Doc along with Hallie Lambie and the rest of her friends for a fun-filled time fixing sorting exploring and caring for toys dolls and more. Inside Doc’s clinic you can choose from four entertaining and engaging developmental activities. • Check Up – Do you have a case of driedout-a-tosis? With Check Up you will diagnose and cure a wide variety of patients with a number of different symptoms. Patient will even get a loving cuddle from Lambie. • Mixupitis – Oh no…some of the toys have mixuptitis and all their parts are mixed-up. Can you help fix them by putting the parts in the right place? • Doctor’s Kit – A good doctor always keeps their kit handy. In this open-ended activity use your device’s camera to perform check-ups using the virtual stethoscope otoscope and X-Ray. • Picture Stickers – Take pictures of your family friends toys or dolls and decorate them with a variety of Doc McStuffins themed stickers. As you play the Big Book of Boo Boos will save the names and diagnosis of all the patients you cured so you can look at them anytime. You will also earn different Doctor’s Notes that prescribe lots of love kisses and cuddles. Join the fun. The Doc is in!!!! Watch Doc McStuffins on Disney Junior Terms of Use: http://disneytermsofuse.com/

title: Good Night Star
author: Sprout
description: Introducing a fun interactive game for you and your preschooler from The Good Night Show on Sprout. Your preschooler can practice their bedtime routine with Sprout's lovable character Star. Brush Star's teeth wash Star's face read a Sprouterrific story to Star and get him ready for bed. Then your Sproutlet can gently rock Star to sleep. You can also sing along to your favorite Good Night Show songs like Brusha Brusha and Twinkle Twinkle. Watch The Good Night Show every night from 6PM- 9PM ET only on Sprout.

title: Funny Fireworks Xylophone
author: MCARTGAMES
description: This game is a free xylophone for your smart phone or tablet pc! You can use this xylophone to learn the basics of music. Xylophone instrument is a fun musical instrument anyone can play! Features: - Realistic and soft sounds - HD graphics and funny design - Supports all screen resolutions for mobil devices Game Extras: The second level of the game is balloon pop game with funny characters. You will enjoy pop the balloons. Enjoy!

title: Talking Pocoyo Premium
author: Zinkia Entertainment S.A.
description: Pocoyo wants to play with you! And with this new application you can become his best friend. With Talking Pocoyo you can talk to Pocoyo and he will repeat everything you say in a funny voice. You can also tickle him make him dance play lots of instruments and even try to guess which animal Pocoyo is imitating! And if you want to share with your family or friends you can save it and have fun watching Pocoyo's antics with everyone. All the fun you can imagine for your kids and for you too! Talking Pocoyo is an interactive game in which you can do all these things: Play with Pocoyo: Pocoyo reacts when you touch any part of his body. Try to discover all his reactions! In addition you can talk to Pocoyo and he will repeat your voice in a funny way. Musical Pocoyo: Play lots of instruments with Pocoyo and show everyone what a great composer you are. Guess the Animal: Can you guess which animal Pocoyo is imitating? Pocoyo Dances: Enjoy watching Pocoyo’s incomparable distinctive dances. Imitate his steps and have a great time! Save and Share: Record everything that little Pocoyo does. You can watch it over and over again and enjoy all of your creations limit-free! And if you want to share it with your family and friends you can show it to them directly on Facebook or YouTube. With Talking Pocoyo your kids will always have their favorite character nearby! Try it and you will never forget the look on your kids' faces!

title: Crayola DJ
author: Legacy Games
description: Create great sounding music with Crayola DJ! Mix loops add fun sound effects then take your beats to the dance party! ---------------------- A Parents' Choice Fun Stuff Award Winner! Winner of The National Parenting Center's Seal of Approval! Winner of the CreativeChild.com's 2015 Creative Play of the Year award in the Creative Play Mobile Apps category! ---------------------- Play with tracks in different genres including dance pop and hip hop. Then perform for an audience and earn points for mixing and scratching your music! Your color-coded music creates an exciting color and light show. Save your music and share with friends and family! ***Features*** - Almost 100 exclusive loops created by professional DJs make you always sound good! - Different musical genres and instrument types ensure endless variety in your mixes! - Crayola DJ makes music production and mixing easy no matter your age or musical experience! - Mix multiple tracks simultaneously for professional sounding mixes! - Use real DJ tools such as crossfaders sound effects tempo slider and more! - Earn points while performing and scratching for a cool dance party! - Your music performance creates a unique and personalized color and light show that reacts to you! - Compete for the love of the audience with a friend in 2 Player mode! - Save your music creations and play them for friends and family! ----We're happy to help!---- Having trouble with our games in any way? Please feel free to email us at mobile@legacygames.com . ----Want more Legacy games?---- Website: http://www.legacygames.com Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/playlegacygames

title: Toddlers Magic Harp
author: Alyaka
description: Harp is a mythological musical instrument. When you play this game you will feel yourself in ancient Rome as a Sezar. Show your musical talents to the crowded. Very interesting visual effects and beautiful sounds will be amazed you.

title: Talking Pocoyo Football
author: Zinkia Entertainment S.A.
description: Enjoy and play with Talking Pocoyo Football! In this brand new app you can dress Pocoyo in your team colors and cheer on your team as they rise to the top of the ranks!. Enjoy the wonderful Pocoyo videos as he repeats phrases after you plays with the ball and encourages your favorite team! If you like football just as much as Pocoyo does in this app you will find fun activities that you can share with your whole family. Talking Pocoyo is an interactive game where you can: Interactwith Pocoyo: Tap on Pocoyo so he can show you his flashy football moves. You can also talk to him and he will repeat everything you say using a variety of funny voices. Support your team: Cheer on your team by playing Pocoyo´s musical instruments. Celebrations: Celebrate when your team scores a goal with Pocoyo´s signature celebration moves! Don't let the ball touch the ground: Help Pocoyo show you his brilliant kick up skills and see how many times he can kick the ball without it touching the ground! Team Colors: Dress Pocoyo in your favorite team colors with up to 50 different Shirts. Record everything and share it! Once you try this brand new app you won't be able to tear yourself away from your favorite character!

title: My Little DJ
author: BabyBus
description: Put babies and turntables together and the result is many little professional DJ’s! Watch them scratch the discs and switch out records. They are really good! Fun features: - Work a simple turntable - Lively animations and effects - A collection of songs for children! Children can listen to music while they add their mix into the play. Let the record spin! -- -- -- Design concepts: We focus on inspirational learning We focus on skill-building We focus on bringing fun contents to our young audience Take the baby bus for an unique learning experience! The series introduction: Baby Bus is the first trusted brand in early childhood educational software. The mobile applications are designed and developed specifically for preschoolers and they are divided into two groups by age the Starter Group for toddlers between the ages of 1 and 3 and the Prodigy Group for children between the ages of 3 and 6. The educational series in the Starter Group pursuits early learning by introducing games and songs tailored to your tots. The applications are aimed at improving their hand-eye coordination and nurturing their creativity from an early age. Tips: In the search bar enter "BabyBus" to find all of our products. Feel free to tell us your thoughts on our games and services using the contact methods listed below: E-mail: en@babybus.com Website: http://www.babybus.com Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BabyBusENGLISH

title: Music Box and Lullaby to Sleep
author: MCARTGAMES
description: THIS GAME IS EDUCATIVE AND FUNNY! It is possible to help your babies to sleep with this application. PLAY AND LEARN TOGETHER WITH YOUR TODDLER! You can listen incredible music box songs and perfect graphics will attract the attention of your baby. Your babies will sleep like an angel. "Music Box and Lullaby to Sleep" is an improved baby game. Your toddlers and kids will listen the music while trying to sleep with this application. This game will help to improve your toddler and / or baby eyes and finger coordination. The game has got three levels which is include 15 musics. Have Fun... CAUTION! Playing the application too much amount of time or leaving the children alone with the mobile phone or tablet pc is not encouraged. Please feel free to notify us! Thank You...

title: Monster Band. Kids music game
author: AppQuiz
description: Monster Band is getting ready for their big concert and needs your help to mix beats and sounds together for their hit song! Monster Band is a fun and easy toy that encourages children to explore music in a new creative way! Choose different cool characters and rhythms. Try out new band combinations and explore different sounds. Play Techno country disco funk. With Monster Band you can play together with your kids and experiment with sounds beats and rhythms in lots of inventive ways. Play different musical instruments: piano organ drums timbale bass guitar bells etc. Let the kids to explore the musical world and become a great DJ or musician.

title: Inside Out Storybook Deluxe
author: Disney Publishing Worldwide
description: Let your Emotions run wild as you journey through the Storybook Deluxe retelling of Disney•Pixar’s original feature film INSIDE OUT! • Interact with the five Emotions—Joy Sadness Disgust Fear and Anger—to discover how they see the world! • Create your own memory spheres with your own pictures colors effects and sounds. • Create hilarious dreams in Dream Productions—using animals astronauts dentists and more! ADDITIONAL FEATURES: • Read on your own record your own voice or read along with the narration that accompanies this retelling of INSIDE OUT! • Creative activities to express your emotions dreams and imagination! • Features clips and quotes from the actual film! • Fun and surprising interactions with characters from the film! Before you download this experience please consider that this app contains advertising for the Walt Disney Family of Companies. If you're experiencing difficulties with audio please check the audio settings within your device to see if your device is muted. Don't hesitate to contact customer care at 877-662-3769 or memberservices@disneydigitalbooks.com

title: Kids Piano Games FREE
author: AppQuiz
description: Teach your little one to learn how to find music keys and play piano Listen to traditional songs and get fun with fully animated and interactive cartoons. Help your child / preschooler to grow and learn more music with the karaoke. Language and music are two important skills to be mastered. Choose different instrument's sounds to play and differents songs. Teach little fingers to find music keys and most famous traditional songs. This children/preschool/kindergarten educational game will train your child to recognize different piano keys while enjoying the games. This game is suitable for toddler preschooler kindergartener and young children (first grader second grader or younger). Interactive engaging and fun easy piano lessons designed to help your little one learning about keys.

title: Rynkes Jungle
author: Rynkeby Foods A/S
description: Rynkeby præsenterer den dansende Orangutang Rynke som har masser af stimulerende sjov for de mindstes kreativitet og hukommelse. Kom og leg med Rynke i hans lille krog i junglen. Han elsker at danse men du kan også kilde ham give ham high fives lege tittebøh og meget mere. Mød også den søde Papegøje som aber efter hvad du siger en en rigtig sjov stemme. Rynkes Jungle er et børnevenligt univers med Dansk tale og danske sange som har stimulerende og underholdende spil til børn i alderen 3 år og op. INDHOLD * Find Rynke i myldretegninger * Spil musik med Rynke * Malespil * Vendespil * Frugtjagt * Dansesjov * Den efterabende papegøje * og mere til.. Rynkes Jungle er for børn og derfor koster app’en ikke noget. Der er heller ingen reklamer eller ”in-app” køb. App’en trækker alm. brugsstatistik men disse data er anonymiseret og vil ikke viderebringes mhp. reklame el. lign.

title: Domino Theory
author: Magnin & Associates
description: Drag your finger to easily create streams of dominos. Push the first domino to knock it over. Watch the chain reaction it creates! Select from several camera angles to follow the falling dominoes. Easily restart erase and edit domino streams. Use "Y" intersections to spawn multiple streams. Dominoes automatically stand back up between attempts. Creates its own interactive music playing a note each time a domino hits its neighbor. You control how it plays the music by how close the dominoes are to each other and how many simultaneous streams are active. Optionally shares your accomplishments via email or instant messaging. YouTube video: http://youtu.be/B-VoThIG6Pc

title: Music game: Dance with animals
author: GoKids!
description: Like us on Facebook! https://www.facebook.com/GoKidsMobile An exciting music game for toddlers! Make the Cow swing or rock it together with her. Once in the morning when the meadow was drenched with sunshine the Cow decided to get a little dancing exercise. Help her limber up and break a sweat yourself! Features: - Interactive game process; - An entertaining app with several music education features; - Facilitates development of motor skills sense of rhythm and music perception; - Two modes: the Cow dances to the music or waits for the kid to initiate a movement; - The game encourages the child to repeat the movements of the Cow. How To Play Choose a game mode on the main screen. The oval portals lead to a meadow where the Cow places her disco on a tree stump and takes on dancing. There are four colorful notes on each side of the screen which kids can press to make the Cow start dancing or change over to a different movement. Who says farm animals are clumsy? Tap the oval with the Cow dancing actively if you want to stretch your body. She'll move to the music on her own. The toddler can watch her dance on the meadow and try to repeat every cheerful movement of hers. Touch a note on your right or left to make the animal pass over to a new step. Oh look she's a real party dancer! If you want to create a dance of your own choose the portal where the dancer is tapping her foot and moving her tail to the rhythm. She'll be awaiting your command and will start moving only after you touch a note. The Muley jumps each step four times after which she'll be stomping to the groove again. Try it interactive dancing is fun! The Lady Buffalo is very skilled in dancing and knows over 10 different moves which she does in random order. She dances with her shoulders and arms stomps her feet waves her hands and tail hops on one leg or jumps on both jingles the bell claps her hooves and moves her entire body in a nice groovy dance. The cheerful simple movements are very engaging as if inviting kids to join the disco. A fun dance with the Cow will be a great physical exercise for your children! The groovy party music accompanied by the bell the animal wears have sparkled interest of a gentleman Ox. He put on his best red bow tie grasped a huge bouquet of red flowers and came to watch the Cow exercise dancing. There he stands leaning an elbow on the fence and looking absolutely inlove. Thanks to the interactive character of the game children will improve their listening comprehension and learn how note symbols look and sound! When the toddler touches notes to initiate dancing steps it is a boost to the development of his or her fine motor skills. When the child tries and dances along with the athletic Lady Cow it facilitates motor learning and results in improved sense of rhythm. The game is incredibly lively and engaging with bright colors catchy music and cartoon-like characters – dancing Cow and inlove Ox. It'll come in useful to moms and dads grandparents brothers and sisters of toddlers. When you need the child to play on his or her own (or with friends) for a short while the game will come in very handy. Let your children go swinging and rocking and singing to the cheerful melody with the Cow! P.S.: Apps with other dancing farm animals coming up soon!

title: City Driver Sim
author: Rational Box Division
description: Drive vehicles in the city Features 4 city vehicles: -Taxi -Delivery Van -Bus -Limousine Includes two game modes: 1. Checkpoint Collector Against the Clock 2. Free Style Mode Features four levels of difficulty in against the clock mode. Drive vehicles in the city Includes two game modes Play Against the clock Play Freestyle

title: Game of Clowns
author: Grogan
description: Roll up roll up the circus is in town! Those crazy clowns have enlisted you to help them put on the greatest show on Earth! Put up a platform place a trampoline spray a clown with bubbles and put on a show in this clown-filled physics- based puzzle game! This FREE version gives you a taste of the full game with over 25 levels of clowns bouncing and rolling around. This crazy game is circus fun for all the family! Watch the clowns roll around bounce on trampolines drive tiny cars and shoot each other out of cannons to solve increasingly challenging puzzles. Can you collect 3 stars on each level and earn all the achievements? What are you waiting for?

title: Karl's Castle
author: Ravensburger Digital GmbH
description: ★★★★★ Best Children Game 2012 - German Developer Award ★★★★★ Experience a world of fantasy that will enchant you over and over again. In Karl's Castle you will discover knights princesses and well-known characters from fairy tales. An interactive world of hidden objects for young and old. Developed for children age two and older. ### Special features: ### - Over 70 interactions and more than 50 characters. - Captivating hand- drawn illustrations. - Intuitive child-friendly navigation. - 3 great mini-games. - Multi-touch capability: recognition of several fingers simultaneously. - High quality animations and humorous sounds. ### Description: ### Karl's Castle is an interactive picture book for children. By zooming swiping and pressing a new world is revealed that is full of little experiences. You will meet many amusing creatures animals and well-known fairytale characters. You can watch as Sleeping Beauty is awakened by the prince's kiss the Frog Prince saves the princess' golden ball from the well or help the Pied Piper bring back his runaway rats. Our commitment: no ads no in-app purchases. Any problems questions or suggestions? If so please contact us at support@ravensburger-digital.com Why not also check out other kid’s apps from Ravensburger such as “Magic Carpet Land” “Whoowasit?” “THE aMAZEing Labyrinth” and many more.

title: Reach for the stars
author: Yuisy
description: Let's rock with the stars! Join Strawberry Shortcake to perform all the dance moves from the show's original songs. HOW TO PLAY • Each song has a special choreography to follow. • Each step of the choreography is represented by an input. • To perform the inputs correctly you must be focused and react fast! • There are up to 3 different inputs that specially combined for each song. FEATURES • 8 Songs including Strawberry Shortcake's hit "Anything is Possible". • 8 different scenarios (each song has its own). • 12 different clothes to customize Strawberry Shortcake look. • A Sing-along feature for all songs (learn the lyrics & sing with Strawberry Shortcake!).

title: Ocean animals puzzles for kids
author: Tiltan Games
description: * Sea Animals Puzzles is a great puzzle game for kids and toddlers * Explore through 36 puzzles! Select the level of difficulty fit for your kids! Aimed for kids in the ages 1-8 Sea Animals Puzzles features: * 6 different locations to explore each contains 6 different puzzles. * Play through of 36 Unique puzzles. More are on the way.. * Wide range of difficulty levels - from 2 pieces for starters to 30 pieces for preschool kids and first graders! * Easy to learn and control even for small kids * Funny and Lovable animals beautifully drawn in vivid HD Graphics * Interactive animals sound effects Positive and pleasant feedback. * Multiple side games for in between puzzle solving - pop balloons or bubbles * Control the game music and sound effects from the settings menu * Additional settings allow several options to modify puzzles difficulty level * Kids safe menu buttons to prevent accidental entry to parent related pages Sea Animals puzzles is a wonderful way to introduce your kid to lovable Ocean Animalss. Your kids will improve their skills while having fun! Our educational games are specifically tailored to fit preschool-aged kids and encourage them to learn from each activity. We specialize in fun educational games. The game Does Not contain ads. The game contains In App Purchase to unlock all puzzles. Note this is the lite version. The first 3 puzzles are open for free. If you like this game and would like to purchase the rest of the puzzles you can unlock the rest of the puzzles by tapping one of the locked puzzles. Thanks for your support! *** How to start to play? *** Press the play button to get to the puzzles. on the first play you will be asked so choose a difficulty level - from 2 pieces up to 30 or choose to play one of the random settings. afterwards you'll reach the puzzle pack selection. the game is divided to 6 sets of 6 puzzles each. pick the first pack to continue. On the puzzle selection page you can choose from 6 different puzzles. Pick the first to begin play. *** How The Puzzles work? *** In each puzzle children will have an outline of an image. Your child will then slide the puzzle piece into its assigned location. Once the kid gets a piece close enough to its target location the game assists the kid by snapping the piece into place. Every correct placement provides a colorful positive feedback to the kid amusement. Once kids complete the puzzle a pleasant voice congratulates the kids on a their great work. In addition balloons or bubbles appear to celebrate the children success and they can enjoy popping them out. also one of the sea animals will make an appearance. Touch the animal to see it perform! *** What will my kids learn? *** Sea Animals puzzles aims to help build kids shape and pattern recognition fine motor skills cognitive skills and visual spatial skills. In addition helpful voice over assist in learning numbers and the english ABC. *** What makes our games work? *** * Educational games for young children is our focus. Our kids ideas are behind many of our games and they are our first happy players for every game we make. * In Tiltan Games we know that educating children can be fun! We aim to give children just the right balance between education and fun * Our games are easy to grasp and control on one hand but challenging enough to provide a significant learning experience. Tiltan Games (2013) LTD http://tiltangames.com

title: Baby Animal Puzzle Lite
author: App Dev Team
description: Suitable for 1-2 years old babies. √ funny and simple √ 3 sliding pieces √ 12 cute animals √ animal sounds on puzzle completion √ difficulty adjustment by adding or removing animals √ NO ADVERTISING Entertain your children with this super simple application let them play with these funny animals. Your kids will love the high quality cute designs and sounds of 12 animals: koala crocodile rabbit monkey lion bear owl dolphin frog panda duck and dog. Baby Animal Puzzle is a secure game for your children and it is free of advertising.

title: Talking Nado Hutos
author: Cotton Interactive
description: Introducing Nado: The lovable character from Hutos & Friends comes to life on the iPhone. Nado can hear you and can repeat what you say. Touch Nado and tickle him. Nado is the perfect virtual companion for children who like to hear themselves talk! ★★★ How to play ★★★ ⅴ Nado greets well. ⅴ Nado gets ticklish when you caresses it. ⅴ You can poke the head the tummy or the feet of Nado with your fingers. ⅴ Nado plays with cables. ⅴ Nado loves balls. ⅴ Nado dislikes alarming clocks because it is a big sleeper. ⅴ Nado flies into the sky on a balloon. ⅴ Nado plays with a hula hoop. ⅴ Nado loves ice. Have fun with Nado and laugh out loud!

title: Dex
author: Felker Tech
description: Working on TVs phones tablets and wearables Dex is built to be the best unofficial Pokedex application on the market. This is a modern app built with Material Design and is powered by Veekun's open source dataset. (Fork used is here: https://github.com/fleker/pokedex ) If you find an app bug or a suggestion go to the repo for the project: https://github.com/fleker/dex Please note this is an early version and that means there are a few issues: -No ORAS data -Some erroneous data

title: Magic Bubbles
author: AR Labs
description: Soap bubbles magically appear around you in an Augmented Reality view on your display. Just a blow to make them appear. Just a finger touch to make them explode. Take a picture with bubbles and share it with your friends. Your kids will love this App. For tablet users: each tablet has the microphone in its own position. Blows toward the microphone to make bubbles appear or use a "blow" button.

title: Happy Jump : Bubble Run
author: Pixie Games Mobile
description: Collect apples and buy more and more new and interesting urchins in their family. Compete with the best players there are a lot of new places to locations Run jump poping ballons and apples and pass a lot of different interesting and challenging obstacles in this crazy known and endlessly fascinating game! ### Features ✬ Develop reaction and quickness ✬ Many options through the levels ✬ Playing new hedgehogs you get a lot of pleasure in the game ✬ New things will help pass quickly locate and open new urchins. ✬ High thrill and excitement comes with minimal supervision ✬ Enjoy a beautiful flight hedgehog with easy operation. If you like our game please rate it and visit our website http://pixiegames.info

title: Toddlers Magic Xylophone
author: Alyaka
description: Xylophone is a recommended musical instrument by psychiatrists for your children's brain developments. You don't need to touch any buttons for play this xylophone because all the screen are divided like buttons and you can touch wherever in the screen that you want for hear a xylophone note. There is an amazing visual effect that makes you feel better. Have fun.

title: ZigZag 2 Double Walls
author: Pixie Games Mobile
description: We offer new possibilities in the Zig Zag 2! Continuation of the beloved game Zig Zag. Stay with your ball on the wall as long as possible just tap the screen to change the direction of the ball and starayse not to fall off the wall. Set records open new balls. You are waiting for an interesting selection of color effects in the store. - 18 kinds of new balls - To make decisions quickly which path you choose - Beautiful effects - Set records - Game for all ages Enjoy the game!

title: Disney Princess Palace Pets
author: Disney Publishing Worldwide
description: **Now available with 2 more Palace Pets for FREE! Berry and Blondie can't wait to play with you! Enter the enchanted world of the Disney Princess Palace Pets. Meet Pumpkin Teacup Blondie Treasure Berry Beauty Lily Summer Sultan and Petit! These adorable pets are all different but each one loves to be cared for and can’t wait to go on new adventures with you. Learn how the pets met the princesses find out their unique talents and treat them to a delightful day at the Royal Pet Salon! Features: * Interactive salon stations where you can wash and brush the pets. Remember no visit is complete without a special accessory and a yummy treat! * Ten interactive stories featuring adorable art and animation. * Charming music sound effects and pet voices. * An innovative photo-saving tool. If you are experiencing difficulties with audio please check the audio settings within your device and if your device is muted. Don't hesitate to contact customer care at 877-662-3769 or memberservices@disneydigitalbooks.com . Before you download this experience please consider that this app contains in-app purchases that cost real money as well as advertising for The Walt Disney Family of Companies.

title: Puzzle for Kids - Toys
author: Playmoood Kids
description: This free educational game for children with lots of colorful images and cheerful sounds is the perfect tool for your kids to develop their fine motor and cognitive skills while having fun at the same time. Preschoolers and toddlers can enhance their problem solving abilities hand-to-eye coordination and learn about shapes and sizes by playing this entertaining and distraction-free game. Suitable for kindergarten and preschool children this free game combines playing with toys - each kid's favorite activity - with a problem solving process involved in completing a puzzle. Allow your kids to work on their concentration and logical skills while trying to solve a puzzle by matching the shapes to complete the picture. This children-friendly game is pretty easy to use and control and all your kid has to do is drag and drop the colorful pieces into place getting a positive reinforcement from a friendly voice-over after successfully completing each puzzle. Gameplay and Features: • A child-friendly interface allowing your kids to develop shape recognition skills as they try to complete images of their favorite toys • Dozens of high-quality images of popular kids' toys such as airplanes ships trains robots teddy bears and much more • Easy to control with pictures of toys that can be completed simply by sliding and snapping the pieces into place • An educational game that brings all the benefits of playing with puzzles including development of cognitive and fine motor skills and improving a child's hand and eye coordination while also helping children build their self esteem as they get a sense of achievement after successfully solving the problem at hand • A friendly voice-over provides a positive reinforcement after each completed puzzle • Cheerful and soothing background music that keeps your kids calm while playing • Clicking sound that lets your kid know that the pieces are in the correct place • Supports tablets and smartphones! • Entirely free with no in-app purchases! *****Playmoood Kids Games Privacy Disclosure***** Our games: • do not contain in-app purchases • do not collect any personal data and information • do not contain links to any social networks Check our other apps for more themes like Food Animals Alphabet and Monsters

title: Scuba Diving Challenge
author: Magnin & Associates
description: Enjoy the thrill of scuba diving on your Android device. Use intuitive thumb controls to easily steer and search underwater through 4 progressively more difficult levels. Level 1 - find for cans to recycle Level 2 - find coins on the ocean floor using a metal detector. Level 3 - find coins some of which may be hidden under the surface of the ocean floor. Level 4 - find both the flight voice and data recorders. Whenever your tanks run out of air return to your boat to refill and then you’ll be able to continue your search. Challenging for all ages. Optionally shares your accomplishments with email or instant messaging. Supports Android phones and tablets. YouTube video: http://youtu.be/6DNknz-VDhM

title: Picturizer
author: PdoubleVCompany
description: It is difficult to draw a picture even when do not know how to draw. You can draw a picture of himself are composed of simple elements of a complete picture. This game will allow young children to please their parents' imagination and ideas without spending a lot of effort. The picture is made up of the background and elements placed on it. The elements can be of different types such as animals birds fish trees houses and many others.

title: Truck Driver RB Sim Deluxe
author: Rational Box Division
description: Truck Driver Simulator Game 3D HD Features: 3 Trucks 2 Cities Deliver Cargo At Delivery Point Game Mode New Single Joystick Control New Driver Seat Camera

title: Tiny Firefighters Seek & Find
author: wonderkind GmbH
description: Help those tiny firefighters and policemen in our interactive seek & find book! Many parents & kids asked for it. Now it is here: The Seek & Find Activity Book all about firefighters and policemen. HIGHLIGHTS ------------------------------ Fire department stories and adventures involving fighting fires as well as saving rescuing and helping people and animals. + Fire! Fire!: help the brave firefighters to put out the blaze + The cute cow is stuck: get her out of the pond using the crane truck + The pussy cat has got stuck up the tree: rescue him and bring him down again + A storm has caused havoc: help the fire department to remove a fallen tree New: Discover the adventures of busy policemen! + Catch the pickpocket! + Support the special operation and catch the burglar! + Oh no the magpie stole the jewels! Can the Police cat get them back? + Safely escort the celebrity in his limousine + Fly against the witch and Superman in your Police helicopter! ...and many more adventures with the firefighters and policemen: the speeding car the cheeky crow the smart firefighter the lazy policeman the dancing traffic officer the crazy duck and the funny horse... Our promise ------------------------------ + Your child will discover lots of little connected stories + Parents too will keep finding new hidden details + It’ll not only be your kid enjoying this app. Customer reviews ------------------------------ „Tiny Firefighters is a great seek and find app for toddlers and preschoolers.“ (funeducationalapps.com) „A really enjoyable (and lighthearted) interactive scene with lots going on for the busy firefighters.“ (smartappsforkids.com) App of the Week award at fun2tap.com and included in the Top 10 Apps of the Month at top-kids-apps.com

title: Barbie Life
author: Mattel
description: Welcome to Barbie Life™! Get the best of Barbie® digital content all at your fingertips... watch a hilarious episode of Barbie™ Life in The Dreamhouse edit photos in the ‘Dream Book’ or express yourself through music in the all-new Superstar Beats game! So come in have fun and get ready to live the Barbie Life™! ● EASY TO USE: The navigation bar makes it easier than ever to explore great content! Check back often for updates! ● BARBIE LIFE IN THE DREAMHOUSE: Ever wondered what a Schlond Poofa is? Check out the video that started it all! ● MUSIC: Sing along with some of the greatest hits from your favorite Barbie™ movies! ● MOVIES: Connect to Barbie™ movies and meet our characters! ● WALLPAPERS: Download Barbie® wallpapers for your tablet or smartphone. ● CONNECT: Visit Barbie.com and keep up with all the latest from Barbie®! Download Barbie Life today! It’s Amazing!

title: Frozen Storybook Deluxe
author: Disney Publishing Worldwide
description: **Now featuring the "Frozen Fever" story the next chapter in the story of FROZEN! Reunite with your friends from Arendelle and experience the story of this hilarious all-new short!** **Winner of the Editor's Choice Award Children's Technology Review** • Experience two sides of the new Frozen film story with Anna and Elsa – two sisters with very different points of view! • Interactive play: create your own “ice craft” snow globes and re-create Frozen scenes with frosty drawing tools. • Flip your device to read hear and see the different perspectives from Anna and Elsa. •Laugh out loud as your enjoy tappable animation film quotes and a few surprises. In “Frozen” fearless optimist Anna teams up with rugged mountain man Kristoff and his loyal reindeer Sven in an epic journey encouraging Everest-like conditions mystical trolls and a hilarious snowman named Olaf in a race to find Anna’s sister Elsa whose icy powers have trapped the kingdom of Arendelle in eternal winter. Features: • Storytelling Options: Read on your own! Record your own voice! Or listen to the narration that accompanies this retelling of Frozen • Create and build frozen scenes and crystal palaces with your “ice craft” tools • Flip your device upside-down for different points of view from the two sisters • Short clips from the actual film • Activities including: put together ice puzzles • Surprising and fun tappable activities Before you download this experience please consider that this app contains advertising for The Walt Disney Family of Companies.

title: Jigsaw Puzzle: Game for Kids
author: Absolutist Games
description: Meet absolutely amazing puzzle game for children! Even the youngest fans of puzzle games will be able to enjoy our new breathtaking and fascinating jigsaw game for kids. The game perfectly suits both for girls and boys. Its level packs are based on the well-known fairy-tales. Playing our Jigsaw Puzzle: Game for Kids Full your child will have fun with their favourite book characters. Our little ladies will have a great time with lovely Cinderella while boys can enjoy the trip with The Elephant's Child. Colorful pictures new opportunities and pleasant music will bring a fascinating pastime. It is a fun classic puzzle game that will help your child to train their attention memory accuracy and diligence. Enjoy nice graphics and easy game mechanics! Features: - beautiful graphics - nice sound effects - addictive level packs - no language skills needed - easy game mechanics - amazing brain trainer

title: Die drei ??? – Der Riesenkrake
author: USM
description: Am Strand von Rocky Beach taucht ein geheimnisvoller Riesenkrake auf der anscheinend auch an Land sein Unwesen treibt. Die Nachricht verbreitet sich wie ein Lauffeuer und schon wird eine Krakenparty am Strand geplant. Kann es dabei mit rechten Dingen zugehen? Die drei Fragezeichen ermitteln und bekommen es schnell mit mysteriösen Spuren dubiosen Gaunern bissigen Geheimgangbesetzern und verschrobenen Wissenschaftlern zu tun. Hilf den drei Detektiven den seltsamen Fall zu lösen! • Gesprochen von Oliver Rohrbeck Jens Wawrczeck Andreas Fröhlich und weiteren Die drei ???-Hörspielsprechern • Detektiv-Adventure mit vielen bekannten Locations und Charakteren aus Rocky Beach • Ein komplett neuer Kriminalfall für die drei ??? • Geeignet für Spieler ab zehn Jahren Das sagen die Spieler: „Ein Muss für den Fan! Schön gemacht manchmal etwas kniffelig aber schaffbar. Abwechslungsreiche Rätsel und das Ganze mit den Originalstimmen. Auch für Nichtkenner der Serie zu empfehlen.“ Daniel Perrault „Jeder Cent hat sich gelohnt! Für Fans der drei??? Ist das Spiel der Hammer! Original Stimmen! Einfach top!!!!“ Dennis Steinbach „Sehr gelungenes und kurzweiliges Spiel.“ Christian Meyer ***** Bitte beachte: Optimiert für Geräte mit einer Grafikauflösung von mindestens 800x480 px. Fragen Verbesserungsvorschläge oder Featurewünsche? Wir freuen uns auf deine Anregungen! Mail an: android@usm.de Updates und Neuigkeiten zu den drei ???-Spielen und allen anderen USM-Titeln: www.usm.de oder bei www.facebook.com/USM.Verlag und twitter.com/USM_Info *****

title: Самолеты Disney. Журнал
author: Whisper Arts
description: Вы готовы к новым приключениям вместе с Дасти Полейполе и его друзьями? В этом приложении вас ждут самые свежие новости прямо с аэродрома «Кривые лопасти»! В каждом выпуске журнала – новые яркие истории из жизни любимых героев. Испытайте свою находчивость и разгадайте головоломки на страницах журнала. В каждом номере вас ждут необычные игры и развлечения: викторины игры «найди отличия» «найди пару» лабиринты раскраски и многое другое. Коллекция журналов будет пополняться новыми номерами - следите за обновлениями! Внимание: приложение содержит платный контент и может направлять уведомления о доступных обновлениях. Если при работе приложения возникли неполадки с аудиофайлами проверьте настройки звука на вашем устройстве и убедитесь что звук включен. Вы также можете обратиться в нашу службу поддержки по адресу support@whisperarts.com .

title: Monster Hopper
author: Ezone.com
description: Hi my name is jack I am 12 years old and I broke my leg on my birthday skateboarding. You may think that that is unlucky but no you're wrong it's not because I got to design and make a game with the help of my Dad (He and my uncle own ezone.com) which I probably wouldn't have had time for if I didn't. My game kept me entertained while I was injured and I hope it keeps you entertained too. Here are some of the features of my game - It's a classic old school platformer - Easy and efficient controls - Double-jump (because all good games have double-jump) - Increase your multiplier to get higher scores - A boss at the end of every level - Addictive! - 3 playable characters: 'Jack' 'Afro Joe' and 'Abrasam Lincoln' - Tablet support - Support for bluetooth controllers: Moga HID - NVIDIA SHIELD support - XPERIA PLAY optimized - Google TV support So please download it and if you like it tell your friends. I got my first piece of fan art from one of my fans the other day so if you want to send any fan art post it to : http://facebook.com/ezonecom In the next update I'm going to add some more levels.

title: ShipAntics
author: StoryToys
description: Welcome to the world of ShipAntics a fun-filled puzzle adventure game mixed with crazy cartoon action stuffed to the gills with weird and wonderful characters! ShipAntics stars a madcap crew of seafaring adventurers. In a last gasp effort to save his beloved Barnacle Captain Fred transforms his ship into a floating school of excellence sort of. Your job is to help Otto and Amanda as they venture into the unknown and sail for the horizon solving mysteries and puzzles along the way. ShipAntics is comprised of three separate chapters. Chapter 1 is free to play Chapter 2 is available as a low cost in-app purchase with Chapter 3 to follow in the coming months. Includes four language versions in one app: English French German Spanish PLAY & EXPLORE Can you solve the mysteries of the good ship Barnacle? You’ll need your wits about you to solve the riddles and navigate the dastardly puzzles! Do you have what it takes to help keep this ship afloat. Investigate each room on the ship and search for hidden surprises along the way. Discover secret objects and hidden creatures. WATCH & LAUGH Laugh along with the comical antics Otto Amanda and the rest of the crew in episodes of cartoon content integrated into the game. Want to watch the cartoon content without playing the game? Select the ‘Appisodes’ feature. EARN REWARDS Win stars for each puzzle solved each hidden creature discovered and every secret item found. Earn new clothes for Amanda and Otto and customize their outfits in-game. Watch our awesome Trailer here: shipantics.com UNLOCK CHAPTER 2 WITH A SIMPLE IN-APP PURCHASE: In the latest chapter Amanda Otto and the crew of the Barnacle travel to the mysterious Kiki Island in search of the fearsome Kiki Beast! Packed with loads of new characters locations puzzles and surprises chapter 2 the Search for the Kiki Beast is a whole new adventure just waiting to be explored!

title: Amelia | Kids Story Book
author: OhNoo Studio
description: Amelia and Terror of The Night is an interactive graphic story book for kids. Intellectually and visually interesting filled with invention. It is a journey to the far-off land of adventures games hidden secrets and unique quests. Meet Amelia - a little girl who lives in mysterious Mushroom Clearing with 3 friends: ▶ Big furry creature TeddyTeddy ▶ a blue two wheeled cat named Kitty-Patter ▶ and shy little tortoise called Little Pencil Help Amelia and team rescue their friend from devious dark creature - Whine. It is a story about friendship acceptance cooperation and courage. Discover unique adventure you have never seen before. ★★ One of the most interactive digital books for Android devices. ★★ ▶ WHAT’S INSIDE AMELIA KIDS BOOK: ✓ Find 60 hidden stars to unlock secret scene at the end of the story book ✓ Find all 180 hidden animated objects and characters ✓ Feel the depth of the 3D effect by tilting the device from left to right ✓ Switch night and day ✓ Rotate the planet with your fingers ✓ Dress-up characters to prepare them for the adventure ✓ Tap the bubbles to pop them ✓ Play the animal orchestra ▶ 4 MINI GAMES: ✓ Tic Tac Toe - for 1 or 2 players ✓ Listen and repeat melodies sung by frogs or play your own ✓ Hide and seek using flashlight ✓ Break glass shade tapping on it ▶ ANIMATIONS & SOUNDS: ✓ 42 beautifully presented screens with detailed graphics ✓ Over 360 interactions and animations ✓ Main characters fully lip synchronized ✓ Fully narrated by professional actors (over 20 minutes of voices) ✓ Every main character has 3 different dialog lines for each screen ✓ Over 35 minutes of professional soundtrack ✓ Over 400 humorous sounds. ▶ AMELIA KIDS BOOK FEATURES: ✓ Captivating hand-drawn illustrations ✓ Both adults and kids will love reading and playing it over and over again! ✓ Easy to use interface ✓ Jump to any page in the book with our handy table of contents ✓ Language support for English and Polish ▶ REVIEWS "Amelia and Terror of the Night is one of the most animated and interactive apps I have seen this year. It definitely will 'Wow' you the minute you begin the app and children are likely to disappear with your tablet the minute you show it to them." - Digital-Storytime.com "What makes Amelia just so great overall is hard to pin on one thing. The quality of the voice acting graphics interactive elements and games story and art is so high and so consistent across all the elements that in itself makes this a unique find". - iOSaffairs.com "Amelia and Terror of the Night must be the best book I have seen on the iOS platform. Even if you include the Androids in there as well there really isn’t anything out there that matches the quality of graphics animations dictation and sounds." - appShrink.com "Every now and again there’s an app that manages to set a new standard for an entire category." "This is one of the most technically impressive and immersive apps currently available on iOS." - Appdictions.com "Amelia and Terror is One of the Most Unique Interactive Storybooks for iPhone and iPad. Every now and again there’s an app that manages to set a new standard for an entire category." - appDictions.com Watch a trailer for this app on YouTube at: http://youtu.be/ASeKyb_XSRI Like us: facebook.com/OhNooStudio Email us: contact@ohnoo.com Learn more about OhNoo story books for kids at www.OhNoo.com

title: Toddlers Music Box
author: Alyaka
description: Choose to play music box as lullabies to your baby to sleep. The app lets select musics to play for your toddler and will loops until you touch.

title: Talking Pato Premium
author: Zinkia Entertainment S.A.
description: You’ve already enjoyed playing with Talking Pocoyo and now you can play with Pocoyo’s best friend! With Talking Pato you can always keep one of the most fun and surprising characters from the Pocoyo series in your pocket! Prepare to laugh and play with this wonderful new application. You can make Pato dance play various instruments with him play an exciting flower game and enjoy his multitude of entertaining interactive features. Pato can also repeat what you say (and sing) and you can share funny photos and videos of you and Pato with all your friends. Talking Pato has tons of features that offer hours of fun for you and your children: •Play with Pato: Pato reacts when you touch any part of his body play with him and try to discover all his fun and amazing moves! He even repeats what you say in his own funny voice! •Musical Pato: Have fun playing the piano banjo drums maracas and show the world the musical genius you really are! •The Flower Game: Test your memory and repeat the musical pattern to make the flowers grow! •Pato’s Dances: Is there anything more fun than a dancing Pato? Learn to dance like Pato! •Record and Share: Record what Pato does and says and share it with your family and friends you can post it on Facebook and YouTube too! Talking Pato is fun and entertaining for kids of all ages! In the free version of Talking Pato you can also unlock 4 new dances and 3 new musical instruments (banjo drums and maracas).

title: Dinosaurs walking with fun XL
author: pepworks
description: „DINOSAURS WALKING WITH FUN XL“ is a must have for every child who loves dinosaurs and prehistoric animals! 16 lovely jigsaw puzzles for children and toddlers developed by parents and tested by boys and girls to suit the tastes and learning abilities of young children from ages 3 to 9. Your kid will just love these wonderfully hand-drawn jurassic creatures and discover where the myths of the dragons come from. „Dinosaurs walking with fun HD“ plays in a land before our time and far before the ice age. Lovely dinosaurs lived in peace and harmony in an amazing jurassic world. Dinosaurs always loved walking with other funny dinosaurs through this beautiful landscape. Discover this amazing world of the walking dinosaurs! Meet the friendly T-Rex (the dinosaur king) or the Triceratops known as the good dinosaur. Each dinosaur has it's own lovely character with charm even the carnivores are sweet and peaceful. „DINOSAURS WALKING WITH FUN XL“ Features: 16 dinosaur jigsaw puzzles from 5 to 12 pieces with friendly cartoon-dinosaurs like VelociraptorT-Rex Brontosaurus Brachiosaurus Triceratops Plateosaurus and many more. The puzzles are optimized for toddlers and kindergarten kids but parents also have a lot of fun playing them. Collect stickers of each dino in the dinosaur-sticker book. Positive feedback for each action your child makes. (Once a puzzle is finished touch the falling stones :) Sweet music sounds and effects. Large puzzle-pieces easy for children to pick and move. Increasing difficulty level as your child advances from puzzle to puzzle. HD graphics suitable for new HD devices. This fun matching jigsaw game for kids and toddlers helps improve visual perception & develop fine motor skills by dragging & dropping puzzle pieces to match the silhouette. The puzzles give positive and pleasant feedback for the child for each part and on puzzle completion. Trains skills like: shape recognition logical thinking tactile and cognitive skills problem solving concentration and memory. If your kid likes this game please rate the app or write a review and take a look at the other upcoming free puzzles from pepworks! Rating and reviews will help us develop more content and more levels and games for your kid!

title: Car and Truck Puzzle for Kids
author: Tiltan Games
description: * Cars and Pals is a wonderful puzzle game for kids and toddlers * Play 48 amazing puzzles with different vehicles and themes! Select the level of difficulty fit for your kids! Aimed for kids in the ages 1-8 Cars and Pals features: * Play through of 48 Unique puzzles. More are on the way.. * Wide range of difficulty levels - from 2 pieces for starters to 30 pieces for preschool kids and first graders! * Easy to learn and control even for small kids * Funny and Lovable vehicles beautifully drawn in vivid HD Graphics * Interactive vehicles sound effects Positive and pleasant feedback. * Multiple side games for in between puzzle solving - pop balloons or bubbles or just play with your cars. * Control the game music and sound effects from the settings menu * Additional settings allow several options to modify puzzles difficulty level and to reset your kid farm to the beginning. * Kids safe menu buttons to prevent accidental entry to parent related pages Cars and Pals is a lovely puzzle game for all ages. Kids will improve their skills while having fun! Our educational games are specifically tailored to fit preschool-aged kids and encourage them to learn from each activity. We specialize in fun educational games. The game Does Not contain ads. The game Does Not contain In App Purchase. ––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––– KNOW WHAT'S INSIDE As a MOMs with Apps member we follow the "Know what's inside" best practices for kids’ apps ––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––– Thanks for your support! *** How to play? *** On the puzzle selection page you can choose from 8 different sets each contains 6 unique puzzles. Pick one to begin play. On the puzzle board you can take pieces from the left pane and drag them to their correct location on the puzzle board until the puzzle is complete. Once the child completes the puzzle balloons or bubbles will show and one of the vehicles will make an appearance and make a recognizable sound effect. Touch the vehicle to see it perform! *** How The Puzzles work? *** In each puzzle children will have an outline of an image. Your child will then slide the puzzle piece into its assigned location. Once the kid gets a piece close enough to its target location the game assists the kid by snapping the piece into place. Every correct placement provides a colorful positive feedback to the kid amusement. Once kids complete the puzzle a pleasant voice congratulates the kids on a their great work. Tiltan Games (2013) LTD http://tiltangames.com/

title: Music Bubbles for Toddlers
author: romeLab
description: Looking for a way to occupy your toddler? A lot of bubbles with music ! Does your kid love bubbles and music ? This is the app for you! A fun application for toddlers to learn to recognize musical instruments and their sounds. Music Bubbles for Toddlers is a nice simple fun and colorful game for toddlers and kids! Pop all the bubbles to listen to the musical instruments sounds! This app is a surprisingly addictive and fun way to pass the time. Your child will admire every kind of musician and will hear realistic sound effects! Pop all the bubbles! Interact with all elements on the screen! Your baby will have lots of fun! It's a preschool interactive game! Play with bubbles! Listen to the sound of every kind of musical instrument! Available for all screen resolutions and devices including tablet device as Kindle and Samsung ! Touch the screen to create all the bubbles that you wish. Tap to pop the bubbles. Touch and hold to blow giant music bubbles! Simple and intuitive! This educational game will help your toddler to improve concentration  memory and fine motor skills.
