title: RB City Bus Sim HD Deluxe
author: Rational Box Division
description: City Bus Simulator 3D HD Features: 3 Busses 2 Cities Pickup Passengers Game Mode New Single Joystick Control New Roof Camera

title: Cute Dogs Kids Jigsaw Puzzles
author: Tiltan Games
description: Must have game for every kid who love Dogs. 30 Lovely jigsaw and swipe puzzles for kids and toddlers with cute dogs. Adjustable to your child's skill level. Drawings too! Your kids will just love these hand drawn puzzles and improve his cognitive and spatial skills. This game encourages design image and shape recognition eye hand coordination. Positive and pleasant feedback for the kid for each part and when puzzle is complete. Content: * Enjoy 30 Unique Puzzles * From 2 pieces up to 30 pieces - you choose your skill level. * Two puzzle types - jigsaw puzzle and swipe puzzle * Paint activity - paint over your favorite puzzles. * Fun mini games at end of each puzzle - pop balloons or bubbles. * Easy controls even for small kids large parts and natural puzzle dynamics. * Best for kids ages 1-6 This game contains a single child-safe in-app purchase to unlock the complete game. ––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––– KNOW WHAT'S INSIDE As a MOMs with Apps member we follow the "Know what's inside" best practices for kids’ apps ––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––– Thanks for your support! Have Fun! Tiltan Games Team http://tiltangames.com/

title: Die drei !!!  Auf der Spur
author: USM
description: Die drei !!! brauchen deine Hilfe denn ihre Mitschülerin Kira ist spurlos verschwunden. Ist Kira wirklich wegen ihres Referats aus der Schule abgehauen oder steckt mehr hinter ihrem Verschwinden? Triff dich mit den drei Detektivinnen in ihrem Hauptquartier und hilf ihnen bei der Spurensuche. Unterwegs warten viele spannende Rätsel lustige Spiele und knifflige Aufgaben auf euch. Sortiert Kiras Mangasammlung stellt ihr Lieblingsoutfit zusammen findet die Fehler auf der Schokoladenpackung helft den Jungs das Fahrrad zu reparieren und setzt das geschredderte Flugblatt wieder zusammen. Nur so findet ihr alle Hinweise und könnt den mysteriösen Fall aufklären. Features: - Krimi-Adventure für Nachwuchsdetektivinnen ab acht Jahren - Das erste Android-Abenteuer zur erfolgreichen Buch- und Hörspielreihe - Ein komplett neuer Fall für die drei !!! - Fünf verschiedene Locations - Spannendes Wimmelbildspiel mit vielen Rätseln und Minigames ***** Detektivinnen aufgepasst: Auf www.usm.de/dda findet ihr Tipps zum Weiterkommen im Spiel! ***** ***** Verbesserungsvorschläge Featurewünsche oder Fragen? Wir freuen uns auf deine Anregungen! Mail an: android@usm.de Updates und Neuigkeiten auf www.usm.de oder bei www.facebook.com/USM.Verlag und twitter.com/USM_Info Alle Infos zur Reihe: www.dieddreiausrufezeichen.de *****

title: Mia and Me
author: Egmont Kids Media Digital
description: Will you help Mia the elf girl save the Kingdom of Centopia? Life in beautiful Centopia is threatened by the evil Queen Panthea – it’s your mission to stop her wicked plans and protect the happy life of Centopias Elves and Unicorns. You need to collect as much Unicorn dust as possible and assemble the Trumptus instrument but watch out there might be obstacles on your way! - Collect unicorn dust to heal the country and to buy great boosts that can help you on your quest to save Centopia. - Once you have collected Unicorn dust you can go to the boost area shop and buy helpful boosts. - Assemble the mysterious Trumptus instrument and use it in the final battle against the wicked Queen. - Have fun shooting your waterglare at the army of muncs and dragons you meet. - Explore the exciting fairytale land of Centopia – from the Fields of Flowers to the Great Jungle. - Maybe you already know “Mia and Me” from TV? Now you can meet Mia and help her save Centopia right here on your iPad! - Mia and Me is a side scroller game for girls in the age of 5-8 years and is based on the TV-series “Mia and Me – It’s Another Reality”. Legal Mia & Me and associated trademarks are owned by and used under license from Hahn Film AG and m4e AG. The Mia and me app is developed by Egmont Publishing Digital A/S in cooperation with Hahn Film AG and m4e AG under license of m4e AG. Mia and me (R) and MIA AND ME (R) are registered trademarks of Lucky Punch GmbH. (c) 2014 Lucky Punch / Rainbow / March Entertainment All rights reserved

title: Ascent of Kings (Free)
author: Nostatic Software
description: The death of a King. An epic challenge to choose a new ruler. Will the youngest of four brothers turn out to be the strongest? Will a boy become King? The answer is up to you. • Classic adventure-platformer gameplay. • Explore and encounter strange creatures - some harmless some not. • Navigate dangerous passages and evade deadly traps. • Seek out elemental shrines and receive upgraded abilities.

title: Sweet Unicorn Adventures
author: TutoTOONS Kids Games
description: Unicorns eat not only rainbows but many other delicious things like ice cream and oranges! Fly to seven magical worlds and make sure that your Unicorn gets enough food to travel further! Perfect casual game for fans of arcade games and unicorns! Game features: > Seven worlds to visit: Countryland Desertland Sealand Cityland Iceland Villageland and Spaceland. > Each world has different obstacles and unicorn food. > Super cute Unicorn who loves yummy food and desserts. > Tons of fantasy creatures and funny characters. How to play? Move the Unicorn up and down to avoid obstacles like trees yellow submarines or even aliens (remember that every world has completely different features). Collect food on your way to make sure that your Unicorn has plenty of energy to fly you to the most amazing places on Earth! DISCOVER MORE FUN WITH TUTOTOONS! Play our games: http://tutotoons.com/apps/ Like us: https://www.facebook.com/tutotoons Follow us: https://twitter.com/TutoTOONS Create your own game: http://tutotoons.com/

title: Uplift
author: Starchaser Studios
description: A 3D puzzle platformer game set in a fantasy world. The first chapter of the Skylander saga Uplift will lead you in a startling adventure across a series of levels which will challenge both your wits and your reflexes. Take control of your own airship and help professor Flugen and his crew search for the rare heltrogen gas the precious element which can save their floating city. Enjoy a steam punk flavoured adventure and steer your blimp through the most diverse obstacles from nature's forces (furious ravens hungry eagles and unpredictable geysers) to the war zeppelins of the insidious Ark. Discover a COMPLETELY FREE unique arcade and puzzle combination! No extra charges no ads and no personal data collection! FEATURES: Use the options menu to choose from 3 different ways of controlling your airship. Original 3D graphics Ambient lighting shaders & effects Real time physics A unique arcade and puzzle combination A compelling story further enhanced by the Lorebook Original music and sounds Completely free no hidden charges Did the first chapter catch your attention? Would you like to find out the rest of the story? You can download it now from Google Play - Uplift: Chronicles (). Minimum requirements: Android 2.3.3 or above 1GHz CPU (single core) 512 MB RAM Graphic chip: Adreno 205 / PowerVR SGX540 / Tegra 2 / Mali-400MP 100 MB free space Due to the fact that we have limited funds to upgrade our game engine to the latest version on some devices the game my exhibit crashes or other unstable behavior. We have never experienced this on our test devices but some users have reported this. We apologise for this inconvenience or any other similar problems unfortunately since this is a problem related to our limited financial resources rather than our programming skills we are unable to have a fix at the current moment. Thank you for your understanding. NOTE: The game installation will require you to download an additional 65MB of data. We apologise for any inconvenience this might cause. WARNING: Everyone upgrading from version 0.726 to version 1.00 will lose their previous savegames. Visit us on our Facebook page: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Starchaser-Studios/244047328950985 Permissions explained: TEST ACCESS TO PROTECTED STORAGE - Needed to test if the installer can download the required game data. FULL NETWORK ACCESS - Needed to download the rest of the game (aprox 65 MB). PREVENT DEVICE FROM SLEEPING - Only needed during the installation. MODIFY OR DELETE THE CONTENTS OF YOUR USB STORAGE - Needed by the game to install itself load and save games.

title: Runes: A Party Matching Game
author: Two Coin Games
description: Runes: A Party Matching Game is a quick reaction matching game for up to 4 players that only requires one device! Compete with friends and try to be quicker than them but watch out some of those runes can be trickey! Great for all ages!

title: Princess Unicorn - Air Hockey
author: Kaufcom Games Apps Widgets
description: Discover a new fantastic air hockey game. Choose between numerous frozen fields. Challenge yourself in the enchanted fairy world where 4 different difficulty levels are waiting for you. Play against a virtual adversary or challenge one of your friends. This game works like a classic air hockey game but it will bring you even more fun. It has incredibly realistic physics a cool graphic style and you can change the field theme with just a couple of touches. How to play: Use your finger to move the paddle and hit the puck to score goals. Features: - Colorful graphics. - Smooth and responsive game play. - Realistic physics. - 2-player mode (on the same device). - Quick play mode (single player). - Numerous hockey fields: Princesses unicorns jewels etc. - 4 difficulty levels: Easy medium hard and pro. - Vibrate when scoring goal This game is has been designed to entertain you if you like it please rate it with 5 stars on the app store.

title: Candy Please! (Free)
author: Nostatic Software
description: Ahh Halloween - a time to dress up carve pumpkins and amass glorious amounts of candy! In order to collect enough candy once around the neighborhood just won't do - you are going to need several different costumes to pull it off. - Classic adventure game fun. - Explore a lighthearted interactive world and solve puzzles. - Search your house and the neighborhood for what you need to make costumes. - Carve your own pumpkin. - Go trick-or-treating and collect that sweet sweet candy. Let nothing stop you from getting your fair share - and more!

title: ZigZag Portal Double Walls
author: Pixie Games Mobile
description: We offer new possibilities in the Zig Zag Portal! Continuation of the beloved game Zig Zag. Stay with your ball on the wall as long as possible just tap the screen to change the direction of the ball and starayse not to fall off the wall. Set records open new balls. You are waiting for an interesting selection of color effects in the store. - Added portals! - 24 kinds of new balls - To make decisions quickly which path you choose - Beautiful effects - Set records - Game for all ages Enjoy the game! PixieGames Team.

title: Reversi
author: Grey Olltwit Educational Software
description: 2 player reversi board game. Also called othello. Easy to play and includes instructions on how to play. Can be played landscape on a smart phone. Best played on a Tablet. No adverts. No in-app purchases.

title: Snake Rewind
author: Gametion
description: Snake Rewind a new twist to old original snake game. Snake is hungry and wants to eat eggs in time. Keep guiding the snake towards eggs. Do you remember the original snake game? Snake game is everyone's favorite. You also spend hours trying to eat as many dots and trying to beat someone score. Try this new take on Snake game.

title: Scribble Hero
author: Nickelodeon
description: Get drawn into an action-packed world when you join the heroic doodle Sketch in a battle to save your notebook from an army of sinister scribbles and evil doodles! Scribble Hero charges real money for additional in-app content. You may lock out the ability to purchase in-app content by adjusting your device’s settings. • Face off against diabolical bosses like the fire-breathing Dracopede and the alien overlord Triblorb on your way to uncovering the ultimate boss of Scribble Hero! • Stock your arsenal with awesome weaponry like the Doodle Destroyer and the Red Marker of Death! • Voyage through outrageous worlds from medieval castles to outer space in a quest to save Sketch's girl pal Dot the cutest doodle in the pad! Scribble Hero features unique hand-drawn graphics 50 levels of pure adrenaline-pumping fun and a ton of boosts weapons and upgrades to collect and customize your experience every time you play. Get ready for doodle-blasting mayhem! FEATURES: • Simple one-touch controls • 50 levels filled with nonstop shooting action and thousands of enemies • 10 evil boss monsters • Collect coins to unlock boosts tombstones weapon upgrades and extra lives. • Unique rewind mode lets you fight back and cause more havoc if you die too soon! • Use special weapons to punch holes in the paper and literally scrub out enemies with a permanent marker! • Survival Mode – See how long you can survive against endless waves of enemies! Scribble Hero collects personal user data as well as non-personal user data (including aggregated data). User data collection is in accordance with applicable law such as COPPA. User data may be used for example to respond to user requests; enable users to take advantage of certain features and services; personalize content and advertising; and manage and improve Nickelodeon's services. For more information regarding Nickelodeon’s use of personal user data please visit the Nickelodeon Group Privacy Policy below. Our Privacy Policy is in addition to any terms conditions or policies agreed to between you and Google Inc. and Nickelodeon and its affiliated entities are not responsible for Google's collection or use of your personal user data and information. Use of this app is subject to the Nickelodeon End User License Agreement. For users residing in the EU Scribble Hero may include the use of persistent identifiers for game management purposes and installation of this app constitutes your permission to such usage of persistent identifiers for all users on your device. Privacy Policy http://www.nick.com/about/privacy-policy.html End User License Agreement http://www.nick.com/info/eula.html Customer Support http://appsupport.nick.com

title: Baby Visual Stimulation Cards
author: Silver Honey Media
description: Baby visual stimulation cards improve babies' focus and concentration. Need something to quickly soothe your infant? These visual stimulation cards are sure to engage your baby while the calm music helps baby relax. Two modes: a play mode for parent-child interaction and a slideshow mode for independent play. Categories include: - Black and white - These high-contrast images are best for newborns. - Black white and red - As your baby gets older and her eyesight gets better she can now see the color red. - Primary colors - Blue red and yellow images. - Rainbow colors - More colors more fun! All the colors of the rainbow. - Animals - Stimulate your baby's imagination with animals. - Babies - Babies love looking at photos of babies! This category engages even the oldest toddler. Recommended ages: birth to 2 years old. Newborn infant baby toddler. Use everyday for best results.

title: Music Puzzle for Toddlers Kid
author: romeLab
description: Discover with your toddler the world of music ! An amazing puzzle with a stunning collection of musical instruments ! The funniest game for your toddler ! A wonderful cute collection of puzzles and animals musicians for toddlers and kids. Does your kid love pets and puppies ? This is the app for you! Your toddler will love this app! Music Puzzle for Toddlers and Kids is an educational and entertaining game. It is a nice simple fun and colorful game for toddlers and kids! Play with music puzzles! A lot of different puzzles and many animals to keep your kid busy. Easy to learn and to control: -touch the screen and drag the musician on the right place -interact with all the elements on the screen when a puzzle is solved -when a puzzle is completed tap the arrow to change to the next level Available for all screen resolutions and devices including tablet device as Kindle and Samsung ! Simple and intuitive your baby will have lots of fun for hours with this puzzle game ! This educational game will help your toddler to improve skills in problem solving logical and cognitive skills concentration and memory. Features: - high quality puzzle game for toddlers and preschool kids from ages 0 to 7 years old with the cutest animals and musical instruments - Easy to use and control - fun for children of all ages babies preschoolers school children and pre-teens designed for preschool boys and girls - learn to recognize musical instruments and their sounds - Simple for toddlers and babies with increasing difficulty - Toddlers develop their fine motor skills by dragging and dropping puzzle pieces - Play with your child or let them play alone - use it to keep your baby or toddler occupied - A lot of animal puzzles! 24 in the FULL version - more than 70 musicians and musical instruments in this FULL version: triangle xylophone trumpet drum tambourine banjo violin cymbals harp piano saxophone balalaika accordion guitar cello trombone bagpipe harmonica flute bongos maracas clarinet mandolin drums hornpipe and others! - randomly generated puzzles! this educational game will never get old! - Does not require internet connection! - Does not contain Advertising! This is the FULL supported version If you want to try the FREE version go to https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=co.romesoft.toddlers.puzzle.music Fun and enjoyable to learn and play with great colorful puzzles this is a must have app! A lot of educational animal puzzles for toddlers and young kids!! Your child will admire every kind of musical instrument and will hear realistic sound effects! Music Puzzle for Toddlers and Kids is a funny game which also helps your toddler improving his abilities. A lot of game for children the best games for kids apps for babies games for girls match game puzzle for 3 year old educational games all from romeLab !

title: Crazy Snowboard Pro
author: Ezone.com
description: Download the #1 mobile snowboard game in the world with more than 15 million players. MASSIVE UPDATE: improved graphics game controller support and Google Play Game Services! ** This Pro version of Crazy Snowboard has no ads and includes 11 additional boards and riders to unlock. ** Get ready for some wicked-cool snowboarding action on your Android Phone Tablet or GoogleTV! Crazy Snowboard has something for everyone: - All new graphics: real-time shadows bump maps lighting and terrain models - Android Phone and Tablet support - Supports MOGA NVIDIA and other bluetooth game controllers - Google Play Game Services leaderboards and achievements - "WiFi Remote" control - In-air trick system: spin flip and grab! - 11 bonus boards and riders including "The Ninja"! - 30 missions - 10 achievements to earn - 24 riders to unlock - 24 boards to unlock - 16 touch-activated in-air tricks to unlock - Grinding: rails boxes logs candycanes! - Smashable obstacles: zombies snowmen elves! - Intuitive controls - really feels like you are boarding! - Quick pick-up-and-play - 4 Endless free-ride modes - Hours of challenging game-play Waiting for a bus? Stuck in line? No matter where you are now you can hit the slopes! Just fire up Crazy Snowboard tilt your device left and right to steer and you're there! Ready for some massive airs? Just touch the screen (anywhere) hold down and you'll crouch ready to spring. Release your touch on top of a ramp and you'll get a huge boost. Then link your tricks together to increase your multiplier and score big. How about some grinding? We've got rails boxes logs candycanes (yes candycanes!) all ready for your grinding pleasure. See how many you can link together to ramp up your bonus multiplier and boost your score. Featuring Google Play Game Services so you can go head-to-head against your friends to see who is the Crazy Snowboard champion! Other Ezone.com games you may like: Snow Spin Team Awesome Diversion Turkey Blast: Reloaded Scarecrow and Galactic Gunner. Note: Please try the free version of "Crazy Snowboard" before purchasing to make sure it is compatible with your device!

title: Music Games for Toddlers !
author: romeLab
description: Help your child to discover the world of music and musical instruments with this great app! A wonderful game and a cute collection of musical instruments for toddlers and kids. your kid loves memory games puzzles and want to play with every kind of musical instrument ? This is the app for you! Your child will discover music and in the meanwhile will exercise his memory! Easy to learn and to control: -touch the screen and try to match the musicians pairs hidden behind the stereo speakers find the couple! -interact with all the musical instruments on the screen when a game is solved -when a game is completed tap the arrow to change to the next level You can also choose the difficulty level: easy medium and hard to suit the needs of each child and exercise your toddler memory. Features: - high quality memory game for toddlers and preschool kids from ages 0 to 7 years old with very cute musical instruments - Easy to use and to control - Toddlers develop their fine motor skills and improve their memory - Play with your child or let them play alone - use it to keep your baby or toddler occupied - more than 100 musicians and musical instruments in this FULL version - randomly generated memory games! this educational game will never get old! - Does not require internet connection! - Does not contain Advertising! This is the FULL supported version If you want to try the FREE version go to https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=co.romesoft.toddlers.memory.music

title: Dreamjob Veterinarian
author: Tivola
description: You can open your own veterinary practice here. Slide into the role of veterinarian and help your fluffy patients with all of their ailments. While doing so you’ll learn a lot about dogs cats rabbits guinea pigs and their various animal diseases. FEATURES • Open your own veterinary practice • Cool graphics and realistic sound effects • Learning rich veterinarian simulation game • Care for dogs cats and rabbits as well as guinea pigs and birds TAKE OVER YOUR OWN VETERINARY PRACTICE In this game you’ll take over countless tasks from the day-to-day work of a veterinarian. You learn how to interpret symptoms and how different treatments can be used. The more patients you help on their road to recovery the more money you’ll earn. With this you can buy new medical instruments or expand your clinic. Turn your career wish into a reality while enjoying cool graphics realistic sound effects and simple touchscreen control. CARE FOR DOGS CATS OR GUINEA PIGS Regardless of whether it’s birds guinea pigs cats or dogs right on the first day many patients need your help. To find out what’s wrong with the animals you have to ask their owners very detailed questions. Perhaps they’re suffering from allergies have parasites in their fur or have sprained a paw and just need a bandage? You’ll find out what the problem is by diligently examining them. You can x-ray take blood samples vaccinate and much more. Try it now and open your own veterinary practice today!

title: Let's dice
author: Thomas Tursics
description: Let's play - a classic game in a new look Well known rules in two variants of game play Collect pips and win by strategy and forward-thinking Let's dice You know the game. You know the rules. So do not hesitate - let the dice roll...

title: Who Built The Ark?
author: James Weatherford
description: Fun Sing-Along with animals and sounds! Who built the ark is a Multi-Touch Toddler Entertainment Application. *No skills needed. *No objectives. *No Goals to meet. Simply start the app and give it to your little one! Children singing The classic tune "Who Built The Ark!" and animals "POP UP" & animal sounds with every touch. Loads of fun from baby On The FRITZ!

title: Whoz Who?
author: 2LA Games
description: Have fun while making your friends or family guess what is written on cards! ALL the players play on ONE SINGLE DEVICE (phone or tablet) for more fun! No network connection is needed to play! You can play wherever you want with no constraints! Whoz Who? is a team game which goal is to make your mates guess what is written on cards. Each round of the game brings fun and very delirious situations! The card themes can be: • Cinema • Sport • Celebrities • Music • Art and literature • Geek and even more! You can bring even more fun by creating your own card packs! _______________ Whoz Who? is available on smartphones and tablets. _______________ No advertising in the application. _______________ Please send your remarks and suggestions to: support@2la-games.com

title: ポケット ペット - 愛ペット
author: ALTRON
description: 「ポケット ペット - 愛ペット」は、ポケットに入れられる、どこでも、いつでも、一緒に遊んでくれるペットの「ごっこ遊び」です。通勤や通学途中の電車の中、待ち合わせの待ち時間、順番待ちや、さまざまなちょっとした時間でも一緒に遊んでくれる可愛いペットです。 ♪ペットは生き物だよ♪ ペットをお世話する、ごはんをあげたり、病気の時にクスリを飲ませたり、シャワーをしたり、おもちゃで遊んだりするのは中々楽しい。普通のペットと何ら変わりはありません。ペットは生き物だからね、わがままも言ったり、おねだりもするから可愛いよ。 ♪楽しいこともたくさんあるよ♪ ペットと一緒にお散歩に行って、ゴールドとアイテムを拾ったり、またゲームセンターへ行くと、色んなゲームがあって、日替わりでゲームが変わって色々遊べるのが楽しい。ハイスコアを狙うとゴールドがもらえるから、やればやるだけ得します。 ♪おしゃべりが大好きペット♪ 飼い主とおしゃべりするのが大好きなペット、もちろん声を出すわけではないですが、吹き出しで自分の気持ちを表してくれます。 ♪ペットは頭が良く、天才？ それに、このペットは中々知識が豊富で、色んな事を知っているからペットに教えてもらって勉強になることもたくさんあるね。例えば、「今日は立秋」とか教えてくれたりする、「昼と夜の長さが同じ」とか、中々の天才で、大学の博士も顔負けかもね。 ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 【注意事項もあるから読んでね】 携帯からこのアプリを削除すると今まで育ててくれたペットのセーブデータが消えて復活できないからね。また、買ったアイテムと貯めたアイテムも全部なくなります。 携帯を変えるとデータの移行ができないから、最初からやり直しだよ。 ゲームで遊ぶために、アップデートや更新にはインターネットアクセスが必要。 インターネット通信機能が悪いとゲームの途中でも、止まる事があるからね。 【携帯やタブレットの推奨環境】 ・Android OSバージョン4.0以上。 ・Android タブレットでも遊べます。 ・ペットは日本語しか分かりません。 ※一部の携帯やタブレットは正常に動作しないこともあります。 【ご意見、ご要望】 『ポケット ペット - 愛ペット』のご意見がありましたらメールしてね： ↓ pocket_pet_001@yahoo.co.jp 【免責事項】 ・このアプリによって発生したどんな損害でも、当社は賠償責任を一切負いませんので、ご了承ください。 ・このアプリに不具合が生じることがありますので、ご了承ください。 【価格】 ・アプリ本体：無料 ・一部有料アイテムがあります。 ・なお、月に購入できる金額および累積する数に上限を設けることがあります。

title: Duckie Deck Homemade Orchestra
author: Duckie Deck Development Sp. z o.o.
description: Duckie Deck Homemade Orchestra is a wonderful introduction to musical exploration for young ones! - 5/5 Appymall.com "Colourful and fun easy to use for little fingers" - Sarah DeBellis Special Education Teacher Playing a musical instrument is fun but creating your own is a major bonus! Release your kid’s inner maestro with Homemade Orchestra where they can customize and play an array of musical instruments made from everyday objects. Whether it’s a rattle made with dried peas or a steel pot drum set there’s no limit to the different sounds you can achieve. Homemade Orchestra has two contexts for a youngster to experience. There’s Explore mode where you can customize and adjust homemade instruments to fine-tune their sound. Or dive straight into Play mode where you can combine a variety of instruments to play a song. Don’t be surprised when the instruments come alive it’s just an effect of the music! Our goal is for kids to have fun while developing their emotional skills and creative thinking. We also want to inspire parents to try new activities with their children encouraging a playful and curious mindset. With colorful graphics dynamic elements and fun sound effects our app is sure to capture a child’s imagination. The simple user interface makes it easy for kids to play independently or together with a friend or family member. Most importantly this app is designed to be completely safe and to protect kids therefore it has no additional payments or ads. KNOW WHAT'S INSIDE As a Moms with Apps member we follow the "Know what's inside" best practices for kids’ apps. ABOUT DUCKIE DECK At Duckie Deck we create smiles. Our biggest goal is to support healthy and well-rounded development in the youngest technology users while also creating opportunities for learning and play to extend beyond the virtual world. Toddlers and preschoolers across the world are playing our educational games and growing happier by the minute. We cover some of the most essential points needed to form healthy personal and social habits – like brushing your teeth sharing with others and caring for the environment. Come smile with us! See our apps at: www.duckiedeck.com Follow us on Twitter: @duckiedeck Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/duckiedeck

title: Roald Dahl's Twit or Miss
author: Penguin Books
description: The most disgusting game EVER inspired by THE TWITS! Swipe the food into Mr Twit's dirty beard to score. Join the FOOD FIGHT now! Every time Mr Twit eats foulsome food flies towards Mrs Twit who is trying to sleep. Score by stopping the mouldy morsels hitting her. But watch out because if she wakes up she'll whack Mr Twit with her stick and then it's GAME OVER! Psssst … here are a few tips to become a top TWIT! - Unlimited levels with wiggly worms & food bombs to get your top score - Discover trick twit shots for bonus points - Fun for children aged 6-11 (and big twits too) - No in-app purchases so you can have as much messy fun as Mrs Twit allows! - Created with Aardman Animations the digital wizards behind Shaun the Sheep. - No third-party advertising The release of Roald Dahl’s Twit or Miss is the very first time any of Roald Dahl’s characters have been given the opportunity to spread their unique brand of mischief from the bookstore to the App Store. Watch out for more! Who is Roald Dahl? Sitting in a hut at the bottom of his garden surrounded by odd bits and pieces such as a suitcase (used as a footrest) his own hipbone (which he’d had replaced) and a heavy ball of metal foil (made from years’ worth of chocolate wrappers) Roald Dahl wrote some of the world’s best-loved stories including Charlie and the Chocolate Factory The Twits The Witches The BFG Fantastic Mr Fox James and the Giant Peach and lots more.

title: Family Sudoku
author: ZingMagic Limited
description: Sudoku is a simple yet highly addictive logic puzzle game. Simply complete the board ensuring that each row each column and each sub-grid only contains one instance of each piece. At the start of a game a number of pieces are placed on the board. These are known as ‘givens’. The remainder of the board contains blank squares for you to complete. You will need to use all your powers of deductive reasoning to solve the unlimited supply of boards that Sudoku can generate. Sudoku supports the ability to mark each board square with possible moves to aid in the puzzle solving. Sudoku also supports the ‘cross hatch’ marking aid to solving puzzles. All boards generated are symmetrical and have a single solution making them pure game boards. Sudoku also supports the popular game variation whereby the diagonals may only contain one instance of each piece. Sudoku includes a lightning fast puzzle solver able to solve any external puzzle. Simply enter any external puzzle and request the solver to find a solution. Game features * Supports 6x6 8x8 9x9 and Jigsaw Sudokus. * Ability to generate an unlimited number of symmetrical single solution games on any board size. * Support for the popular game variation requiring the diagonals to contain unique pieces. * Ability to mark squares with possible moves to aid in solving. * Support for the ‘cross hatch’ board solving technique. * Lightning fast solver able to solve any external puzzle. * Check the validity of a board at any stage. * Freeze the board enabling you to easily return to previous game positions. * No need to purchase expensive additional game packs * Stunning graphics with choice of boards and piece sets. * Easy medium and hard levels of game play. * Enter any external puzzle and use the solver to generate a solution. * Sudoku is just one of our large collection of best of breed classic board card and puzzle games available for a wide range of platforms.

title: Popping Wrap Game Free
author: Kenneth Lawton
description: Amusing and fun to play bubble wrap popping simulator. Great for killing time but not much of anything else. The "popped" state of each bubble is random so the game looks different each time you play. Free app. No ads. This is a complete replacement to the original version of this program. This one was completely designed from the beginning to fix all of the problems I had with the last app. This one fits on all screens the sounds work and I've added music - plus you can save your preferences if you'd rather turn them off.

title: DogHotel - My boarding kennel
author: Tivola
description: Open your own dog hotel now! Look after all the doggies placed in your care. Granny Edith's poodle needs to lose some weight beefy Lucky wants to join the fire department and little Lizzy wants to learn her first tricks. Make sure all the dogs have a nice time in your hotel and that they return to their owners happy! THE FEATURES AT A GLANCE # Run and expand your very own dog boarding kennel! # Care for cute beagles loyal labradors agile Australian Shepherds and lots more breeds! # Feed and groom your doggy guests and train them in clicker training and on the challenging obstacle course! # Complete exciting missions. Each dog has its own story and presents you with challenging tasks! # Expand your boarding kennel and decorate it to your tastes with pirate baskets or a magical shower! # Pet and play with your dogs or watch them frolic around together on the lawn! CARE FOR UP TO EIGHT DIFFERENT DOGS As a fresh young boarding kennel manager you take control of your very own dog hotel. You'll find dog-caring tasks waiting for you there. You ensure that all of the dogs are happy and satisfied during their stay. Up to eight dogs can stay in your boarding kennel at a time – so you've got your paws full! Make sure they've got enough food wash and brush their coats and clean their cages. With lots of good care and plenty of activities they'll feel right at home! And of course don't forget to give them lots of loving care and attention. PLAY WITH THE DOGS ON THE LAWN Happy dogs need variety and lots of fun! So it's important to give your guests enough space to run around in. You can play Frisbee or ball with them on the playing field or watch the dogs frolicking around together. TEACH THE DOGS NEW TRICKS! With DogHotel 3D it's now also possible to train your dogs! Use the clicker and with a bit of patience you can teach them neat new tricks and commands to perform. Labrador Lucky's owner will be thrilled when he gives him his paw when he comes to picks him up! You can improve the fitness of your furry friends on the obstacle course. Guide your dogs over obstacles through tunnels and across wobbly tree trunks. DECORATE YOUR DOG HOTEL! As the manager of the boarding kennel it's also your job to make sure the place is looking spic and span. The more dogs you care for successfully the more decorative items you'll unlock. From the pirate ship bathtub to the fun sausage feeding bowl there's something for everyone. Use them to decorate and expand your boarding kennel entirely to your own tastes. Let your imagination run wild! So what's keeping you? Your doggy guests are waiting! Download DogHotel 3D now and open up your own boarding kennel! If you have any questions or comments about this app please contact our support team at apps@tivola.de . Or visit our Facebook page: facebook.com/tivolamobile

title: Crazylines Monuments Premium
author: CUBITO Sébastien
description: Crazylines is a simple but addictive board game. The goal of the game is to arrange your cards (animals monuments events) based on criteria chosen at the beginning of the game. In Crazylines Monuments you can play using two criteria: the date of construction and the height of the monuments. Do you know if the Eiffel Tower is larger than the Statue of Liberty? If Big Ben was built before or after the Arc de Triomphe? Download Crazylines now to test your knowledge! ▶ Five modes of play including two multiplayer. ▶ Up to four players on the same device. ▶ 60 cards in the free version. And 150 cards in the full version! ▶ 11 playable characters all beautifully drawn. ▶ A game for all ages which allows you to learn while having fun. Cards and menus in English French German Spanish Italian Portuguese Chinese Japanese Korean and Russian.

title: Bring back the cone!
author: Naarassusi Game
description: Bring back the cone! It is children's strategic game in style of board games. During a rain the stream was overflowed with water and flooded a hedgehog mink. All food which the hedgehog collected for the winter deteriorated. Friends decided to help it to collect new stocks. Each of them seeks to collect more than the others and to show that he is the best friend. Not all forest gifts equally are pleasant to a hedgehog: Cones – 1 point of food. Apples – 2 points of food. Mushrooms – 3 points of food. Each of friends of a hedgehog uses the strategy what to win: Cats – fast and carefree go the first. Hares – not less fast but more careful go the second. They can jump through other players. Foxes – go the third cunning and prudent. They can drag off someone else's food. Bears – go the last judicious and slow. They watch closely the stocks and don't give them to steal. Through them hares can't jump.

title: Let's go to the Opera!
author: DADA Company Edutainment
description: In "Let’s go to the Opera" you will join a group of schoolchildren visiting the Opera House. You will be greeted by a friendly guide who will accompany you on a tour showing you all the nooks and most intimate secrets about the theater’s inner workings. Orchestras singers choirs dancers lights scenery ... all at your fingertips! During the tour you will discover how the show and the professionals who make it possible work. All explained in a playful and didactic manner exquisitely illustrated by the great artist John Berrio. Especially recommended for children between ages 5 and 12.This application presents a secure environment for children. CONTAINS NO THIRD-PARTY ADVERTISING NOR IN-APP PURCHASES. A unique opera experience for the whole family to enjoy! CONTENT - Travel through the history and origins of opera. - Discover genres and operatic themes. - Learn about key representatives of the genre. - Observe theatrical architecture and structural elements. - Learn about types of opera singers choruses ballet and more ! - Role description of each member of the orchestra. - How a stage director works. - Find out about technical duties (tailoring stagehands illuminator set designer seamstress sewing costume makeup and characterization). - Introduction to major opera composers. The child will learn many new concepts associated with the opera performance. Especially recommended for children between ages 6 and 12.This app provides a safe environment for children containing no third-party advertising or in-app purchases. Dare to enter the world of opera! FEATURES - Acquire or expand user knowledge related to the opera. - Ideal as educational support for teachers. - Texts and dialoque in English Spanish Catalan Galician and Basque. - Detailed original artwork from artist Juan Berrio. - Develops the ability to analyze lyrical production. - Promotes the education and diversification of musical tastes. - Acquire vocabulary of the processes involved in developing an opera. - Encourages participatory methodology. **************************** ABOUT DADA COMPANY Dada Company is an award-winning studio that creates interactive books and digital toys for children and adults to enjoy together. We offer quality entertainment designed to educate and entertain and to parents we offer the satisfaction of providing their children an edifying learning experience. We work with educators and education experts to make our products child friendly. Visit our webpage at www.dadacompany.com where you can find more information and assistance. Follow us on Twitter at @DADA_Company or Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/DADACompany for more information about all our latest news. Check out videos and trailers of our apps at http://www.youtube.com/user/DADAcompanyEdu DADA Company takes children’s privacy very seriously and we want you to have a safe experience. That’s why our apps do not include third-party advertising or in-app purchases. If you have any trouble with our app or any other questions or suggestions feel free to contact us at any time at support@dadacompany.com . We will be happy to help you. Don’t forget to mention the version of your device and your operating system.

title: Solo Noble
author: Grey Olltwit Educational Software
description: 36 marble solitaire game. Also called Peg Solitaire and Brainvita. Forward planning and patience is required to get down to the least number of marbles. No adverts. No in-app purchases.

title: All-in-One Mahjong 3
author: Pozirk Games
description: All-in-One Mahjong 3 is an addictive solitaire game where player is challenged to eliminate all pieces from the board. • Two game modes: Time mode (with shuffle ability match all pairs as soon as possible) Score mode (no shuffle play until you win or lose). • 72 NEW layouts! • 15 NEW backgrounds. • Global leaderboard with people playing all over the world. • Keep track of your own records. • Move and zoom/pinch of layout. • Relaxing music. Have fun!

title: Wedding Salon
author: Sugar Games
description: Try your hand at the wedding business! Holly runs a chain of wedding salons and your job is to help her manage and develop it while providing top-notch customer service. Salon customers have dozens of things to do: make a beautiful bouquet choose a fabulous dress or an elegant suit find unique gifts for the bride and groom – and that’s only the half of it. Naturally the couple and their guests want to look stunning on the great day so they’ll also need a good massage several tanning sessions and a nice hairstyle. It’s a good thing they’ve chosen Holly’s salon because they can find it all here! Customers hate waiting so you’ll need all your skill to make them happy. Once you find the right approach to each of them your efforts will be rewarded with generous tips. The money you earn can be used to hire staff and upgrade equipment. As for the experience you gain it will come in handy soon: Holly is getting married too and she wants her wedding to be absolutely perfect! Game features: - 70 levels - 10 unique salons throughout the USA - 7 types of mini game to test your reactions and observation skills - Demanding customers and challenging situations - Wedding preparations - Business and romance in perfect harmony

title: Virtual Pet Tiger
author: Gluten Free Games
description: Adopt and care for one of the most beautiful animals on earth the Virtual Pet Tiger! Play games dress up in funny outfits and hunt down a tasty snack to keep your tiger happy and healthy! Download the Virtual Pet Tiger today while it's 50% OFF for a very limited time! Game Features + INTERACTIVE 3D TIGER - This fearsome animal is at your command with ferocious roars razor sharp claws and more! + DOZENS OF ACTIVITIES - Hunt down a tasty snack learn about your tiger play dress-up and much more! + CARE FOR YOUR PET - Look after your tiger's well-being by managing four different stats: Hunger Thirst Health and Happiness! + CUSTOMIZE YOUR CAT - Pick your favorite colors add a funky hat and even name your new pet! + BEAUTIFUL JUNGLE - Explore your tiger's gorgeous 3D home in the virtual jungle! + HD GRAPHICS - Stunning High Definition graphics look so real you'll fall in love with your tiger at first sight! Download the Virtual Pet Tiger and control one of the most adorably dangerous animals roaming the world today! Be sure to check out our other awesome Virtual Pets! Snuggle up with the cuddly Virtual Pet Kitty Cat or cower in fear of the ferocious T. Rex! Like us on Facebook! facebook.com/glutenfreegames Follow us on Twitter! twitter.com/glutenfreegames

title: Princess Fashion Show Free
author: Laura Tallardy
description: If your little girl wants to be a magic fairy tale princess this is the dress up app for you! You can create your own beautiful princess with Princess Fashion Show- a virtual paper doll app that lets you make and dress up a pretty princess fit for a fairy tale! Select her skin tone eye color hair color hairstyle and outfit to make this cute paper doll look just like you! Have fun dressing up your princess from a wardrobe full of pretty dresses jeweled tiaras try on a glitter gem jewel necklace bracelet earring ring (the jewelry sparkles!) fancy purse and folding fan to create the ultimate in royal style. Be a fashion designer and select different colors for the dresses and shoes for mix-and-match fun! You can give your princess a name and she can even have a royal pet like a royal puppy or a sweet little kitten. She can model her fairytale outfit in lots of different scenes like a medieval castle an enchanted forest a rose garden and more magical places! Roll the dice to get a new princess with a different random outfit every time. When you’re done giving her a beauty makeover you can save your princess to your device’s photo gallery or email her to a friend. Show off your fashionista skills by creating endless outfits for your princess dress up doll! Features -Game is for girls ages three and older. -Includes over 20 dresses with tons of accessories 7 princess pets and 9 different backgrounds. -Beautiful graphics by children’s book artist Laura Tallardy. -Child-friendly! Note for Parents This app: – Does not contain ads popups or in-app purchases. – Does not contain links to social networks or the internet. – Does not use data collection tools. – Does not require an internet connection to play. – Does require the “Storage” permission to store pictures of the princess. Please see our privacy policy for more information http://privacy.lauratallardy.com .

title: ADDers and Ladders
author: Grey Olltwit Educational Software
description: 2 player game of snakes and ladders. You can play the traditional way of up the ladders and down the snakes or down the ladders and up the snakes hence the name ADDers and Ladders. It is also a reference to the condition of Attention Deficit Disorder (or ADHD) as I also look after the charity ADDers.org. There is no advertising in the game but future editions may include it to raise funds for our charity. A one player game against the computer is also included if you are nobby no mates like me! Can be played landscape on a phone but best played on a tablet. On screen help is included via a help button as well as a great dice shaker and automated up and down counter sliding. Grey Olltwit Educational Programs: - Simple design makes them suitable for all including Special Needs students e.g. ADHD Autism ASD etc. - Suitable for all ages. No furry animals or pre-school graphics - Certificates and/or High Score Tables reward good effort - Made in England by an Englishman

title: Virtual Pet Dinosaur T. Rex
author: Gluten Free Games
description: Meet the King of Dinosaurs and hear him roar with most ferociously awesome pet of them all the Virtual Pet Tyrannosaurus Rex! Roam the Prehistoric Park unleash a terrifying roar and feed your T. Rex to keep him happy and healthy! Download the Virtual Pet T. Rex today while it's 50% OFF for a very limited time! Game Features + FEROCIOUS 3D T. REX - The lizard king is at your command with terrifying roars bite attacks and more! + DOZENS OF ACTIVITIES - Roam the Prehistoric Park read up on your dinosaur's history and laugh at hilarious dinosaur jokes! + CARE FOR YOUR DINO - Look after your dinosaur's well being by managing four different stats: Hunger Thirst Health and Happiness! + CUSTOMIZE YOUR REX - 8 Different HD dinosaur skins choose from! + BEAUTIFUL ENVIRONMENT - Behold your dinosaur's gorgeous 3D home in Prehistoric Park! + HD GRAPHICS - Stunning High Definition graphics look so real you'll fall in love with your new dinosaur at first sight! Download Virtual Pet Dinosaur: Tyrannosaurus Rex and control one of the most powerful dinosaurs of all time! Be sure to check out our other awesome Virtual Pets! Snuggle up with the cuddly Virtual Pet Kitty Cat or soar through the skies with the Virtual Pet Eagle! Like us on Facebook! facebook.com/glutenfreegames Follow us on Twitter! twitter.com/glutenfreegames

title: Scary Stories for Kids
author: ZebraFox Games
description: In the Scary Stories for Kids app Felipe Femur the Skeleton Gummy the toothless werewolf and Sunny the sun loving vampire each have a unique creepy and even scary story to tell around the campfire party and are more than happy to tell it again and again as they sit around the warmth of an eerie crackling fire. They've come prepared with three spooky never before heard scary stories that both kids and adults will enjoy for free: • Wet toothless Mouths • The Cursed Can Opener • Hungry! Hungry! The three current short scary stories 4 kids range in size as do the monstrous storytellers' bodies from Felipe's brief skeletal story to Sunny the Vampire's slightly longer but still gaunt one to Gummy the Werewolf's plump tale of horror that's sure to please children who love to be afraid or to scare their friends. Each story comes complete with spooky sounds that are guaranteed to send shivers down spines and give goose pimples and each is perfect for a scary night in an eerie old house after a little trick or treating in costume or for a creepy camping trip out in the spooky wilds. For the best experience gather around a campfire and read each haunting ghost story aloud; maybe cook up some s'mores over the fire before heading to your coffin or tombstone to sleep... or at least trying to. If you're a fan of eerie books or creepy TV shows we're confidant you'll enjoy the Scary Campfire Stories for children app. Enjoy and thanks for reading the terrifying stories of horror in Scary Campfire Stories for kids! Features: • Free to Read • More Haunting Tales to Come • No Advertisements • Engaging Kid friendly Content • Three Original hair-raising Halloween Stories for Children • Eerie Suspenseful Sounds • Link to Felipe Femur Website for More Halloween Fun Perfect for Halloween (All hallow's Eve/ All Saint's Eve) Samhain and Day of the Dead (Día de Muertos). As always thanks for reading boils and ghouls! Trick-or-treat! Reviews comments suggestions and ratings are welcome and appreciated. Updates: More friends are slated to join the campfire Halloween party at a later time (future updates with more spine-chilling stories) including Runny the sniffling witch's creepy tale. ------------------------------- RATINGS/ AWARDS: Felipe Femur: Halloween Campfire Stories has won the User's Choice award in the App Apes 2014 Halloween Contest: http://app-apes.com/2014/10/felipe-femur-halloween-campfire-stories/ Felipe Femur: Halloween Campfire Stories has received a 8.8/10 on App Ape Felipe Femur: Halloween Campfire Stories has received a 100 on AppBrain ------------------------------- Written by: Russell Dorn author of No Proper Thief a choice based game where readers attempt as Clyde Lamm (a.k.a. the Rooster) to survive their first bank heist--hosted by Hosted Games. Art & Programming: David Vincent Dorn Want more? Find more fun activities at http://www.felipefemur.com  including coloring sheets bingo cards hangman pages ideas for throwing the perfect spooky creepy scary horrific or just plain eerie Halloween party and much much more!

title: Eden River
author: Unello Design
description: Eden River is a relaxation experience designed for Virtual Reality. It is the 5th game from Unello design. Eden River was created as a counterpoint to all the violent horror and action demos prevalent in VR. There is no blood in Eden River there are no monsters. Instead you cruise down a tranquil river flying along with the animals of the forest. If you have one set up a small electric fan blowing a slight breeze in your face. Eden River is a truly transcendental experience that is already in use in virtual reality research labs and special education classrooms around the world. The original score by Aaron Lemke was nominated for the Proto Award for Best Score. Works with: -Google Cardboard -Durovis Dive -ImmersiON-VRelia GO -Most other smartphone VR viewers Also from this developer: Zen Zone Nebuland

title: Aqua Puzzle For Toddlers
author: Rohn Media GmbH
description: Aqua Puzzle For Toddlers- free educational puzzle for toddlers and kids ### Your Child are about to undertake a journey through the world of ocean animals. In the course of up to 15 scenarios your child & pitu will playfully get to know everything about animals and will thus train his- or her- gift of imagination intellect skills and combination capacities.

title: Preschool Educational Kitchen
author: Gameiva
description: Learn all the different kitchen cooking activities and play so many different games from the preschool educational kitchen by Gameiva. Start your game repairing the clock and putting all the numbers from 1-12 in the perfect series in it. Clean all the dirty vegetables and fruits and also separate the fruits from vegetables into different baskets. Match all the different food items in the kitchen to the one who produced them. Complete all such simple yet fun games and reach the next level for another round of games with more fun. Activities in the Game: ï Arrange all the burgers in the ascending order of their size. ï Prepare the exact same ice cream and cake as shown in the image by yourselves. ï Clean all the dirty food items. ï Put all the numbers on the clock in its perfect series. ï Play games like matching the items and letters etc. ï Share this entertaining educational game with friends and have fun playing together. About Gameiva GameIva brings you the latest creations of most loved categories of games and apps which are all hugely loved by kids. We are entirely devoted to build user friendly games related to fun and learning for better educational familiarities and enjoyment for kids. Stay with us for the latest updates of GameIva on Google play and get more of educational games. title: Little Best Friends And Fun
author: Gameiva
description: Best friends are always there for us whenever we are in any kind of need or even in any fun activities. Enjoy an entire day with your best friends with lot of different fun activities and games. Dress up with your best clothes and fill the balloons to play with it. Enjoy bathing in a bathtub and play with the toys in there. Enjoy a whole lot of many different innovative games and activities with all your best friends and finally go to sleep with them in your bed room. Activities in the Game: 1) Open all the presents and collect all the toys from it. 2) Use the bubble toy to make bubbles and play with it. 3) Get down to have tasty sandwich as lunch and some drinks with your friend. 4) Do other activities like playing with the train planting fixing the bird house etc. 5) Share this game with all your best friends and enjoy all the activities together. About Gameiva GameIva brings you the latest creations of most loved categories of games and apps which are all hugely loved by kids. We are entirely devoted to build user friendly games related to fun and learning for better educational familiarities and enjoyment for kids. Contact us anytime for any questions and suggestions at wecare@gameiva.com .

title: Mystery Spot The Differences
author: Gameiva
description: Gameiva comes up with a latest addition to the criminal mystery and spot the difference game with a new category of different pair of images where you have to find out the hidden dissimilar and missing objects amongst the images. Start from the beginning and complete all the levels from easy to hard. The time is limited so you will have to be quick with your senses and find out all the objects before the time is over. So hurry up as there are so many different images that you need to find out before the time is over. Features: 1) Lot of different levels with different images difficulty levels. 2) Find out the missing items and the differences in the pair of image in the given time limit. 3) Spot 10 differences and missing items from each level. 4) More than 25 levels of different categories of images in the game. 5) Share this mystery game with your friends and compete with them. About Gameiva GameIva brings you the latest creations of most loved categories of games and apps which are all hugely loved by kids. We are entirely devoted to build user friendly games related to fun and learning for better educational familiarities and enjoyment for kids. Stay with us for the latest updates of GameIva on Google play and get more of educational games. Contact us anytime for any questions and suggestions at wecare@gameiva.com

title: Crane Challenge Simulator 2016
author: BRAIN BROS MOB
description: - Crane Driving Simulator 3D Time to put that hard hat on and become a heavy crane operator to in this loader simulator game. Think about lifting heavy containers in a new built construction city with your hydraulic stick. Driving an crane machine is now a great fun experience for everyone in Crane Driving Simulator 3D. Crane Driving Simulator 3D is a complete loader simulator treat for the lovers of crane challenge games. In this excavator parking game the heavy crane is operated by using different crane man controlled machine animations. You will be involved in a series of excavator simulator mechanics handling of the container transporter. This awesome crane transporter game will change your mind about other bulldozer simulator and digger games. So download this digger simulator if construction worker games are getting too difficult to play! Unlike other crane parking and excavator games you will enjoy the awesome fun associated with similar heavy cranes bulldozer simulator and loader games animations and sounds. Meanwhile you can act as if you are playing one of ultimate loader games involving a digger simulator. Add another achievement to your list being a construction worker! Key Features - 10 realistic crane construction levels. - Awesome excavator simulator environment. - Exciting heavy crane simulation. - Challenging time limited chaining up games. - Smooth realistic gameplay. - Optimized graphics Download Crane Driving Simulator 3D now to add to digging games in your mobile device for a great backhoe driving experience in a construction city among digger games. Brain Bros Mob is a powerhouse for delivering top notch simulation games. Don’t hesitate to reach us out for any feedback or suggestions. Believe it and visit: https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=BRAIN+BROS+MOB Follow us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/brainbrosmob

title: Incredible Baby Rattle
author: 7Druids GmbH
description: Help your little one grow and learn through visual and tactile stimulation in this fun new interactive app. Incredible Baby Rattle is suitable for small kids aged from the wonderful ones to the fantastic fours! Let them pop rattle move bounce and shake their way to a happy and curious place full of cuddly characters and friendly colours. From the very second your baby was born it has been taking in and learning from the sights and sounds of their brand new world. Most of this learning comes though play. With Incredible Baby Rattle you can soothe and amuse your baby just by using your phone. Toy rattles have been used to calm babies for centuries. They promote learning by improving hand-eye-coordination through stimulation of their senses. These sensory treats also encourage your loved ones to explore and question the world around them. With High Definition 3D graphics Incredible Baby Rattle is a visual delight for anyone – both young and old. There are 6 individually designed themes 2 of which are free. You’ll discover new ones after a couple of days of fun or upgrade immediately from inside the app. It’s super-simple to use. Just shake the phone to bounce off rattle items from walls. You can pop or move rattle items with your finger. Your baby will love this app! So will you! You can sit back and enjoy the happy smiles it brings to their little faces. Inspire your child to explore question fiddle wonder play and have barrels of fun all at the same time!

title: Pregnant Princess Doctor Game
author: Gameiva
description: There is a very good news for the princess that she is pregnant and will soon be having a cute baby. Help the princess with all the necessary medical attention and treatments. Do lot of different responsible activities like a doctor for the princess and see that the baby and the princess are perfectly in a healthy condition. Check her heart beats and pulse to confirm that she is healthy. Use the different machines to see the baby and also see that he is healthy by checking his heartbeats. Do a lot of different doctor activities in this fun game for kids. Features: 1) First check the health of the princess using all the different tools. 2) Give her proper medicines according to her health conditions. 3) Give proper attention to the baby and take proper care of him. 4) Use a lot of different medical tools for all the different procedures. 5) Also play a lot of different games with the child after he is born. 6) Share this game with your friends and have fun playing with the cute baby. About Gameiva GameIva brings you the latest creations of most loved categories of games and apps which are all hugely loved by kids. We are entirely devoted to build user friendly games related to fun and learning for better educational familiarities and enjoyment for kids. title: Rasmus Klump
author: Egmont Kids Media Digital
description: Her kan dit barn trygt hygge sig i Rasmus Klump-biografen med tegnefilm høre Rasmus Klump-musik lege i pandekageværkstedet finde ting på myldretegninger male i malebog lægge puslespil spille vendespil og lytte til lydbøger med Rasmus Klump og hans venner. Applikationen er gratis at hente og dele af alle aktiviteterne kan prøves gratis i ubegrænset tid. Der anbefales en WIFI-forbindelse når applikationen skal downloades. Når indholdet først er hentet kan det bruges uden internetforbindelse. INDHOLD * Hør Rasmus Klump musik * Se Rasmus Klump-tegnefilm * Pynt pandekager med forskelligt slags fyld fra Rasmus Klump og vennerne * Hør Rasmus Klump lydbøger * Find sjove ting på myldretegninger * Spil og hør puslehistorier - puslespil der udløser hyggelige historier * Farvelæg eller tegn i malebog * Spil vendespil med 6 12 og 22 brikker Når der købes ekstra indhold via applikationen er der en forældrelås der skal forhindre at dit barn køber indhold uden din tilladelse. Hvis du har problemer med at hente/afspille film eller andet tilkøbt indhold fra applikationen kan du klikke på den røde pil i toppen af skærmen og starte downloadprocessen forfra. Hvis du bruger samme konto skal du ikke betale igen for allerede købt indhold. Ligeledes kan du downloade appen på flere Android enheder og du kan slette og geninstallere Rasmus Klump appen. Det koster ikke ekstra. Hvis du downloader appen på en ny enhed skal alt tilkøbt indhold downloades igen – uden beregning. Hjælp os med at lave en endnu bedre Rasmus Klump-app. Send en mail på appservice@egmont.dk og fortæl hvad vi kan gøre bedre. Giv også gerne en karakter og del din mening med andre brugere i Google Play.

title: Infant Visual Stimulation Card
author: Silver Honey Media
description: Instantly calm & soothe your baby with Infant Visual Stimulation Cards Free. Introducing Infant Visual Stimulation Cards Free Edition! This free app for newborns infants and babies includes several high contrast images designed to calm and soothe your baby increase concentration and stimulate the creation of brain cell neurons. The eyes of newborns and infants are not fully developed. In the beginning they can only detect high-contrast colors like black and white (then later red). The best way to help them develop their vision is by using infant visual stimulation cards. Visual stimulation cards are high-contrast images in different patterns designed to stimulate your baby's vision. Help your infant's eyes develop with Infant Visual Stimulation Cards Free Edition. By stimulating your baby's vision you are also stimulating their brain. Features: - High-contrast images designed to attract baby's attention. - Calm and soothing music to help baby relax. - Different categories for the different stages of baby's growth. - All images are high-definition. - Ad-free. How to use Infant Visual Stimulation Cards. - Install the app from the Google Play Store. - Open the app. - Press the start button to show the images to your baby. - Tap the screen with your finger to go to the next image. - Use regularly for best results. Recommended ages: for newborns infants and babies from birth to 2 years old. Recommended uses: play time tummy time back time bed time sleeping

title: Milli the small snail
author: mixtvision DIGITAL GmbH
description: *** An incredible interactive adventure story: Awarded „Red Dot Award“ 2015 „GIGA-Maus“ 2015 „Best Kids Concept“ 2013 „Exhibit of the Day“ 2014 „FWA Mobile of the Day“ 2015 *** * 5 / 5 stars: a fun interactive storybook for children. – TheiPhoneMom.com ** 5 stars and EAS recommendation. - Educational App Store ** An app that can very capably teach as well as entertain. - NewsWatch TV ** Delightful. - SmartAppsforKids.com ** We love this app. - AppsPlayground.com ** A lovely story app for toddlers. – MyBoredToddler.com ** Catchy rhyming verses ... vibrant artwork. - GeeksWithJuniors.com * Milli the curious little snail goes on a quest to find out what snails do best. The only snail on Apple Tree Hill she turns to the strange and wonderful creatures she meets every day for answers. On the way she gets sucked into many adventures but will any one be able to tell her what it is that snails do? "I wish I could find out I wish that I knew I wish someone could tell me what it is that snails do. I know that I am curious and ever so slow but what makes me me? Well I really don’t know." Milli and her best friend Miro the ladybird (who is neither a lady or a bird) set off to learn more about who they are and what they’re good at and along the way they learn more about the animals they meet. Why is Wanda the Owl so clever and how does Leon Chameleon hide so well? Find out right here. Told in rhyme through a series of stunning interactive landscapes Milli’s adventures on Apple Tree Hill will enthral story-lovers both young and old. The gentle philosophy of the narrative is complemented perfectly by the wonderful hand-painted illustrations and enchanting animations creating a poetic life-like world with so much to discover. There is plenty of fun to be had as well - interactive picture elements encourage readers to join in and help shape Milli’s world while there are always new details to discover. Integrated child-oriented game elements in which Milli fans can help the little snail in her quest to find out who she is offer even more variety. Thanks to her endless curiosity and boundless enthusiasm Milli makes lots of new friends and finally realises what she is really good at – being helpful. Features: * An allegorical tale told in rhyme with a positive message – discover how a little snail can achieve big things * Wonderful illustrations * Hand-painted with watercolours and potato prints * Specially composed music that fits the story * Interactive animations * Loveable characters * 30 magical interactive frames with an additional 3 mini-games * For reading aloud reading alone or listening to * In German and English – for a fun introduction to a foreign language * Safe for children ad-free and no in-app purchases! *** Milli in the press *** An app that can very capably teach as well as entertain. It teaches children how to solve problems and to be empathetic. NewsWatch TV The first thing that strikes a user of this app is the beauty of the art that fills each and every page of this story of Milli the snail. The story is substantial and with its high quality content is excellent value for money. This is an app that you should definitely check out. EducationalAppStore.com I really enjoyed the Milli the Snail app. I would definitely recommend this app to the parents of young readers and pre-readers. TheiPhoneMom.com An interactive vibrant tale about self-discovery that is as interesting for grown-ups as it is for kids. Told in catchy rhymes and through beautiful hand-drawn artwork the story encourages kids to find out what they do really well. GeeksWithJuniors.com This is my favorite little storybook app to come along in a long long time. Charming artwork delightful narration & story and a few mini-games in for activity give us a well put-together app that can be enjoyed by adults and children together. SmartAppsForKids.com

title: Goldilocks and The Three Bears
author: Mercury Inpress Inc
description: Goldilocks and The Three Bears is the fourth app in the Incredebooks Funny Fables series. This reimagined version of a fairytale classic will delight both children and grown ups alike. Look for specially highlighted pages and bring the story to life with your mobile device! **IMPORTANT** This App needs to be paired with a hardcover storybook. For more information on availability please visit http://www.incredebooks.com Features: · Explore 4 entertaining digital experiences that are weaved into the storyline. · Beautiful 3D rendering bring the book to life! · Custom music and magical sound effects! · Explore each scene further using custom rotation and zoom features. · Parents section with gated access. We believe that there is a strong human connection to the feel of the print medium. Our goal is to preserve the familiarity of actually holding a storybook and to create market leading mobile gaming technologies. We had a great time creating these stories. We hope your entire family enjoys them too! Visit our website for more information on the Incredebooks - Funny Fables Series at http://www.incredebooks.com **Look for our other Incredebooks including The Three Little Pigs Jack and The Beanstalk and Little Red Riding Hood. ***QUESTIONS? CONCERNS?*** reviews are great…but we can’t contact you through them - if you have any issues or questions please send emails to: support@incredebooks.com . Please help us improve our products! Your feedback is appreciated! Send feedback comments and suggestions to: feedback@incredebooks.com ***PRIVACY AND SAFETY*** This app contains NO ads in-app purchases or push notifications. Absolutely NO personal data will be collected. This app does contain a link to our website for more information and links to the iTunes app store in reference to our other games; these links are found only in the gated Parent’s section which requires separate access from the game play screens. Copyright Incredebooks Inc. 2014. Incredebooks Inc. is property of Mercury Active Inc. and AM Productions Inc. All Rights Reserved.

Help the princess with her makeup dress up and many other different makeover activities in this game. Remove her pimples and also remove some unwanted hair off her face. Help her with different beautiful hairstyles. Wash her face and use some beauty face washing cream to make her glow like a moon. title: Preschool Kids How many Boxes?
author: Fantamstick Ltd.
description: An app for improving comprehension performance in a play area that is great fun for preschool through to elementary school kids. An intelligence-enhancement game in which the player must guess how many 3-D boxes are piled up; both simple and profound at the same time. Boasting a design in which it is not possible to proceed onto the next question until the present multiple-selection question has been answered correctly it can be enjoyed by 2-year old and older children. Moms and dads will be amazed at the performance of their kids! The colors design and sound effects have been selected from the viewpoint of keeping children amused. * Free download * Contains no advertisements so children will not be able to leave the confines of the application.

title: Shaun in the City
author: Aardman Digital
description: All proceeds from every app purchase supports sick children across the UK! This is the official Shaun in the City - Sheep Spotter app by Aardman Animations. Find all the sculptures collect ewe-nique achievements and trophies see exciting stats from other app users and complete special trails with our baa-rilliant Shaun in the City: Sheep Spotter app! 70 5ft artist-decorated sculptures of Aardman’s internationally-renowned character Shaun the Sheep will make Bristol their home from Monday 6th July to Monday 31st August in a baa-rilliant arts trail to raise funds for The Grand Appeal! Can ewe find them all?

title: The Yonghy-Bonghy-Bo
author: Saturday Buffet
description: The Yonghy-Bonghy-Bò has found Lady Jingly Jones and wants to get married...but what about her secret? This wonderful storybook app combines Edward Lear’s timeless children’s poem with colorful illustrations and animation to make a fun interactive experience for kids of all ages. STORY First published in 1877 “The Courtship of the Yonghy-Bonghy-Bò” is one of Edward Lear’s most beautiful pieces of verse. On the coast of Coromandel India the Yonghy-Bonghy-Bò is a hermit who lives in the woods. One day he comes across the beautiful Lady Jingly Jones and surprises her with a marriage proposal. Unfortunately for him Lady Jingly reveals that she is already married! Although her husband is far away in England Jingly rejects Bò’s offer and sadly asks him to leave her alone. The Yonghy-Bonghy-Bò runs away finds a gigantic turtle on the beach and rides far across the sea on the turtle’s back! FEATURES --Full voice-over narration performed by a female narrator. --“Read To Me” and “Read Myself” options to experience the story with or without narration. --Bright & colorful hand-drawn illustrations with lots of animation. --Highlighted touch elements to make the app easy-to-use for young children. Nearly 50 objects and animals move or make funny sounds when tapped. --A “For Parents” page with suggested questions and activities for children to encourage creative thinking. PRIVACY POLICY --This app does not send us personal data. --This app does not contain advertisements. --This app does not contain in-app purchases. --This app does not contain social features such as links with Facebook or Twitter. --This app does not track your location. CORKY PORTWINE APPS Corky Portwine is a Los Angeles-based developer of apps for children. We believe art poetry and music are fundamental to childhood development. We are a proud member of Moms With Apps (Parents With Apps) and the Application Developers Alliance. ------MAKE SURE TO CHECK OUT “THE OWL AND THE PUSSYCAT” THE SECOND APP IN OUR SERIES OF CLASSIC CHILDREN’S POETRY!------ --You can see videos of our apps at WWW.CORKYPORTWINE.COM --“Like” us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/corkyportwine --Follow us on Twitter: @CorkyPortwine
