title: Learn GreenVegetablesWithBheem
author: Green Gold Animation
description: *** This Free App works both on Phones and Tablets *** You can learn about various green vegetables in English and Hindi using this App. Chhota Bheem and his friends take you through interesting animations to learn about green vegetables. There are 2 Levels within this App. Chhota Bheem is India’s most loved animated character. With a viewership of over 40 Million people Chhota Bheem is India’s top animated TV Series.Chhota Bheem has been rated as India’s most favorite kid’s character.

title: Dora and Friends
author: Nickelodeon
description: Get ready to create big adventures with Dora and Friends Nick Jr.’s newest show! It’s time to make a story! ¡Vamos! The Dora and Friends app invites kids to become magical storytellers as they play with Dora and her new friends. Create Your Own Dora and Friends Stories: With this app kids can create adventure stories of their very own! They can choose from ten iconic Dora and Friends backgrounds dozens of props and several musical tracks to bring their scene to life! Then they’ll play with the characters and watch them interact with the background props and music in surprising ways. Make Your Own Friends for Dora: Create up to four additional custom friends to be incorporated into any story. Select different hair-styles facial features outfits and more! Even name the new friends. Build A Personal Gallery: Kids can record their voices as well as the on-screen movements of Dora and her friends. Then they’ll save each recording to the gallery to replay again and again! This app includes lots of educational opportunities for preschoolers and Dora fans: 1.Open-ended activities that include word play imaginative storytelling the basic elements of narrative structure and the exploration of characters settings and events 2.Opportunities for co-play 3.Curriculum developed and reviewed by a preschool education expert Dora & Friends collects personal user data as well as non-personal user data (including aggregated data). User data collection is in accordance with applicable law such as COPPA. User data may be used for example to respond to user requests; enable users to take advantage of certain features and services; personalize content and advertising; and manage and improve Nickelodeon's services. For more information regarding Nickelodeon’s use of personal user data please visit the Nickelodeon Group Privacy Policy below. Our Privacy Policy is in addition to any terms conditions or policies agreed to between you and Google. Nickelodeon and its affiliated entities are not responsible for Google's collection or use of your personal user data and information. Use of this app is subject to the Nickelodeon End User License Agreement. Privacy Policy http://www.nickjr.com/about/privacy-policy.html End User License Agreement: http://www.nick.com/info/eula.html

title: Baby Remote Control NoAds
author: BlackDevelopers
description: This paid version have no advertisements at all! We hope you and your baby will have fun with this remote control. It includes optional trilingual voices at number buttons. Language can be switched using the color square buttons: - Red button = Spanish voices. - Green button = English voices. - Yellow button = French voices. - Blue button = Just musical sounds (default). You can also set a vibration mode at the app menu (you should click Back x2 to enter menu) Vibration is disabled by default. This app is recommended for children up to 5 years of age.

title: Free Kids Puzzle Game -Animals
author: Abuzz
description: What is hidden in the mysterious jungle do you know all the animal names fun animal facts or the animal sounds that they make? It's time to find out with this FREE educational game for preschool children. Work on your matching motor skills learn your words & phonics and practice your pronunciation while playing with this fun zoo puzzle. The simple game-play rich graphics and hilarious animations make this game a true match for your baby toddler preschool children and is also helpful for children with autism. Want to go on a true Savannah adventure and explore the grassland habitat? This fun free game is the one for you. Discover the amazing animals and master your matching skills speech and pronunciation while playing with the cutest hand-drawn animals. And we know that your baby won't get bored ever because we have a surprise for him animated animal flips & turns animal sounds as well as real animal pictures and videos are just some of them :) Gameplay & Features: - 52 hand-drawn animals from the Jungle and Savannah. - creative game play where each animal puzzle piece is broken very intuitively. - theme specific ambient music and cute sounds in the entire game to make it more interesting for your young ones. - tons of animations & maximized interaction with all objects & puzzles for lots of giggles and laughs. - applause cheer and balloons on successfully completing each animal puzzle. - animals come to life and play the animal name and audio sounds. - select the image icon to see real animal pictures the video icon to see the animal in motion and read the unique facts of each animal which are presented with the images. - 27 different languages and pronunciations - English Arabic Chinese Danish Dutch Filipino Finnish French German Greek Hindi Indonesian Italian Japanese Korean Macedonian Malay Norwegian Polish Portuguese Russian Serbian Spanish Thai Turkish Ukrainian and Vietnamese. Privacy Disclosure: As parents ourselves iAbuzz takes children's wellness and privacy very seriously. Our app: • Does not contain sharing links to social networks • Does not collect personal data Feedback Please: If you have any feedback and suggestions on how we could further improve the design and interaction of our apps and games please visit our website http://iabuzz.com/ or leave us a message at kids@iabuzz.com . We would be glad to hear from you as we are committed to update all of our apps and games on a regular basis with new features and also want to get some ideas for future app development.

title: Care Bears Appisode
author: Plumzi Inc.
description: Now your child can join the Care Bears characters in an interactive adventure! Care Bears Appisodes allows your child to watch full-length Care Bears episodes and play along with their favorite Care Bears! In this Appisode Funshine needs help learning an important lesson about competition! It's up to your child to help and his Bear friends along the way! Features: - Fully interactive experiences featuring Funshine Wonderheart Tenderheart Cheer and more! - Based on full length episodes - More than 30 exciting experiences with your favorite Care Bears! - Intuitive tap drag draw swipe tilt and voice interactions - Activities within the Appisode make each viewing a new experience! - Parents can track their child's progress and success in each of the activities including: Math Language and Literacy Science and Nature Social and Emotional Critical Thinking and Exploration Plumzi Inc. is Palo Alto-based start-up funded by Silicon Valley investors with the participation of The Walt Disney Company Turner Broadcasting KDDI and Fuji TV. Plumzi partners with world renowned animation studios to turn their existing TV episodes into Appisodes a new form of entertainment on tablets and smartphones that enable kids to interact with characters and help drive the story via touch voice and tilt. Plumzi is a winner of Disney’s 2012 Innovation Challenge a 2013 graduate of Media Camp the accelerator program by Turner and Warner Bros. and works with the world’s leading animation studios including DreamWorks Nickelodeon Cartoon Network Warner Brothers and more.

author: Green Gold Animation
description: *** This Free App works both on Phones and Tablets *** You can learn about various vegetables in English and Hindi using this App. Chhota Bheem and his friends take you through interesting animations to learn about vegetables. There are 2 Levels within this App. Chhota Bheem is India’s most loved animated character. With a viewership of over 40 Million people Chhota Bheem is India’s top animated TV Series.Chhota Bheem has been rated as India’s most favorite kid’s character.

title: Die Zebras sind los
author: b-interaktive
description: Ein interaktives Kinderbuch mit Spiel- und Lesespaß für Groß und Klein. Benjmain Blümchen ist verwundert: Warum stehen denn Zarah und Zacharias Zebra mitten auf dem Weg im Zoo? Sind sie etwa aus ihrem Gehege ausgerissen? Karla Kolumna weiß die Lösung! Erlebe die aufregenden Abenteuer zusammen mit Benjamin Blümchen aus dem Neustädter Zoo. Du kannst dabei entweder dem professionellen Sprecher zuhören oder die Stimme deiner Eltern aufnehmen. Zudem gibt es auf jeder Seite interaktive Inhalte zu entdecken. Erforsche die Seite mit deinem Finger ganz genau; probiere es einfach aus! Alle Geschichten sind auch im Buchhandel erhältlich. Highlights der App: - Pädagogisch wertvoll - Lernspaß mit den beliebten Elefanten - Liebevolle Illustrationen und Animationen - Interaktive Elemente zum Entdecken auf jeder Buchseite - Vorlesefunktion mit den originalen Sprecherstimmen Join us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/binteraktive

title: Free Kids Puzzle - Bathroom
author: Abuzz
description: Its a simple and fun educational app for little children including babies. Watch them learn the names of numerous toilet items sets and accessories for personal hygiene; what they need when they take shower brush teeth wash hands comb hair or even when they just feel like playing with a rubber duck in the bathtub. Helps in their development of spatial matching tactile memory cognitive and fine motor skills while playing 30 different jigsaw puzzles. Also appropriate for toddlers with special needs and autism. Features: Simple & intuitive child-friendly interface Universal app for all phones and tablets 27 different languages and pronunciations - English Arabic Chinese Danish Dutch Filipino Finnish French German Greek Hindi Indonesian Italian Japanese Korean Macedonian Malay Norwegian Polish Portuguese Russian Serbian Spanish Thai Turkish Ukrainian and Vietnamese. Hundreds of pieces in 30 different puzzles Easy navigation between puzzles Easy movement of puzzle pieces across screen High-quality pictures Sweet background music Drag & drop animations Balloon animation & happy cheering after each correctly solved puzzle The theme of this Puzzle is ‘Bath’ check our other apps for more themes like ‘Animals’ 'Food' 'Kitchen' 'Furniture' 'Vehicles' and 'Tools' ***All puzzles are available for FREE*** Privacy Disclosure: As parents ourselves iAbuzz takes children's wellness and privacy very seriously. Our app: • Does not contain links to social networks • Does not contain any in-app purchases • Does not collect personal data But yes it does contain advertising as that’s our means of providing the app free of cost to you – the ads are carefully placed such that the kid is least likely to click on it while playing. Feedback Please: If you have any feedback and suggestions on how we could further improve the design and interaction of our apps and games please visit our website http://iabuzz.com/ or leave us a message at kids@iabuzz.com . We would be glad to hear from you as we are committed to update all of our apps and games on a regular basis with new free features.

title: Musical Instrument Sounds
author: Game Ability
description: “Musical Instrument Sounds” is a FREE application with most popular musical instruments worldwide. It is ideal for educational uses. The application has different navigation options to increase the fun. It also enhances creativity in terms of combining overlapping sounds of multiple instruments and composing music. Be aware that your device may turn into a theater. Content Details App includes most popular musical instruments from instrument families such as strings woodwinds brass percussion and keyboards. Strings : Violin Cello Viola String Bass Mandolin Classic Guitar Electric Guitar Oud Ukulele Saz Banjo Harp Lute and Sitar. Woodwinds : Clarinet Flute Oboe Bassoon Piccolo Ocarina and Vuvuzela. Also Harmonica and Bagpipes as wind instruments. Brass : Saxophone French Horn Trumpet Trombone and Tuba. Percussions : Drum kit Xylophone Tambourine Glockenspiel Marimba Bongo & shaker Cymbals Chimes Snare Drum Triangle Timpani Castanets Keyboards : Piano Accordion Organ Keyboard and Harpsichord. Navigation Options Application offers four different menus for interaction. Single Menu : Names images and sounds of most popular 45 musical instruments. Grouped Menu : Multiple combinations of musical instruments to orchestrate with overlapping sounds. Combinations include at least one instrument from each of the instrument families such as strings woodwinds brass percussion and keyboards. Shuffle Menu : Shuffle option to create various combinations of 8 musical instruments. Quiz Menu : Listen the sound clip and guess the instrument. Challenge yourself. Pedagogical Assets Teaches names appearances and sounds of the musical instruments. Can be used as an educational tool for kids. Enhances creativity in terms of combining multiple instruments and composing music. Doesn't include harmful images or ads for your kids. Technical Properties Easy to use. Simply tab to listen swipe to navigate. High quality long and overlapping sounds. Simultaneous playback of up to 10 sounds. High definition graphics and animated display. Suitable for both smart phones and tablets. Contact us via gamebility@gmail.com

title: Christmas Elf Adventure Full
author: Ploosh
description: Count down to Christmas with this beautiful Advent Calendar for . This is the full version of "Elf Advent(ure) Calendar 2014"! Have fun and help the Elves to save Christmas(Xmas)! Will they manage to wake the Frost Giant in time? * 24 exciting episodes! * A new game every day. * An exciting Elf Advent poem with hilarious verses * Beautifully drawn graphics * Entertainment for kids and the whole family Please support our small company by purchasing this full version! "Elf Advent(ure) Calendar 2014" is an Advent Calendar with Christmas games for kids. The story is told as a poem in 24 exciting episodes. Solve a puzzle each day to help the Elves on their adventurous journey in this thrilling Christmas journey! Story: The diligent Elves are almost finished with their Christmas preparations as they notice the disaster: The lazy Frost Giant has overslept! Unfortunately he is responsible for one of the most important ingredients for a perfect Christmas: Snow! A delegation of Elves travels to the Giant's cave in order to wake the sleepy head but this proves far more difficult than expected. Will they manage to put things right? And also in time to bring snow to everyone until Christmas Eve? This is a fun Christmas Calendar with cute puzzles for Children. It starts with the Elves working at Santa's workshop. There are different games some animated puzzles some jigsaw puzzles other ones containing drawings for kids. At the end of each daily mini-game there funny animations await. Boys and girls alike will enjoy this collection of riddles brainteasers and other fun things. The backgrounds of the puzzles are beautifully drawn christmas paintings by talented artists who have worked on amazing christmas cards and christmas stories for kids before. Merry Christmas and all the best from Ploosh! www.ploosh.net elf@ploosh.net

title: Fun with Sounds - ABC
author: Grumpy Old Jon
description: Meet some Crazy Characters in a Romp through the Alphabet! Fun with Sounds is a Talking Alphabet Picture Book. Swipe the Pages to Turn to the Next Picture. Press the Buttons and Fun with Sounds - ABC Reads the Words. Words and Pictures by Anne and Matt and used with their kind permission. Development Note: This Project builds on the Android Page Code Example from Harism ( https://github.com/harism/android_page_curl )

title: Food puzzle for kids
author: Abuzz
description: Puzzle for kids series (8) are one of the best fun and educational games for young kids toddlers and preschool children. This top free game will help your child develop matching tactile and fine motor skills while playing and exploring 72 different food wooden textured puzzle shapes. Watch them learn all the names of numerous fruits vegetables and other food items through fun and play - apple grapes orange pineapple watermelon banana kiwi cherry strawberry lemon corn peas carrot tomato pepper mushroom potato onion cucumber cabbage milk egg bread water juice butter cheese yogurt jam & cereals. They will hear the pronunciation as well as see the name written below which will also help the kids get familiar with the abc's the letters of the alphabets. A pleasant voice will always encourage and praise your kids and toddlers and motivate them to continue to build their vocabulary memory and cognitive skills while playing. The game is enriched with animations sounds and interactivity for repeat playing & learning. It will keep your toddlers busy for hours and yet you will never be worried about them losing any piece of the puzzle. Features: * Simple and intuitive child-friendly interface. * 27 different languages and pronunciations - English Arabic Chinese Danish Dutch Filipino Finnish French German Greek Hindi Indonesian Italian Japanese Korean Macedonian Malay Norwegian Polish Portuguese Russian Serbian Spanish Thai Turkish Ukrainian and Vietnamese. * Hundreds of puzzle pieces in 72 different puzzles. * Easy navigation between puzzles. * Easy movement of puzzle pieces across screen. * High-quality graphics and images. * Drag and drop animations and child friendly background music. * Balloon animation and happy cheering after each correctly solved puzzle. * The theme of this Puzzle is ‘Food’ check our other apps for more themes like ‘Animals’ 'Kitchen' 'Furniture' 'Bathroom' 'Cars' and 'Tools' And last but not least ***All puzzles are available for FREE*** Privacy Disclosure: As parents ourselves iAbuzz takes children's wellness and privacy very seriously. Our app: • Does not contain links to social networks • Does not contain any in-app purchases • Does not collect personal data But yes it does contain advertising as that’s our means of providing the app free of cost to you – the ads are carefully placed such that the kid is least likely to click on it while playing. Feedback Please: If you have any feedback and suggestions on how we could further improve the design and interaction of our apps and games please visit our website http://iabuzz.com/ or leave us a message at kids@iabuzz.com . We would be glad to hear from you as we are committed to update all of our apps and games on a regular basis with new free features.

title: Poppy Cat Bubble Volcano Free
author: StoryToys
description: Read and play with Poppy Cat and the Bubble Volcano an enchanting 3D pop-up activity app for tablet and mobile phone featuring the much-loved TV character in eight fun-packed games and activities. Stunning 3D technology brings Poppy Cat and her adorable friends to life as they set off on a brand new adventure. Join them as they dive down to the ocean deep where there's exploring to be done seahorses to rescue and puzzles to solve. The activities are fun and easy to play and young children will love earning badges for completing the extra challenges in every scene: • Help Poppy Cat and her friends pogo up and down to pop bubbles! • Guide Poppy Cat's submarine through a magical undersea world • Track down Alma Zuzu Mo and Owl in a maze of swaying seaweed • Piece together a mysterious map that’s just like a jigsaw puzzle • Rescue the little seahorses from inside a dark cave • Come to a seahorse party play a tune and much much more! Welcome aboard explorers – it’s a perfect day for an adventure! FEATURES • Narrated in US and UK English by the voice of Poppy Cat • 8 charming pop-up games and activities designed for little fingers • Magical 3D pop-up experience • Bright colorful illustrations based on the TV animations • Read to Me Read it Myself and Autoplay modes • 16 beautifully-presented pages of text • Charming musical sound effects and soundtracks from the TV series • Fully localized for US and UK English French and Spanish ********************************** REVIEWS of previous StoryToys apps: "StoryToys has near-brilliantly rethought children's books. This application evolves the very concept of what a story can be." ~ Jeremy Horowitz iLounge “Every page keeps the reader wanting more. The interactivity of the pop-up pages is superb.” ~ Leanne McGinty Ahgoo Review “Now THIS is what I call an app!! My jaw dropped when I started reading this interactive book.” ~ Sylvia Duckworth French Apps for kids “Stunning. If I had to sum up this app in one word it would absolutely be stunning.” ~ Danielle Smith TheresABook.com ********************************** STORYTOYS AWARDS * Two iLounge awards for best kids’ app * Winner of two Mom’s Choice gold and silver awards * Winner of the Editor’s Choice Award for Excellence in Design (Children’s technology review) * Shortlist nominations for the FutureBook Digital Innovation Award * Best Kids’ App Ever winner * Longlisted for the DBW Publishing innovation award (children’s book category) * Children’s Technology Review Editor’s Choice Award. *************************************** RATE OUR APP! We hate to bother you with this but the truth is that app reviews are incredibly important. We need to know what you think so that we can improve our products in the ways that you would like to see. Reviews give you a platform to be heard help other customers to make decisions and help us spread the word about our apps. So as you can see it would really mean a lot to us if you would consider reviewing or rating this app! *************************************** STAY IN TOUCH! Stay in touch to hear about new releases and promotions: Visit us: storytoys.com Email us: For any technical issues please email us at support@storytoys.com Like us on Facebook: Facebook.com / StoryToys Follow us on Twitter: @StoryToys

title: BYS NBA Basketball 2015
author: Fingerprint Digital Inc.
description: Backyard Sports NBA Basketball 2015 is the only game that lets you play with the Pros as Kids! This popular & beloved franchise returns as an action packed arcade style 3-on-3 pick-up style basketball game. Relive this classic Backyard Sports title in all new HD action. Select a team of pros as kids & the original Backyard Sports characters. Backyard Sports NBA Basketball 2015 is free to download and is officially licensed by the National Basketball Association. Backyard Sports NBA Basketball Features: NBA SUPERSTARS Backyard Sports NBA Basketball 2015 features the pros as kids including Stephen Curry LeBron James Kevin Durant Kobe Bryant Carmelo Anthony Dwight Howard Damian Lillard Demar DeRozan Kenneth Faried Dwayne Wade Blake Griffin Derrick Rose 2014 Champion Tim Duncan and more! 3D GRAPHICS For the first time ever Backyard Sports NBA Basketball 2015 comes to you in beautiful 3D! Play in classic Backyard Sports venues with Pablo Sanchez Achmed Khan and your other favorite Backyard Sports characters. ONE TOUCH CONTROLS Pass shoot and steal the ball with intuitive controls that are easy to pick up & play but difficult to master. POWER-UP Use in game Power-Ups like “Speed Shoes” and the “Fire Ball” to dial up the action. Or scan codes from real Backyard Sports gear to unlock other exciting in-game power-ups like “720 Dunks” or the “Basket Force Field.” You can even unlock & power-up new NBA superstars for your team! Download now to Power Up Your Game!

title: Animals Puzzle For Kids
author: Abuzz
description: This Free jigsaw like puzzle game helps your kids develop matching tactile and fine motor skills while playing 84 different Animals Puzzles - horse cow pig sheep duck chicken donkey dog cat and rabbit bee butterfly mouse peacock monkey owl fish dolphin penguin frog. It is a fun and educational learning game for preschool children and toddlers including those with autism. Watch them learn all the names of numerous pet farm jungle zoo and water animals through fun and play. A pleasant voice will always encourage and praise your kids and motivate them to continue to build their vocabulary memory and cognitive skills while playing. The game is enriched with animations pronunciations sounds and interactivity for repeat playing & learning. It will keep your kids busy and yet you will never be worried about them losing any piece of the puzzles! Features: Simple & intuitive child-friendly interface Universal app for all phones and tablets 27 different languages and pronunciations - English Arabic Chinese Danish Dutch Filipino Finnish French German Greek Hindi Indonesian Italian Japanese Korean Macedonian Malay Norwegian Polish Portuguese Russian Serbian Spanish Thai Turkish Ukrainian and Vietnamese. Hundreds of puzzle pieces in 84 different puzzles Easy navigation between puzzles Easy movement of puzzle pieces across screen High-quality graphics Sweet background music Drag & drop animations Balloon animation & happy cheering after each correctly solved puzzle The theme of this Puzzle is ‘Animals’ check our other apps for more themes like 'Food' 'Kitchen' 'Furniture' 'Bathroom' 'Cars' and 'Tools' And last but not least ***All puzzles are available for FREE*** Privacy Disclosure: As parents ourselves iAbuzz takes children's wellness and privacy very seriously. Our app: • Does not contain links to social networks • Does not contain any in-app purchases • Does not collect personal data But yes it does contain advertising as that’s our means of providing the app free of cost to you – the ads are carefully placed such that the kid is least likely to click on it while playing. Feedback Please: If you have any feedback and suggestions on how we could further improve the design and interaction of our apps and games please visit our website http://iabuzz.com/ or leave us a message at kids@iabuzz.com . We would be glad to hear from you as we are committed to update all of our apps and games on a regular basis with new features and also want to get some ideas for future app development.

title: Astro Boy Dash
author: Animoca
description: The world's favorite robot boy wonder in his own mobile app to celebrate 50 years of Astro Boy Animation! Join Mighty Atom the Astro Boy and his cute robot sister Uran in Astro Boy Dash an action-packed running game that will push your speed and reflexes to the limit. Based on the famous Astro Boy and Astro Girl manga and anime characters created by Osamu Tezuka. To ensure Atom's safety and optimal functionality Prof. Ochanomizu conducts daily lectures to teach Atom about his robotic body’s advanced capabilities. But Atom is bored of this daily routine so he decides to run away from the lab and experience the world on his own. Take control of Astro Boy as he makes a mad dash through the streets and skies of the metropolis. Collect coins to spend on power-ups and valuable robotic upgrades that will help Astro Boy escape Prof. Ochanomizu's boring lectures! How to Play: Steer left and right by tilting your device Swipe the screen upward to jump Swipe the screen downward to slide Features: - The world's favorite robotic boy in an epic action running game - Based on the Astro Boy manga and anime characters by Osamu Tezuka - Beautiful 3D graphics and futuristic art style - Play as Atom the mighty Astro Boy or Uran the Astro Girl - Seamless day and night transition - Endless running! Survive as long as you can! - Highly responsive and intuitive controls - Unlock and purchase different costumes - Pick up coins to purchase equipment and power-ups - Connect your game to Google+ and Facebook to gain access to the Public Leaderboard - Compete with friends and share your in-game achievements **Astroboy Dash supports both mobile phones and tablets** ** Please note that while the app is free please be aware that it contains paid content for real money that can be purchased upon users' wish to enhance their gaming experience.You may control in-app purchases made within this app using password protection which can be enabled from the setting page of the Google Play Store app. **

title: The Owl And The Pussycat
author: Saturday Buffet
description: The Owl and the Pussy-cat are in love and on an adventure across the sea! This wonderful storybook app combines Edward Lear’s timeless children’s poem with colorful illustrations and music to make a fun interactive experience for kids of all ages. STORY If your child has never heard Edward Lear’s classic nonsense poetry then this is the place to start! “The Owl And The Pussy-cat” is a fun poem that tells the story of two animals in love. The poem begins as they sail across the sea in a boat. The Owl sings a love song to the Pussy-cat and they decide to get married. They soon buy a ring from a “Piggy-wig” (a pig) they meet in the woods. They are then married by a Turkey and the story ends as the Owl and the Pussy-cat dance together by moonlight :) FEATURES ★ Full voice-over narration performed by a professional actress. ★ “Read To Me” and “Read Myself” options to experience the story with or without narration. ★ Bright & colorful hand-drawn illustrations with lots of animation. ★ Highlighted touch elements to make the app easy-to-use for young children. ★ Original music and musical sound effects. ★ A “For Parents” page with suggested questions and activities for children to encourage creative thinking. PRIVACY POLICY --This app does not send us your personal data. --This app does not contain advertisements. --This app does not contain in-app purchases. --This app does not contain social features such as links with Facebook or Twitter. --This app does not track your location. CORKY PORTWINE APPS Corky Portwine is a Los Angeles-based developer of apps for children. We believe art poetry and music are fundamental to childhood development. We are a proud member of Parents With Apps and the Application Developers Alliance. “The Owl and the Pussycat” is the second app in our series featuring classic children’s poetry. Check out our first Edward Lear app “The Courtship of the Yonghy-Bonghy-Bo” available now! See more of our stuff at http://corkyportwine.com !

title: Мыльные Пузыри Премиум Фиксики
author: Thematic Media GmbH
description: Представляем вашему вниманию премиум версию одной из самых популярных игр Фиксиклуба - Мыльные Пузыри. По экрану быстро разлетаются мыльные пузыри. Нужно успеть прикоснуться к каждому пузырьку так чтобы он лопнул. Погоня за летучими пузырями помогает малышам развить внимательность и скорость реакции а взрослым – отдохнуть и расслабиться. А разобраться с правилами и узнать маленькие секреты помогут любимые мультипликационные герои – фиксики! В премиум версии добавляются новые уровни усложняются задания и ... в прочем вы сами все узнаете! Мобильная версия популярной игры портала Фиксиклуб - www.fixiclub.ru Игровой портал «Фиксиклуб» - это обучающая и безопасная среда для ваших детей. На портале www.fixiclub.ru вы всегда сможете найти то что полезно и интересно вашему ребенку. Все игры разработаны для развития важнейших навыков и умений которые пригодятся не только в школе но и в жизни! Фиксиклуб позаботился о том чтобы ваши дети не заскучали за процессом обучения и разработали десятки игр по разным дисциплинам. Но и конечно не нужно забывать об отдыхе для этого у фиксиков припасено несколько отличных развлекательных игр. Не все же время учиться можно и на фиксиборде полетать или пузыри полопать! В Фиксиклубе играя под руководством фиксиков дети знакомятся с буквами и цифрами тренируют память внимание логику сообразительность; развивают мелкую моторику и координацию движений. Каждый месяц в Фиксиклубе появляются новые игры: дети играют фиксики учат родители отдыхают!

title: Baby Animals
author: Azaotl
description: Enjoy watching pictures of baby animals with a funny wobbly effect. Now includes a memory game you will see a set of 4 pictures for some seconds. Then they dissapear and you will have to find one of them You have 2 lives! Easy and good to play with your kids to promote memory retention. In the gallery the effect of the jumping animals can be modified. Really good for having your children busy. There are some settings that have really cool results for example: Big Pictures: Spring: 0.45 Inertia: 0.363 Big jumping Picture: Spring: 0.45 Inertia: 0.6087 No jumping picture: Spring: 0.909 Inertia: 0.09 And you can experiment yourself

title: Pop Happy
author: Ablyvion Games
description: Simple entertainment for young minds! A cascade of colorful smileys falls down when same color smiles touch each other they grow! Grow large enough and they pop! Turn the device side to side and watch the smiles tumble around. You can also touch a smiley and it will pop! No in game advertising No in-app purchases. No levels or scoring. Just fun to dance and play along with. Song Credits: Title: Colorful Spots Artist: Nicolai Heidlas

title: Jake's Pirate School
author: Disney Publishing Worldwide
description: Ahoy and welcome to Pirate School Matey! Join Jake and crew for four fun-filled pirate themed classes and earn Badges of Honor and an Official Never Land Pirate Certificate. Classes include: Sailing Sail Bucky and Jake around obstacles and use Bucky’s gadgets to collect barrels fruit and to shoot beach balls to whales and dolphins. Pirate Band Learn to play five different instruments and make a pirate song with Bones and Sharky. Map & Spyglass Navigate Never Land with Cubby and then use the spyglass to find exciting treasures with Jake! Pixie Dust Fly through mazes with Izzy and Skully and trace shapes to scare away Captain Hook cutouts blocking your way. Features •Characters and locations from the Jake and the Never Land Pirates TV show. •Create a pirate! Capture or import a photo of your child's face into the game! •Pirate School Captain's Log tracks class levels completed and Badges of Honor earned. Designed for ages: 3 and up Terms of Use: http://disneytermsofuse.com/

title: Troll i ord - Reven
author: GROM as
description: I det somaliske eventyret om krokodillen som mistet tungen sin møter vi reven som må låne seg en tunge for å lage bryllupslyd. Krokodillen er snill og hjelpsom men reven er lur og upålitelig. Her får vi vite hvorfor reven ikke går til elva for å drikke vann og hvorfor krokodillen ikke har tunge. Barna kan lytte til eventyret bla fra side til side og få estetiske og språklige opplevelser gjennom interaksjon med eventyret. Gjennom hele fortellingen kan de veksle mellom språkene. Materiellet passer særlig godt for barn i alderen 2 til 7 år og egner seg godt i barnegrupper der flere språk er representert. Når barna kan forstå og oppleve eventyret på norsk og andre morsmål kan man skape en felles referanseramme for videre lek og målrettet arbeid. Slik styrkes barnas språkkompetanse samtidig som eventyrets fiksjon fremmer fantasi og kreativitet. Gjennom Troll i ords eventyrunivers møter barna kjente norske folkeeventyr og eventyr med opprinnelse fra andre deler av verden. Troll i ord leker og språkverktøy er utviklet for hjem barnehage og skole i samarbeid med språkforsker Margareth Sandvik og designere pedagoger og utviklere i GROM as. Mange fantastiske skuespillere og fortellere formidler eventyrene. Les mer om personene bak fortellerstemmene våre på grom.no/trolliord.

title: Mattel Fun with Puzzles
author: Mattel
description: Mattel Fun with Puzzles is filled with tons of puzzles featuring your favorite Mattel brands: BARBIE MONSTER HIGH and HOT WHEELS. This is puzzle fun for all ages! Enjoy hours of endless puzzle solving with our unique “Puzzle Piece Randomizer” that provides a new and different puzzle experience each time you play! The app comes with one free puzzle for each brand. Additional puzzle packs featuring your favorite brands are available for in app purchase with a grownup's permission. EXCITING FEATURES: • Puzzle Piece Randomizer: Provides a new and different puzzle experience each time you play! • 3 Brands to Choose From: Barbie Monster High and Hot Wheels! • Each puzzle pack includes 10+ unique puzzles with three levels of difficulty • A built-in timer system challenges players to finish all the puzzles and then come back again to beat their best time

title: Kids' Puzzles
author: About Fun
description: Kids favourite jigsaw puzzle game finally on Android! Jigsaw puzzles with beautiful original hand-made cartoon pictures in various puzzle sets (e.g. Fairy Tales Dragons Pirates Holiday Farm Winter Family Dogs Dinosaurs). Kids love this puzzle game! PLAY THE BEST KIDS JIGSAW PUZZLE GAME NOW! Kids Jigsaw Puzzles is a fun jigsaw puzzle game intended mainly for kids from 3 to 9 but is suitable for anyone from 0 to 100+ years. Almost everyone knows the goal of this puzzle game you have to put together puzzle pieces to reveal the picture. Your kids can choose from multiple sets of pictures. Each picture puzzle set contains ten or more pictures each in several difficulty levels (even for toddlers smallest kids and teens) Download the application with one set of 28 pictures for free and get the other puzzle sets for only $0.99 (for 10+) or $1.99 (for 20+) or 2.99$ (for 30+). Your children will love it and love you even more! Game saves progress of each and every puzzle your unfinished puzzle will be never lost. Your kids can stop and continue anytime. MAIN FEATURES: * contains one full puzzle set with 28 free pictures (Animals) * other puzzle sets containing 350+ amazing pictures are available for purchase: Underwater Fairy Tales Dragons Pirates Holiday Farm Winter Christmas Safari Easter Family Dinosaurs Summer Dogs Ghosts Sport Fall * each puzzle set contains 10 or more hand crafted beautiful puzzle pieces to solve * works perfectly on all Android tablets and phones COMPLETE LIST OF ALL JIGSAW PUZZLE SETS: * Animals puzzle set (28 pictures completely for free) * Fairy tales puzzle set * Underwater puzzle set * Dogs puzzle set * Family puzzle set * Sport puzzle set * Ghosts puzzle set * Winter puzzle set * Farm puzzle set * Dragons puzzle set * Safari puzzle set * Pirates puzzle set * Holiday puzzle set * Dinosaurs puzzle set * Easter puzzle set * Fall puzzle set * Summer puzzle set * Christmas puzzle set * Bonus puzzle set (hidden 35+ extra pictures uncovered by solving puzzles in all picture sets above) The one of the most downloaded kids educational apps Kids Puzzles full of delightful original images. Once kids complete the puzzle the game congratulates the child on an excellent job and gives the child a small yellow star. Children enjoy success time after time and receive positive reinforcement. So they want to keep learning and playing. Kids Puzzles helps children build and practice cognitive skills visual spatial skills shape recognition as well as tactile and fine motor skills. The game does not overload children and parents with too many visual and audio stimuli. Coping with stress and over-stimulation is therefore one skill that your kids won't be practicing during this game. Its clear focus makes the game a delight for children and a winning choice for parents. You will find just the right balance between education and fun. We don't feature fun at the expense of education – or education at the expense of fun. We also know that many games are too complicated and don’t involve and delight kids. WE WOULD LOVE YOUR FEEDBACK! Your five-star reviews/ratings are very important to us and they’ll help us bring you free updates with more great features and exciting new games! Please contact us if you experience any problems or if you would like to share your ideas with us on how to further improve the game. Have fun with this jigsaw puzzle game for kids!

title: 끼익끼익의 아주 중대한 임무 하편
author: PUBLSTUDIO
description: 눈을 감고 가만히 귀를 기울이면 우리들의 끼익끼익 비명이 들릴 거야. 도시에 사는 작고 투명한 소리 요정 '끼익끼익'. 책으로 출시되었던 '끼익끼익의 아주 중대한 임무' 의 인터랙티브 앱북 출시! 끼익끼익들은 널빤지나 나사못이나 철판 같이 혼자서는 아무 소리도 내지 못하는 것들을 대신해서 '끼익끼익 비명'을 질러 주는 아주 중요한 임무를 맡고 있어요. 연작소설 '타워'와 소설집 '안녕 인공존재!'로 화제가 된 작가 배명훈작가의 창작동화 '끼익끼익의 아주 중대한 임무'가 인터랙티브 앱북으로 출시 되었습니다. 이 이야기는 2010년 작가가 터키의 이스탄불을 여행하던 도중 트램 연결고리에서 들려오는 끼익끼익 소리를 듣고 도시를 가득채우고 있는 소리의 목록을 수첩에 적으면서 시작되었습니다. 본 앱북은 다양한 인터랙션 조화롭고 따뜻한 감성의 일러스트 그리고 오리지널 사운드 트랙으로 제작되어 아이들뿐만이 아닌 어른들에게도 상상력을 자극하고 재미와 감동을 더 합니다. 미술을 전공하고 현재 게임 회사에서 디자인을 하고 있는 화가 이병량의 아빠가 딸에게 들려주는 이야기라는 문체의 특성을 '아빠의 오래된 일기장' 으로 컨셉화한 조화롭고 따뜻한 감성의 일러스트는 그림책이라고도 할 수 있을 정도로 앱북 내 풍부한 삽화를 보여줍니다. 아이부터 어른까지 모두 즐기실 수 있는 '끼익끼익의 아주 중대한 임무' 지금 바로 끼익끼익을 만나보세요. ---- 개발자 연락처 : #c6 smart contents center G.square 18F 1039 Hogye-dong Dong an-gu Anyang-city Gyeong gi-do 431-080 Korea

title: 384 Puzzles for Preschool Kids
author: Abuzz
description: After the huge success of our puzzle games and 1000+ positive reviews from parents we got busy and made an extra large mega jumbo giant pack of all the "Puzzle 4 Kids" games this time with NO ADS. That's right now you can have a bundle of 180+204 puzzles that cover Animals Food Bathroom Kitchen Furniture Cars and Tools ALL-IN-ONE for a small cost of $1.99 and you have 35 objects to try out for free first. Warning: We're talking about hours of exciting & educational puzzle time! Your toddlers and preschoolers will build their vocabulary memory and cognitive skills while playing with this high-quality designed animation-rich localized puzzle pack. Features: Simple & intuitive child-friendly interface 27 different languages and pronunciations - English Arabic Chinese Danish Dutch Filipino Finnish French German Greek Hindi Indonesian Italian Japanese Korean Macedonian Malay Norwegian Polish Portuguese Russian Serbian Spanish Thai Turkish Ukrainian and Vietnamese. 8 Puzzle themes with thousands of puzzle pieces in 180+204 different puzzles Easy movement of puzzle pieces across screen to match High-quality and cute graphics and pictures Sweet background melodies and tunes Easy drag & drop animations Bonus balloon-pop game & happy cheering after each correctly solved puzzle Learning first words and pronunciations while playing Themes: Animals - Our most popular puzzle of all 50 silly animals to play with – horse cow pig sheep duck chicken donkey dog cat rabbit bee butterfly mouse peacock monkey owl fish dolphin penguin frog panda giraffe lion tiger elephant bear camel tortoise crocodile and zebra. Food - You'll find Tasty fruits Yummy vegetables and everything you can eat for breakfast bundled up in this "delicious" puzzle Bathroom - It's time to take a Bath. Your kid will learn numerous pronunciations from his favorite bath toy- the rubber duck to the loud washing machine that makes everyone's clothes clean Kitchen - Someone wants to help while mommy is making lunch or baking cookies well why not play with our Kitchen puzzle instead while mum is busy Furniture - All that furniture you need to remember it can get pretty difficult for your little ones this puzzle can help them memorize all the things around the home through fun and play Cars - Who's for a ride? You'll find 30 different vehicles and transportation means in this amazing puzzle. You think your boys know all of them? Think again :) Tools - This is a puzzle to play with dad be a little handyman and learn all the names of tools used around the house. If you have any feedback and suggestions on how we could further improve the design and interaction of our apps and games please visit our website http://iabuzz.com/ or leave us a message at kids@iabuzz.com .

title: Aufregung im Affengehege.
author: b-interaktive
description: Ein interaktives Kinderbuch mit Spiel- und Lesespaß für Groß und Klein. Was ist nur bei den Affen los? Sind Alfons und Alina etwa krank? Da schaut Benjamin am besten gleich mal nach. Erlebe die aufregenden Abenteuer zusammen mit Benjamin Blümchen aus dem Neustädter Zoo. Du kannst dabei entweder dem professionellen Sprecher zuhören oder die Stimme deiner Eltern aufnehmen. Zudem gibt es auf jeder Seite interaktive Inhalte zu entdecken. Erforsche die Seite mit deinem Finger ganz genau; probiere es einfach aus! Alle Geschichten sind auch im Buchhandel erhältlich. Highlights der App: - Pädagogisch wertvoll - Lernspaß mit den beliebten Elefanten - Liebevolle Illustrationen und Animationen - Interaktive Elemente zum Entdecken auf jeder Buchseite - Vorlesefunktion mit den originalen Sprecherstimmen Join us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/binteraktive

title: Kids Draw Maze Labyrinth
author: Dave Bollinger
description: Crayon Maze is a skill building maze game and letter maze tracing game designed for primarily for toddlers preschool and kindergarten children but fun for kids of all ages. Younger children will enjoy learning their ABC's with the very easy alphabet mazes and number mazes that are "trace" puzzle mazes intended to aid letter recognition and exercise writing skills. Older kids will enjoy a wide selection of more difficult mazes. (Including a few that might even challenge their parents!) 180 hand crafted letter mazes number mazes shape mazes geometric mazes picture mazes and other custom maze puzzles in 6 difficulty levels for kids of every age. An endless supply of random mazes in 4 difficulty levels. Kid friendly: Simple logical gameplay that a toddler can master. A "no reading required" interface. Attractive rewards familiar three star unlock and high score system to encourage repeat play and improvement merit badges "star pop" mini-game when stars earned. Stars are awarded as an incentive for solving mazes quickly and to encourage repeat play and trace skill improvement but are not required to progress. Younger kids working on a letter maze or number maze need not achieve stars while older kids and adults working on a harder maze can challenge themselves to earn the highest reward. 4 themes: Crayon on paper: default high-contrast daylight Chalk on blackboard: reversed-contrast nighttime Pencil on graph paper: reduced-contrast for sensitive eyes Chalk on greenboard: medium contrast general purpose HD graphics for tablets and larger phones. Two control modes available simultaneously or individually: "drag" (better for larger devices) and "pull" (better for smaller devices). No in-app purchases or social media. Like us on facebook for news/updates: http://www.facebook.com/CrayonMaze

title: BheemandGaneshaActionComic
author: Green Gold Animation
description: Chhota Bheem is India's number one animated character with a following of 35 million viewers. This action comic is based on the movie Chhota Bheem and Ganesha. The comic is a mix of text voiceovers and nice images. The comic is real fun for all kids and Chhota Bheem fans and comes in two modes: "READ ALONE" and "READ TO ME". In the "READ TO ME" option a voiceover reads the comic to you. Enjoy the comic.

title: Birds: Puzzle Games for kids
author: Tiltan Games
description: *** Birds Puzzle is a wonderful game for kids and toddlers *** Explore 36 puzzles! Jigsaw and Shuffle Puzzles Paint and record your voice. Select the level of difficulty fit for your kids! Aimed for kids in the ages 1-8 Birds Puzzle features: * Play through of 36 Unique puzzles. * Two types of puzzles: Jigsaw and Shuffle * Paint & Save your kids drawings. * Record and play their voice. * Wide range of difficulty levels - from 2 pieces for starters to 30 pieces for preschool kids and first graders! * Easy to learn and control even for small kids * Funny and Lovable animals beautifully drawn in vivid HD Graphics * Interactive animals sound effects Positive and pleasant feedback. * Multiple side games for in between puzzle solving - pop balloons or bubbles or just play with your farm animals. * Control the game music and sound effects from the settings menu * Additional settings allow several options to modify puzzles difficulty level and to reset your kid farm to the begining. * Kids safe menu buttons to prevent accidental entry to parent related pages Birds Puzzle is a lovely game for all ages. Kids will improve their skills while having fun! Our educational games are specifically tailored to fit preschool-aged kids and encourage them to learn from each activity. We specialize in fun educational games. -------------------------------------------------- KNOW WHAT'S INSIDE As a MOMs with Apps member we follow the "Know what's inside" best practices for kids' apps -------------------------------------------------- Birds Puzzle does NOT have ads Birds Puzzle does NOT have social links Birds Puzzle contains a single In App Purchase to unlock all activities and puzzles. Thanks for your support! Tiltan Games Team http://www.tiltangames.com

title: Game of Clowns FREE
author: Grogan
description: Roll up roll up the circus is coming! Those crazy clowns have enlisted you to help them put on the greatest show on Earth in this fun physics puzzle game for all ages! Put up a platform place a trampoline spray a clown with bubbles and put on a show in this clown filled physics- based puzzle contraption game! Game of Clowns includes: * This FREE lite version gives you over 25 levels of clown-based physics fun * bonus levels * cannons * trampolines * clowns * circus balls * barrels of water * a zany fun circus soundtrack * gorgeous cartoon graphics * increasingly challenging physics puzzles * ...and lots more This crazy game is circus fun for all the family! Watch the clowns roll around bounce on trampolines drive tiny cars and shoot each other out of cannons to solve increasingly challenging puzzles. Game of Clowns has the 'easy to learn difficult to master' gameplay that will challenge and delight you for hours on end. The realistic physics will amaze and delight as you solve each level with ingenious use of balloons cannons rolling clowns the bubble-spraying clown giant clown shoes platforms balls trampolines and more! Can you collect 3 stars on each level and earn all the achievements? What are you waiting for? Be a clown! Build contraptions! This game will amaze you with it's clown-based fun and novelty amusement for all the family! One reviewer says: "It's awesome! It's just like Rovio's Amazing Alex but with clowns! It's 'Amazing Clowns'!" If you like games like Amazing Alex Bad Piggies and Clowning Around you're sure to love the physics-based fun of Game of Clowns! The circus is coming!

title: Hotel Transylvania 2 Story App
author: Cupcake Digital Inc.
description: In theatres now! Drac's pack is back in this brand new narrated storybook app based on the new film Hotel Transylvania 2!! Follow Dracula Frank Murray Wayne Griffin Blobby Johnny Mavis and Drac’s vampson Dennis in an all-new monster comedy adventure. The storybook features genuine character audio and vivid images from the movie! Dracula has opened the Hotel Transylvania’s doors to humans for the first time and things are changing fast–for the better. However he’s secretly worried that his half-human grandson Dennis doesn’t have a vampire side. So while Mavis and Johnny are away he enlists his monster friends to help him put the boy through a “monster-in-training” boot camp. Things get really zany really fast in this fun follow up to the first movie. In addition to the narrated story kids can create their own Hotel Transylvania 2 art with a digital coloring book featuring scenes characters props and stickers directly from the movie. Features - Storybook featuring read-along narration and highlighted words that can be turned off to read on your own. - Coloring pages featuring your favorite characters from the movie all sorts of painting options and stickers! - Genuine character audio from the movie–hear the Drac Pack’s actual voices from the movie! - Includes real images from the movie! This app contains gated areas to ensure that only adults can access anything that would take you outside of the app. This app may also contain advertising about other apps from Cupcake Digital. Cupcake Digital collects user data in accordance with applicable law such as COPPA. User data may be used to enable users to take advantage of certain features and services; personalize content; and manage and improve the app. To view our app privacy policy please visit: www.cupcakedigital.com/appsprivacy We always welcome your questions and suggestions contact us any time at www.cupcakedigital.com/about/contact.

title: Animal Car Puzzles
author: Tiltan Games
description: Animal Car Puzzles for Kids Free - Play Jigsaw Puzzles and Paint Race car Air Plane Truck & Boat with Funny Lion Bear & Cat - for Preschool Kids and Toddler *** Animal Car Puzzle is a wonderful game for kids and toddlers *** Explore 36 puzzles! Jigsaw and Shuffle Puzzles Paint and record your voice. Select the level of difficulty fit for your kids! Aimed for kids in the ages 1-8 Animal Car Puzzle features: * Play through of 36 Unique puzzles. * Two types of puzzles: Jigsaw and Shuffle * Paint & Save your kids drawings. * Record and play their voice. * Wide range of difficulty levels - from 2 pieces for starters to 30 pieces for preschool kids and first graders! * Easy to learn and control even for small kids * Funny and Lovable animals beautifully drawn in vivid HD Graphics * Interactive animals sound effects Positive and pleasant feedback. * Multiple side games for in between puzzle solving - pop balloons or bubbles or just play with your farm animals. * Control the game music and sound effects from the settings menu * Additional settings allow several options to modify puzzles difficulty level and to reset your kid farm to the begining. * Kids safe menu buttons to prevent accidental entry to parent related pages Animal Car Puzzle is a lovely game for all ages. Kids will improve their skills while having fun! Our educational games are specifically tailored to fit preschool-aged kids and encourage them to learn from each activity. We specialize in fun educational games. ––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––– KNOW WHAT'S INSIDE As a MOMs with Apps member we follow the "Know what's inside" best practices for kids’ apps ––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––– Animal Car Puzzle does NOT have ads Animal Car Puzzle does NOT have social links Thanks for your support! Tiltan Games Team http://www.tiltangames.com/

title: Foggy's Big Fright
author: Loud Crow Interactive Inc.
description: Discover a magical world of handcrafted puppetry brought to life in Windy & friends. This unique and wonderful story experience combines stop-motion animation with touch interactivity that will captivate children and the young-at-heart. In this spooky appisode we are invited to join Windy and her friends as they celebrate Halloween! Dress Foggy in the perfect costume and go trick-or-treating for candy. Help Windy decorate her party and spot the silly costumes of her friends. Set off colorful fire works and light the lanterns. With plenty of hidden surprises there is much to see and do! Learning Outcome: Sometimes we feel afraid or anxious but in "Foggy's Big Fright" we learn to acknowledge these feelings and show empathy and kindness. Bonus games promote word association in English and French as well as early spelling skills. App Features * Groundbreaking mix of handcrafted stop-motion animation with innovative interaction and cinematics * Touch tilt and drag the screen to explore the world of Windy & friends * Original music narration and sound effects * Three reading modes included for your enjoyment: Read to Me Read Myself and Autoplay * Language support in English and French; toggle languages on-the-fly * Visual Word Map promotes word association in both languages * Word Game trains early readers learn to sort and match letters and spell simple Halloween words * “Parents only" area safely separates adult controls from child-friendly content Visit www.windyandfriends.com for DIY craft activities original music and even more Windy & Friends! Visit us: www.loudcrow.com Follow us: twitter.com/loudcrowinc Like us: facebook.com/loudcrow

title: Chhota Bheem & Jumbo Comic
author: Green Gold Animation
description: Chhota Bheem is India's number one animated character with a following of 35 million viewers. This action comic is based on the TV show Chhota Bheem in Haathi Bheem Ka Saathi. The comic is a mix of text voiceovers and nice images. The comic is real fun for all kids and Chhota Bheem fans and comes in two modes: "READ ALONE" and "READ TO ME". In the "READ TO ME" option a voiceover reads the comic to you. Enjoy the comic.

title: Magic Realm Puzzles for kids
author: Tiltan Games
description: * Magic Realm Puzzles is a wonderful puzzle game for kids and toddlers * Play 24 amazing puzzles. Meet heroes and wonderous creatures battling dangerous beasts! Select the level of difficulty fit for your kids! Aimed for kids in the ages 1-8 Magic Realm Puzzles features: * Play through of 24 Unique puzzles. * Wide range of difficulty levels - from 2 pieces for starters to 30 pieces for preschool kids and first graders! * Easy to learn and control even for small kids * Funny and Lovable vehicles beautifully drawn in vivid HD Graphics * Interactive vehicles sound effects Positive and pleasant feedback. * Multiple side games for in between puzzle solving - pop balloons or bubbles. * Control the game music and sound effects from the settings menu * Additional settings allow several options to modify puzzles difficulty level. * Kids safe menu buttons to prevent accidental entry to parent related pages Magic Realm Puzzles is a lovely puzzle game for all ages. Kids will improve their skills while having fun! Our educational games are specifically tailored to fit preschool-aged kids and encourage them to learn from each activity. We specialize in fun educational games. ––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––– KNOW WHAT'S INSIDE As a MOMs with Apps member we follow the "Know what's inside" best practices for kids’ apps ––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––– Magic Realm Puzzles does not contain ads. Magic Realm Puzzles does not have social links Magic Realm Puzzles contains a single In-App-Purchase to unlock all puzzles. The first 3 puzzles are open for free. If you like this game and would like to purchase the rest of the puzzles you can unlock the rest of the puzzles by tapping one of the locked puzzles. Thanks for your support! *** How to play? *** On the puzzle selection page you can choose from 24 unique puzzles. Pick one to begin play. On the puzzle board you can take pieces from the left pane and drag them to their correct location on the puzzle board until the puzzle is complete. Once the child completes the puzzle balloons or bubbles will show! *** How The Puzzles work? *** In each puzzle children will have an outline of an image. Your child will then slide the puzzle piece into its assigned location. Once the kid gets a piece close enough to its target location the game assists the kid by snapping the piece into place. Every correct placement provides a colorful positive feedback to the kid amusement. Once kids complete the puzzle a pleasant voice congratulates the kids on a their great work. Tiltan Games (2013) LTD http://tiltangames.com

title: SwipeRun
author: hiroyuki eguchi
description: Move the character by swiping and avoid avoid avoid all the obstacles!! There are more than 15 sorts of unique characters. Run and collect money to have more characters. ## How to play Move the running character by swiping so that it won't hit the obstacles. ## Rules If the character hits obstacle it's game over. The more you run the more difficult it'll become. There are more than 15 sorts of characters!! Run more and collect all the characters!

title: 끼익끼익의 아주 중대한 임무 상편
author: PUBLSTUDIO
description: 눈을 감고 가만히 귀를 기울이면 우리들의 끼익끼익 비명이 들릴 거야. 도시에 사는 작고 투명한 소리 요정 '끼익끼익'. 책으로 출시되었던 '끼익끼익의 아주 중대한 임무' 의 인터랙티브 앱북 출시! 끼익끼익들은 널빤지나 나사못이나 철판 같이 혼자서는 아무 소리도 내지 못하는 것들을 대신해서 '끼익끼익 비명'을 질러 주는 아주 중요한 임무를 맡고 있어요. 연작소설 '타워'와 소설집 '안녕 인공존재!'로 화제가 된 작가 배명훈작가의 창작동화 '끼익끼익의 아주 중대한 임무'가 인터랙티브 앱북으로 출시 되었습니다. 이 이야기는 2010년 작가가 터키의 이스탄불을 여행하던 도중 트램 연결고리에서 들려오는 끼익끼익 소리를 듣고 도시를 가득채우고 있는 소리의 목록을 수첩에 적으면서 시작되었습니다. 본 앱북은 다양한 인터랙션 조화롭고 따뜻한 감성의 일러스트 그리고 오리지널 사운드 트랙으로 제작되어 아이들뿐만이 아닌 어른들에게도 상상력을 자극하고 재미와 감동을 더 합니다. 미술을 전공하고 현재 게임 회사에서 디자인을 하고 있는 화가 이병량의 아빠가 딸에게 들려주는 이야기라는 문체의 특성을 '아빠의 오래된 일기장' 으로 컨셉화한 조화롭고 따뜻한 감성의 일러스트는 그림책이라고도 할 수 있을 정도로 앱북 내 풍부한 삽화를 보여줍니다. 아이부터 어른까지 모두 즐기실 수 있는 '끼익끼익의 아주 중대한 임무' 지금 바로 끼익끼익을 만나보세요. ---- 개발자 연락처 : #c6 smart contents center G.square 18F 1039 Hogye-dong Dong an-gu Anyang-city Gyeong gi-do 431-080 Korea

title: Olaf's Adventures
author: Disney Publishing Worldwide
description: Now you can save Anna's Birthday cake from a parade of hungry snowgies in the all-new "Frozen Fever" game in Olaf's Adventures! And then adventure through Winter Spring and Summer Frozen fun as you skate fly play ice hockey beach dodge ball discover countless hidden treasures and more! FEATURES • New 'Save Anna's Cake Snowgies game! • 2 all-new silly ice-skating adventure games: Ice Hockey and Ice Skating. • Explore and discover hilarious new hidden tappables throughout your ice-skating spree: find hidden snowflakes go ice fishing and sledding make snow angels blow bubbles and much more! • Try your hand at Beach Dodge Ball and Sandman Shuffle in Summer the Avalanche Game and Snowball Fight in Winter and the Fruit Fight and Snowman Shuffle games in Spring! • All-new loveable original comedy and voice work of actor Josh Gad from the feature film! Before you download this experience please consider that this app contains in-app purchases that cost real money as well as advertising for the Walt Disney Family of Companies. If you're experiencing difficulties with audio please check the audio settings within your device to see if your device is muted. Don't hesitate to contact customer care at 877-662-3769 or memberservices@disneydigitalbooks.com . ***

title: Kids Learn about Music
author: Intellijoy
description: Kids Learn about Music is your young child's gateway into music. This simple and fun app will introduce children to the basics of the keyboard music notes instruments styles and more! Each activity offers options to learn and play. Kids are motivated to continue playing as they earn rewards. 1. Play Piano - Children will tap on keys to hear their sounds select songs and see their notes and follow a guide to play a song. 2. Notes - Kids will discover the names and placement on the staff. 3. Keys - This fun activity will help your young ones become familiar with the concept of major and minor keys. 4. Instruments - Children will learn to identify the sounds of 10 popular instruments! 5. Genres - Kids will learn to tell the difference between 12 genres of music - from waltz to rock n' roll! This full version includes 5 additional melodies for the Piano activity and the Play mode for the last two activities (as opposed to Learn mode only).

title: Western Gunfight Challenge
author: Magnin & Associates
description: The excitement of western style gunfighting and target practice on your Android. Turn and tilt your device to line it up your gun with the target. Then tap the screen to fire. Seven challenging levels with stationary and moving targets single and double skeet shooting and western style duels against three bad guys. Optionally shares your accomplishments with Facebook Twitter Weibo email or instant messaging. Universal App - supports iPhone iPod Touch and iPad including standard Retina and iPhone 5 displays.

title: Scribblenauts Remix
author: Warner Bros. International Enterprises
description: THINK IT! CREATE IT! SOLVE IT! The award-winning best-selling video game is now available for Android tablets and phones! Help Maxwell acquire the Starite by creating any object bringing it to life and using it to solve each challenge. Let your imagination run wild in this groundbreaking puzzle game. Summon to life a ‘colossal winged car’ or a ‘shy frost-breathing robotic hippopotamus’! If you can think it you can create it. It’s the perfect game for the casual player looking for fun and extensive replay with unlimited solutions and different outcomes. Or the Scribblenauts fan wanting the complete Maxwell experience. Whether you’re 8 or 80 the only limit is your imagination! ============================================================================ And the critics love it! > “Editors’ Choice Award” – IGN.com > “A work of utter genius.” – Touch Arcade > “A brilliant game.” – Wired.com > “4/4 Stars. A highly recommended puzzle game for all ages.” – USA Today ============================================================================ FEATURES: CLASSIC GAMEPLAY 50 levels to play! Includes 40 of the most popular levels from Scribblenauts and Super Scribblenauts and 10 original levels exclusive to Remix. WORLD PASS Purchase a World Pass and receive all current and future world expansions - 40 extra levels and counting! If you previously purchased a world expansion you’re automatically upgraded to a World Pass and all future worlds will now automatically appear in your game for free. PLAYABLE AVATARS Re-live Scribblenauts by playing as a different character from in the game. Try out the feature with the free God avatar! UNLIMITED FUN Enter the Playground to create objects to your heart’s content playing and interacting in a true sandbox! INNOVATIVE USER INTERFACE Use the “shake to undo” function to remove created objects simply by shaking your Android device. Create what you want and see what happens! Hang out with Maxwell! > VISIT Maxwell:: www.scribblenautsremix.com > LIKE Maxwell:: www.facebook.com/ScribblenautsVideoGame > FOLLOW Maxwell: http://twitter.com/ScribbleMaxwell

title: Clangers - Playtime Planet
author: StoryToys
description: Clangers - Playtime Planet is an adorable activity app for preschool children. Designed for tablets and mobile phones it features all the favorite characters from the TV show including Tiny Small Mother Major and Granny Clanger. Watch them come to life as you tap your way through a visually-stunning 3D world packed with charming animations and cute Clanger whistles. The initial app includes 5 games and activities each set in a different part of the Clanger’s little blue planet: • SKYMOO RIDE. Guide a Skymoo as it swoops over the Clanger planet avoiding moons and satellites and gobbling bubble flowers along the way. • EGGBOT SING-SONG. Help Tiny play 6 delightful tunes from the TV series by tapping on the singing Eggbots. • PEEKABOO CAVES. Tiny and Small are playing a game of hide and seek in the Sleeping Caves. Can you find them? • MYSTERY STARS. Help Small Clanger explore the stars swiping spinning constellation to reveal their hidden shape. • BOUNCING PEAS. Tiny and Small are having trouble collecting some very bouncy peas in their basket. Can you help? Another five games and activities are automatically included in a free update coming soon featuring Major’s workshop the Soup Dragon the Froglets and the Music Trees. Designed for preschoolers and Clangers fans of all ages the Clangers - Playtime Planet app is part of the StoryToys Jr. line. FEATURES • Intuitive child-friendly and easy to use • Stunning 3D world recreates the TV characters and sets • Charming animations • Professionally narrated • Soundtracks and sound effects from the TV show

title: Spell Words - Magical Learning
author: Ixora Studios Pte Ltd
description: ♦ ♦ ♦ ♦ ♦ ♦ ♦ Race against time and scramble to find new words and gain more powers and abilities in this exciting new word game! ♦ ♦ ♦ ♦ ♦ ♦ ♦ Collect the words that you found in your dictionary and learn find out what they mean. Connect letters to clear tiles! Make longer words for special bonus tiles or use any of five exciting power ups to scramble through more words and top your friends on the score ladders! Level your power-ups and unlock new exciting and improved abilities! Think that finding words should be shared with others? Help your friends in the weekly "Word Bounty" and find the word of the week for greater rewards! Spell Words is supported for Android Phones and tablet. Connect to your friends using Facebook!

title: Chili Crab - The Musical Notes
author: Plug and Boom
description: Chili Crab - The Musical Notes is a game created by artists and educators to teach kids in a fun and engaging way the names and the sequence of the musical notes as well as their positions on the note staff. The content is based on a methodology developed over more than 40 years at “Núcleo Villa-Lobos de Educação Musical” a renowned music school in the brazilian city of Belo Horizonte. The app contains three different games: 1 - Lead Note game By helping Chili Crab escape from Le Shark the sinister french shark your child will have a first contact with the names of the musical notes and their ascending (do - re - mi - fa - sol - la - si) and descending (do - si - la - sol - fa - mi - re) sequences. 2 - Neighbor Note game In this game the child will experience what have been learned about the notes sequence to help Chili Crab collect musical notes passing through the screen. The notes must be collected in a certain order that changes at each play but always according to the notes ascending and descending sequences. To make it even more fun the levels are full of collectable coins and power-ups to help the player. 3 - Musical Staff game This last game works just like the Neighbor Note game but now a staff of notes indicates to the child which note should be collected. In the last two levels of this game the names of the notes won’t even be displayed anymore and your little musician will naturally use the knowledge acquired during the previous levels to read the staff with minimum effort. CONTACT If you run into any problem with the app please send us an e-mail before writing a negative review. Our e-mail is contato@plugandboom.com.br (Don’t worry about it being a brazillian address. You can write us in english). We can’t reply to reviews (there is no way to do it) but we will be glad to answer your e-mails and help with any unexpected problem. PRIVACY As we are ourselves parents we take children’s wellness and privacy very seriously. Our application: - Does not contain ads. - Does not contain in-app-purchases. - Collect anonymous information about gameplay to help us calibrate the game difficulty and create a better experience for our tiny users. The game was developed thanks to INOVApps a brazilian initiative to stimulate the development of apps in the country.

title: Animal Sounds for Baby
author: Androbaby
description: - Animal Sounds for babies and kids! - Enjoy with high quality animal pictures and animal sounds. - Set your favorite animal sound as ringtone notification or alarm. - Kids will love the sweet animals and their sounds! Animal Sounds has two modes: - LIst all animals on the screen and listen you wish. Long press on selected animal to set as ringtone alarm or notification. - One animal on the screen with its big image and its name. Long press on image to set as ringtone alarm or notification. This app has great photos of various animals along with their sounds. Very cool and cute. Enjoy!

title: Dinokeeper
author: Spoke Inc.
description: Welcome to the fantasic world of dinosaurs! You are a Dinokeeper. Drive around a primitive island collect dino food and feed the friendly dinos. Don't forget to clean up after them! The Dinos are waiting for you to fill their big mouths! Features - Easy operation for kids. Recommended for ages 3 and up. - Six fanciful dinosaur figures. - Explore the primitive island terrain. A parental gate protects kids from: - Third-party advertising - In-app purchasing - Links to social networks - Personal data requests Kappi Digital Toy Apps: Our apps are intended for parents and kids to enjoy together.

title: What's Pixelated - word puzzle
author: Espace Software
description: Do you enjoy challenging and yet addictive and fun word games? "What's Pixelated?" is a brand new game concept from the award winning puzzle game developers bringing something fresh to the market for word puzzle lovers and fanatics. At the start the photograph is pixelated and you need to guess the picture based on the part of the picture that's shown. You'll need to look carefully at the pixelated picture to decide which parts of the photograph to expose as you only have a limited number of tiles that can be revealed. The less moves you make to reveal the picture the better! This quiz type game tests your guessing power and your vocabulary. You'll be forced to use your imagination every moment throughout the hundreds of images. Don't worry no adult content so it's a perfect brain teaser for everyone! Brush up on your lingo because the pictures will not always be the hard part. Wordsmiths come and show your crossover skills! There are enough pictures here to keep you playing for days! Graphics and the gameplay are sharp and we guarantee countless hours of nothing but fun! Earn points (virtual coins) while beating the levels with style and use the proceeds on a bunch of hints. They will help you when you get stuck and you will be! This game is free and you will not be bothered with ads (you can optionally purchase additional coins for more lifelines if you like). Play in your choice of any of the 16 built in languages: English French German Portuguese Italian Spanish Russian Greek Turkish Romanian Arabic Persian Danish Dutch Norwegian and Finnish. Join the phenomenon called "Whats Pixelated?" today and you will truly feel what its like to play a great puzzle game! Game Features: • Simple and familiar gameplay you know and love! • Unlimited Fun: Two hundred pictures to guess and more to come! • High quality images from professional photographers that look great on High Definition (HD) and retina displays of both tablets and smart phones • Increasing difficulty as you progress through the puzzles • Earn in-game coins when you solve a puzzle that can be used for lifelines to help in other puzzles or securely purchase more coins if you run out. • Translated by native speakers into the following languages: English French German Portuguese Italian Spanish Russian Greek Turkish Romanian Arabic Persian Danish Dutch Norwegian and Finnish • No advertising • It currently has 200 puzzles to play. More puzzles will be added in free future updates in case you complete them all! Great fun for everyone from beginner through to intermediate and expert level adults and kids of all ages will enjoy guessing the pics in this logic based word teaser quiz. All solution words are nouns so even young children (from 5 - 6+) will be able to guess the answer and there are always a bunch of hints available within the manic game if you get stuck on a puzzle. We hope you enjoy this acclaimed word and picture guessing and rearranging puzzling game suitable for all ages (even grownups and grandparents) that will exercise your reasoning brain and imagination helping brain development by keeping the mind active. ESRB and PEGI approved and certified suitable for children. It's rated kid safe so it can be safely enjoyed by the whole family. A cross between Hangman Scrabble(TM) and Pictionary(TM) designed for compatibility with all Android devices (tablets and smartphones including Samsung Galaxy Google Nexus Amazon Kindle Fire HD HDX FireOS). Also available seperately for the iPad iPhone Windows Phone Blackberry and Windows 8 Surface devices (see our website below). Check out our other puzzle games and kids educational apps at: http://espacepublishing.com or follow us on Facebook for the scoop on new app releases and free giveaways at: https://www.facebook.com/espacepublishing

title: Слова из слов
author: Vitamin Labs.
description: СЛОВА ИЗ СЛОВ • Из букв заданного слова составь как можно больше новых слов • Пройди все уровни • Добавляй новые слова • Узнавай значение незнакомых слов • Накопи как можно больше очков • Стань умнее Игра “Слова из слов” хорошо знакома и детям и взрослым. Развивает память и эрудицию увеличивает словарный запас повышает грамотность. Смысл игры: Из букв заданного слова необходимо составить как можно больше новых слов. Словарь этой супер игры составляет более 8800 слов . Игра “Слова из слов” состоит из 6 уровней. На каждом следующем уровне необходимо составить все больше слов. Каждое предложенное игроком слово подтверждается значком ввода. За каждое правильное слово начисляются баллы и увеличивается счетчик отгаданных слов. Если вы не смогли составить все слова данного уровня то по кнопке “пропустить” – откроется весь список слов. При нажатии на любое слово списка дается его толкование. Можно добавлять новые слова - нажми "Добавить в базу". В следующем обновлении приложения слова будут проверены и добавлены. По кнопке “дальше” предлагается новое упрощенное слово текущего уровня. Возможности и особенности игры: 1. Подключен толковый словарь. Нажатие на слово позволяет узнать или уточнить значение слова. 2. Можно по желанию перейти на более сложную (платную) игру “Слова из слова 2”. Разрешения - android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS: для поддержки пуш уведомлений на старых устройствах - android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED: для пуш уведомлений - android.permission.VIBRATE: для вибрации при пуш уведомлениях - android.permission.WAKE_LOCK: для пуш уведомлений во время выключенного экрана.

title: Cars & Trucks Puzzle for Kids
author: Pixel Envision Ltd.
description: Cars Trucks and Community Vehicles Puzzle for Kids is a fun puzzle game for toddlers and kids from ages 1 to 6 featuring 16 cartoon cars and construction vehicles such as race car police car tractor fire engine ambulance garbage truck bulldozer and more in 20 shape & tangram puzzles! When a puzzle is completed children are rewarded with a variety of fun celebrations and interactions such as balloon popping. The fun matching activities help improve visual perception knowledge of shapes & develop fine motor skills by dragging and dropping puzzle pieces to match their holes. Perfect for preschoolers. Features • Kids Safe please see our Privacy Policy • Original high quality cartoon art drawn by professional children's book illustrator • Four different vehicle groups: Cars Trucks Construction & Community Vehicles • Automatic advance to the next puzzle • Three different puzzle styles with increasing difficulty levels • Interface & touch controls designed for toddlers • Press & hold button to limit menu access to parents • Option to hide/show locked puzzles to prevent accidental purchases The first 4 puzzles are free all of the remaining ones can be unlocked easily via single in-app purchase. Once unlocked there are no further in-app purchases or other dialogs. PRIVACY POLICY We take privacy very seriously this app: Does not contain ads Does not contain integration with social networks Does not contain web links Does not use analytics / data collection tools Does contain a single in-app purchase to unlock full version WE VALUE YOUR FEEDBACK If you like our app please take a minute to rate and review it. If you have any questions or need help please reach us at http://www.pixelenvision.com/support/ or by sending an e-mail to support@pixelenvision.com

title: Doozers Podmobile
author: The Jim Henson Company
description: Join Flex as he goes about his busy day in Doozer Creek. Pick up radishes to be delivered to a construction site pick up peaches and get them to the bakery and pick up other members of the Pod Squad to take them for a ride! About Doozers Doozers are DOERS – they put their ideas into action! Doozers focuses on four little Doozers a group of best buds who play together and share a love of inventing. Dubbed ‘the Pod Squad’ Spike Molly Bolt Flex and Daisy Wheel bounce from one fabulous adventure to the next engaging in exciting projects and having a blast playing together.
