description: - 27 high-quality popular bird sounds calls voices and bird images. - Set bird songs as ringtone alarm or notification by long pressing on bird images. - Bird sounds for your entertainment and helps you relax after an hard day! - Bird sounds is the perfect app to have a good time with your children and friends. - You can use bird songs as flash cards for babies to teach them bird names and sounds. - Soothing music and sleep sounds for babies - Relaxation ringtones and nature music - Absolutely relaxing for toddlers and kids Bird Sounds has two modes: - LIst all birds on the screen and listen you wish. Long press on selected bird to set as ringtone alarm or notification. - One bird on the screen with its big image and its name. Long press on image to set as ringtone alarm or notification. You can feel forest ambience and listen forest birds tropical forest birds and crow owl parrot piegon loon woodpecker rooster seagull mockingbird and much more! This app has great photos of various birds along with their sounds. Very cool and cute. Enjoy!

title: LearnColorsWithBheem
author: Green Gold Animation
description: *** This Free App works both on Phones and Tablets *** Chhota Bheem is India’s most loved animated character. With a viewership of over 35 Million people Chhota Bheem is India’s top animated TV Series. Chhota Bheem has been rated as India’s most favorite kid’s character. This app teaches colors using Chhota Bheem and his friends to young kids in the age group of 1 year to 8 years in a fun and entertaining manner. There are 2 sub-apps within this App: Color Recognition: This helps kids learn and recognize colors in a fun approach using very nice animations. Color Matching: This is a game where the child has to listen to the question and select the correct color. Enjoy the app !!

title: Memory game for kids - Animals
author: Abuzz
description: ***** A Winning combination of fun simplicity and creativity for children aged 2-5 years old ***** "Memory Matching for Kids" is a unique creative game for the whole family. Watch your little boys and girls learn all the names of numerous pets farm animals jungle animals insects and sea animals – through fun and play. We've enriched the initial concept of the popular game of pairs by introducing single tap wooden block cover animations instead of traditional cards flip which gives "Memory Match" a unique game play. Your Children will love this fun and educational game and while playing this free game will help them to: * Focus and concentrate better * Increase short-term retention * Develop cognitive skills * Exercise their memory through 3 levels of difficulty * Get familiar with the names appearance and sounds of 80 different animals Game Features: Simple & intuitive child-friendly interface 27 different languages and pronunciations - English Arabic Chinese Danish Dutch Filipino Finnish French German Greek Hindi Indonesian Italian Japanese Korean Macedonian Malay Norwegian Polish Portuguese Russian Serbian Spanish Thai Turkish Ukrainian and Vietnamese. Random combination and placement of 82 different animals during each play Three difficulty levels (easy medium and hard) to adjust to the age and skills of your child High-quality colorful graphics Sweet background melody Star animation & pronunciation after each correctly matched pair Bubble animation & happy cheering after each solved memory match game Non-competitive free of timers and scores the more your children play the more they practice The theme of this Memory Match game is ‘Animals’ check our other apps for more themes like 'Food' 'Bathroom' 'Kitchen' 'Furniture' 'Tools' and 'Cars' And last but not least ***All Memory Match games are available for FREE*** Privacy Disclosure: As parents ourselves iAbuzz takes children's wellness and privacy very seriously. Our app: • Does not contain links to social networks • Does not contain any in-app purchases • Does not collect any personal data But yes it does contain advertising as that’s our means of providing the app free of cost to you – the ads are carefully placed such that the kid is least likely to click on them while playing. Feedback Please: If you have any feedback and suggestions on how we could further improve the design and interaction of our apps and games please visit our website http://iabuzz.com/ or leave us a message at kids@iabuzz.com . We would be glad to hear from you as we are committed to update all of our apps and games on a regular basis with new features and also want to get some ideas for future app development.

title: Puzzle for Kids – Home Kitchen
author: Abuzz
description: Children are having fun and learning different names that represent numerous kitchen utsensils and appliances used in their every day life. Kitchen Puzzle for Kids is a unique educational jigsaw style puzzle for preschool toddlers and babies. This free game helps your kids overall brain development while playing and exploring 60 different Kitchen objects that they can find in your home or house. Once the picture is assembled your girls/boys will hear the pronunciation and then see the written words which will also help him/her get familiar with the alphabet letters. Features: Simple & intuitive child-friendly interface Universal app for all phones and tablets 27 different languages and pronunciations - English Arabic Chinese Danish Dutch Filipino Finnish French German Greek Hindi Indonesian Italian Japanese Korean Macedonian Malay Norwegian Polish Portuguese Russian Serbian Spanish Thai Turkish Ukrainian and Vietnamese. Hundreds of pieces in 60 different puzzles Easy navigation between puzzles Easy movement of puzzle pieces across screen High-quality graphics High-quality background melodies Drag & drop animations Balloon animation & happy cheering after each correctly solved puzzle The theme of this Puzzle is ‘Kitchen’ check our other apps for more themes ‘Animals’ 'Food' 'Bath' 'Furniture' 'Cars' and 'Tools' And last but not least ***All puzzles are available for FREE*** Privacy Disclosure: As parents ourselves iAbuzz takes children's wellness and privacy very seriously. Our app: • Does not contain links to social networks • Does not contain any in-app purchases • Does not collect personal data But yes it does contain advertising as that’s our means of providing the app free of cost to you – the ads are carefully placed such that the kid is least likely to click on it while playing. Feedback Please: If you have any feedback and suggestions on how we could further improve the design and interaction of our apps and games please visit our website http://iabuzz.com/ or leave us a message at kids@iabuzz.com . We would be glad to hear from you as we are committed to update all of our apps and games on a regular basis with new free features.

title: appolino Plus & Minus MU
author: Lehrmittelverlag St.Gallen
description: This app from the appolino series is about adding and subtracting numbers. The range of numbers up to 20 to 100 and to 1000 working with blocks number lines and value charts are taught and practiced. The number pyramids combine adding and subtracting. Appolino Plus& Minus is based on the curriculum of the first years of school. appolino® Plus and Minus is a child-friendly and didactically considered learning app for mathematics. It is meant for young clever minds from 5 to 10 years who want to learn with playful elements at their own pace. Through differentiated learning activities within the 9 modules and 54 levels they will acquire a solid knowledge of and skill in the field of addition and subtraction. This app is available in two versions with an identical content. However unlike this multi-user version (in which 4 levels are available simultaneously ) the single-user version can only deal with one learning level. For didactic reasons appolino apps are not designed for iPad mini. Therefore the apps may (under circumstances) only be operational on a limited basis. This version offers… … an additional 45 levels with diverse attractive learning activities. … a retainment of what’s learned which stores the current level of achievement and enables a continuity of the learning process. ... an adaptive control of chosen tasks which makes learning sustainable and prevents boredom. ... a multi-user capability with four accounts which allows families or school classes to use the app together. ... A training mode for a specific selection and in-depth examination of content which also allows both teachers and parents to try out the app. All the apps of the appolino-series were developed specifically for the iPad and offer the joy of learning with optimal success! Don’t forget to check our further apps.

title: Fun Math with Chhota Bheem
author: Green Gold Animation
description: *** This Free Game works both on Phones and Tablets *** In this game you need to help Chhota Bheem answer multiplication and division questions. With every correct answer that you enter a part of a colorful image is revealed. Help Bheem discover his friends. There are multiple levels in these game. Chhota Bheem is India’s most loved animated character. With a viewership of over 40 Million people Chhota Bheem is India’s top animated TV Series. Chhota Bheem has been rated as India’s most favorite kid’s character.

title: Touch & Patch Puzzle for Kids
author: Absolutist Games
description: Try out a new learning app for kids from Absolutist. It is designed for ready-witted active and merry children who likes having fun and learning something new every day. The app offers 4 thematic super level packs with numerous puzzles inside. Touch and Patch Puzzle is a multiple-choice game that involves many skills which children can master. They can play and learn at the same time studying alphabet names of fruit vegetables wild animals and pets it's like a toy stoy. Your kids will not get bored playing this amazing shape puzzles. Beautiful graphics is a big advantage of this app. All the pictures are pleasant and children-friendly. Even the youngest kids can enjoy the app with its great shape mechanics. Just give it a try and you won't be able to put it down. Main features: - Children-friendly graphics - Numerous shape puzzles in each pack - Beautiful and easy game mechanics - Great means to develop logic skills Touch and Patch Puzzle is not an ordinary app that just entertain your children. It also helps them to become more creative and fast thinking develop logic and diligence. If you want your kids to have fun and educate themselves at the same time do not hesitate and try Touch and Patch Puzzle for Kids!

title: Ocean - Puzzles Games for Kids
author: MagisterApp
description: ★★★★★ Puzzles and Colors for Kids ★★★★★ - Puzzles with sounds and interactive background - Coloring the Animals Our children will enjoy learning and playing with the animals of the sea. The child will have also fun discovering all the interactive objects of the background and can hear all the sounds of the sea and its inhabitants. In the full version you will find 18 puzzles and you can paint all the animals. In the lite version there are 5 puzzle. Intuitive and simple game is designed for kids. MagisterApp designs and develops games for kids taking care of every detail cute sounds lovely images and the simplicity of the game will ensure a pleasant and enjoyable user experience for your children.

title: LEGO® Friends Art Maker
author: The LEGO Group
description: LEGO® Friends Art Maker is a fun and colorful art and creativity app for kids ages 5+. Create paint decorate and save your own Heart Cards and artwork with lots of details colors sparkles stickers and bling! Features * Create and decorate your own LEGO Friends Heart Card print and give it to your best friend. You can print from your device photo library if it is set up to your printer or you can save the Heart Card to your computer and print from that. * Make your own work of art: start with a blank canvas or choose from lots of cute backgrounds in different shapes and patterns * Use a pencil pattern brush hairbrush marker stamps or sparkles in all your favorite colors to create beautiful and detailed artwork * Decorate with patterns prints and stickers with playful scenarios of the five LEGO Friends girls and the pets from Heartlake City * Frame your art and save it on the pin board and to your photo album or print it – unlike the fridge door this pin board lets you showcase as many drawings and paintings as you want! * In a hurry or on your way out? Just save your work and edit or finish later. * Unlock extra art accessories and badges * Not sure how to start your drawing? Find ideas in the Art Inspiration section. Appropriate for kids ages 5+ Intuitive navigation No reading skills required No extra in-app purchases No third party advertisements Fun and playful encouragement for creativity Every great artist started out with just a few drawing tools and a blank piece of paper. Start today and just have fun creating! For app support contact LEGO Consumer Service. For contact details please visit http://service.lego.com/contactus When you download this app you accept our privacy policy and terms of use for apps. Read more on http://aboutus.lego.com/legal-notice/Privacy-Policy and http://aboutus.lego.com/en-us/legal-notice/terms-of-use-for-apps LEGO and the LEGO logo are trademarks of the LEGO Group. ©2014 The LEGO Group.

title: Animals Blocks Puzzle for kids
author: Abuzz
description: Watch your children learn all the names and voices of numerous farm animals jungle animals insects and other animals that can be found in the zoo through fun and play. Your little ones will enjoy playing and learning with these free HD virtual 3D block puzzles. Flip by flip turn by turn he/she will match the building blocks and a happy animal will be assembled. A pleasant voice will always encourage and praise your kids and motivate them to continue to build their vocabulary memory matching tactile fine motor and cognitive skills while playing. If your kids love dogs cats horses lions monkeys giraffes elephants pandas or even fish and dinosaurs they'll love this game because these are just part of the 84 high-quality illustrations packed inside this educational game. * 27 different languages and pronunciations - English Arabic Chinese Danish Dutch Filipino Finnish French German Greek Hindi Indonesian Italian Japanese Korean Macedonian Malay Norwegian Polish Portuguese Russian Serbian Spanish Thai Turkish Ukrainian and Vietnamese. Privacy Disclosure: As parents ourselves iAbuzz takes children's wellness and privacy very seriously. Our app: • Does not contain links to social networks • Does not contain any in-app purchases • Does not collect personal data But yes it does contain advertising as that’s our means of providing the app free of cost to you – the ads are carefully placed such that the kid is least likely to click on it while playing. Feedback Please: If you have any feedback and suggestions on how we could further improve the design and interaction of our apps and games please visit our website http://iabuzz.com/ or leave us a message at kids@iabuzz.com . We would be glad to hear from you as we are committed to update all of our apps and games on a regular basis with new features and also want to get some ideas for future app development.

title: Cecil the Lion
author: Gimucco
description: Join the tiles and uncover more and more animals that deserve our attention and care to save them from extinction Following Cecil's death on July 2015 we have happily followed the many voices that raised defending the life of all animals in our planet and especially the endangered species. This game is our small contribution to raise awareness to the problem and get people to improve their knowledge about all the species that are currently at risk of extinction but still are killed every year for sport fun or profit. Credit for the icons goes to the WWF Endangered Emoji campaign.

title: Trains Planes Puzzle for Kids
author: Pixel Envision Ltd.
description: Trains Planes and Sea Vehicles is a fun puzzle game for toddlers and kids from ages 1 to 6 featuring 16 cartoon transports such as trains planes ships and more in 20 shape & tangram puzzles! When a puzzle is completed children are rewarded with a variety of fun celebrations and interactions such as balloon popping. The fun matching activities help improve visual perception knowledge of shapes & develop fine motor skills by dragging and dropping puzzle pieces to match their holes. Perfect for preschoolers. Features • Kids Safe please see our Privacy Policy • Original high quality cartoon art drawn by professional children's book illustrator • Three different vehicle groups: Trains Air & Sea Vehicles • Automatic advance to the next puzzle • Three different puzzle styles with increasing difficulty levels • Interface & touch controls designed for toddlers • Press & hold button to limit menu access to parents • Option to hide/show locked puzzles to prevent accidental purchases The first 4 puzzles are free all of the remaining ones can be unlocked easily via single in-app purchase. Once unlocked there are no further in-app purchases or other dialogs. PRIVACY POLICY We take privacy very seriously this app: Does not contain ads Does not contain integration with social networks Does not contain web links Does not use analytics / data collection tools Does contain a single in-app purchase to unlock full version WE VALUE YOUR FEEDBACK If you like our app please take a minute to rate and review it. If you have any questions or need help please reach us at http://www.pixelenvision.com/support/ or by sending an e-mail to support@pixelenvision.com

title: Hitzen Katapulta LITE
author: Gestionet Multimedia
description: Hitzen Katapulta aplikazioaren dohaineko bertsioa. Aplikazio hau Euskara hutsean eta Euskara lantzeko aplikazio jolasgarria da. Bertsio osoa hurrengo helbidean lortu dezakezu: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=air.com.gestionet.hitzenkatapulta&hl=es Hutsunez betetako hitzak ikusiko ditu erabiltzaileak eta letrak botatzen dituen katapulta baten bidez hitzak osatu beharko ditu erabiltzaileak. Dohaineko bertsio honetan maila bakarra ekartzen du. 3 maila ezberdin aurkezten ditu joko honek: mendia hiria eta hondartza. Guztira 17 pantaila. Maila bakoitzean agertzen diren hitzak maila horren testuinguruarekin bat egingo dute. Joko hau Eusko Jaurlaritza eta Bizkaiko Foru Aldundiaren laguntzarekin ekoiztu da. Gestionet Multimedia enpresak ekoiztu du TXAPELGAMES markapean. Box2D motore grafikoa erabili da jokoaren ekoizpenerako.

title: Number Fiesta
author: SpringMix Games
description: Learning how to count is a straight-up party with Number Fiesta Firmly focused on helping young kids learn basic counting skills and recognize numbers this flexible app is really four unique educational games in one. Games challenge young users in different ways meaning they can choose whichever learning approach works for them or play every game together to get their counting and numbers skills down pat. Giving toddlers and kindergartners the chance to play their way to becoming better counters Number Fiesta is both fun and educational. Structuring the learning process as a game is one of the most effective teaching methods and with games that are as entertaining and vibrant as they are educational Number Fiesta’s four unique counting challenges give your young ones the perfect opportunity to get started on developing their numbers skills. The most simple game in the app is Count which encourages kids to count along with a fun audio track while each counted number is highlighted on-screen. The app’s quiz game challenges kids to count how many cartoon items appear in front of them. The objects themselves don’t matter so users only need to worry about counting while a helpful multiple choice answer key lets them narrow down the right answer from three possible options. Blending a classic memory game format with numbers Number Fiesta’s Matching game pushes users to match multiple pairs of numbers from a grid of cards. The catch is that they can only flip one card at a time meaning they must recognize various numbers and remember their positions on the board to succeed! The app’s fourth game is an exciting timed race where counting isn’t the goal but simply the way they keep score. The goal is simple collect every piece of fruit as fast as possible! Remember children are inherently thirsty to learn. With Number Fiesta they can discover numbers in a way whimsical enough that it just might make learning how to count a real party. Audio is in English & Spanish

title: MELILEMO syllabes (FR-Lite)
author: Fabrice Eveillard
description: COLLER COUPER RECOLLER les syllabes & les lettres pour essayer de TROUVER le bon mot !! ***** MELILEMO SYLLABES est un jeu éducatif pour toute la famille dont le but est de retrouver les mots mélangés et découpés en morceaux ( un mode "Facile" permet aux plus jeunes de pouvoir jouer en leur proposant un découpage différent des thèmes et des mots un peu plus simples un nombre de mots mélangés limité à 2 ainsi que l'affichage des solutions pour apprendre de nouveaux mots ou les aider à retrouver les syllabes correspondantes ). ***** Cette version gratuite vous propose de découvrir ce nouveau jeu au Gameplay original en mode " classique " ( Trouver 30 mots le plus rapidement possible) ou en mode " 2 minutes chrono " ( Trouver le plus de mots en 2 minutes ) et vous donne la possibilité de choisir des champs lexicaux précis parmi 2 séries de 4 thèmes classiques et enfants ou de jouer en aléatoire ( mélange de tous les thèmes ). ***** Préparez-vous !!! la version "Famille complète" & la version "Pro" seront bientôt disponibles ...

title: Diction: find words fast
author: Wind-up games
description: Search for words of 3 or more letters in a tile grid. When you make a word the letters disappear and new tiles fall in from the top of the screen. Try to remove as many tiles as you can before the timer runs out! There are four different ways to play: •In classic mode each tile you remove scores you 1 point. Score as many points as you can before the timer runs out. •In arcade mode tile scores are weighted like scrabble tiles. More difficult to use letters are worth more points. Some tiles contain additional bonuses providing score multipliers or time bonuses. Combine bonus tiles to maximize your points. •In time attack mode each word you make gives you an additional time bonus. The longer the word the more time you get. Extend your game as long as you can in order to maximize your score. •Fixed mode is like a solitaire boggle game. Tiles are not removed when you make a word and duplicate words are not allowed try to find as many unique words as you can. Features: •Online leaderboards try to beat your friends! •Achievements. •Four different ways to play. • 9 different themes! Pick you favourite colour! •Play on different sized grids (from 4x4 up to 10x10). Diction is completely free requires no permissions and has no adverts or in app purchases. If you like this game please consider purchasing the donate version. Thanks!

title: Multiplying & Dividing MU
author: Lehrmittelverlag St.Gallen
description: In appolino® Multiplying & Dividing comprehension is built up and internalised without simply drilling multiplication tables. Multiplications and divisions can be illustratively solved on the numbers row and the point field right up to 1000. Relationships become visible and clever solutions options are encouraged. Riddles of the «numbers maze» challenge pupils to have fun using their multiplication and division knowledge. This app is available in two versions with an identical content. However unlike this multi-user version (in which 4 users are available simultaneously ) the single-user version can only deal with one learning level. This App offers ... … an additional 45 levels with diverse attractive learning activities. … a retainment of what’s learned which stores the current level of achievement and enables a continuity of the learning process. ... an adaptive control of chosen tasks which makes learning sustainable and prevents boredom. ... a multi-user capability with four accounts which allows families or school classes to use the app together. ... A training mode for a specific selection and in-depth examination of content which also allows both teachers and parents to try out the app. All apps of the appolino series have been developed especially for tablets. They combine learning pleasure with learning success!

title: Animal Puzzle for Toddlers
author: Pixel Envision Ltd.
description: Animal Puzzle for toddlers and kids is a fun animal puzzle game for toddlers and kids from ages 1 to 6 featuring 26 cute cartoon animals such as cow horse goat sheep pig dog elephant and more animal puzzles in 30 shape & tangram puzzles ! When a puzzle is completed toddlers are rewarded with a variety of fun celebrations and interactions such as balloon popping. The fun matching activities help toddlers improve visual perception knowledge of shapes & develop fine motor skills by dragging and dropping puzzle pieces to match their holes. Perfect for toddlers and kids. Features • Animal Sounds! (excluding sea animals giraffe & turtle) • Kids Safe please see our Privacy Policy • Original high quality cartoon art drawn by professional children's book illustrator • Four different animal themes: Farm Jungle Sea (Underwater) & Savannah • Automatic advance to the next puzzle • Three different puzzle styles with increasing difficulty levels • Interface & touch controls designed for toddlers • Press & hold button to limit menu access to parents • Option to hide/show locked puzzles to prevent accidental purchases by toddlers The first 4 animal puzzles are free all of the remaining ones can be unlocked easily via single in-app purchase. Once unlocked there are no further in-app purchases or other dialogs. PRIVACY POLICY We take privacy very seriously this app: Does not contain ads Does not contain integration with social networks Does not contain web links Does not use analytics / data collection tools Does contain a single in-app purchase to unlock full version WE VALUE YOUR FEEDBACK If you like our app please take a minute to rate and review it. If you have any questions or need help please reach us at http://www.pixelenvision.com/support/ or by sending an e-mail to support@pixelenvision.com

title: Cryptogram Puzzles
author: MakeThisApp LLC
description: Cryptograms are here! Give your brain a workout! Test your skill deciphering the cryptograms. Passages are constructed from book titles literary and historical quotes proverbs and many more. Thousands of unique puzzles with more than a trillion code permutations. Solve the puzzles interactively. Letters are highlighted green or red after each attempt to solve. You may ask for hints or the entire solution. Keeps track of your scores and elapsed time. Includes a unique feature that allows you to create your own puzzle and have a friend try to solve. Four difficulty levels provide a challenge for the beginner or expert. No internet connection required. No ads. Just download and enjoy anywhere. A free demo version is available under the app name Cryptogram Puzzles Free Trial.

title: Quick Math with Bheem
author: Green Gold Animation
description: *** This Free Game works both on Phones and Tablets *** In this game you need to help Chhota Bheem answer quick addition and subtraction questions. Jaggu will be throwing apples from a tree top and your quick answers will help Chhota Bheem save the apples. Chhota Bheem is India’s most loved animated character. With a viewership of over 40 Million people Chhota Bheem is India’s top animated TV Series. Chhota Bheem has been rated as India’s most favorite kid’s character.

title: Bowling with Words
author: Dizzy Heights
description: Play Bowling with Words! Play this Addictive Words Puzzle Game with beautiful icy levels! Search for the right words by throwing down pins with letters on them. HOW TO PLAY: Simply tap the screen with your finger to throw bowling balls at the pins. Each pin has a letter. When you shoot down the pins in the right order to complete the word you finish the level and get score. FEATURES: • Simple-to-Play and Fun! • You can always get the first letter of the words in each level. • Great brain-exercise • 48 levels CONNECT: https://twitter.com/dizzyheights_ Let us know if you have any suggestions and/or questions. 1.Update: 3 New Packs Added 2.Update: 2 New Packs Added

title: MELILEMO Lettres ( FR-Lite )
author: Fabrice Eveillard
description: ---> Cette application est en FRANÇAIS ! COLLER COUPER RECOLLER les lettres pour essayer de TROUVER le bon mot !! ***** MELILEMO LETTRES est un jeu éducatif pour toute la famille dont le but est de retrouver les mots mélangés et découpés en lettres ( un mode "Normal" avec les mots découpés lettres par lettre un mode "2 lettres" avec les mots découpés par groupe de 2 lettres ). Si vous ne connaissez tous les mots ... pas de problème : Vous pourrez trouver et enrichir votre vocabulaire puisqu'un indice vous est proposé toutes les 10 secondes si vous êtes bloqués. ***** Cette version gratuite vous propose de découvrir ce nouveau jeu au Gameplay original en mode " classique " ( Trouver 30 mots le plus rapidement possible) ou en mode " chrono " ( Trouver le plus de mots en 2 minutes ) et vous donne la possibilité de choisir des champs lexicaux précis parmi 2 thèmes ou de jouer en aléatoire ( mélange de tous les thèmes disponibles ). ***** Amateurs et amatrices d'anagrammes de scrabble de mots mêlés et de mots croisés : Préparez-vous !!! La version payante comprend plus de 1100 mots classés en 11 thèmes et bénéficie de mises à jour régulières afin de rajouter de nouvelles listes et de nouveaux mots. version "Pro" bientôt disponible ...

title: Word funk
author: Jason Sidwell
description: Word Funk is a stylish and demanding word game designed to test and improve your English vocabulary. This version is free to play and contains no advertising. You have 10 rounds to make 10 words. Words can be a minimum of 3 and a maximum of 8 letters long. Scores are based on the number of letters used and the use of difficult letters like a "Q" or an "X. There are 12 achievement chains and 60 individual achievements to be attained within the game. There are 424 points in total to be gained from all the achievements which will unlock all the tiles on the mystery wall. Word Funk uses a fast and concise dictionary engine with over 70000 English words with 3 to 8 letters. Playing Word Funk is simple to learn. There are various in-game help screens available to assist you with this. Let Word Funk test and improve your English vocabulary.

title: Balloon Kaboom
author: Space Castle Games
description: Balloon Kaboom was originally created for my 3 year old twin sons. The game provides a safe environment for kids to practice their hand eye coordination. This app is free and also ad free. How to play: - Touch the balloons to pop them. - Combos can be started by popping the round balloons. Combos can be maintained by popping more round balloons before the combo ends. - Start timed score mode in the in game menu. - In timed score mode the timer will stop when a combo is active. - Access the in game menu by pressing and holding the gear in the upper right corner. FEATURES: - Fun physics - Day/Night cycle - Simulated moon phases - Timed score mode - Leveling and combo system - Save your progress with 4 save slots. - Ad free! If you like please buy me a coffee to show your gratitude: https://sites.google.com/site/spacecastlegames/home/send-your-thanks

title: Acrostics Crossword Puzzles
author: Egghead Games
description: Acrostics Crostics or Double Crostics (Dell) combine crosswords with fill in the quote. Another ★★★★★ word game by Puzzle Baron. Also called anacrostics the puzzles are based on anagrams and crosswords. Your goal is to reveal a hidden quote in a grid by correctly answering crossword-style clues. Each letter in the quote is linked to a letter in one of the clue answers. As you fill in more and more answers more letters will begin to fill the quote grid until eventually the entire quote is revealed. You can also do this in reverse. As words of the quote become clear they will fill in the clue answers! Fifty ranked and timed puzzles. Every puzzle has a difficulty level and time. When you finish the puzzle you'll see a graph showing how your time compares to expert puzzlers and the number of hints taken if any. All puzzles have been solved and timed by thousands of players at the popular Puzzle Baron Acrostics web site. Designed from scratch for fast Android play this app allows you to concentrate on solving the puzzle and makes solving much easier than with paper and pencil. The result is pure puzzle solving fun with no ads or distractions! Advanced play features include automatic grid updating and indexing see related cells multi-level undo remove errors and hints. Three difficulty levels will challenge beginners and seasoned players alike. Share the results with your puzzling friends with a single tap via email Facebook or Twitter. Seven more puzzle packs each with 50 puzzles with a mix of difficulties are available for purchase inside the app. These will provide HOURS and HOURS of fun! If you like word games crosswords or cryptograms acrostics are a fun way to exercise your brain! All the puzzles have validated difficulty levels and times aggregated from the popular Puzzle Baron websites. His family of web sites have served millions and millions of puzzle enthusiasts since 2006. Quality Software by Egghead Games. Contact us at support@eggheadgames.com or www.eggheadgames.com.

title: Worch - Word Search Puzzles
author: Thader Games
description: WORCH: The world's best word search puzzle has arrived with an awesome art! Start playing and meet WORCHY the lovely pencil that will join you in this adventure. Play the most exciting word search puzzle of the world. Are you able to find all the words? Countless packs of words with over 150 levels all for free! Thousands of different words to be found! Get Worchys to unlock new PACKS and INK to complete the alphabet Four original game modes - NORMAL: Find all the words on the board horizontally vertically diagonally or upside down - BLITZ: You have fixed time to find all the words on the board - SHUFFLE: Each time you find a word all the board will mix up - RUSH: Find the word marked before its time runs out Moreover... QUICKPLAY! for your free minutes: Choose board size difficulty amount of words to find and game mode. Create infinite customized boards. Increasing difficulty ... Do not get stuck: Help yourself with the POWERUPS! - Time - Hint - Shuffle 33 Google Play ACHIEVEMENTS that you can share with your friends Available in 6 languages (German Spanish French Italian and Portuguese) ... complete the game in all of them! You will never play the same puzzle: There are infinite boards! Worch your word search game with huge dictionaries and thousands of words. Share your games and your achievements with your friends on FACEBOOK and TWITTER

title: WordBog
author: Worldweaver Ltd.
description: So how good do you think you are at word games? Could you make a 20+ letter word? In WordBog everyone in the world competes on the same puzzle for 24 hours so you can compare your abilities with your friends family and top players no matter where they live. To play make words by using letters in sequence moving up down left right or diagonally. Letters disappear when used and letters above fall into the spaces. You can also turn the board clockwise or anticlockwise to switch things about. Words are scored by letter value multiplied by word length. When you've done your best submit your score to see how you compare! This is the mobile edition of the popular Facebook game but does not require a Facebook account to play. See for yourself why WordBog is one of the fastest growing new word games in the world!

title: Pettson's Inventions 2
author: Filimundus AB
description: The sequel to the praised Pettson's Inventions. Bigger better and more fun than ever! Please note that the inventions from this game is a part of the inventions in the collection Pettson’s Inventions Deluxe! Help old man Pettson and his cat Findus build their amazing inventions! Which of the objects should be included and where do they fit in the machinery? Drag and drop the parts to their right spot and watch the invention go! As usual a secret waits to be unlocked for those who manages to complete everything. A fun and pedagogic app that teaches logic and stimulates creativity for children of all ages. ★ A whopping 37 ingenious inventions to solve! ★ Possibility to increase difficulty by including fake parts in the inventions. ★ Voices in English German and Swedish. ★ Fantastic original artwork! ★ Kid-friendly interface! ★ No in-app purchases. Keep inventing! Check out Pettson's Inventions 1.

title: Pettson's Inventions
author: Filimundus AB
description: Help Pettson and Findus build their inventions! In this tricky game you should help building these clever inventions. You need to figure out which ones of the objects should be included and where to put them in the machinery. Drag and drop the objects to their right spot and watch the invention start. For every invention finished there will be a reward of a cogwheel. When you have finished all the inventions a special invention will be unlocked where you will help Findus fly out to space! Pettson’s Inventions is a pedagogic app that practices logic and stimulates creativity for preschoolers. Please note that the inventions from this game is a part of the inventions in the collection Pettson’s Inventions Deluxe! - All-in-all there are 27 inventions some easier some a bit harder! - Choose to play with or without fake objects to adjust the difficulty level - Choose whether Pettson and Findus should speak English Swedish or German

title: Animal Sounds for Kids Pro
author: kidgames
description: Product Features - Ad free - Gallery mode: Pictures thumbed through themselves every 5 seconds.Suitable even for kids half-year. - Help your young child learn about animals sounds - Look at high-quality photos of animals - Touch the picture of any animal to hear the sound it makes - APP2SD - The game is optimized for Android phones and tablets. - Volume control from the volume buttons Product Description Help your young child learn about animals with Animal Sounds for Kids. This cute and useful Android application includes high-quality animal photos and recorded sounds. Simply touch any animal's image to hear the sound it makes. Slide your finger across a picture to move on to the next or previous image. Please tell us about your experience rate our app and post a comment. If you have any questions please email us.

title: Quick Word Game with Bheem
author: Green Gold Animation
description: *** This Free Game works both on Phones and Tablets *** In this game you need to help Chhota Bheem form words quickly before the balls are caught by Raju & Dholu/Bholu.. There are two levels in this game and the 2nd level has tougher words. If you get the answer at the top most stage you will get 5 points in the next stage when the ball drops one level you will get 3 points and in the final stage before the catch you get 1 point. Chhota Bheem is India’s most loved animated character. With a viewership of over 40 Million people Chhota Bheem is India’s top animated TV Series. Chhota Bheem has been rated as India’s most favorite kid’s character.

title: Baby & Toddler Flashcards Free
author: Silver Honey Media
description: Teach your baby or toddler with Baby & Toddler Flashcards Free the smart and fun way to help your baby learn new words. Baby & Toddler Flashcards Free features: - Easy words from baby's everyday life - simple practical words are shown in big easy-to-read font - letters are all in lower-case making it easier for your child to read These digital flashcards develop child's memory and recognition of words as well as English language and communication skills (oral and verbal). No need to create your own flashcards or print anything. Simply use your mobile phone or tablet to teach baby how to read. How to use: - Install Baby & Toddler Flashcards Free from the Google Play Store. - Open the app. - Tap the screen to start. - "Flash" each card by tapping the screen. - Use everyday for best results preferably short sessions multiple times a day. Best used for: babies newborns infants toddlers preschoolers Can also be used as: a reader for school-age children special education Recommended ages: 0 months - 3 years of age Level: Easy Language: English Price: Free Unleash your child's genius with Baby & Toddler Flashcards Free!

title: Jack and The Beanstalk
author: Mercury Inpress Inc
description: Jack and The Beanstalk is the second app in the Incredebooks Funny Fables series. This reimagined version of a fairytale classic will delight both children and grown ups alike. Look for specially highlighted pages and bring the story to life with your mobile device! **IMPORTANT** This App needs to be paired with a hardcover storybook. For more information on availability please visit http://www.incredebooks.com Features: · Explore 4 entertaining digital experiences that are weaved into the storyline. · Beautiful 3D rendering bring the book to life! · Custom music and magical sound effects! · Explore each scene further using custom rotation and zoom features. · Parents section with gated access. We believe that there is a strong human connection to the feel of the print medium. Our goal is to preserve the familiarity of actually holding a storybook and to create market leading mobile gaming technologies. We had a great time creating these stories. We hope your entire family enjoys them too! Visit our website for more information on the Incredebooks - Funny Fables Series at http://www.incredebooks.com **Look for our other Incredebooks including The Three Little Pigs Little Red Riding Hood and Goldilocks and The Three Bears. ***QUESTIONS? CONCERNS?*** reviews are great…but we can’t contact you through them - if you have any issues or questions please send emails to: support@incredebooks.com . Please help us improve our products! Your feedback is appreciated! Send feedback comments and suggestions to: feedback@incredebooks.com ***PRIVACY AND SAFETY*** This app contains NO ads in-app purchases or push notifications. Absolutely NO personal data will be collected. This app does contain a link to our website for more information and links to the iTunes app store in reference to our other games; these links are found only in the gated Parent’s section which requires separate access from the game play screens. Copyright Incredebooks Inc. 2014. Incredebooks Inc. is property of Mercury Active Inc. and AM Productions Inc. All Rights Reserved.

title: Three Second MATH for Kids
author: HuskyDev
description: Specially intended for kids from 6-10 years. Game contain two mods - add substract (1-20) - add substract multiplydivide (1-100) Are you good at math? Show it to all your friends. Sign-in into Google Play Games and compare achievements and best score with your friends. The goal of game is to decide whether shown example is true or false and according to the decision to click on the true or false button and achieve the best possible score. Caution game is very addictive :)

title: Touch Kids
author: MauroME Games
description: You can learn about the alphabet numbers colors pop balloon bubble fairies comets insects ( flies fly cockroaches spiders wasps butterflies ladybugs ) and fish in a fun and entertaining way. From infant to preschoolerthis game is fun for everyone. A beautiful game for young children or toddlers. How to play? 1) Touched: count the figures that you touch. 2) Touch: show the figure that you must touch. 3) Record: the highest score. If you touch a figure that should not "Touched" is reset. If a figure escapes "Touched" subtracts one point. Tip: Touch a figure only when you're sure. Enjoy!

title: Astro Boy Piano Lite
author: Baby Cortex
description: Kids have fun and learn as they explore the wonderful world of music with Atom the mighty Astro Boy! The famous robot and superhero character from Japanese animation and manga now has his own educational music app free! This is the Lite version. Introduce your child to the wonderful world of music with the help of Astro Boy the robotic boy who is one of the most enduring characters in pop culture. This free version of Astro Boy Piano lets your child play freely on seven colorful virtual piano keys or play along to the tune of three popular nursery rhymes. You can even turn on a special character voice mode that lets the keys sound off the voices of the characters from the world famous Astro Boy franchise! This Lite version is free and includes 3 songs. Get the full version to unlock all 8 piano keys and an 10 additional nursery rhymes! This cute app is suitable for children between 9 - 36 months. It also provides hours of entertainment for older children. This is an official Astro Boy product licensed by Tezuka Productions. **This free lite version of Astro Boy Piano includes the following features** - Colorful 7-key piano with cute and animated characters from your favorite Astro Boy and Astro Girl mangas & anime - Switch to character voice sound mode to play the voices of your favorite characters! - Choose from 2 music playing modes: freestyle or play along with a favorite nursery rhyme - Learn and play with 3 popular children’s songs - Record and replay your performance

title: Lullaby “Sleep My Dear”
author: MAGE
description: The famous lullaby by W. A. Mozart for a few centuries helping children from all over the world to get asleep. Wonderful music well known to everyone since childhood beautiful illustrations and slumberous animation are creating comfortable atmosphere. Together with nice sleepy characters it’ll be easy for a child to calm down and fall asleep. You can listen to the lullaby like a song while Mum and Dad may try to sing it in Karaoke mode. It’s so great to fall asleep to the native voice! • The famous lullaby by W.A. Mozart • Beautiful illustrations • Slumberous animation • Soft sincere performance • Professional arrangement of musical composition • Comfortable Karaoke mode The lullaby “Sleep My Dear Fall Asleep...” will certainly become your real help — now it’ll be much more easier to get your child asleep!

title: Gummy Pop
author: HashCube
description: STOP MATCHING and START POPPING! Create incredible chain reactions to free the adorable Gummies from the clutches of the hungry monsters! Are you ready to have an amazing time with the lovable Gummies? Find out why these creatures have mysteriously appeared all over Granny’s farm! Gummy Pop Features: - Unique and Exciting Chain Reaction Mechanics - Amazing Power Ups to help you in sticky situations - Adorable Characters that you'll love - Hundreds of Challenging Levels - Deceptively Simple and Incredibly Fun Gameplay - Play Along with Friends on Facebook - Captivating Music & Sounds - Play on multiple devices without losing progress Download & Play Gummy Pop for FREE Today! Don't forget to Connect to Facebook & enjoy Gummy Pop with your Friends!

title: Children's Piano
author: Łukasz Dzierżak
description: Children's Piano application is a colorful version of piano with sounds of animals vehicles arctic animals farm animals and birds instead of having a piano sounds. In application there are included 2 main sets of sounds: Animals sounds included: - Dog - Panda - Frog - Mouse - Duck - Cat - Lion Vehicles sounds included: - Truck - Sport car - Train - Ambulance - Trabant - Firetruck - Plain Each set also contain 5 special sounds hidden under black keys. Children's Piano contain also another sets to buy using In-App payment method. Right know available to buy are two sets: Birds sounds included: - Sparrow - Gull - Toucan - Parrot - Owl - Pelican - Pigeon Farm sounds included: - Chick - Goose - Roster - Pig - Horse - Sheep - Cow Each additional set cost $1.32.

title: Kids Piano
author: Arrogance Technologies
description: Baby Piano is the best piano learning app! This kid piano game is specially designed for kids to play and learn for fun. It will be great for music learning and exploration. Your child or toddler will love this piano game. Kids Piano app is kids favorite. Entertainment for kids with colorful piano while learning piano sounds. This kids piano app is kids game friend kids music teacher and also it is a mother's helper to keep children quiet.

title: Xylophone For Kids
author: Mustafa Demir
description: Kids and parents xylophone has come for you! Your kids will spend good time when playing xylophone. Their adaptation to music will improve. They will become professional xylophone players in time. This game will act a part of their mental development. After a while they will be able to compose musics and they will enjoy doing it. Also it's a nice application for adults to spend their time make fun learn how to play and learn how to create new songs. This application runs smoothly and optimized for your phones and tablets. Features: HD graphics multi touch clear Sounds Caution Playing the application too much amount of time or leaving the children alone with the tablet pc is not encouraged

title: Halloween Pumpkins
author: PuzzlAdventura
description: Wicked witch wants to steal all your pumpkins! Treat or trick? It's up to you. Be a kind wizard and you will free pumpkins by matching them right! Let all witchcraft stay away and connect colors as you wish! "Halloween Pumpkins" 3 match puzzle Features: ► Fine scary design ► Atmospheric Halloween music ► Great number of exciting levels ► Excellent animation ► Leisure with pleasure ► Original game twists to enjoy with family or by yourself ► Easy to pick up but challenging to master strategies ► Connect pumpkins in sophisticated ways to get amazing boosters and other bonuses ► Enjoy impressive blasts magic power-ups and develop your logical skills simultaneously ► Train your IQ while playing ► Combine spelled pumpkins in spectacular combos to clear levels ► Dazzling power up combinations This is a scary but stunning Halloween Pumkins' saga to enjoy holiday time! Halloween Pumpkins is a well-designed free game fun mania great play time! Match and enjoy cool splashes and blasts. First time the world of hipster pumpkins is introduced to the broad public worldwide to make your journey around a range of eat-away places fun engaging and definitely quite diverse. Addictive and absolutely stunning puzzle game designed with love. Let’s see what does Halloween Pumpkins Menu offer on your way among eerie splashes terrifying combos and well-deserved bonuses! This is a fun FREE game for your Android! 3 match puzzle with hipster-like pumpkins a lot of challenging levels fun time together with splashing Halloween animation. Halloween Pumpkins free 3 match puzzle game also features: ● Spooktacular graphics ● Smooth game mechanics ● Simple to understand intereting to master puzzle ● Blasts to help to path through challenging levels ● Colorful hours of trick or treat fun ● Haunted 60+ levels Halloween Pumpkins saga is the best-looking Halloween FREE pumpkins matching game for your Android device whether it is phone or tablet. The game is optimized for Android phones and tablets. Our team is glad to see your comments. Leave it here or write to puzzladvent@gmail.com ► Facebook: www.facebook.com/puzzladvent ► VK: https://vk.com/worldofjelly

title: VoxelMaker
author: Nostatic Software
description: With VoxelMaker you can create 3D models of your own design and then render them with realistic lighting and shadows. Voxel models are made from 3D cubes and create a stylized "blocky" look - much like a 3D version of pixel art. Models can be exported for use in other programs or you can use the built-in ray tracer to render high-quality images of your scenes. With VoxelMaker you have both 3D canvas and camera in your hands: be inspired and create! • Full-featured model editor using intuitive touch controls. • Import (.vox) and export (.vox .ply .fbx) models. • Cut/copy/paste parts of your model to easily move/rotate/duplicate sections. • Insert text into your scene. • Use touch controls to paint colors onto a model or flood-fill areas at a time. • Control light direction and intensity in your scene. • Render views of your scene with configurable shadow softness ambient light and depth of field. • Rendered scenes can be exported or shared.

title: Kids Fun Animal Piano Pro
author: App Family
description: App Family is proud to introduce the PRO version of "Animal Piano" bringing you laughter and fun with 9 hilarious pianos beautiful HD graphics and high-quality sounds You play by pressing directly on the cheerfully animated characters. As you play random effects change the piano keys for variation and fun! Parental guidance information: - No third party advertisements. - Suggested age group is children aged 2 - 4 depending on previous touchscreen game experience. - The game encourages basic manipulation skills (touch) musical skills (scale of notes) and imaginative play For more fun check out our other fun kids games! Technical information: - Installs to SD card if available. - Anonymous usage statistics are collected via Google Analytics hence the requirement for Internet access. We do this only to improve the game experience of future versions. The only statistic collected is the number of times each piano is played. Credits: Music: Kevin MacLeod Sound: http://www.appfamily.se/?page=soundcredits

title: Tiny Tots Zoo Volume 1 Free
author: Ends in Four Games
description: Tiny Tots Zoo – Volume 1 is the first in a line of games that offer a charming collection of animated puzzles for toddlers preschoolers and children from ages 2 to 6. The game includes puzzles with 40 different animals from household pets such as dogs and cats to zoo favorites like elephants lions and giraffes. This quality puzzle game features two puzzle modes for learning shape recognition and matching and is great for educational purposes or just for fun! The jigsaw mode allows you to make the puzzles easy enough for a toddler or more difficult for preschoolers or older children by choosing between 6 8 and 10 pieces. And when the jigsaw puzzles are complete you can watch the fun as children are rewarded with animations animal sounds and bubble popping. The fun matching mode helps improve visual perception knowledge of shapes and develop fine motor skills by having the child drag & drop puzzle pieces to match their shadows. This mode features 10 uniquely themed colorful backdrops cute animations and realistic animal sounds. It also has a random mode to mix up the animals and backdrops for extended play. If your child loves animals and puzzles this is the game for them! Please note that this is the free version of the app. The free version includes 4 puzzles with the option to unlock the other 6 and magic mode via app purchase. Let us know if you have any suggestions or feedback. We would love to hear from you to keep making better games for everyone! Features: • 10 puzzles with 2 different puzzle types. • Colorful backgrounds animations and sounds. • 40 different animals from around the globe. • Adjustable puzzle difficulty with a choice of 6 8 or 10 pieces. • Positive encouragement. • Easy for children to use and control. • Fun to learn and play!

title: Real Piano
author: Mustafa Demir
description: Real piano has come! When you play real piano you and your childs will have fun and learn how to play piano and the other instruments at the same time. Through six different instruments you will gain different experiences. Your childs will learn how to play piano with playing the songs in this game. Touch and make wonders. Music notes are almost like flying. After you play this game you will feel relax with the sound of music. Fun is waiting for you. Have Fun!!! Instruments in this application: 1-Piano 2-Banjo 3-Toy Piano 4-Sine 5-Square 6-Triangle Caution Playing the application too much amount of time or leaving the children alone with the tablet pc is not encouraged!

title: Toddlers Magic Flute
author: Alyaka
description: The Flute sound makes you calm. Colorful shapes and amazing visual effects are very interesting for all players. Discover the musician that is inside of you. All the children deserves being a musician.

title: Learn Music for Kids
author: Mobimind Software
description: Teach your kids to play different instruments and compose fun songs! It is a wonderful application especially designed for kids to learn as they explore and enjoy the music. The songs and all music in general holds wonderful things : we are happy  conveys messages we use it as a way to communicate and more. Kids can develop their hidden musical talents! The whole family will play songs together! MUSIC BENEFITS ★ It stimulates intellectual development auditory sensory speech and motor development of children. ★ Increase the skills to listen memorize and concentrate. ★ They feed the imagination and creativity of kids ★ Power sociability causing children to better relate with their peers. In addition nursery rhymes help create an ideal environment for children to have fun while exploring the music. 3 GAME MODES ★ INSTRUMENTS: Piano Xylophone Drums percussion. Guitar Tubular Bells Each instrument has its own representation. The child can give free rein to their imagination to compose their own melodies in the different instruments. ★ SONGS: Wonderful songs to learn and play. The "Auto Play Mode" plays the song to learn the melody. Then can play it alone following the aid. Funny animals accompany the notes of the music and tell that keys should play. ★ SOUNDS: Several collections of sounds (animals letters numbers special effects vehicles etc.). The child can explore and recognize the different sounds of objects as well as learn the pronunciation of the numbers and letters in different languages. FEATURES ★ Totally FREE! ★ Fantastic AutoPlay Mode to play the selected song. ★ High-quality Real Sounds. ★ You can select the representation of the scales "DO-RE-MI" or "CDE". ★ Languages: Spanish - English ★ This application is intuitive and easy to learn even for babies! ★ Ideal for introducing children to the world of music. *** DO YOU LIKE OUR APP? *** Help us and take a few seconds to rate it and write your opinion on Google Play. Your contribution will enable us to improve and develop new free applications!

title: Cyclopsy - Two Players
author: SvaGames
description: Cyclopsy two players - is a board strategy game that is powered on a mechanics of games like Checkers and Reversi you can play together on one device android. Play with your friends - this is pure fun! Features of Cyclopsy: • Innovative game mechanics • Original graphics • Charming characters • Additional bonuses that will help you on difficult levels • Easy and fun to play but tough to master

title: Baby's First App Pro Key
author: dberm22
description: ★★★★★ Pro Key ★★★★★ To use the app you must have both this and Baby's First App (Free) http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dberm22.BabysFirstApp installed. This app merely removes the 5-day expiration of the trial version. Don't worry this app does not use any battery memory and negligible hard-drive space. No extra icons will show up in your launcher. ________________________________________ ★★★Filled with catchy music and lots of bright flashing colours I am sure it will keep any young ones interested. I find the interaction surprisingly lots of fun for me that is. I just know younger ones are bound to love it even more.- AnndroidOfVirtue.com★★★ Link to article including a video demo visit: http://www.androidofvirtue.com/babys-first-app/ Written for babies by babies! Okay maybe it wasn't written by babies but it was exclusively designed with babies in mind and has been extensively beta-tested by a top-notch team of babies (aka my two beautiful nieces Ava and Hailey). Open this app hand your phone to your child and sit back while you enjoy countless hours of uninterrupted "you time". I have spent over 100 hours developing this app with unique features to grab your baby's attention and keep them entertained and captivated for hours. These features include: ○ Multi-finger scrolling ○ Omni-directional scrolling ○ Infinite scrolling ○ Cute icons and music This app will also help your child develop their young brains. Learn animal names and sounds letters and words numbers and simple math problems. Oh let's not forget to mention that this app has a locking feature which makes it extremely difficult for a child to exit the app unless they know what they are doing (press your phone's back button or the exit tile 10 times in a row). No more unexpected charges on your cell-phone bill changes to your settings or opening that folder you thought you hid so well. While running Baby's First App intercepts the home button to make sure that your 2 year old is not perusing your data. Keep them in the app where they are safe and captivated. ___________________________ This app was written for my 2 nieces (ages 2 and 3) after I was unable to find a suitable app for them. This app was specifically geared towards toddlers. Something easy to pick up and play nothing frustrated and extremely simple. It requires zero supervision keeps your child inside the app and last but not least educational. If you like it please send it to your friends! ________________________ Legal Stuff: This app comes without warranty and I do not take any responsibility if something happens to your phone or child as a result of installing this app. All icons are shuffled randomly when you launch the app so if any words which appear are offensive in nature that was purely accidental. If enough monkeys type on enough keyboards.. etc. By installing this app you agree not to sue me for anything. I wrote this app to entertain your child not to be a target of lawsuits. Thanks! Now enjoy the app!

title: Family Linez
author: ZingMagic Limited
description: Linez is a highly addictive classic board game. Simply place five or more pieces in a line horizontally vertically or diagonally to score points. Linez is based on the highly addictive Lines games. Your objective is simply to score the highest number of points and enter the High Score Hall of Fame. At the start of game a number of pieces are positioned at random on the board. Turns consist of the player moving a single piece from one square to another. Once a piece has been moved three additional pieces are positioned at random on the board. Points are scored and pieces removed from the board when five or more pieces of the same type are aligned horizontally vertically or diagonally. Bonus points are scored for achieving more than five in a line or making more than one line of five pieces at a time. The game continues until there are no more free squares on the board. Game features: * Easy medium and hard levels of play. * Highly addictive game play. * Global high score table. * Full player statistics - we dare you to show your boss the number of games played !!. * Superb graphics and piece animation. * Linez is just one of our large collection of best of breed classic board card and puzzle games available for a wide range of platforms.

title: Toddler Sing and Play 3
author: landoncope.com
description: Your kids will love singing along with these games: • Wheels on the Bus • Ants Go Marching • Five Little Monkeys • The Alphabet Song Designed for ages 2 and up these games help your children learn popular songs while interacting in a fun and creative way. ***Wheels on the Bus*** Sing with a happy bus and its passengers as it travels around the town! This bus has it all: wipers horn people and even a hidden monkey! To start the music tap a bus object after each verse (12 verses total). Hint: to change the bus color try popping the balloons. ***Ants Go Marching*** Hurrah! Ten busy ants make their way down the road to get out of the rain! The little ant leads the way and performs the action of each verse. Your children will love tapping on the ants and hearing what they have to say! ***Five Little Monkeys*** This counting song features five unique monkeys that love to jump! When the lights turn on sing along as the monkeys do their tricks! Each time a monkey bumps his head mom calls the doctor until there are no monkeys left. Time to go back to bed! ***The Alphabet Song*** Sing it forwards backwards and with objects! This song is not your ordinary ABC song. Each letter turns into an objects when tapped and each object does silly tricks! Your children will love singing along with this fun game.

title: 1 learn sight read music notes
author: ngfSoft
description: Learn to sight read music in G & F Clef. Solfa. Notes above and below staff. Span 6 octaves. Applies to any instrument. Notes generated randomly and not limited to a repeating set. Switch between clefs for even more fun. Answer key for starters. Beginners set the pace by limiting the octave section to learn. Major and Minor Scales (sharps and flats). Piano sound can be muted. Include test score and performance statistics. Great for phones. Perfect for tablets. Alternate notations: C D E F G A B C D E F G A H Do Ré Mi Fa Sol La Si Do Re Mi Fa Sol La Si ハ ニ ホ ヘ ト イ ロ Ni Pa Vu Ga Di Ke Zo Sa Re Ga Ma Pa Dha Ni Alternate sound: Guitar Organ Trumpet Vibraphone Telephone

title: Ever After High™
author: Mattel
description: Ever After High™-The Official App Welcome to the spellbinding world of Ever After High where the next generation of fairytale legends attend classes and prepare to live their fairytale fates... or choose their own story. With this first official Ever After High app you’ll be able to explore the fairytale world with your favorite Royals and Rebels such as Apple White™ Raven Queen™ Madeline Hatter™ and more! CHARMING FEATURES: 1. Dress up Apple White Raven Queen and others with tons of magical fashions to choose from in Mirror Mirror. 2. Create your own masterpiece in Art Club where you can color and decorate drawings of your favorite Ever After High characters and scenes. 3. Piece together over 25 unique puzzles of your favorite characters and locations. Each spellbinding puzzle has three levels of difficulty. 4. Watch all of the enchanting episodes set in this wicked awesome world. 5. Explore and learn about your favorite Ever After High characters including Madeline Hatter™ and Cedar Wood ™ in the bio section. 6. Discover new sections of Ever After High as they magically open. Please Note: This app is free-to-play but some items can also be purchased for real money. You can disable in-app purchases through your device settings.

title: Disney Color and Play
author: Disney Publishing Worldwide
description: Create color play and animate like never before with the all-new Disney Color and Play app! Disney Color and Play features lots of fun with such favorites as Doc McStuffins Mickey Mouse Clubhouse Frozen and Big Hero Six. * Explore color and paint Color and Play Playrooms any way you like. Watch your characters leap off the screen in 3D! * You can even pair the app with Disney Color and Play Coloring Books and let your device bring pictures to life in the app! * Use real coloring books (subject to availability and may not be for sale outside North America) or buy and print pages online! * If you don't have a coloring book a free Mickey Mouse Clubhouse Coloring Page is available to print color and enjoy. * More Disney Color and Play Coloring Pages are available for in-app purchase. FEATURES: * Visit Disney Color and Play Playrooms to color and paint Disney favorites. * Work with unlimited combinations of tools colors patterns stickers and more! * Use the magic wand to turn your creations into fully-animated 3D characters! * Create magical animated experiences with your Disney Color and Play Coloring Books turning your coloring pages into animated 3D fun! * Enjoy exciting activities with your Disney Color and Play Coloring Pages. Some activities include mazes and word searches with special animations and a way to make jigsaw puzzles out of your own drawings! * Purchase includes Mickey's Living Room from Mickey Mouse Clubhouse along with an activity that lets you make cool music! * Two Doc McStuffins Color and Play Playrooms are also available for purchase where you can help Doc solve puzzles and heal boo-boos! * Purchase additional coloring pages to print and decorate then watch them come to life on your screen. If you’re experiencing difficulties with audio please check the audio settings within your device to see if your device is muted. If you experience difficulties printing from your device simply move the saved page to your computer and print from there. Don’t hesitate to contact customer care at 877-662-3769 or memberservices@disneydigitalbooks.com . Before you download this experience please consider that this app contains advertising for The Walt Disney Family of Companies.

title: Sofia the First Color and Play
author: Disney Publishing Worldwide
description: Color and play to your artist's delight with this all-new super-fun creativity app from Disney! Let your imagination take over as you paint everything in Sofia’s Royal Bedroom and Cedric's Lab even Sofia and Clover. Then watch it all come to life in amazing 3D! Customize your textures with the in-app camera and let your inner artist shine in this magical 3D coloring experience. * Cast magic spells! * Mix potions! * Jump up and down on Sofia’s royal princess bed! * Play with dolls and Clover! * Play a funny game of hide-and-seek with Clover too! * Paint Sofia’s regal bedroom any way you like! Sofia the First Color & Play is a magical 3D coloring book featuring three of your favorite Disney Junior characters Sofia Clover and Cedric. Your child will be inspired to customize everything with paint markers stickers patterns and more…before watching it come to life in 3D! Enjoy creating different worlds with unlimited combinations of tools colors and textures. FEATURES •Paint Sofia and Clover any way you like with infinite combinations of tools colors patterns stickers and more! •Use the magic wand to watch your paintings become fully-animated 3D characters in a 3D world! •Use the in-app camera to create your own unique textures! •Play fun activities with Clover like dolls hide-and-seek or just jump up and down on the royal princess bed! * Cast magic spells and mix potions! •Learn about colors 2D 3D line form and symmetry. **Works with Disney Color and Play! If you already own Sofia Color and Play simply download the free updates first then download Disney Color and Play from the Store. Your rooms will automatically unlock! ***Some additional content will be downloaded when running the app. If you are experiencing difficulties with audio please check the in-app settings and the device itself to see if it is muted. Don't hesitate to contact customer care at 877-662-3769 or mail to: memberservices@disneydigitalbooks.com Before you download this experience please consider that this app contains advertising for The Walt Disney Family of Companies.

title: Family FiveOAK
author: ZingMagic Limited
description: FiveOAK is an addictive dice solitaire game played with a set of five standard dice. It combines the best in luck and skill to entertain for many hours. FiveOAK is a dice game for one or two players. The objective of the game is to score as many points as possible from 13 ‘hands’. A ‘hand’ comprises the values shown on five dice which you roll. You have three opportunities to create a ’hand’. On the first go all five dice are rolled. Thereafter you can choose any or all of the dice to roll. You do not have to use all three attempts to obtain a hand. Using less dice rolls will score bonus points. You score points by obtaining ‘hands’ with specific combinations of dice such as ‘three of a kind’ ‘four of a kind’ and ‘full house’ as in poker. The most valuable hand is ‘five of a kind’ 'Yacht' or 'Yahtzee'. The ultimate aim of the game is to achieve the highest number of points possible and take your place in the “High score Hall of Fame”. FiveOAK supports one or two player mode of play. Individual player statistics include number of games played player average score and high score. Game features * One or two player modes using the same device. * Chance score - get away with that rash gamble! * Bonus scores for making hands early. * High score table. * Full player statistics. * FiveOAK is just one of our large collection of best of breed classic board card and puzzle games available for a wide range of platforms.

title: Little Tales
author: Whisper Arts
description: Little tales is the first children's mobile app which collects works by contemporary storytellers and children's poets. The app is perfect for children from 2 to 12 years! Your child certainly like our stories and poems! Our tales and poems will teach your child to think and help him learn the world around us. It will give answers to simple questions. Listen and watch the modern tales with your children and have fun! Good Warmth and Happiness will come to your home with our stories.

title: Pettson's Inventions Deluxe
author: Filimundus AB
description: The ultimate Pettson compilations app! Compete in the brand new VS mode beat a friend or the clock! "Pettson's Inventions is a great series of fun contraption games. The cooperative play VS mode and the large number of puzzles make the Deluxe version the best of them all." www.geekswithjuniors.com "Excellent educational game of creativity engineering and skill that stretches the imagination!" www.ipadfamily.com.au Containing most inventions from Pettson's Inventions 1 and 2 for a smashing total of 66 stages including 6 completely new. Help old man Pettson and his cat Findus build their amazing inventions! Which of the objects should be included and where do they fit in the machinery? Drag and drop the parts to their right spot and watch the invention go! A fun and pedagogic app that teaches logic and stimulates creativity for children of all ages. - Compete against a friend or the clock in VS mode. - A massive 66 ingenious inventions to solve! - 6 brand new tricky inventions! - New co-op friendly layout. - Get help from visual instructions (optional). - Possibility to increase difficulty by including fake parts in the inventions. - Voices in English German and Swedish. - No in-app purchases.

title: Kids Car Racing game – Beepzz
author: Abuzz
description: Buckle up and join us for a fun ride with our Beepzz rally cars. Choose your favorite vehicle and face the challenges of unique uphill and downhill environments. Our Beepzz buddies will take you on an unforgettable journey through the city farm desert snowy hills Savannah forest rocky mountain holiday beaches and the jungle. Learn multiple skills while you play. This creative arcade racing game will improve your child’s problem solving skills and working memory; and boost their confidence. More importantly they'll have lots of fun. Get ready to get addicted to the most entertaining physics based easy racing game for little kids. Features: Two finger touch simple racing game for young kids aged 2-6. Move forward and backward; jump the obstacles; flip the car if you get stuck upside-down; roll with laughter; race the animal cars to their food. 4 amazing topics with 48 diverse hill-climbing race tracks – more to be added soon! Smooth physics simulation through both uphill and downhill race courses. Collect coins to unlock new cars and themes. Different animated animal vehicles with variable engine power suspension tyres and speed acceleration. Play with the dog shaped van; cat shaped car; bull shaped tractor; camel shaped truck; elephant shaped four wheel drive jeep; reindeer shaped van; and cheetah shaped sports car. Different difficulty levels gradually introduced in the gameplay to stimulate the child’s mind. Keeping in mind that this app is for small kids the cars do not burst or die. Privacy Disclosure: As parents ourselves iAbuzz takes children's wellness and privacy very seriously. Our app does not collect personal data. But yes it does contain advertising as that’s our means of providing the app free of cost to you – the ads are carefully placed such that the kid is least likely to click on it while playing. Feedback Please: If you have any feedback and suggestions on how we could further improve the design and interaction of our apps and games please visit our website http://iabuzz.com/ or leave us a message at kids@iabuzz.com . We would be glad to hear from you as we are committed to update all of our apps and games on a regular basis with new features and also want to get some ideas for future app development.

title: Toonix!
author: Cartoon Network EMEA
description: We’ve listened to your feedback and now have an updated fully functional and stable app you can enjoy and play again. --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Create your own Toonix avatar pick a skateboard and go for a spin on tracks from your favourite Cartoon Network shows: Adventure Time Ben 10 Omniverse The Amazing World of Gumball and Regular Show! CUSTOMISE YOUR TOONIX Change the eyes mouth and hair of your Toonix or give them cool costumes or accessories. SAVE AND SHARE YOUR TOONIX Toonix are not camera shy! So save a picture of your unique creation to share with your friends. COLLECT COINS The more coins you pick up the more new levels and skateboards you unlock. You can collect them in the game or buy them in the store. MESS AROUND! There's lots of hidden ways to play with your Toonix: tickle them spin them around make them sneeze. Discover them all! IN-APP PURCHASES "This game contains in-app purchases: buy individual Stars packs or pay to unlock the whole game Please note: purchases are not necessary to have an amazing game experience." This game is available in the following languages: Arabic English French Italian Portuguese Russian Spanish Turkish If you're having any problems with this app feel free to contact us at advanced.platforms@turner.com . Tell us about the issues you're running into as well as what device and OS version you're using.

title: Max & Ruby Bunny Bake Off
author: Cupcake Digital Inc.
description: It’s time to create yummy dishes or spectacular messes with the most lovable and mischievous bunnies from author/ illustrator Rosemary Wells’ popular Max & Ruby book and television series! Plus have fun painting and sharing sweet holiday-themed coloring pages featuring your favorite bunnies with family and friends. Join Max and Ruby as they make their favorite recipes in the kitchen! Watch out for that silly Max though his recipes are more of a mess than a meal! Max and Ruby’s Bunny Bake Off is a fun app for kids to bake and decorate fun foods with their favorite characters from the hit TV show Max & Ruby. Fans of the show won’t be surprised to see Max’s icky recipes as you make Ant and Acorn Pancakes Max’s Earthworm Cake with Caterpillar Icing and more! Don’t worry though Max’s older sister Ruby has her own amazing recipes and is excited to show you how to make them like refreshing Pink Lemonade and beautiful Birthday Cake with raspberry fluff icing. Best of all Grandma has some traditional recipes like her Fiesta Fruit Flan that are sure to make everyone happy too! But be careful!
