title: Crazy Doodle
author: Madison Sheets
description: Crazy Doodle is a fun app that allows you to draw on your device! All you do is click on a color And draw! If you would like to erase just shake and it all goes away! I made this for my 5th grade science project!:)

title: Kitchen Blocks Puzzle for Kids
author: Abuzz
description: These 3d building blocks will keep your little boys and girls entertained while teaching them kitchen first words and pronunciations. Watch your children learn all the names of numerous home kitchen utensils food preparation cooking accessories and many more items that are used in the house every day just by playing with these rolling cubes. A pleasant voice will always encourage and praise your kids and motivate them to continue to build their vocabulary memory spelling matching tactile fine motor and cognitive skills. This educational game is enriched with animations sounds and interactivity for repeat playing and learning. Features: * Realistic flip or turning effect of puzzle cubes. * 27 different languages and pronunciations - English Arabic Chinese Danish Dutch Filipino Finnish French German Greek Hindi Indonesian Italian Japanese Korean Macedonian Malay Norwegian Polish Portuguese Russian Serbian Spanish Thai Turkish Ukrainian and Vietnamese. * 60 different puzzles each assembled of four 3D blocks. * Simple and easy navigation between different objects. * Cute images and sweet background melodies. * Star animation balloons popping and happy cheering after each correctly solved puzzle. * The theme of this 3D Puzzle is ‘Kitchen’ check our other apps for more themes like ‘Animals’ 'Food' and 'Cars'. Privacy Disclosure: As parents ourselves iAbuzz takes children's wellness and privacy very seriously. Our app: • Does not contain links to social networks • Does not contain any in-app purchases • Does not collect personal data But yes it does contain advertising as that’s our means of providing the app free of cost to you – the ads are carefully placed such that the kid is least likely to click on it while playing. Feedback Please: If you have any feedback and suggestions on how we could further improve the design and interaction of our apps and games please visit our website http://iabuzz.com/ or leave us a message at kids@iabuzz.com . We would be glad to hear from you as we are committed to update all of our apps and games on a regular basis with new free features.

title: My Little Pony: Best Pet
author: PlayDate Digital Inc.
description: Rainbow Dash always knows what she wants—faster cooler and higher! But is this what you should look for in a pet? After running into her Ponyville friends at their weekly pet play date Rainbow Dash wants in and decides to find a perfect pet… her way! In this adventure Rainbow Dash holds a ‘Best Pet’ contest to find the perfect pet for her! Based on the episode May the Best Pet Win from the hit animated series FRIENDSHIP IS MAGIC “My Little Pony: Best Pet” is the newest interactive storybook app from PlayDate Digital -- an action filled fable that highlights what to look for in a pet! It’s perfect for all My Little Pony fans and will speak to all who have ever wanted a pet. MY LITTLE PONY: Best Pet is a wonderful introduction about choosing a pet valuing difference and appreciating friendship. This new interactive storybook app is designed to help emergent readers practice their English skills while following the adventures of their favorite characters. Key Features: • Features the official TV voice of RAINBOW DASH FLUTTERSHY TWILIGHT SPARKLE APPLEJACK AND RARITY from the show FRIENDSHIP IS MAGIC • An introduction to what’s important when choosing a pet • Interactive MY LITTLE PONY action and voices on every page! • Quality animations that bring the story alive • Read to Me and Read Along modes for all levels of early and emergent readers • New and advanced vocabulary highlighted and sounded out on each page • Includes a Sight Word practice section Early and emergent literacy • New vocabulary • Expanding early reading skills • Increasing reading comprehension

title: Build a Ship with Kate & Harry
author: Very Nice Studio S.A.
description: 5/5 STARS from Top Best Apps For Kids! ***** Awarded "Editor's Favorite Appy" badge by appsmarts.com ***** Recommended by WeAreTeachers Blog on their "60 Apps for teaching STEAM" list in Engineering Apps for Gardes K-2 section. ***** "Build a Ship with Kate and Harry. How fun is this app. Help your children and encourage their creative side with this app. They can create a whole range of their own unique ships and watch as either Kate or Harry sail their creation through the seas. They can create any range of ships with the parts available and it is so easy to use. All your children have to do is tap on each of their selections and the app does the rest for them. An excellent fun app which I highly recommend. 5 stars." (review by Sharon Turriff at AppyMall) "It is a cute app I like how you are only limited by your imagination as to what type of ship you can create I like that the music is not over bearing. I like that Mr Toddler doesn’t need my constant help to build and then sail the ships. Mr Toddler Enjoyed this app a lot." (review by Jo-C at IHeartThisApp) "This app provides tons of creative freedom and experimentation as children piece their ship together. They get to choose from various decorations ship bodies masts etc. to create their perfect ship that they can test out on the sea." (review by Lamisha Serf at BestAppsForKids) ***** A carefully designed interactive toy app that focuses on child’s creativity and experimenting perfect for the youngest audience around the world. From award winning Very Nice Studio team. First - pick Kate or Harry to be your helper. Next - build your ship by simply tapping ship parts - there are over 3000 ship design combinations available and all of them are possible to reach in 5 simple steps! Then - watch Kate or Harry steer your ship through a randomly generated environment tap the ship parts and everything you see to check what happens. Look for treasure chests! Finally - enjoy your ship being applauded by an enthusiastic crowd in the docks! HIGHLIGHTS - No written or spoken language just sounds and gestures - For toddlers and preschoolers around the world - Designed for 2-4 years old kids but works great for the whole 1-6 years old range - Unlimited creativity experimenting and discovery options - Only “Tap&Watch” mechanics throughout the app: NO icons NO buttons NO complicated choices NO links - Lots of funny and realistic sounds. - No time pressure no high scores no in-apps no ads. Check also other great apps with Kate and Harry: “Build a Car with Kate&Harry” "Build a Plane with Kate&Harry " "Ride a Pony with Kate&Harry " "Kate and Harry in Africa" "Even toddlers can help themselves have fun find their way around in this app and can proudly present their creations to their parents. These apps are a clear ‘must have’ for all kids!" - topbestappsforkids.com Visit www.kateandharry.com to learn more! ***** PRIVACY POLICY ***** We at Very Nice Studio are parents ourselves and we take your privacy and the privacy of your child very seriously. We comply with the Children's Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA). This software does not store share use or collect any personal information from our users. This software does not include ads links or in-app purchases.

title: Christmas - Coloring Puzzles
author: MagisterApp
description: Merry Christmas to all the children and parents who play and have fun with our coloring puzzle. ★★★★★ Try the New Christmas Game ★★★★★ ★★★★★ Two Games in One ★★★★★ ★★★★★ Puzzles and Colors for Kids ★★★★★ - Puzzles with Sounds and Interactive Background - Drawings to Color Our children will enjoy learning and playing with the characters of Christmas. The child will have also fun discovering all the interactive objects of the background and can hear all the sounds of Christmas. In the full version you will find 14 puzzles and you can paint all the Figures. Intuitive and simple game is designed for kids.

title: Off to bed! boys and girls
author: DADA Company Edutainment
description: * Selected by Apple at 'Rewind 2011' as one of the 5 best book apps in 2011 * Top 1 in the App Store in Spain and Argentina in the Book section * Top 5 in Mexico Colombia Panama Macedonia etc. Discover “Off to bed!” a lullaby for the 21st century! Now you can choose whether the main character is a girl or a boy! ★ GUIDED BY YOUR IMAGINATION★ Enjoy this unique experience with your children a celebration of the imagination with attractive and innovative interactive scenes. It’s bedtime for our young friend. Put him or her to bed and see how once the lights go out fantasy takes over in dreamland. ★ FUN AND LEARNING FOR ALL THE FAMILY ★ “Off to bed!” prepares children for bedtime seeing it as a game full of adventures and fantasy. It is an ideal application for helping parents with the task of putting their children to bed. Through the story the child learns about the ritual of falling asleep. The child is responsible for putting the main character to bed. At the same time he or she will understand that they must go to bed too. ★ A MODERN AND DIFFERENT KIND OF LULLABY ★ A fascinating interactive story told in verse with a multitude of amusing interactive animations that children can discover at their own pace. The child touches the screen to interact with the characters and activate a host of fun-filled surprises: seeing reading listening touching moving hitting and making music all in one! The book also includes a soothing original soundtrack which adapts to fit the rhythm of the narration. A complete story that will delight both tiny tots and older children alike. ★ WHAT THE SPECIALIST BLOGS SAY ★ "It has excellent illustrations and animations [...] very carefully designed." Applesfera "A very well thought-out app with relaxing music and a story told in verse makes bedtime pleasurable for parents and children..." Appsmama.es ★ CHARACTERISTICS ★ • For children of all ages. • Original and creative script. • Exquisite illustrations by Màriam Ben-Arab. • Varied interactive elements. • Funny animations and sounds that create an extraordinary experience. • Intuitive and easy-to-use interface with direct access to scenes. • Easy-to-read thanks to its carefully thought-out typography. • Touch the phrases to repeat. Great for young readers. • Soothing and relaxing original soundtrack. • Develops the child’s hand-eye coordination. • Counting has never been so much fun! • No adverts. ----------------------------------------------------------------------- Visit our page at http://www.DADAcompany.com Follow us on Twitter at http://twitter.com/DADA_Company or if you would like to receive the latest information and news from DADA Company click Like on our Facebook page at http://www.facebook.com/DADACompany . Take a look at at our videos and story previews on YouTube http://www.youtube.com/user/DADAcompanyEdu ★ ABOUT DADA COMPANY ★ DADA Company offers children quality entertainment designed to educate and have fun and to give parents the satisfaction that they are offering their children an enriching educational experience. Each DADA Company story is totally original and different to the previous one. DADA Company has been awarded with the 2013 Bologna Ragazzi Digital Award in the fiction category. Some of their other titles include: "Four Little Squares" "1000 Adventures" or "Learn with Transportation". Support: support@DADAcompany.com

title: Max & Ruby: Hop into Spring
author: Nelvana Digital Inc.
description: Hop your way into fun this season with Max & Ruby: Hop into Spring. Crack all the piñatas on the screen and watch as toys eggs and candy come flying out. Each new piñata opens a new opportunity for fun and prizes. Keep an eye out for special piñatas as you just might find a surprise waiting for you! Now hop to it! Highlights: • New piñatas and prizes! • Break the piñata and collect new prizes! • Create and color your very own piñatas! • Win exclusive Max & Ruby wallpapers! • Unlock power-ups!

title: Winx Bloomix Quest
author: Apps Ministry LLC
description: ***Now even more magic! Complete missions and get weekly rewards! Get the best outfit for Bloom in the showroom. Change clothes right on the run!*** This exciting game will take you into the amazing Winx Club world and thrill you with endless adventures! Winx Bloomix Quest is an official game based on the animated television series Winx Club. Download the app and explore the Winx Magic worlds play as your favorite Winx and overcome all the obstacles on your way! Use magical powers to face powerful foes and fulfill your amazing Bloomix Quest! Winx Bloomix Quest combines several types of gameplay that will keep you entertained for hours featuring a classic runner game that will take you on electrifying chases and exciting boss battles. Features: * Play as your favorite Winx * 3 different types of gameplay in one game * Impressive animation effects * Beautiful 3D locations and graphics * Child-friendly interface Download "Winx Bloomix Quest" today and live your own Bloomix Quest!"

title: Feebidu
author: jTouch GmbH / recreo kids
description: The Good Fairy has been kidnapped by the Time Pirates. Charlie Carpet is distressed! After all the Good Fairy is his best friend. The evil Captain Rumblerum and his crew have risked everything to ensure their evil plan succeeds. Nothing is too horrible for them. They have destroyed all the buildings and everything beautiful on planet Feebidu. Charlie needs your help! Join him on an exciting journey and save the Good Fairy from the clutches of the evil Time Pirates. Collect diamonds and other surprises to rebuild Feebidu and help it regain its former splendor. Features: - A fantastic story with lovingly created characters. - Collect diamonds to rebuild Feebidu. - Discover lots of colorful plants animals and buildings to design Feebidu just the way you want. - Explore Feebidu’s magic places and secrets. - 27 exciting levels packed full of surprises and bonus stones. - Atmospheric music for an immersive playing experience. - No in-app purchases – completely child-friendly! If you wish to contact us simply write to us at: presse@recreo-kids.de Have fun playing! Learn more by visiting our website at www.recreo-kids.com.

title: Cupcake Chefs
author: Pazu Games
description: SAFE FOR KIDS • No Ads • Parental Controls ABOUT PAZU Pazu is a mobile games company that creates and publish beautiful digital games especially designed for kids. CUPCAKE CHEFS Cupcake Chefs is a fun and original game that lets you go through the whole process of making your own cupcakes – choose your favorite character pick your ingredients mix them together heat it in the oven and watch the spectacular outcome! There are 5 different chefs to choose from who will completely change your style of baking - Each character has its own unique ingredients and looks which will lead for a very distinctive cupcake. For example the Cow’s focus is organic good & vegetables while DeeDee’s focus is magic powder and candies. Features • 5 different chefs to choose from – Each with their own unique ingredients and style! • Hundreds of ingredients that can produce countless different cupcakes! • Experience the full baking process – from making the cupcake to heating it and watching the final result! •Colorful and unique toppings icings decorations and characters! •Easy and fluid interface that is designed especially for kids •It’s FREE! Cupcake Chefs lets you experience baking in its most fun and creative form without the dangers of real life baking. With countless options for baking different cupcakes Cupcake Chefs is a captivating tool where the only limit is your imagination!

title: LEGO® Star Wars™ Yoda II
author: The LEGO Group
description: Choose your side and join the battle in LEGO® Star Wars™ The New Yoda Chronicles! Collect the Holocrons to defeat your enemy and take control of the galaxy in a series of fast-paced action packed mini games. Is your destiny to dominate the Galaxy with Darth Vader™ or become a Jedi alongside Grand Master Yoda? • Quest with Yoda™ or Darth Vader™ to discover your destiny • Collect the Holocrons to save the day or crush the rebellion once and for all • Run shoot jump and fly through the LEGO® Star Wars™ universe in style • Battle with lightsabers in Kashyyyk and base jump the pits of Utapau • Take down Star Destroyers defeat the AT-AT Walkers and dogfight in space • Includes 8 action packed MiniFigure levels and 4 epic Space Battles all in one • Featuring 24 iconic LEGO® Star Wars™ MiniFigures and over 12 awesome Vehicles • Sign in with LEGO ID to make your victories count on LEGO.COM/StarWars May the Force be with you! For app support contact LEGO Consumer Service. For contact details refer to http://service.lego.com/contactus Our privacy policy is accepted if you download this app. Read more on http://aboutus.lego.com/legal-notice/Privacy-Policy LEGO and the LEGO logo are trademarks of the LEGO Group. ©2014 The LEGO Group. © & ™ Lucasfilm Ltd. We recommend that you turn your device off and on after installing or upgrading any official LEGO® game or app. For more information about LEGO® Star Wars™ visit www.LEGO.com/starwars

title: SamSam Super Cosmic Games
author: BAYARD PRESSE
description: SamSam Super Cosmic Games. 9 educational and brain games of logic speed and memory. App for kids ages 5 to 8. To become a cosmic hero with SamSam complete all three levels of each game while improving your score! For children ages 5-8. - Successfully complete each game to gain superpowers and unlock the next game. - Improve your score and win super hero badges. - Win the bonus game. 9 different types of games (game of skill speed memory). The games vary each time you play them. Extra stuff: - You can create and save 6 different player profiles - Game play and navigation adapted for children. - Games become progressively more difficult. - A high-quality graphic world. - Includes the characters from the animated series. The nine games: MISSION 1 – IMPROVE YOUR SPEED Tap on the monsters as fast as possible but don’t tap on you friends. MISSION 2 – LEARN TO FLY Touch and hold on the screen to make SamSam fly and avoid the obstacles. MISSION 3 – BUILD YOUR FLYING SAUCER Build your flying saucer with the puzzle pieces. MISSION 4 – BECOME A SUPER PILOT Choose the right shape to help SamSam along his course. MISSION 5 – EXERCISE YOUR OBSERVATION SKILLS Find the differences between the two images. MISSION 6 – REPEL YOUR ENEMIES With your finger push the Piratrocities into the black hole. MISSION 7 - IMPROVE YOUR REFLEXES Tilt the screen to collect all of the toys. MISSION 8 – DEVELOP YOUR SUPER MEMORY Identify who disappears behind the planet in this game of memory. MISSION 9 – Bonus game– The big galactic combat Eliminate all of the monsters to become a real cosmic hero. SamSam is a character created by Serge Bloch for Red Apple magazine (Pomme d’Api) edited by Bayard.

title: LEGO® Ninjago Tournament
author: The LEGO Group
description: You’ve been invited to enter Master Chen’s Tournament of Elements. Utilize your Ninja Training to unlock your True Potential and defeat the other Elemental Masters! Face-off against the all new Elemental Masters each with their own unique abilities. Battle in Chen’s Arena against well known enemies from the Ninjago: Masters of Spinjtsu TV Series. Level up your characters; the more you use them the stronger they become! Unlock your favorite characters including Sensei Garmadon Snike and Mindroid! Unleash the Power of Spinjitsu to blast your way through waves of opponents! Face a mysterious new foe… For app support contact LEGO Consumer Service. For contact details refer to http://service.lego.com/contactus Our privacy policy and terms of use for apps are accepted if you download this app. Read more on http://aboutus.lego.com/legal-notice/Privacy-Policy and http://aboutus.lego.com/en-us/legal-notice/terms-of-use-for-apps LEGO and the LEGO logo are trademarks of the LEGO Group. ©2015 The LEGO Group.

title: Donut Party Lite
author: cuddl LLC
description: NOTICE: This is the Lite version of Donut Party. Check out the full version of Donut Party  which includes achievements Facebook and Google Play Games integration so you can play with your friends and cloud backup of your game progress! Donut Party Lite is a tasty twist on classic match three puzzle games! Embark on a journey of deliciousness as you drive your Donut Truck around the world! Earn points by matching donuts together. Create special donuts to earn even more points! Travel through cities to earn stickers for your doughnut truck. It's a dessert with a sweet candy taste! Yum! Features: ✮ Delicious glittery donut themed match 3 game! ✮ Make special frosty donuts swirl donuts and more! Mmm! ✮ 150 levels and 6 cities to unlock loads of addictive Donut Party Lite puzzle fun! ✮ New obstacles and goals to discover in each city! ✮ Earn stickers for your Donut Truck by completing cities! If you like delicious desserts and playing match 3 puzzle games this is the game for you! It's a yummy pastry themed twist on classic match three jewel puzzle games! Join the Donut Party today! Made with lots of sugar butter and frosting by cuddl LLC.

title: Little Market Free for Kids
author: totekoya
description: Little market is educational app that you can shopping pretend. You can enjoy shopping play while you typed the cash register and put your favorite items in the basket. Even small children can play happily with a simple operation. Guests may rest assured that there is no accounting items and advertising. ※ In the free version will be displayed ads within the app. Ad does not appear in the Full-Version. ■ Operation • You can move to another screen when you swipe or touch the sign at the top of the screen. • You can add to bag by dragging the goods in a basket on the screen of the shelf. • You come out again even if the item lost on the shelf when you move the screen. • You can also calculate or typing a digit in the same way as the calculator is at the cash register. The price will be added to touch the basket of cash register it is passed through a sensor in the middle products came out.

title: Paint 4 Kids
author: Ela & Pietro Lab
description: Paint 4 Kids is a simple app for your kids to paint and color. Help your child to select one of the available drawings and then select you preferred color. Try to fill all the white spaces as you like. You can choose different modes for drawings: fill a shape with a single tap move fingers to fill a shape or free drawing so you can write on the entire screen! And of course you can choose the size of your brush. With Paint 4 Kids you can create amazing drawings with kids and after the hard work you can save share and print you artwork with grandparents and friends.

title: Wubbzy's Beauty Salon
author: Cupcake Digital Inc.
description: ** Get red carpet ready with Wow! Wow! Wubbzy! and pals! Choose from 4 awesome beauty salon treatments – nails make-up hair or spa ** Play & color using loads of styling features and tools ** 20+ fun stickers and nail art to choose from Wubbzy and his friends need help getting ready for a night out in Wuzzleburg! Wash style and primp with 9 friends from the popular Wow! Wow! Wubbzy! Television series. You can complete their new looks with a rockin' makeover and funky nail art! Wubbzy's Beauty Salon was developed by leading kids app developer Cupcake Digital with the producers from the Emmy® Award-winning Nick Jr. series "Wow! Wow! Wubbzy!"® Spend the day pampering your friends with wubbtastic spa experiences: • Cut shape and paint nails in fun colors! Add stickers for fabulous nail art masterpieces! • Play with make–up using plenty of tools and glitter • Get a wash & dry at the hair salon then style with a kooky hat! • Apply face masks and pluck or shave hair for hours of silly fun Cupcakedigital.com provides free downloadable activities to further the educational learning at home. Parents' and Teachers' Guides are also available with helpful tips for getting children ready for school and for utilizing apps to reinforce learning in and out of the classroom. We care about your kids and their safety. This app contains gated areas to ensure that only adults can access anything that would take you outside of the app. A pixel embedded in this app collects anonymous data to help us understand downloads by device. To view our full app privacy policy please visit www.cupcakedigital.com/appsprivacy

title: Project My Pet Puppy
author: CandyCode
description: Welcome to Project My Pet a cute experience with augmented reality where you can use the camera on your smartphone or 7 inch / 10 inch tablet to see and play with a your own virtual puppy. To play with the Project My Pet Puppy you'll need to go to http://www.candycode.co.uk/projectmypet/ ">www.candycode.co.uk/projectmypet/ and print out a picture of the puppy’s basket. Right-click on the image save it to your computer and print out a copy onto ordinary printer paper or card any size (but about 5cm square is ideal). You can use colour or black and white ink. Now place the puppy’s basket on a flat surface run the app and point your camera at it. If nothing happens try holding your phone at a slightly different angle or moving the basket to an area with better lighting. You can change the puppy's position by rotating the basket or moving the camera up and down or side to side. Once you are happy you can play with your brand new puppy by tapping the buttons on your phone’s screen - you can feed your pet get it to stand up or hear it yip. It can also wash itself sit still jump up and settle down to sleep. If you lose the basket or it gets damaged just go back to http://www.candycode.co.uk/projectmypet/ ">www.candycode.co.uk/projectmypet/ to print out another copy. Enjoy!

title: Paddington Bear’s Adventures
author: Daredevil Development Ltd.
description: An official licensed PADDINGTON BEAR™ app for Android. Now you can have fun and play games with Britain's favourite bear Paddington Bear in his first ever officially licensed game. - Pad Gadget includes Paddington as top 10 Kids App..."Brings all of Paddington's accoutrements to iOS devices. From marmalade to his distinctive blue duffle coat the little bear will surely appeal to any Anglophile-in-training. A player can choose a character then play from several minigames where (he) she not only enjoys a virtual tour of London but also earns costume rewards which (he) she can then use to dress Paddington up in a variety of outfits including a doctor a pirate and more" - Guardian (Top30 Apps) says "an array of London scenes featuring - not to mention some suitably-sticky marmalade. Good fun for kids." Paddington Bear's Adventures includes 6 games five of which have a choice of 3 difficulty levels allowing all ages to enjoy the progressive gameplay. As you successfully play through the game you will collect various items of clothing for Paddington™ allowing you to create your very own digital Paddington Bear™ for your personal Paddington scrapbook. Go Sightseeing and you'll need to spot the differences on Nelson's Column on the Guardsman at Buckingham Palace at St Paul's Cathedral and at other famous London attractions. Play the Go Home jigsaw puzzle game and you will have to put together Paddington Station The London Eye Buckingham Palace and other famous buildings. Making Marmalade follows Paddington's Aunt Lucy's famous recipe where you'll mix ingredients to make Paddington Bear's favourite treat. Helping Out where you'll need to use your observation skills to place items in the correct place in Mr Grubers Antique Shop. Tidying Up where you need skill and judgement to pack away items in Paddington's case and keep his room tidy for Mrs Brown. Paddington Dresses Up where you can create your own digital Paddington Bear using the clothes you have unlocked on your adventures. Once created you can use your Paddington Bear when making your own pictures using the scrapbook feature. The game features beautiful Paddington Bear. The game includes specially re-recorded music from the Paddington Bear TV series theme originally composed by Herbert Chappell. Game Features: Hours of fun for all ages Progressive play though 3 levels of difficulty Easy pick up and play Beautiful graphics A picture maker where you can create edit and save your own pictures of Paddington and his friends sightseeing in London Customise and save your own Paddington Bear to use in the picture maker and view in your scrapbook. ABOUT PADDINGTON BEAR For more than 50 years British-born writer Michael Bond has been entertaining children all over the world with his stories of Paddington Bear the marmalade-loving duffle-coat-wearing Wellington-booted bear from Darkest Peru. Paddington's adventures have been adapted several times for the small screen most notably by Michael Bond himself in collaboration with Ivor Wood and FilmFair for the BBC and HBO in the 1970s and 80s. In recognition of Paddington's extraordinary popularity and success Michael Bond was awarded the OBE for services to children's literature in 1997. The brand's longevity and the character’s extraordinary appeal are felt by boys girls mums dads and grandparents everywhere. Today with over 70 titles available in 40 languages and more than 100 countries book sales are in excess of 35 million. Use the 'MORE GAMES' feature in the app where you can view all the other exciting apps from us. If you experience problems rather than posting a negative review please get in touch out service team are here to help. eMail us at: Contact@Daredevil-Development.com Become a fan Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/paddingtonbear

title: Easter Games for Kids: Puzzles
author: Tiltan Games
description: Easter is Here! Play with bunnies and paint them too! 38 Lovely jigsaw and swipe puzzles for kids and toddlers with cute bunnies. Adjustable to your child's skill level. Drawings too! Your kids will just love these hand drawn puzzles and improve his cognitive and spatial skills. This game encourages design image and shape recognition eye hand coordination. Positive and pleasant feedback for the kid for each part and when puzzle is complete. Content: * Enjoy 38 Unique Puzzles * From 2 pieces up to 30 pieces - you choose your skill level. * Two puzzle types - jigsaw puzzle and swipe puzzle * Paint activity - paint over your favourite puzzles. * Fun mini games at end of each puzzle - pop balloons or bubbles. * Easy controls even for small kids large parts and natural puzzle dynamics. * Best for kids ages 1-6 This Easter game contains a single child-safe in-app purchase to unlock the complete game. ––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––– KNOW WHAT'S INSIDE As a MOMs with Apps member we follow the "Know what's inside" best practices for kids’ apps ––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––– Thanks for your support! Have Fun! Tiltan Games Team http://tiltangames.com

title: Tin Marín
author: 503 Estudio
description: Ya puedes descargar gratis la aplicación del Tin Marín museo de los niños disfruta y conoce los diferentes servicios y programas juega y prueba tus conocimientos gana estrellas que podrás canjear por premios. Es una herramienta con la que puedes mantenerte informado sobre: - Tarifas - Promociones - Exhibiciones - Servicios - Programas Puedes ampliar tus conocimientos con un juego de preguntas y respuestas de diferentes temas en un recorrido virtual por las 31 exhibiciones para ganar tendrás que conseguir todas las estrellas si respondes correctamente las preguntas correspondientes a cada exhibición del Museo. - El avión - El Banco de los niños - El Hospital - El Mariposario - El Mercado - El Módulo Lunar - El Planetario - El Reino de los Dientes - El Súper - El Teatrino - El Tren por El Salvador - El Jardín de los Pingües - Jugando y Construyendo - La Casa Panda - La Energía que nos Mueve - La Estación de Bomberos - La Tele - Leamos un Cuento - Los Sentidos - Mi Cuerpo me pertenece a mí - Pinta tu Mundo - Reuso y reciclaje de papel - Riesgolandia - Burbujulandia - Conecta-2 - La Cama de Clavos - Dulce Hogar de Zucaron - El Volcán - Mapas Satelitales - Planeta Azul - La Energía de la Tierra Las preguntas se van actualizando continuamente y siempre vas aprender cosas nuevas e interesantes para tí. Si te equivocas puedes volver a intentarlo hasta completar todo el recorrido. Juega en familia con amigos y compite a ver quién sabe más y lo completa primero. Lo más destacado: - Te da acceso a información importante del museo - Pone a prueba tus conocimientos - Despierta tu interés y capacidad de investigación - Gana premios

title: Pororo Penguin Run
author: mocoga
description: Pororo's fun new 3D running game! Run with Pororo and his adorable friends in this delightful 3D runner! The award winning creators of 'Super Penguins' bring you the official game of Pororo the Little Penguin! Race with adorable characters across loads of fun tracks from ice palaces through snowy villages and many others! Get a boost in dazzling bonus modes with cars planes rockets and more! Compete in fun daily and weekly challenges to win rewards and play with friends by sending them free gifts and comparing scores! With simple 'touch-and-tilt' controls this delightful 3D runner is fun for everyone! Official game of Pororo the Little Penguin an award-winning cartoon series! Run jump and fly your way across Pororo's delightful world collecting stars and coins on the way! Join the adventure for free today! Brought to you by an award-winning team. - FREE TO PLAY - Run with all of the adorable characters from the Pororo cartoon - Simple "touch and tilt" controls - everyone can play - Race through fun tracks from ice palaces to snowy towns and more - Dazzling bonus modes with cars planes rockets and more - Complete fun new daily and weekly challenges for great rewards - Compare high scores with friends and send them free gifts Fun new 3D runner! Official game of award winning ‘Pororo the Little Penguin’!

title: ¡A la cama! niños y niñas
author: DADA Company Edutainment
description: * Seleccionada por Apple en 'Rewind 2011' como una de los 5 mejores apps de libros en 2011 * Top 1 en el App Store de España y Argentina en la sección de Libros * Top 5 en México Colombia Panamá Macedonia etc. Descubre “¡A la cama!” la primera nana del Siglo XXI. ¡Ahora podrás elegir que el protagonista sea un niño o una niña! ★ IMAGINACIÓN AL PODER ★ Disfruta con tus hijos de una experiencia única. Una celebración de la imaginación y la fantasía en atractivas e innovadoras escenas interactivas. Ha llegado la hora de dormir para nuestro pequeño protagonista. Llevadle a la cama y observad cómo una vez apagadas las luces la fantasía se adentra en sus dulces sueños. ★ DIVERSIÓN Y APRENDIZAJE PARA TODA LA FAMILIA ★ “¡A la cama!” prepara a los niños para irse a dormir viviéndolo como un juego lleno de aventuras y fantasía. Es la aplicación perfecta para facilitar a los padres la tarea de acostar a sus hijos. A través de la historia el niño comprende el ritual del sueño. El niño tendrá que encargarse de llevar al personaje a la cama. Al mismo tiempo irá asimilando que también ha llegado para él la hora de dormir. ★ UNA NANA DIFERENTE Y ACTUAL ★ Un fascinante cuento interactivo en verso con multitud de simpáticas animaciones interactivas que cada niño podrá irá descubriendo a su propio ritmo; déjale tocar la pantalla para interactuar con los personajes y disparar gran cantidad de sorpresas a cada cual más divertida; Ver leer escuchar jugar tocar desplazar chocar y hacer música ¡todo en uno! Además el libro incluye una dulce banda sonora original que se adapta al ritmo de la narración. Una completa obra que hará las delicias de los niños más pequeños y también de los más mayores. ★ LO QUE DICEN LOS BLOGS ESPECIALIZADOS ★ "Tiene unas excelentes ilustraciones y animaciones [...] ha sido diseñada con bastante cariño." Applesfera "App muy bien resuelta con música muy relajante y una historia rimada hará la hora de irse a la cama todo un momento de placer para padres y niños… " Appsmama.es ★ CARACTERÍSTICAS ★ • Para niños de todas las edades. • Guión original y creativo. • Exquisitas ilustraciones a cargo de Màriam Ben-Arab. • Rico en variedad de elementos interactivos. • Graciosas animaciones y sonidos que crearán una experiencia sorprendente. • Interfaz intuitivo y fácil con acceso directo a escenas. • De fácil lectura gracias a su cuidado aspecto tipográfico. • Toca cada frase para repetir su locución. Estupendo para los primeros lectores. • Dulce y relajante banda sonora original. • Desarrolla la coordinación mano-ojo en el niño. • ¡Recitar y contar los números nunca ha sido tan divertido! • Sin publicidad. ----------------------------------------------------------------------- Visita nuestra página web en http://www.dadacompany.com Síguenos en Twitter en http://twitter.com/DADA_Company o haz clic en Me gusta en Facebook en http://www.facebook.com/DADACompany para más información sobre todas nuestras novedades. Echa un vistazo a los vídeos y trailers de nuestras apps en http://www.youtube.com/user/DADAcompanyEdu ★ SOBRE DADA COMPANY ★ Dada Company ofrece a los niños entretenimiento de calidad diseñado para educar y divertir y a los padres la satisfacción de ofrecer a sus hijos una experiencia de aprendizaje enriquecedora. Cada obra de DADA Company es totalmente original y diferente a la anterior. DADA Company ha sido galardonado con el Bologna Ragazzi Digital Award 2013 en la categoría de ficción. Algunos de sus títulos son: “Por Cuatro Esquinitas de Nada” “1000 Aventuras” “Marina y la luz” o “Con los transportes aprendo” entre otros. Soporte: soporte@dadacompany.com

title: Sea Battle Pirate
author: appliciada
description: SEABATTLE PIRATE FEATURES: ★ Easy to get into the game and great fun to play! ★ Multi-platform game for adults and kids ★ 3 difficulty levels (easy normal hard) ★ Become a true Jack-Sparrow-like pirate of the seas ★ Next generation marine adventure! ★ Immaculate effects ★ Optimized for phones and tablets of different sizes Do you remember playing Battleship on paper with your classmates? Did you struggle with drawings? There's no need no more. Play SeaBattle Pirate on your phone tablet or even TV. Enjoy cool design and ambient music with clean sound effects. Free naval journey where you can develop your strategic skills. Attack an opponent Win a glorious victory old salt! ▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀ SEA BATTLE GAME RULES ▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀▄▀ You've got a navy consistant of 1 battleship ( it takes 4 squares) 2 cruisers (3 squares) 3 torpedo boats/destroyers (2 squares) 4 cutters (1 square per each cutter) All ships should be located on the 10x10 square field. Battle Ships can not border each other by angles or sides. You gotta demolish opponent's navy first Forestall an opponent marine win the battle - This is the aim of SeaBattle Pirate. Enjoy incredible warship! Our team is glad to see your comments. Leave it here or write to appliciada@gmail.com Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/groups/appliciada/ VK: https://vk.com/appliciada
